item.text: dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud bzhugs so//
rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la kro d+hI tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das zhi khro'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos nas bshad pa'i
dus gcig na// ji ltar snang zhing srid pa dang/ mthong zhing thos pa dang/ bstan cing rtogs pa 'di dag thams cad/ ye nas ma g.yos shing/ bcos pa med pa'i chos nyid la/ snang
ba ni lha dang lha mo'i sku gsung thugs/ phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang la/ mi snang na dngos po dang mtshan ma dang/ gzung 'dzin dang rtag chad du mi snang ba yin la/ yod na ni
sems kyi ye shes gsal la ma bsgribs par sangs rgyas par yod la/ med na gnyis su snang ba dang/ phyogs dang ris su phye ba med pa yin la/ rol na thabs dang shes rab
dbyings dang ye shes dga' ba dang bde ba'i longs spyod chen por rol pa yin la/ mi rol na chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la/ gang la yang ma chags gang la yang mi
'dzin/ gang la yang mi gnas pa yin pas/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis rtog pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par snang bas/ dper na nam mkha' la 'di zhes gzung rgyu med pa la/ mig
nad can la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar yang snang la/ snang ba'i dbang gis tha dad par snang ba bzhin du/ yang dag pa'i chos nyid la/ gang yang grub pa med pa la/ log
pa dang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang ste/ chos nyid snang ba ma rtogs pas ma rig pa'i dbang du gyur la/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis mun pa'i smag bzhin 'thibs pas/ ye shes kyi

snang ba nub par gyur to// rtogs pa'i dbang gis las sna tshogs yang snang bar gyur to// nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'du byed sna tshogs par snang bar gyur to// phyin ci log gi dbang gis gol ba sna tshogs su

gyur to// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rgyu 'bras sna tshogs su gyur to// sdig pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs su gyur to// las kyi dbang gis nyon mongs shing myang ba sna tshogs su gyur to// de dag kyang gang zhe na/
'di lta ste/ 'khrul pa la las rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig mi 'da' ba'i chos nyid la/ 'da' bar byar med pa la/ rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa la mi rigs shing 'da' ba'i las byas pas/ 'jig rten gyi
khams 'dir yid du mi 'ong ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs par sdug bsngal sna tshogs las nam yang thar ba'i dus med par skyes pa dang/ 'khrul pa la
las 'dod pa dang/ longs spyod la chags pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa rnams la/ brkam chags sna tshogs par spyad pa'i dbang gis/ yi dwags la sogs pa'i gnas su yun ring bar
'khod pa dang/ 'khrul pa la las gti mug gi dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la thug thub tu spyad pa dang/ thams cad ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bab col du gyur pas/ byol song la sogs pa'i gnas su
skyes nas/ de las 'chi na yang slar lus de nyid len cing bskal pa yun ring bar gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du mi dang lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang/

'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa nyams su myong zhing 'khor ro// 'khrul pa la las bstan cing bsgrag pa dang/ bsgom zhing bsgrub par bya ba rnams ni/ bdag gis ma rtogs shing gzhan la ma khrol bar byas/

gsang zhing sba ba dang thabs kyis spyod pa rnams ni/ bdag gi ngo mthon dang gsang mtshams med par spyad la/ gzhan la yang de ltar bstan cing de bzhin du bsgom ste/ lta bas mchod pa thams cad la bsgom pa
dang/ bsgoms pas ma chod par ci la yang 'jug pa dang/ bsgrub pa mthar ma phyin par las rnam pa sna tshogs pa brtsams te/ bdag nyid phung po lha'i dkyil 'khor du sgrol ma shes par/ sems can gzhan la
mngon spyod kyis sgral ba'i las la bab col bar byas pa dang/ bdag nyid sems kyi chos nyid ma skyes pa la/ rtogs pa'i ye shes sbyor ma shes par/ gzhan yid du 'ong ba la glags la bab pa dang/ thabs 'og
tu chud pa dang/ rdo rje g.yos pa'i dbang gis/ mo'i rigs snang snang la sbyor ba'i las bab col byas pa dang/ bdag nyid bsgom pa'i ting 'dzin ma gsal bar/ gzhan drang bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor
la sogs pa'i dpon byas te gzhan tshom bu la sogs pa bsdus nas/ bka' bzhin du ni gang yang ma byas/ phrin las kyi lung 'chol ba sna tshogs par byas pa dang/ bdag nyid bsgrubs pa'i rang rtsal ma rdzogs
par 'jig rten gyi khe grags dang gzhan thub par 'dod pa'i mthu rtsal 'dod pa'i phyir/ mu stegs la sogs pa'i log pa'i chos dang/ de la brten pa'i gang zag gis 'dod pa tshol ba'i bcos bu dang/ 'phral
bsdebs byas nas dam med pas/ gzhan la bslus pa'i 'gal ba chen po la khrims phyung nas/ dang du len par byed pa dang/ bdag nyid dngos grub gsal bar ma thob par/ gzhan gyis bkur bar 'dod pa
dang/ btsun zhing mkhas par 'dod pa'i phyir/ lung las btus pa dang/ yid las byung ba'i snyan ngag tu sdeb sbyor byas nas/ gzhan la 'chad cing ston par byed/ bdag nyid rgyal ba'i bka' brgyud gsal bar
ma gyur pas/ gzhan las bdag nyid chung bar mthong bas/ bdag nyid kyis phyogs bsdus nas gzhan dang ris su bcad nas/ bka' 'di las lhag pa gzhan na med do// zhes smra bar byed cing de'i sde dang

'khor gyis kyang de bzhin du rang rang gi ris bzung zhing che bar phyung nas/ gsang ba'i don blo la ma son pas smra ba'i rgyu chung bas/ gsang ba skad smra zhing nyon mongs pa'i mthu gting brtas par byed pa dang/
bdag nyid nyon mongs pa la shas cher spyad pas/ gzhan yang de la lan 'don pa'i dbang gis/ bdag dang gzhan dngos su 'thab pa dang/ skyon dang zol la sogs pa bshams nas/ 'khrug pa dang

gsod pa la sogs pa byed pa dang/ bdag nyid kyis mi rtag pa dang/ sgyu ma lta bu'i don mi shes pas/ mi chos kyi blon po lta bu dang/ 'du 'dzi g.yeng ba spyod pa'i las byed pa dang/ de lta bu'i log par 'dren

pa'i slob ma mang ba'i dbang gis/ gzhan thams cad kyang de lta bu'i las byed pa dang/ gcig la gcig 'dzug pa dang/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang/ phrag dog rlom pa dang/ che ba dang bkur ba'i rim pa med par
gnad du btsugs nas/ log pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsham pa dang/ log pa dang sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs par spyad pa'i dbang gis/ yongs kyis dpya sla bar gyur nas/ kun kyang 'jig rten gyi
khams 'dir mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyams su myong nas/ bsgrub pa la don med cing dus ma yin par tshe zad nas/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba'i yang gting du skye bar 'gyur

ro// nam yang 'thon pa'i dus med pa yin no// phal pa rnams dang slob ma rnams kyis sna drangs nas/ mnar med pa ma gtogs pa yan chad nas/ nyi tshe ba man chad du bskal pa du ma zhig gi bar du sdug bsngal

nyams su myong nas/ de las thar nas byol song dang yi dwags kyi gnas su skye na yang/ sngon gsang sngags spyod tsa nas/ zhe sdang gi dbang gis mgo lus mang bar bsgoms pa'i kha mig mgo lus mang bar skyes

nas/ der yang sdug bsngal shas cig nyams su myong nas/ de nas thar nas skye na yang thar pa'i sgo lho nub pas/ gnas kyang lho nub mtshams dur khrod ka rangs zhes bya bar skyes/ de dngos por 'dzin dbang gis

lho nub mtshams de yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gnas/ tha ma grong khyer gyis bskor ba/ phyi mtha' dur khrod kyi tshogs mang bar gnas pa'i yul du skyes/ de la gnas pa de la yang rang rgyud kyi gnas ma yin

te khro bo'i las dbang gi snang ba'o// de lta bu'i dbus su na/ sngon gsang sngags kyi don spyod tsa na/ dngos po la brtag par 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas/ ru tra rnam pa gsum gyi bdag po dbus na gnas pa de/
sngon dngos po yod pa la che bar bsgoms pa'i dbang gis/ lus ri rab tsam la/ sdig pa'i las sngon du thal zhing/ bsod nams kyi las phyir lus pas/ mdog kyang thal mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa

dug gsum gyi rtsa ba las/ nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par sngon spyad pa'i mthus/ lag na yang mdung rtse gsum pa la sogs te/ mtshon cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa thogs pa/ sngon nyon mongs pa grags pa che
ba'i 'khor dang smon lam mthun pas/ de'i 'khor yang shar gti mug che ba dri za'i srin po/ lho nga rgyal che ba gshin rje'i srin po/ nub 'dod chags che ba klu'i srin po/ byang phrag dog che ba gnod

sbyin srin po/ de rnams kyang chos nyid la chog shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin med pas/ kun kyang sems can mang po zos 'chos kyang skem pa la hrid pa rtsa rgyus sra ba/ pags pa gnyer ma rus gong che ba'o// de rnams kyang

sngon 'dod chags dang 'bral ma shes pas/ chung ma re re dang 'khril te/ de rnams sngon 'dod chags la chog pa'i dus med pas gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i byi mo dang/ slas dang dur khrod la sogs pa'i mo rnams la

chags pa spyad pa'i dbang gis/ de rnams kyi 'khor na srin mo brgyad dang/ mgo brnyan ma brgyad dang/ sha za nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis/ gtso mo bzhi ste rtsa drug/ las dang mngag gzhug sum

brgya drug cu dang/ gsod pa bco brgyad yang bran brgyad khri bzhi stong/ sum brgya drug cu/ bco brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ bzhi la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi lag char bskur nas/ skye 'gro mthong dag ni

bsgral nas/ thams cad phung bar byas te/ gtsang sme med par za ste/ ta na'i las la dus dang rgyun med par byed/ chung ma dang 'khor thams cad la bzang ngan med par sbyor zhing/ 'dod chags kyi las la dus

dang rgyun mi 'chad par byed/ gsod gcod dang mi snyan pa'i dgra drag po dus med par grags/ sha dang rus pa ni ri ltar spungs/ khrag dang chu ser ni mtsho ltar bskyil/ gzugs dang khog pa ni rdza ltar bsnyil/

gsur dang dud pa'i dri bsung sprin ltar gtibs/ ha ha dang kha kha 'brug ltar bsgrag/ mtshon cha dang rnag khrag char ltar 'bab/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ srin mo nad

gtong ma brgya dang/ lcags kyi tiSh+ta sprul pa bzhi la sogs pa btang ste/ dang po dud 'gro'i gnas bzhi la/ nad sna tshogs dang/ mtshon cha sna tshogs btang ste zos/ de nas gling bzhi'i mi zos/ de bzhin du 'dod
khams dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams ril dbang du sdus shing zos te/ thams cad du gsod pa dang/ sbyor ba'i las mtha' dag gtsor spyod cing/ 'bras bu ngan song gsum dang mnar med pa'i
las sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa la/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings nas/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs nas/ shin tu nyam thag cing gol bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de dang cha mthun

sprul par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa kun tu bzang pos khro bo thams cad kyi mchog he ru kar sprul te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad sku la tshang zhing rdzogs nas/ khyab cing
gdal ba'i phyir na/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sprul/ yum kun tu bzang mo kro d+hI shwa ri gnam zhal mar sprul nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las rigs lnga'i sangs

rgyas yab yum rnams ye shes kyi he ru ka yab yum bcur gyur te/ rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bud+d+ha he ru ka yab yum du gyur nas/ de ci bas kyang sku che ba phyag mang ba mtshon cha rno ba me dpung 'bar ba/ nga ro che

ba mthu che ba drag cing rngam pa/ gsod pa la brtson par sprul te/ dregs pa chen po gtso bor rU tra dngos su bsgral lo// yum gyis de'i chung ma bsgral lo// de bzhin du badzra he ru ka yab yum gyis/ shar gyi dri za'i

srin po pho mo bsgral lo// rat+na he ru ka yab yum gyis/ lho gshin rje'i srin po pho mo bsgral lo// pad+ma he ru ka yab yum gyis/ nub klu'i srin po pho mo bsgral lo// karma he ru ka yab yum gyis/ byang gnod sbyin gyi

srin po pho mo bsgral lo// bdud dang srin po'i lag cha mdung rtse gsum rgyal byed rtags kyi kha T+wAM gar bsnams/ pags pa g.yang gzhir sku la gsol lo// thod pa mnabs zhal du mdzad do// rnam par shes pa'i

sems rigs nges pa'i sras su gyur pas/ rak+sha he ru ka'i skur gyur to// ngan song gsum du skye nges pa'i sras sems rigs nges pa'i sras su bsgral bas/ sa nu he ru kar gyur to// 'khor byang chub sems dpa'

sems can rnams kyis kyang/ de rnams kyi 'khor rnams btul te/ srin po de'i dur khrod grong khyer gyi shar phyogs na/ srin mo chen mo keng rus thod yangs ma zhes bya ba/ keng rus thod du bcings nas/ zhing gi

dbyug pa dang/ thod khrag thogs nas/ dur khrod chen po'i khrag 'thung yul na 'khod pa la/ byams pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis kyang ma thul ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos/ khro mo ko'u ri

mar sprul te/ lag pa g.yas na zhing gi dbyig pa thogs pas/ mo'i dbyig pa dbang du bsdus/ g.yon pa b+han+d+ha rak+tas mo'i thod khrag dbang du bsdus/ sku dang 'od me dpung gis mo'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas/
srin mo des bsams pa/ bdag pas kyang mthu byin che bas skyabs kyang btsal/ bdag dang spyod pa cha mthun pas lung stsal ba yang mnyan la/ bdag dang rigs gcig pa cig kyang gzod 'byung bsams pa las/

khro mo des smras pa/ khyod thod khrag dang zhing dbyug thogs nas khrag 'thung ba la don ci lta bu zhes smras pa las/ srin mo des gsol pa/ bdag bkres shing skom pa la chog pa'i dus med pas 'tshal lo// zhes

gsol to// khro mos smras pa/ de ltar ma yin te/ nga thod khrag thogs pa ni nyon mongs pa khrag dang 'dra ba de chos nyid du zad par byed pa'i rtags yin la/ zhing gi dbyig pa ni ma rig pa bcom nas 'khor ba rdul
du brlag pa'i rtags yin no// zhes smras pas/ srin mo des kyang de bzhin du bsgoms pas/ srin mo des phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du ko'u ri'i bran dang yang bran
dang/ khol dang yang khol du dbang byin te bzhag go/ de bzhin du srin po'i yul gyi lho phyogs/ dur khrod chen po 'jigs pa'i yul na/ srin mo mda' 'phen mas sems can thams cad gsod cing za ste/ byams

dang snying rje ni med/ nyon mongs pa rang gam la zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis kyang ma thul ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos lha mo tso'u ri ma thabs kyi mda' 'gengs mar sprul nas/ srin mo

de dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ bran dang yang bran dang khol dang yang khol du dbang byin te bzhag go/ de bzhin du srin po'i yul gyi nub phyogs dur khrod chen

po 'dzin byed na/ srin mo 'dzin byed ma zhes bya ba lag na chu srin gson ma pi ta thogs pas/ sems can thams cad 'dzin cing mi gtang bar za ba la/ byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis ma thul ba las/ byang
chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ khro mo pra mo ha mdog dmar ba lag par chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs par sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha bstun zhing rigs gcig par byas nas btul te/

yang gong ma bzhin du bzhag go/ srin po'i yul gyi byang phyogs dur khrod sgrol ba na/ srin mo be tA nag mo zhes bya la/ lag g.yas sbar khyim gdengs nas bus pa brdung ba/ g.yon pas bus pa khog rangs su za ba

cig gnas pa la/ yang cis kyang ma thul ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ khro mo be twa li g.yas rdo rje g.yon bus pa za bar sprul nas/ gong ma bzhin du bzhag go/ srin po'i yul gyi shar lho

mtshams nas/ dur khrod 'dren byed ces bya ba na/ srin mo nang khrol 'dren ma zhes bya bas sems can thams cad bsad nas nang khrol dang rgyu ma sha khrag rlon par za ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/

khro mo puk+ka sIr sprul nas/ yang gong ma bzhin du bzhag go/ srin po'i yul gyi lho nub mtshams na dur khrod chen po'i tshal sngon na/ srin mo chen mo rab 'jigs ma zhes bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo bo

phor par bcad nas/ sha khrag tshil bus bkang ste/ sor mo gsum gyis dkrug cing 'thung ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel bas/ khro mo g+has ma rir sprul nas btul te yang gong ma bzhin du

bzhag go/ srin po'i yul gyi nub byang gi mtshams na dur khrod sa la zhes bya ba na/ srin mo chen mo srog gcod ma zhes bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi snying khrag rtsa ba nas phyung nas za ba la/ byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ khro mo smar sha nIr sprul nas btul te/ yang de bzhin du bzhag go/ srin po'i yul gyi byang shar mtshams na/ dur khrod chen po ka pa la na/ srin mo smyon ma zhes bya ba/
sems can thams cad kyi mgo lus bcad nas/ smyon ma'i brtul bzhugs kyis gar sha stag byed pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ khro mo tsaN+Da lir sprul nas/ yang de bzhin du btul nas
bzhag go/ de nas srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi phyi rol na/ shar phyogs 'jig pa chen po'i yul na/ srin mo mgo brnyan ma 'joms byed chen mo seng ge'i mgo can/ sems can thams cad/ kha long du blang nas/

sprug cing ril mid par byed pa la/ thabs cis kyang ma thul ba las/ lha mo lA s+ya mas phra men ma sing ha mar sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma

'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du bran dang yang bran dang/ g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang byin te bzhag go/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i yul na/ srin mo phra men za byed stag mgo ma/ lag pas bsnol nas bam chen po la

'bru tshugs su blta ba la/ lha mo mA le mas phra men ma stag mgo can du sprul nas btul te/ de bzhin du bzhag go/ nub phyogs klu'i yul na srin mo phra men ma len byed ma zhes bya ba/ wa'i mgo can ma dpag tshad

brgyad khri bzhi stong nas/ bam chen mo'i dri tshor nas len par byed pa la/ lha mo gIr ti mas sri la mu khar sprul te btul nas/ de bzhin du bzhag go/ srin mo phra men mang ro ma zhes bya ba/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin

gyi yul na/ khyi'i mgo can bam chen po la 'drad cing za ba la/ lha mo nIr ti mas/ phra men ma shwa na mu khar sprul nas/ de bzhin du btul te bzhag go/ yang shar lho'i mtshams drang srong gi yul na/ srin mo phra men

ma khrag 'thung ma/ bya rgod kyi mgo can thod khrag 'thung ba la/ lha mo d+hu pe mas gr-id+d+ha mu khar sprul nas btul te bzhag go/ lho nub nair r-i t+ya'i yul na/ srin mo phra men ma rkang za ba zhes bya ba/ bya kang+ka'i mgo can

ma bam chen po phrag la khur nas/ sha dang khrag dang rkang dang tshil bu za ba la/ lha mo badzra puSh+pe mas phra men dur bya'i mgo can mar sprul nas btul te bzhag go/ nub byang rigs sngags 'chang ba'i yul na/ srin

mo phra men ma 'joms byed ma bya rog gi mgo can/ lag na spu gri ka ma la thogs nas/ bam chen po'i mgo bcad pa thogs shing za ba la/ lha mo mar me mas/ kA k+ka mu khar sprul nas btul te bzhag go/ byang shar

'byung po mang po'i yul na/ srin mo phra men ma skul byed ma 'ug pa'i mgo can/ lcags kyu dang thod khrag thogs nas/ bam chen po'i tsit+ta brku ba las/ lha mo dri chab mas U lu mu khar sprul nas btul te/ de
bzhin du bzhag go/ srin mo'i yul dang gnas kyi phyi rol na/ grong khyer chen po bzhi la/ shar phyogs grong khyer tsa ka li byi na/ mi'am ci'i srin mo rta mgo can lag na lcags kyu thogs te/ thams

cad 'dzin cing za ba las/ byams pa chen pos lcags kyu mar sprul nas btul te bzhag go/ lho phyogs kyi grong khyer chen po ya ma yo ti na/ grul bum gyi srin mo phag mgo can lag na zhags pa thogs te/ thams

cad 'ching zhing za ba la/ snying rje chen pos zhags pa mar sprul te btul nas bzhag go/ nub phyogs su grong khyer mA ra ya na/ lto 'phye'i srin mo dred mgo can lag na lcags kyi dra ba thogs nas/ thams cad za ba

la/ dga' ba chen pos nyi zla lcags sgrog can gyi skur sprul nas btul te bzhag go/ byang phyogs grong khyer chen po'i rtsa ma'i ri na sha za'i srin mo spyang ki'i mgo can/ lag gnyis sder 'dzings su sbyar te/ thams

cad spor cing za ba las/ btang snyoms chen mo dril bu mar sprul nas btul te de bzhin du bzhag go/ de'i phyi rim phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad na/ phyogs skyong srin po brgyad kyi bu mo 'bar ma brgyad las/ shar

phyogs dri za mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grong khyer na dri za'i rgyal po'i bu mo 'bar ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can lag na nyi zer gyi zhags pa thogs nas/ stong gsum mam khams gsum 'dzin cing za ba la/ ston

pa kun tu bzang po'i thugs las yi ge k+sha phyung/ de la spor byed nyi zer zhags pa can du sprul nas/ de dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems

can thams cad kyi don du bran dang yang bran dang/ g.yog dang yang g.yog dang/ 'khor dang yang 'khor du dbang byin te bzhag go/ de bzhin du shar lho'i drang srong mang po'i grong khyer na/ me lha ag ne'i bu mo

'bar ma me khyer glog phreng 'dzin la/ yi dwags kyi thub pa kha 'bar mas/ spor byed me khyer glog 'dzin du sprul nas btul te/ gong ma bzhin du bzhag go/ lho phyogs gshin rje mang po'i grong khyer na/ gshin rje'i

bu mo 'bar ma gtum mo mdung thung 'phen la/ mi'i thub pa shAkya thub pas spor byed ma der sprul te btul lo// lho nub srin po'i grong khyer na/ srin po nerar-i t+ya'i bu mo 'bar ma gshin rje ral gri'i skra la dmyal

ba'i thub pas der sprul nas btul lo// nub phyogs chu lha mang po'i grong khyer na/ ba ru Na'i bu mo 'bar ma rdo rje dril 'khrol ma la/ chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i thugs las yi ge a byung/ a las spor byed

rdo rje dril 'khrol mar sprul nas btul lo// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams rlung lha mang po'i grong khyer na/ rlung lha ba dan gyi bu mo 'bar ma gnod sbyin khyung thogs ma la/ lha'i thub pas spor byed ma der sprul nas
btul lo// byang phyogs gnod sbyin ku be ra'i grong khyer na/ gnod sbyin dbyug tho can gyi bu mo 'bar ma thogs med skar mda'i gtong la/ lha ma yin gyi thub pas spor byed ma der sprul nas btul

lo// byang shar bgegs mang po gnas pa'i grong khyer na/ dpal ldan gyi bu mo 'bar ma ba lang sna la/ byol song gi thub pas spor byed ma 'jig rten pAk+Sha rgya bal du skye ba'i shing gi bye brag gcig rdeb tu sprul nas btul te de

bzhin du bzhag go/ srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi gru bzhi na/ bdud kyi bu mo za byed ma dang/ rmongs byed ma dang/ za ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ rmongs pa skem byed ma bzhi la/ dpal chen po'i thugs gsang ba'i

gzungs ma bzhi las/ gsang ba'i yum chen mo bzhi ste/ bde ba za byed ma dang/ bde ba rmongs byed ma dang/ bde ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang bzhir sprul nas/ de rnams kyi 'dod pa'i spyod
pa dang cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i don du gsang ba'i gzungs ma'i g.yog dang yang g.yog la sogs pa'i dbang byin te bzhag go/ de nas srin po'i yul

dang/ gnas kyi phyi rol na/ srin po'i 'khor dang mkha' 'gro ma sha khrag rus pa'i lhag sdud chen mo la/ phyogs bzhi na bzhi bzhi/ mtshams bzhi na gsum gsum/ sgo bzhi na re re ste sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ sems

dpa' chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis btul te/ shar thal ba yod pa'i gling na/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bzhi btul ba las dga' bar byed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mdog thal skya/ lag na pad+ma lo ma dang chas par byas
nas/ sems can thams cad dbang du sdud cing za ba las/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpas mkha' 'gro dga' bar byed pa lag na rdo rje rtse gsum thogs par sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas
nas/ thabs kyis btul te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du/ bran dang yang bran la sogs par dbang byin te bzhag go/ de bzhin du mkha' 'gro 'dren byed lag na lcags
kyu thogs pa la/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal pos mkha' 'gro ma 'dren byed mar sprul nas btul lo// de bzhin du sems dpa' chen po rdo rje legs pas/ mkha' 'gro ma gsod byed mar sprul nas/ srin
po'i 'khor gsod byed ma btul lo// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chags pas mkha' 'gro ma spor byed mar sprul nas/ srin po'i 'khor spor bar byed ma btul lo// lho phyogs me tog bkram pa'i gling na/ rin
chen rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis btul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma la/ 'bar byed ma mdog sngo lag na me 'bar ba la/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin chen gyis mkha' 'gro ma 'bar byed mar sprul nas btul te gong
ma bzhin bzhag go/ de bzhin du rdo rje nyi mas srin po'i 'khor gzi brjid ma btul lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis khro gnyer ma btul lo// rdo rje bzhad pas 'joms byed ma btul lo// nub phyogs

khrag gi rgya mtsho'i gling na/ srin po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi la/ pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis btul ba la/ mkha' 'gro chags chen ma lag na pad+ma gdengs pa mdog dmar mo la/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
chos kyis/ mkha' 'gro chags chen mar sprul nas btul lo// de bzhin du rdo rje rnon pos chags bral ma btul lo// rdo rje 'khor los 'khor lo ma btul lo// rdo rje smra bas rgyas 'debs ma btul lo// byang

phyogs sha'i phung po spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi la las kyi rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis btul ba/ mkha' 'gro sna tshogs ma lus mdog ser lag na mtshon cha rgya gram thogs pa la/ sems

dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyis/ mkha' 'gro sna tshogs lus mdog ljang gu/ rdo rje rgya gram thogs par sprul nas gong ma bzhin du btul nas bzhag go/ de bzhin du rdo rje go chas srung ba mo btul lo// rdo rje mche

bas gnod sbyin mo btul lo// rdo rje khu tshur gyis yan lag 'phrog ma btul lo// shar lho mtshams na rkang sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma gsum la/ mkha' 'gro bya rog mgo lag
na gri thogs pa la/ sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro bas bya rog gi mgor sprul te/ lag na gri dang 'khar gzhong thogs pas spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas btul te gong ma bzhin du bzhag go/ debazhin du
kun tu bzang pos 'jigs byed ma btul lo// zla 'od gzhon nus 'ug mgo ma btul lo// lho nub tshil sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma gsum la/ sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong

kun la skyong gis/ mkha' 'gro bzhad mgo mar sprul nas/ srin po'i 'khor bzhad mgo ma btul lo// de bzhin du dra ba can gyi 'od kyis khyi mgo ma btul lo// rdo rje snying pos phag mgo ma btul lo// nub byang
zhag sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma gsum la/ sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ mkha' 'gro rnga mo'i mgor sprul nas/ srin mo rnga mo'i mgo can btul lo// de bzhin

du 'od dpag med kyis bong bu'i mgo can btul lo// mya ngan kun 'joms kyis ra mgo ma btul lo// byang shar mtshams na nang khrol dang ba su ta sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma
gsum la/ sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i ye shes tog gis/ mkha' 'gro ma byi la'i mgo can mar sprul nas/ srin mo byi la'i mgo can ma btul/ de bzhin du blo gros mi zad pas keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa
btul/ spobs pa brtsegs pas mkha' 'gro ma rus pa'i phreng ba can gong ma bzhin du btul lo// de rnams kyi sgo bzhi na/ shar na srin po bum sna/ lho na gshin rje d+ha sha grI la sogs pa bzhi ni/

gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa khro bo bzhis bsgral/ de rnams kyi chung ma bzhi gnas pa la/ byang phyogs kyi sems dpa' chen po bzhis btul te/ shar phyogs kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa' ngan song kun 'dren

gyis/ mkha' 'gro ma lcags kyu mar sprul nas/ shar phyogs srin po bum sna'i chung ma lag la lcags kyi ku ku+u ra thogs pa dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas te/ gong ma bzhin du btul nas bzhag go/ sems dpa'

chen po byams pa mai tris/ mkha' 'gro ma zhags pa mar sprul nas/ lho sgor gshin rje rnam par 'joms pa'i chung ma lcags kyi thag pa 'phen pa btul lo// sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang pos/ mkha' 'gro ma

lcags sgrog mar sprul nas/ nub sgor srin po'i rgyal po lang+ga mgrin bcu'i chung ma lag na lcags kyi lu gu rgyud bsdams pa btul lo// sems dpa' chen po don yod grub pas/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje dril 'khrol mar

sprul nas/ byang sgor gnod sbyin 'bod skrog gi chung ma/ lag na mi rkang gi gling bu thogs pa dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas te btul nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bran dang yang

bran dang/ g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang byin te/ las kyi mkha' 'gro mar bzhag go/ de nas srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi phyogs bzhi bla 'og na/ sngon gsang sngags kyi don spyod tsam na/ gzung 'dzin dang

rtag chad kyi blta ba sum brgya drug cu'i mthu brtas pa las/ srin po'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan sum brgya drug cu las/ snyegs pa'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan gshog pa can brgya nyi shu/ 'dzin pa'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan

sder mo can brgya nyi shu/ gsod pa'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan mche ba can brgya nyi shu las/ phyogs bzhi bla 'og tu drug cu drug cu bkye ste/ sems can thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa las/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku las 'od zer bkye ste/ dkar po ser po dmar po ljang gu mthing ga rin po che'i kha dog la sogs pa/ 'od zer re re la yang grangs bye ba khrag khrig drug cu drug cur spros te/ phyogs bzhi

mtshams brgyad bla 'og phyogs bcu thams cad/ 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas/ don bya ba dang bskul bar bya ba dang/ byi dor bya ba dang/ snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'od zer de

dag slar 'dus pa las/ mi mo sum brgya drug cur gyur te/ shar phyogs nas dung gi mi mo drug cu/ lho nas lcags kyi mi mo drug cu/ nub phyogs nas zangs kyi mi mo drug cu/ byang nas g.yu'i mi mo drug cu/ 'og
nas gser gyi mi mo drug cu/ steng nas bse'i mi mo drug cu de rnams kyang mthun par zhal gcig phyag bzhi bzhi ste/ g.yas kyi dang po snyegs byed kyi pho nya gshog pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa

bsnams pa/ 'og ma na 'dzin byed kyi pho nya sder mo can bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na sdom byed kyi pho nya mtshon cha can bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnams pa/ tha ma sgrol byed kyi pho nya mche ba

can bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnams pa// de lta bu dngos sum brgya drug cu la don gyi bye ba khrag khrig dang ldan pa'o// de dag gi myur ba ni glog gis kyang bskyad du med pa/ mgyogs pa rlung gis kyang bskyad du med

pa/ gnyen pos mi tshugs pa rdo rje pha lam gyis bskyad du med pa/ ci la yang thogs pa med pa sha stag go/ de las shar phyogs nas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rtags/ 'od dkar po las rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya dung

gi mi mo drug cu/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje las byung ngo// oM badzra b+ha na b+ha na aM ku sha dza/ zhes drug cu tham pa brjod pas/ pho nya rdo rje 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje sder mo dang/ rdo rje kI la ya dang/ rdo rje

'bigs ma dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma dang/ rdo rje drag mo dang/ rdo rje mgyogs ma dang/ rdo rje gtum mo dang/ rdo rje 'bebs ma dang/ rdo rje gsal ma dang/ rdo rje sdom ma dang/ rdo rje 'gugs ma dang/ rdo rje thogs

med dang/ rdo rje bskyod ma dang/ rdo rje 'chang bdag dang/ rdo rje phra men dang/ rdo rje myur byed ma dang/ rdo rje skul byed ma dang/ rdo rje gsal bkra ma dang/ rdo rje yang dag dang/ rdo rje rtse dang/ rdo rje dbang phyug dang/

rdo rje rin chen mo dang/ rdo rje kha 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje gsal bkra ma dang/ rdo rje khro mo dang/ rdo rje 'chang ma dang/ rdo rje gtum mo dang/ rdo rje khros ma dang/ rdo rje las byed ma dang/ rdo rje dus mtshams ma dang/ rdo

rje thar ma dang/ rdo rje ku la dang/ rdo rje dpal 'bar ma dang/ rdo rje skyong chen ma dang/ rdo rje lus khro ma dang/ rdo rje ngag khro ma dang/ rdo rje yid gtum ma dang/ rdo rje sder chen ma dang/ rdo rje gsod byed ma dang/ rdo

rje brlang ba dang/ rdo rje gsod mo dang/ rdo rje za ba mo dang/ rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang/ rdo rje 'chang ba mo dang/ rdo rje tshe len ma dang/ rdo rje mdangs len ma dang/ rdo rje srog 'phrog ma dang/ rdo rje snying 'byin ma

dang/ rdo rje gcod byed ma dang/ rdo rje skul byed ma dang/ rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs dang/ rdo rje smyon ma dang/ rdo rje 'jug byed ma dang/ rdo rje yid 'phrog ma dang/ rdo rje rkun mo dang/ rdo rje rdzu byed ma dang/ rdo rje

'jig byed ma dang/ rdo rje bcud len ma dang de ltar drug cu po yang sprul pa mche ba can drug cu 'brangs pas/ srin po shar phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ pho nya rnams la smras pa/ khyed la
sogs pa rnams srin po'i pho nya byed pa de/ rtogs pa ci dang ldan/ don cis byed/ pho nya rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi rje bos bdag cag rnams la pho nyar byin te/ las dang mthur ldan pas
sems can thams cad 'gugs pa'i pho nya bgyid pa lags so// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mos smras pa/ sems can la yang da rung ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod la/ tshogs gsog pa la gnas pa dang/ dge ba

bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgrar gyur cing/ ngan pa'i ngang tshul can sgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa rnams ni/ ma bkug cing ma bsgral na nyams pa chen po'i rgyur 'gyur

bas snying rje chen pos zin par byas la/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug cing drangs la/ lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la/ gnyis su med pa'i ngang du bya'o/ zhes smras pas/ pho nya de dag thams cad
dga' ches te/ de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs te mna' 'bor te/ bran dang yang bran du dbang byin te 'khor du bzhag go/ de nas nub phyogs so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer dmar po las/

pad+ma rigs kyi pho nya mo zangs kyi mi mo drug cu sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// gardza gardza s+pho Ta baM/ zhes drug cu brjod pa las/ pad+ma thogs 'bebs ma dang/ pad+ma 'brug sgrogs ma dang/ pad+ma char

'bebs ma dang/ pad+ma 'od 'gyed ma dang/ pad+ma bkrag gsal ma dang/ pad+ma gzha' tshon ma dang/ pad+ma 'od 'phro ma dang/ pad+ma 'od gsal ma dang/ pad+ma khrag 'thung ma dang/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang/ pad+ma

sa bdag ma dang/ pad+ma 'gugs byed ma dang/ pad+ma dkar sham ma dang/ pad+ma sgra sgrogs ma dang/ pad+ma yid gzhungs ma dang/ pad+ma lta na mdzes pa dang/ pad+ma seng phrog ma dang/ pad+ma bdud rtsi 'bebs ma dang/

pad+ma mgyogs byed ma dang/ pad+ma gsod byed ma dang/ pad+ma snying 'byin ma dang/ pad+ma dmar 'thung ma dang/ pad+ma rkang 'jib ma dang/ pad+ma las byed ma dang/ pad+ma zhags thogs ma dang/ pad+ma bla 'phrog ma dang/

pad+ma thogs byed ma dang/ pad+ma za byed ma dang/ pad+ma smyos byed ma dang/ pad+ma rmugs byed ma dang/ pad+ma rdzu byed ma dang/ pad+ma 'khrugs byed ma dang/ pad+ma drag mo dang/ pad+ma brkam ma dang/ pad+ma 'joms byed ma

dang/ pad+ma dga' ma dang/ pad+ma 'dzin ma dang/ pad+ma glog 'gyu ma dang/ pad+ma g.yul 'joms ma dang/ pad+ma lha 'brel ma dang/ pad+ma srog 'brel ma dang/ pad+ma myur byed ma dang/ pad+ma rangs byed ma dang/ pad+ma sreg

byed ma dang/ pad+ma glog byed ma dang/ pad+ma tho ba ma dang/ pad+ma gtun khung ma dang/ pad+ma zhags 'phen ma dang/ pad+ma me khyer ma dang/ pad+ma sdud byed ma dang/ pad+ma g.yengs byed ma dang/ pad+ma bdud 'joms ma dang/

pad+ma dpal mo dang/ pad+ma dbang phyug ma dang/ pad+ma drag mo dang/ pad+ma gtum bag can dang/ pad+ma ka la ma dang/ pad+ma sde tshogs dang/ pad+ma ma hA la me Do dang/ pad+ma rab brjid ma dang/ drug cu

rnams kyang sbrul gshog pa can drug cu 'gab na 'brengs pas/ srin po'i nub phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ gong ma de bzhin dam mnos dbang byin te bzhag go/ de nas lho phyogs mnyam

pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer mthing ga las/ rin po che'i rigs kyi pho nya mo lcags kyi mi mo drug cu sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// ha la ha la pA sha hUM drug cu las rin chen dbang phyug ma
dang/ rin chen mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rin chen mthu 'bebs ma dang/ rin chen sra ba mo dang/ rin chen mchongs ma dang/ rin chen khro gtum ma dang/ rin chen brtson byed ma dang/ rin chen 'jigs ma dang/
rin chen sha za ma dang/ rin chen khrag 'thung ma dang/ rin chen so gtsigs ma dang/ rin chen ral gsigs ma dang/ rin chen 'khrugs byed ma dang/ rin chen 'dzul byed ma dang/ rin chen lhug byed ma dang/

rin chen mthu mo che dang/ rin chen nag mo che dang/ rin chen rtog med ma dang/ rin chen rtog 'joms ma dang/ rin chen yongs grub ma dang/ rin chen sna tshogs lus dang/ rin chen sred pa ma dang/ rin chen

sdong gcig ma dang/ rin chen dur khrod ma dang/ rin chen dbyings phyug ma dang/ rin chen bde 'gro ma dang/ rin chen rgyas byed ma dang/ rin chen 'dzum byed ma dang/ rin chen khrag gi myos byed ma dang/ rin

chen rngam 'dzin ma dang/ rin chen mgyogs byed ma dang/ rin chen sdum ma dang/ rin chen mdung thung sder dang/ rin chen 'gyur ma dang/ rin chen thog 'bebs ma dang/ rin chen spros med ma dang/ rin chen

'khrugs byed ma dang/ rin chen dbyug ma dang/ rin chen ka la ya dang/ rin chen gsal bkra ma dang/ rin chen mkha' bsgyur ma dang/ rin chen kun sgrol ma dang/ rin chen ra ro ma dang/ rin chen khrag 'thung

ma dang/ rin chen 'bar ma dang/ rin chen mi zad ma dang/ rin chen 'phrog byed ma dang/ rin chen sgrol byed ma dang/ rin chen sna tshogs stobs dang/ rin chen yid 'phrog ma dang/ rin chen srog len ma dang/

rin chen bcud len ma dang/ rin chen tshe rkun ma dang/ rin chen dbang mo che dang/ rin chen drag 'joms ma dang/ rin chen sdud byed ma dang/ rin chen glang 'dzin ma dang/ rin chen srog 'dzin ma dang/ rin

chen rtsa 'gro ma dang/ rin chen sna la byin ma dang/ rin chen snas stong ma la sogs pa drug regacig 'dug cu rnams/ yang sprul rmig bu'i mgo can drug cus 'gram nas 'brengs pa/ srin po'i lho phyogs kyi pho nya drug
cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te// thabs sna tshogs kyis btul nas gong ma bzhin du dam mnos te bran du dbang byin nas bzhag go/ de nas byang phyogs nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rtags

'od zer ljang gu las/ las kyi rigs kyi pho nya g.yu'i mi mo drug cu sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// pa tsa pa tsa g+haN+De hoHdrug cu las/ las rdo rje ma dang/ las 'joms ma chen mo dang/ las kha lo
'dul ma dang/ las dbang phyug ma dang/ las grub byed ma dang/ las la bskul ma dang/ las grub pa mo dang/ las mthar phyin pa mo dang/ las chud mi za ba dang/ las dbang sgyur ma dang/ las thogs med
ma dang/ las grub pa mo dang/ las gsal byed ma dang/ las dbang byed ma dang/ las kyi dam tshig ma dang/ las kyi bya ra ma dang/ las kyi stangs 'dzin ma dang/ las kyi stangs gcod ma dang/ las kyi gal

'dzin ma dang/ las kyi skul byed ma dang/ las kyi bya ra mo dbang mo dang/ las kyi bya ra mo phag mo dang/ las kyi bya ra mo spyan brgya mo dang/ las kyi bya ra mo mig stong ldan ma dang/ las kyi bya ra mo 'od

mgyogs ma dang/ las kyi bya ra mo rlung zhon ma dang/ las rdzu 'phrul can dang/ las sgyu ma dang/ las dbang phyug rgyal mo dang/ las grags rgyal ma dang/ las dpal sham ma dang/ las yag+sha mo dang/ las khro
bag can dang/ las mche ba mo dang/ las dbang bskur ma dang/ las dngos grub bdag mo dang/ las sgrol byed chen mo dang/ las thams cad kyi bdag mo dang/ las 'od 'phro ma dang/ las drag mo dang/

las khro skyen mo dang/ las myur grub ma dang/ las chud ma zos pa dang/ las 'dul byed ma dang/ las rgya mtsho dang/ las stangs 'dzin ma dang/ las kyi sgrol byed ma dang/ las 'dul mkhas ma dang/ las la

goms ma dang/ las la mkhas ma dang/ las kyi dbang bskur ma dang/ las kyi mchog sgrol ma dang/ las kyi rgyu sgrol ma dang/ las kyi rngam pa mo dang/ las spro skyen mo dang/ las gtum chen ma dang/ las mig

dmar ma dang/ las sen mo can dang/ drug cu nga brgyad pas ma byung/ rnams kyang yang sprul sder mo can gyi tshogs drug cu bgab nas 'brengs pas/ srin po'i byang phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang cha mthun par byas te/ de

rnams btul nas dam phog nas dbang byin te bzhag go/ de nas dbus stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer ser po las/ gser gyi mi mo drug cu khro bo dang khro mor sprul te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo// kro d+ha kro d+hI hUM phaT/ drug cu las khro bo chen po bi dza ya dang/ khro mo chen po rdo rje rnam bsnyems ma dang/ khro bo chen po dbyug pa chen po dang/ khro mo chen mo rdo rje sder mo can dang/ khro bo chen po ya mAn

ta ka dang/ khro mo chen mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang/ khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang/ khro mo chen mo rdo rje gtun khung mo dang/ khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang/ khro mo chen mo rdo rje gtum mo dang/ khro bo

chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ khro mo chen mo mda' snyems ma dang/ khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ khro mo chen mo rlung 'byin ma dang/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang/ khro mo chen mo

gsod byed ma dang/ khro bo chen po ma hA ba la dang/ khro mo chen mo bskyod chen ma dang/ khro bo chen po hUM ka ra dang/ khro mo chen mo sgra 'byin ma dang/ khro bo chen po badzra kI la ya dang/ khro mo chen mo rgyas 'debs chen

mo dang/ khro bo chen po dme brtsegs dang/ khro mo chen po 'dam 'byin ma dang/ khro bo chen po badzra yak+sha dang/ khro mo chen mo sa ma ye shwa rI dang/ khro bo chen po dmar nag dang/ khro mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma dang/ khro

bo chen po badzra 'ba' ta la dang/ khro mo chen mo rdo rje brag mo dang/ khro bo chen po su+u su ti ga ra dang/ khro mo 'bar 'jigs ma dang/ khro bo chen po shrI ma hA ka la dang/ khro mo chen mo ral pa 'greng ma dang/ khro bo

mi 'chi thabs sbyor dang/ khro mo 'joms byed chen mo dang/ khro bo chen po las thams cad pa dang/ khro mo las kun grub ma dang/ khro bo chen po rab rngams dang/ khro mo chen mo gtum mo dang/ khro bo chen po 'jig

rten gsum snang dang/ khro mo chen mo mi pham ma dang/ khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum 'dul dang/ khro mo chen mo lcags kyu ma dang/ khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum 'jig dang/ khro mo chen mo khro gnyer ma dang/ khro

bo chen po 'jig rten gsum 'ching dang/ khro mo chen mo zhags pa ma dang/ khro bo chen po pad+ma rgyal dang/ khro mo chen mo ro langs ma dang/ khro bo chen po be con sngon po dang/ khro mo chen mo lcags sgrog ma dang/ khro bo

chen po ka ni badzra dang/ khro mo chen mo ral gcig ma dang/ khro bo chen po rdo rje go cha dang/ khro mo chen mo dril bu ma dang/ khro bo chen po rngam chen dang/ khro mo chen mo dbang sdud ma dang/ khro bo chen po rdo rje tho ba dang/

khro mo chen mo za byed ma dang drug cu rnams kyang/ yang sprul mgo brnyan dang/ phra men ma dang/ phra thabs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshogs drug cu bgab nas 'brengs pas/ srin po dbus kyi pho nya dang/ steng gi pho nya srin

po pho mo drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ de rnams btul nas bran dang yang bran dbang byin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ dam byin dbang phog ste bzhag go/ de nas mtha' dang bla 'og med pa chos

kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rtags 'od mthing nag las/ bse'i me mo drug cu sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// mA ma mA ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhes drug cu las ma mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma dang/
sbas pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ dur khrod tshogs kyi ma mo dang/ za byed rngam pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ khams gsum sdud pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ rgyu drug sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ srid gsum za ba'i ma mo

chen mo dang/ yongs la dbang bsgyur ba'i ma mo chen mo dang/ mthu dpung bskyod du med pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ sha khrag gsur la dga' ba'i ma mo chen mo dang/ nang khrol glo snying 'byin pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/

za byed tshe srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ rngam chen mchod la dga' ba'i ma mo chen mo dang/ 'dzin byed zhal du stobs pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ bgegs chen snying la 'debs pa'i ma mo chen mo dang/ zhing bcu

gtan nas len pa'i ma mo dang/ dam nyams snying la 'debs pa'i ma mo dang/ 'byung po sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ gshin rje sgrol ba'i ma mo chen po dang/ klu sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ gnod sbyin sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/

srin po sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ srin mo sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ gza' chen len pa'i ma mo dang/ khrag 'thung ba'i ma mo dang/ drod 'phrog pa'i ma mo dang/ dbugs len pa'i ma mo dang/ srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo dang/

mdangs 'jib pa'i ma mo dang/ bya rgod mgo'i ma mo dang/ khrag skyug ma'i ma mo dang/ chu srin kha'i ma mo dang/ dur khrod rgyan gyi ma mo dang/ rdo rje gar gyi ma mo dang/ pad+ma gar gyi ma mo dang/ sa bdag dbang phyug

ma mo dang/ ri rab rtse nas bsnyil ba'i ma mo dang/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas skem pa'i ma mo dang/ rdo rje tho ba'i ma mo dang/ rdo rje gtun khung gi ma mo dang/ rdo rje dur khrod bdag gi ma mo dang/ rdo rje 'degs pa mo'i

ma mo dang/ rdo rje gsal bkra ma'i ma mo dang/ rdo rje khrag 'thung ma'i ma mo dang/ ri lung dre'u zhon pa'i ma mo dang/ dus bzhi'i rgyal mo 'joms pa'i ma mo dang/ khyi spyang gcan du sprul pa'i ma mo dang/ stag dom

dred ltar rdzu ba'i ma mo dang/ 'dzum phyed khra ltar lding ba'i ma mo dang/ ri klung med par khebs pa'i ma mo dang/ ngal dub med par rgyug pa'i ma mo dang/ gtsang sme med par sgrol ba'i ma mo dang/ ya byin ral

dkar mchod pa'i ma mo dang/ bse byin rtsal mo che yi ma mo dang// phag byin thogs pa med pa'i ma mo dang// de byin grub pa mo yi ma mo dang/ tshe srog kun la dbang bsgyur ma mo dang/ g.ya' ri gangs la brten

pa'i ma mo dang/ 'brog srin skyes pa 'dul ba'i ma mo dang// khro tshig myur bar brtson pa'i ma mo dang// drug cu rnams ni yang sprul bud med brda' ma 'phrod pa/ paN tshe ba bzlog dka' ba/ 'khor drug cu drug cur

'brengs pa/ srin po'i mgo dang mtha'i pho nya byed pa'i srin mo drug cu dang cha lugs mthun par byas te/ srin mo rnams la smras pa/ khyod la sogs pa ni srin po'i pho nya byed cing sems can thams cad bkug
bcing bsgral nas/ sha khrag rus pa za zhing 'dug pa de don ched ci yod/ rtogs pa ci dang ldan/ zhes smras pa dang/ srin mo rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi jo bo bdud ru tra chen pos khams
gsum dbang bsgyur bas pho nyar dbang stsal te/ sems can thams cad dgug cing bsgral ba'i pho nya bgyid 'tshal ba las/ don ched dang rtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so// grogs mo dag rtogs pa dang don ci
mchis/ ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ bdag dang gzhan bsgral nas/ bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por 'don pa'o// srin mo rnams kyis smras pa/ rtogs pa

dang don ched de lta bu ldan pa e ma la la ho// bdag cag rnams la de ma 'tshal ba yang 'gyod na/ de da rung rtogs pa ma 'byongs shing/ 'jig rten cha la brten pas 'tshal ba ma mchis so// ma mo rnams kyis

smras pa/ de 'chal ba yang ma mchis la/ rtogs pa dang don ched du ldan pa byos shig gang zag dge bcu+u dang ldan pa dang/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig bsrung ba ma gtogs so// dam tshig dag dang mi ldan

zhing de dag nyams pa rnams ni yud kyis mi bsgral du ma rung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nas ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu gsog cing/ mnar med par 'gro bas de dag rtogs pa dang snying rjer ldan pas bsgral la/

bdag nyid chen por longs spyod par bya'o// zhes smras pa dang/ srin mo thams cad dga' ches te/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos bro bor te/ bran dang yang bran dang khol dang yang khol dang yang

g.yog tu byin te/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i 'khor bsrung ba dang/ nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig gi don bsgrub pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i bka' bsrung zhing/ rang gi dam tshig las mi 'da' bar

zhal gyis 'chos/ g.yar gyis blangs te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du/ pho nya sum brgya drug cur mtshan btags te bzhag go/ de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams na/

srin po'i pho nya mo srin mo chen mo nad gtong zhing sha za ba bdun la/ srin mo chen mo brkam ma dang/ srin mo chen mo rab tu brkam ma dang/ srin mo chen mo dri ma 'don pa dang/ srin mo chen mo phor thogs dang/

srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma dang/ srin mo chen mo skul byed ma dang/ srin mo chen mo myos byed ma dang bdun gyis nad dang rims rnam pa sna tshogs pa btang ste/ sems can ril kha 'dogs pa las/ dpal chen

po'i thugs ye shes kyi sprul pa las/ yi ge hUM bdun byung/ yi ge hUM bdun las/ gsang ba'i ma bdun byung ste/ rdo rje hUM grags ma dang/ rdo rje kun gsal ma dang/ rdo rje kun bzang mo dang/ rdo rje chen mo ye shes
mchog dang/ rdo rje 'od chags ma dang/ rdo rje 'od gsal ma dang/ rdo rje g.yu sgron ral gcig ma dang bdun gyis/ de rnams dang spyod pa mthun par sprul te/ nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa btang ste/

btang tsam na btang ba'i ngo bo ci yang med par sems can mang po bsad la bsad pa tsam na bsad pa'i ngo bo ci yang med par byas te/ srin mo rnams kyis mthu zil gyis mnan nas/ srin mo rnams la smras pa/
khyed la sogs pa rnams nad rnam pa sna tshogs pa gtong zhing/ sems can rnams kyis sha khrag la brkam pa de/ las ci'i dbang gi rtsa ba yin/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas su bskal pa dpag tu med
par mi ltung ngam/ srin mo bdun gyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni dang po pha dang mas zas su sems can thams cad kyi sha khrag bskos la/ lag char nad kyi rkyal pa gtad pa las/ sems can dmyal ba zhes

bya ba'i don ma rig go/ grogs mo dag 'di ltar spyod pa'i don dang gtan tshigs ci mchis/ ma mo bdun gyis smras pa/ kho mo cag ni don chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang las gnas pas/ dug dang bdud rtsir dbyer med

pa la/ 'khrul pas phyin ci log gi lam du khrid pas sems can dmyal bar skye nges pa de dag thabs dang snying rjer ldan pas/ 'khor ba dang ngan song du mi gtong zhing bla na med pa'i lam la bkod pa las/ log
pa'i lam du bstan pa ma yin no zhes smras pa dang/ srin mo rnams 'jigs skrag nas/ 'di skad smras so// e ma'o gti mug rang dbang gis// ngan song gsum du skye nges pas// skyob pa'i thugs ni ci zhig
mnga'// 'di la skyob pa'i mthu mnga' na// bka' nyan dam nod 'bangs su mchi// 'tshal ba'i zas skal gang la bgyi// 'dren pa khyod kyis bshad du gsol// ma bdun gyis smras pa/ sngar nyes pa dran pa rnams

kyang rjes su 'gyod pa legs so// slan chad kyang de lta bu bab chol mi byed par dam du chos la slan chad kyang sdom par zung zhig khyed kyi zas skal ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig chad song dkar po'i phyogs dang/ dam
la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// nag po'i phyogs dang dam la mi gnas shing// zhing bcur gyur pa'i brnag pa de kho na rnams bsngos so// zhes pa dang/ srin mo rnams rab tu dga' mgu yi rang ste/ de
bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos te/ bran dang yang bran du mna' bor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ 'khor skyong bar bzhag go/ i ti/ gu+u h+ya sa ma ya rdzogs so//// de nas
yang bdud kyi gleng gzhi la/ shar phyogs kyi gling na dri za'i mgyogs ma dang/ lho gshin rje'i mgyogs ma dang/ nub klu'i mgyogs ma dang/ byang gnod sbyin gyi mgyogs ma dang bzhis srin po'i gsang ba'i
gzungs ma bzhir byas te/ shin tu yang chags pa rang ga mas sems can thams cad yid bslu zhing chags pa'i dbang gis srog dang 'bral bar byed pa las/ dpal chen po'i thugs gsang ba'i
yum dkar mo mi gcig rgyas 'debs ma dang/ bde ba rmongs byed ma dang/ bde ba za byed ma dang/ bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang bzhis/ de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas/ mthu dpung zil gyis mnan

nas btul te/ de rnams la smras pa/ khyed rnams chags pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi yid bslu zhing srog dang 'bral bar byed pa des ngan song gsum gyi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ram zhes smras pa
dang/ mgyogs ma bzhis smras pa/ grogs mo dag de ltar byed pa ci lags/ yum bzhis smras pa/ kho mo cag ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don la chags tsam na/ chags pa med pa mthar phyin pas

nyon mongs pa dang gzung 'dzin la 'chel ba sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi srog dang 'bral ba yin no zhes smras pas de bzhin du ngo mtshar du gyur nas de bzhin du bgyid lags pas/ bdag cag rnams la de'i dbye ba

dang rim pa gang lags pa bka' stsal du gsol/ yum bzhis smras pa/ chags par bya ba'i yul ni ye shes kyi dbyings rtogs pa des/ ma dang sring mo dang bu mo la sogs pa gang la yang mi rtog cing/ rtog pa med
pa'i chos nyid du mkhyen pa las ma gtogs pa/ phal pa rnams ni chags par bya ba'i yul ma yin la/ 'khor ba las bslu ba'i chags pa'i yul ni/ ma rig pa phal pa yid dang mthun par bya zhing/ chags pa med

pa dang/ srog dang 'bral ba yang/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa'i dge ba'i phyogs dang/ dam tshig la gnas shing bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi spun dang ming sring yin pas brtse
gdung dang mi 'bral ba'i srog gi lu gu rgyud byas pa las/ de rnams la srog gi bar chad lta ci smos kyi/ de'i bka' las zur tsam yang 'gal na/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur nas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar skye

bar 'gyur ro// de la srog dang mi 'bral du mi rung ba gang zhe na/ sdig pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang/ dam la mi gnas shing mi bsrung ba dang/ de dag mnos nas nyams par gyur pa la ni/ srog dang mi phral na
ngan song dang mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur bas/ dam 'di bzhin du gnas shing dmod longs shig de rnams kyis dmod btsugs pa/ rnal 'byor pa bka' dang dam la gnas pa rnams ni bdag cag gis
bsgo ba brtsi zhing gdung ba sri zhu'i tshogs bgyid de/ bka' dang dam las 'gal ba rnams srog dang 'bral bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma bgyis na bdag cag rnams kyi lus srog tshig par gyur cig ces dam
bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje theg pa'i bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ 'khor bsrung bar dbang byin te/ sring mo bzhir ming btags te bzhag go/ de nas yang srin po'i 'khor las

kyi ging bco brgyad la/ bdud lha yor thom dang/ bdud lha gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mo dang/ tshangs pa dung gi thor tshugs can dang/ gnam sa gnyis kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen

po'i las mkhan dang/ ma bdud rgyal mo dang/ rta zhon rkya bzhi dang/ dmu bdud rngams pa dang/ tshangs pa'i the'u brang dang/ 'brog srin mgo dgu dang/ shar phyogs nas khams gsum gyi bdag po dang/ sprin gyi

sgron ma dang/ rdo rje mchu dang/ bi nA ya ga dang/ lha mo nag mo dang/ nam gru dang/ gshin rje'i rgyal mo rmig pa mgo dang/ shel gyi srog bdag la sogs pa bco brgyad kyis/ khams gsum gyi sems can thams

cad sgrol ba 'ba' zhig byed pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen zhal bzhad pa'i sprul pa las/ rdo rje'i ging bco brgyad du sprul te/ de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ dpa' bo chen po las rnams kun byed pa dang/ khro

mo chen mo khams gsum dbang sdud ma dang/ rdo rje ging ka ra dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje spyang ki dang/ rdo rje gshin rje dang/ rdo rje rol pa dang/ rdo rje 'chi bdag dang/ rdo rje dus mtshams dang/ rdo rje ro
langs dang/ rdo rje 'joms ma dang/ dbang sdud lcags kyus 'dren pa chen mo dang/ khams gsum g.yab mos 'debs pa chen mo dang/ gzugs med rlung ltar gyur pa chen mo dang/ gar gyi glog ltar sgyur ba

chen mo dang/ rbod gtong len par byed pa chen mo dang/ rna nyan phra ma zer ba chen mo dang/ srid gsum sgrol bar byed pa chen mo dang/ za byed chen mo ma de bco brgyad du sprul nas/ de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun

par byas te bgegs bco brgyad po la smras pa/ khyod la sogs pa rnams sems can thams cad kyi sgrol ba'i ging 'ba' zhig byed pa don ched ci yod/ thabs ci yod/ snying rje ci dang ldan/ ngan song gsum du mi
skye'am/ zhes pa dang/ bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni sngon nas pha mas sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ging gyis shig par dbang bskur ba las/ thabs dang snying rje ma mchis so// grogs

po dag thabs dang snying rje ci dang ldan/ ngan song gsum zhes pa ci lta bu zhes zer ba dang/ ging rnams kyis smras pa/ de lta bu'i nyon mongs pa dang/ gdol pa can ni shin tu 'khrul pa ste/ don chen ni sems can

ma rig pa rnams rig par bya ba dang/ rtogs pa can rnams sun dbyung ba'i don ched yin la/ snying rje ni ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis log pa'i phyogs mtha' dag byas pas shin tu sdug bsngal ya nga'i gnas su skyes
pa de/ bu gcig la ma byams pa dang 'dra bar bskyed la/ thabs kyis snying rje ba'i sar mi bzhag par de nyid mthu dang thabs kyis bsgral te/ bla na med pa'i sa la bkod pa'i ched du bstan pa las/
de dang mi ldan pa rnams ni/ dmyal ba yi dwags byol song la sogs pa shin tu mi bzad pa'i ya nga ba las thon par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dang/ bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/ e ma a la la la de bzhin du bdag
cag rnams kyang bgyid pas/ mthu dang thabs kyis mngon sum du bsgral dmigs dang/ mi sgrol ba gang lags pa de'i dbang dang dam tshig stsal du gsol/ ging rnams kyis smras pa/ bsgral ba'i dmigs

ni thugs rje'i dpyang thag chad de/ zhe sdang log pa'i lam dgu la zhugs pa dang/ nyon mongs rang ga mas dbang byas te/ zhing bcur gyur nas/ log pa'i las mtha' dag byed pa dang/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i sku
dgrar gyur pa dang/ sems can tshe zad cing dus la bab pa rnams sgrol cig/ gang zhig rnal 'byor pa gzhung dang mthun pa lta ci smos kyi/ 'gal ba med pa'i sems can tshe ma zad pa rnams ni ma sgrol cig
ces pa dang/ bgegs kyi rigs rnams dga' mgu yi rang nas/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam bcas dmod bar mna' bskyal te/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i phyi'i dgra bo thams cad sgrol cig par/ phyi'i

ging bco brgyad du dbang byin te bzhag go/ de nas rU tra dregs pa chen po dang bcas pa rnams bsgral te/ khog pa dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang du brtsigs/ rnam par shes pa 'og min gyi yum gyi mkha' la gnas

spar te thugs sras su byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod/ 'khor ci bgyi'i bka' nyan thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ bran dang yang g.yog tu bgyis te/ rU tra dang dregs pa'i phyogs thams cad ming yang mi

grag cing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnyan par gnas te/ chos nyid yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po na/ dgyes pa chen po'i lhun la rtag par bzhugs pa la/ blo'i khyad par gyis so sor mthong zhing
rtogs te/ la las byang chub kyi shing drung rtsar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdud rnam bzhi rim gyis btul nas/ dregs pa thams cad zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyis btul nas/ le lo can dang/ rtag pa sun
dbyung ba'i phyir/ thabs kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul bstan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas shing/ sems can thams cad bde ba la 'god par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang/ la las ri rab

kyi zom la phyag na rdo rjes ye shes kyi rdo rje gsor te/ lha ma yin thams cad sngangs skrag nas/ srid pa gsum yang 'dar zhing g.yos te/ mdongs gsol du rang rang gi srog gi snying po phul te/ dregs pa
can thams cad btul nas/ lha'i tshig bden pas zhal gyis 'ches shing dam mnos/ lha srin sde brgyad bran dang chad gyur bgos nas/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i mu ran gyi 'khor bsrung shing/ ngan
song gsum po rim gyis lha dang mi'i bde ba la 'khod cing/ sems can thams cad rig 'dzin gyi sa la gnas shing 'khod par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang/ la las rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i

skus/ lha'i khang pa rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i gnas nas/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i skur sprul te/ dbang phyug chen po'i srin po dang/ dregs pa can thams cad bsgral zhing/ thal ba yod pa'i

zhing khams na/ slar dran pa rnyed par byas te/ bdud dang srin po thams cad btul zhing tshar bcad nas/ 'khor dang bran du byas te bka' dang dam tshig mnos nas/ lha dang lha ma yin pa dang mi dang mi ma yin pa
la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba dang/ 'khor dang gang zag skyong ba g.yar gyis 'ches te/ 'dod khams dang/ gzugs khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams la sogs pa thams

cad rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la bkod par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang/ la las 'di ltar yum gyi mkha' la/ rgyal ba rigs lnga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa las/ khro bo dang/ dpal 'bar khro

mo'i rgyud 'di ltar/ bdud dang rU tra rim gyis btul nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad rim gyis chos kyi dbyings bde ba chen po yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la rim gyis

'khod par mthong zhing rtogs pa thams cad ni/ dpal kun tu bzang po ngo bo nyid kyi sku chos nyid ma bcos pa'i byin gyis rlabs las snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ so sor snang zhing gnyis su med par bstan pa ma

yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni btags pa dang mtshan ma can ma yin pa'i tha tshig go/ de lta bu'i chos 'di thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab bsam du yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dmigs pa med
cing/ mi dmigs pa'i tha tshig go/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad la bskal pa dpag gis mi langs par yang brjod pa'i mtha' med la/ skad cig yud tsam cig ma brjod par yang thams cad 'dus

so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yun ring ba dang thung ba med pa'i tha tshig go/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ thugs zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par/ sku 'bar ba'i cha lugs khro bo dang khro mo'i sku

gsung thugs kyi rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang la/ de ltar snang tsam na thugs zhi ba'i ngang las kyang g.yos pa rdul tsam yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ma g.yos pa'i tha tshig go/ de lta bu'i chos
'di dag thams cad la/ mtha' yang med la dbus kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad du nye ring dang/ thams cad du phyogs ris dang/ thams cad du snga phyi dang/ thams cad du che chung
med pa'i don no// de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ye shes la gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i thugs la gnas so// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi
sems la gnas so// rang gi sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni ci yang min la ci la yang mi gnas pas/ chos 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma byas shing smra bsam gyi yul las
'das pas brjod du med pa'i chos nyid do// brjod du med pa skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid do/ skye 'gag med pa las ma g.yos pa/ ma g.yos pa btsal du med pas/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms shing mi

gnas par byed pas khro mo zhes bya la/ de las skye zhing 'byung bar byed pas yum zhes bya la/ de lta bu'i las thams cad la rol pas yab ces kyang bya la/ de'i ngang la 'du 'bral med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thabs

dang shes rab kyi don la mkhas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dus thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs la gnas pas/ 'di ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni phyag gi mdzad pa phyag rgya'o// thugs la bzhag pa dgongs

pa'o// zhal du brjod pa gsung rab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ der ni don thams cad 'dus pas/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po las klu'i rgyal po'i stobs kyis/ chu bo dang chu bran char la sogs par spros nas/ slar rgya

mtsho chen por 'dus pa dang 'dra bar dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud chen po 'di las/ rnal 'byor gyi skyes bu chen po'i dgongs pas/ lta ba dang bsgrub pa dang/ dkyil 'khor dang sgom pa la sogs pa byung nas/ slar

'di nyid du 'dus so// dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud 'di ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rgyud 'di la brten nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang

rgyud 'di'i don rtogs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ de bzhin phyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ rgyud 'di'i don rtogs nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de ni dper na u dum wa ra'i tshal ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i dpe yin la/ u dum wa ra'i tshal dang/ tsan+dan gyi nags la sogs rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nad 'jil ba'i mthu

yod pa dang 'dra bas na/ rgyud 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dpe yang yin la/ sems can thams cad kyi lus ngag yid gsum phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yang yin no// rgyud 'di'i
don ma rig cing ma rtogs na/ nyon mongs pa ma rig pa'i bdud dang/ phung po sdug bsngal gyi bdud dang/ lha'i bu mya ngan gyi bdud dang/ 'chi bdag mi rtag pa'i bdud de/ dper na nad dang rims

la sogs pa dang po dbugs la zhugs/ zhugs nas rtsa la rgyu'o// de nas sha dang khrag la rgyu'o// de nas rkang dang sri la 'khol lo// de nas srog rtsar 'dus nas mi rtag pa'i las su 'gyur ro// de las log pa'i

phal pa rnams ni/ srog pa rtsa la cung zad 'khod nas/ sha dang rus pa la phyir byung nas/ khrag dang ba spu la byung ste/ phyi'i 'byung ba la ltos so// de bzhin du bdud dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa thams cad dang po
rgyu ma rig pa las byung ngo// de nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pas bcad nas/ kun gzhi la las sna tshogs kyi bag chags sna tshogs su stsogs so// de nas sems can sdug

bsngal gyis gtan zhing du 'khyams so// de las sman bzang po dang sman pa mkhas pa 'dra ba'i rgyud 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam 'di ston pa dang 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang 'phrad na sdug bsngal
nyid byang chub yin pa dang/ nyon mongs pa nyid lam yin pa dang/ ma rig pa nyid chos nyid yin pa dang/ 'khor ba nyid yang dag pa'i lam gnas su bstan pas/ gzung 'dzin gyi 'chel ba thams cad chos nyid

bde ba chen por ye nas gnas pa las/ thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par mdzad do// don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rgyud 'di ni dam tshig la mi gnas pa dang snod ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod

yul ma yin te/ dper na nor bu rin po che tir ya ka ni lha'i dbang po dang klu'i dbang po'i bsod nams yin pa dang 'dra bar/ 'di ni dam tshig la gnas shing snod du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin pa'o// de lta

bu'i rgyud 'di ni 'og min gyi gnas dang/ skye mched mu bzhi dang/ 'dod khams dang gzugs khams kyi lha'i ris su khyab na yang/ ril lus ma bor bar phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su/ grangs dang tshom bu bsam

gyis mi khyab pa/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang mi klu'i gnas su khyab na yang/ ril lus ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su grangs dang tshom bu bsam gyis

mi khyab pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// de dag thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod par byed do// de nas kyang thabs dang shes rab

tu ldan pas rigs nges pa'i sras su bya ba dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i rgyur gzhag pa'i phyir/ thugs gsang ba'i mdzod thugs kyi sa bon/ yig 'brur bzhag nas slar 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir/ phyag
rgya chen pos kha bcad de bzhag go/ de lta bu'i rgyud 'di'i rang bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan 'das pa thams cad dang/ phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched thams cad sangs rgyas par bstan pa
las/ rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i lha'i dkyil 'khor du/ thams cad ril 'dus pa las phyis log pa'i phyogs dag byung ba la/ nan tan ci ltar bskyed par bgyi/ yab bde
ba chen po bla na med pas bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'dir 'dus pa las phyis log pa 'byung ba la nan tan bskyed pa legs so// legs so// legs pa'i lam las log par 'byung ba ni/ dper na rgyal po'am

bram ze'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la lta bu las/ rigs 'chol te gdol pa'am/ bshan pa lta bu'i las byed pa ni/ skye bo yongs kyi kyang smad pa dang/ nye 'khor rnams kyis kyang spang bar 'gyur la/ de

nyid kyang ris dmas shing mi bde ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ rgyal po chen po'i bka' chad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang 'dra bar/ gang zag gang zhig gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'am/ de la gnas pa

gang yin pa log par gol te/ ting 'dzin rnam pa brgyad kyis log par khrid de 'di lta ste/ brlang po phyal pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rgyu las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ g.yengs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

bslad pas 'chal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chags par gzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de'i mthu brtas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang

brgyad do// de la brlang po phyal pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi dbang gang yang med par las thams cad la 'jug pa'i las byed pa'o// rgyu las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gang zhe na/ gsang

sngags thabs kyi spyod pa thams cad la gti mug dang/ rang byan dang thugs thub tu spyad pas lung med par nges pa'i lan brjod pa'o// g.yeng ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ glu gar dang rol mo dang bzhad

gad la sogs pa 'jig rten g.yeng ba'i chos la bsten pa ste/ don dang mi 'tsham par rtsa ba bdud rtsi las gol ba'o// bslad pas 'chal ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ chos nyid tshig dang ming gis gdags su med pa la/
yod med rtag chad du bslad pa dang/ sems las gzung 'dzin du gdags su med pa la/ skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur du bslad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bka' rgya mtsho rab 'byams dpag
gis mi langs pa 'di/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang thob par zad kyis don ni ma rtogs pa la/ gang zag ming tsam mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams kyis/ tshig gi sgro btags pa dang/ skur pa
gdab pa dang/ tshig gi ke'u shang gis bslad pa rnams ni gang zag 'chal bar gyur te/ don med pa'i las su stsal ba'o// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gang zhe na/ gab pa dang gsang ba'i

sbas pa la mi gnas par rdzas dang lag cha dang/ yo byad la mngon par 'chel te/ mtshan mar 'dzin te mu stegs pa dang 'dra bar spyod pa'o// 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yang dag pa'i don bstan pa

las snyan dngags dang/ rang bzo dang/ khe'u shang dang/ sdeb sbyor dang/ phyogs char 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te/ 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ris 'dzin cing gzhan smod par byed do// chags par bzung

ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ ta na dang ga Na la sogs pa chos nyid la khungs 'byin cing/ de nyid la mtho gnon dang btsan thabs dang/ 'dod pa'i dbang btsan du spyod pa ni/ bshan pa'am smad 'tshong ma lta bu la brten
pa'o// de'i mthu brtas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ de dag log pa'i lam gyi mthu brtas pas/ yi dwags dang srin po'i gzugs su snang ba dang/ dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dwags kyi 'jig rten dang/ gshin

rje'i 'jig rten du smin pa dang/ de dag lus ngag yid gsum rab tu khro gtum che zhing/ shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams so// de dag la ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya zhe na/ de dag la gtsor blangs te rtse gcig

pa dang bcas pas/ nan tan du bzung ste spyod pa'o// de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin brgyad po la gnas pa ni/ skye bo yongs kyi dpyas shing smad pa dang/ de nyid ya ga dang sgro skur du gyur pas/ rnal 'byor pa yongs kyis

smad cing bsting ba ste dam tshig las nyams pas bya ra ma rnams kyis kyang rab tu khrel te/ srog gi bar chad du byed cing/ 'jig rten 'dir yang mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ 'bras bu ngan song

gsum du skye zhing sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ shin tu gdung ba'i smre sngags 'don cing/ mgon dang skyabs med pa'i sdug bsngal brgal ba dpag tu med par myangs nas/ de las thar nas

kyang srin po chen po'i lus blangs te/ srid pa gsum yang phung bar byas te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs khrel du gyur nas/ bla na med pa'i the'u ka'i bka' chad kyis gong ma bzhin bsgral bar 'gyur ro// rdo
rje sems dpa' gzhan yang ma brtags pa'i don brgyad kyis gol ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/ de yang gang zhe na/ yin pa la ni ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa dang/ ma yin pa la yin par sgro 'dogs pa dang/ mkhas pa la

ni mi mkhas par skur pa 'debs pa dang/ mi mkhas pa la mkhas par bstod pa dang/ theg pa 'og ma rnams la gong ma yin zhes che ba 'byin par byed pa dang/ gong ma la 'og ma yin zhes smod pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bka' la bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smod pa dang/ bdud kyi tshigs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin zhes smra ba'o// de la yin pa la ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni/ chos nyid don

dam pa'i bden pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mngon du phyung ba 'di la/ snod ma yin pa la gsang ba dang/ phal gyis thos na skrag cing skur pa 'debs pa dang/ smod par 'gyur bas kun gyi thun mong ma yin

te/ rang bzhin gyis gsang ba 'di la/ gang zag dad pa chung ba dang/ shes rab zhen pa dang/ thos pa chung ba rnams kyis 'di dag gi don la 'phya zhing 'phral bsdebs dad mos tsam du byas pa yin/ yang dag pa

ma yin no// zhes sgro 'dogs par byed do// ma yin pa yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni phal cher khyi'u shang dang/ rang bzo la sogs pa thos pa chung zhing shes rab dman pa dang/ 'gal ba'i don ma rig pa'i tshig sdeb
dang/ phar bslang pa tshur bsres pas bcos pa rnams la smon pa 'bul te/ bzang ste don yod do zhes sgro 'dogs pa byed pa'i gang zag rnams so// mkhas pa la mi mkhas par skur pa 'debs pa ni/ lta bas chos
nyid gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs nas/ shes bya la ye ma rmongs pas/ rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing/ dbang po rab tu gyur pa rnams kyis shes rab rnam gsum la rgyud sbyangs nas/ rgyud dkrugs pa dang

lung gcus pa dang/ man ngag gab pa rnams la/ tshig chad song/ phrag dog gi dbang gis gzhan gyi yon tan smad par 'dod pa'i phyir/ de ni mkhas pa ma yin no// zhes smod cing rgyu med pa'i skyon brjod par byed

pa'o// mi mkhas pa la mkhas par bstod pa ni gang zag bdag phyogs kyi che bar 'dod pa dang/ gzhan la thabs kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ pha rol po mtho bar dogs pa'i phyir/ dbang rnam pa lnga lta ci smos kyi/

rnal 'byor kha dbang yang ma bskur ba la/ dbang rdzogs zhes smra ba dang/ phyi nang gi bka' mtha' dag lta ci smos kyi/ theg pa chen po 'di'i ming tsam yang ma thos pa la rdo rje rgyal po zhes brjod pa dang/ rtsa ba'i

dam tshig dang yan lag gi dam tshig lta ci smos kyi/ bka' dang dam la yang zur tsam yang mi gnas te/ ral chod dang gzu lums dang/ rang byan dang che ngag tu spyod pa la mkhas par bstod pa rnams so// theg pa

'og ma la gong mar che ba 'byin pa ni/ bsam gtan rnam par mi rtog pa'i lta ba bden pa la zhugs nas/ stong pa la khungs 'byin pa la sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ting nge 'dzin ci la yang mi rtog pa dang mnyam zhe che

ba 'byin par smra ba'o// gong ma la 'og ma yin zhes smod pa ni/ rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med pa snod du ma gyur pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa la/ 'di ni theg pa gang bas kyang dma' ba ste/ mu stegs log pa'i
chos yin no zhes smod pa dang 'phya ba rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smra ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ci yang mi gsung/ mi gsung ba ni rgya
che ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci yang mi mdzad/ mi mdzad pa ni gting zab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang na yang mi bzhugs/ mi bzhugs pa grangs mang ba'o// zhes brjod pa dang/ de'i don
blos mi dpog pa rnams/ de ni bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smra ba dang/ gang zag bcud la mi rtog cing/ yul la lta ba rnams bka' yang dag pas grags pa 'dod pa dang/ gzhan la sogs pa la khyad par 'dod

pa'i don/ bden pa med pa bdud kyi tshig go zhes smra ba rnams so// bdud kyi tshig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no zhes smra ba ni/ rtogs pa'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin du mi ldan par ta na ga Na gyi las la

bab chol du spyod cing bdud kyi las spyod pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin zhes smra ba dang/ gsang ba'i dam tshig dang/ dur khrod kyi chas la sogs pa rnams mu stegs phyal pa dang 'dra bar thogs te

bdud kyi spyod pa byed pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las byung ba yin zhes smra ba dang/ gsang sngags dang gsang ba'i rgyud 'di dag thams cad snod ma yin pa lta ci smos kyi dbang ma thob par rdo rje'i lce yod

kyang mi bshad la/ dbang ma bskur bar snod dang ldan pa la yang mi bstan no// zhes 'byung ba la snod med pa dang/ dam med pa dang/ rtog pa med pa dang/ 'khrul pa dang/ gti mug dang/ thug thub du thams
cad la grangs mang bar bstan nas bdud kyi dbang du btang ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no zhes smra ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' smad de bdud kyi tshig tu smra ba yin no// sems dpa' chen

po de ni dper na bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha byad du sprul nas/ dge slong rjes su yi rang ba rnams la smras pa/ nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di stongs la khad/ go'u ta ma'i bstan par ma nyan

par// rno ba'i mtshon thogs drag shul las byas te// pha rol g.yul las kun tu rgyal bar bya'o// zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis bdud kyi tshig yin par shes shing/ tshig chad song/ gong ma ltar smra ba
rnams ni bdud kyi tshig yin par blo dang ldan pa rnams la snang ngo// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyi ba ci lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i bka' ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni/ nga dang gzhan gnyis su ma phye ba gang yin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// phyogs dang ris su ma bzung ba
gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// rgyu 'bras gnyis so sor ma phye ba gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// chos nying gdal ba chen po ma skyes pa la/ skye 'gag med

cing spros pa dang bral ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// thams cad skye 'chi dang 'pho 'gyur med cing/ nga dang bdag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// dus la snga phyi med cing gnas la mtho
dman med la yun la ring thung med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// de ci yang med pa las ni cir yang snang ba la/ cir yang snang tsam na cir med pa las ma g.yos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
bka' yin no// gcig las ma g.yos par mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par snang la/ mang po bsam gyis mi khyab par snang tsam na/ gcig las ma g.yos pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// gcig tu
'dus la gnyis su med cing/ gsung du snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang bsam du med cing brjod kyis kyang mi langs la/ brjod du yang med la bgrang du yang med

pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// spangs kyang ma spangs la/ chags kyang ma chags pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// cir yang snang ci lta bur yang ma grub cing/ bsam gyis kyang mi khyab la/
dpag gis kyang mi langs la/ dpag tu yang med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin no// chos ma byung ma skyes pa skye ba med pa'i rtogs pa chen po'i thugs mnyam pa chen po'i sangs rgyas ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gyur ba yin te/ sa gzhi nam mkha' la 'phags srid la/ chu klung rgyun las ldog srid kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do// de ni rtsol ba dang bcas

pa ma yin/ rtsol du med pa'i bdag nyid yin la/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ngang du brdal bas/ don dam pa yang yin no// de ni sgro skur dang gron thebs med de/ grub cing mthar phyin

par 'gyur nges pas bden pa yin no// de ni dper na rgya gar gyi yul na bsod nams las grub pa'i rgyal po 'ba' li ta/ rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun la dbang byed cing chags pa la thugs rje chen pos chags

pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sprang po'i gzugs las bkres pa nyam thag pa cig byung nas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ e ma nyam thag pa'i sems can bkres skom gyis nyen pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod la cung zad brten nam/
bram ze sprang pos smras pa/ gser gyi ri la g.yu yi rdza lhags te/ gram pa la sogs rin chen bcal bkram zhing// chu klung 'di kun bdud rtsir 'bab gyur kyang// nor gyis chog dang zas kyis chog shes
bzang// dgos pa'i don ni bla med sangs rgyas so// zhes smras pas/ rgyal po rgyal srid la skyo sems skyes nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod do de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bden

pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' lta bu ma yin gyi/ tha na bya dang ri dwags dang me sgra rlung sgra las grags kyang/ kun tu bzang po'i ngang nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis bstan pa yin par shes

par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thams cad du bzang ngan dang spang len med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ tshad ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshad ma zhes bya ba ni/ drang zhing don dang mthun pa de

yin zhing/ steng du phebs pa la tshad ma zhes bya ste/ ston pa'i bka' tshad ma ni 'gyur ba med pa'o// rdo rje slob dpon gyi bka' tshad ma ni gol ba med pa'o// rang gi rtogs pa tshad ma ni bcos pa med pa'o// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ ston pa'i bka' tshad ma 'gyur ba med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus chos nyid la bzhugs pa la/ mu stegs byed kyi ston pa ltar/ byed pa po dang byed pa'i skyes bu dang/ rtag chad kyi mtshan ma

can ma yin pa'o// de lta bu'i don 'di thams cad rdo rje slob dpon gyis rtogs nas/ sgro skur med par snod dang ldan pa rnams la bstan na/ des tshad ma thog tu phebs nas/ 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gol
ba med pa'o// rang gi rtogs pa tshad mas bcos pa med de/ chos nyid tshig dang yi ges gdags su med pa la/ sangs rgyas kyis ma mdzad/ sems can gyis ma bcos/ mdzad cing bcos pa'i mtha' las 'das

pas/ 'di ltar tshad mas rtogs na/ las dang sdug bsngal gyis bcos su med de/ bcos pa med pa'o// tshad ma zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o// tshad ma zhes bya ba skyon med pa'o// tshad ma zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin

pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ da ltar dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ tshad ma nges pa'i don rtogs nas sangs rgyas so// de bzhin snga rabs 'das pa dang/ da ltar dang ma

'ongs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon kyang tshad ma skyon med pa/ 'di dag gi don rtogs nas grub pa brnyes pa yin no// de bzhin du snod dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor phyis 'byung ba yang/ tshad ma'i don rtogs na tshe gcig

gis rig 'dzin gyi gnas su sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ci lta bu la bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la yang bya na/ rtogs pa klong du gyur te nyams su

len pa la bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can yin pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid sems can las byung ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa klong du gyur pa ni/ gzung 'dzin rtag chad
dang/ yod med sdug bsngal la sogs sangs la/ de nyid mi rtog pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang du rgyas pas/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad nyams su lon pa'o// gzhan

yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po dang mtshan ma med pa'i sangs rgyas chos nyid la/ de rtogs pa mthar phyin par rgyas pas sangs rgyas pa'o// gsol pa/ chos nyid skye ba med pa la// gnyis su ma mchis pa
lags na// sems can bgyi ba ji lta bu/ bka' stsal pa/ sems can zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad la ma rig pa'i dbang gis mtshan mar bzung bas/ 'dzin rtog la blo 'chel ba dang/ gzhan yang rU tra rnam pa

gsum ste/ phyi gzung bar bya ba'i yul med pa la gzung ba'i yul du 'dzin pa ma traM ka ru dra'o// nang 'dzin par byed pa'i sems med pa la/ 'dzin pa'i sems su bzung ba ni a kar sha ru dra'o// gzung 'dzin rnam

pa gnyis yul sems brtas pa las grub pa ni kha trAM kha ru dra'o// rU tra rnam pa gsum yang sems can no// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa chos log par spyod pa yang sems can yin no// de la chos log par spyod pa

zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa chen po rdo rje theg pa 'di spyod pa las/ dper na rgyal po dmangs kyi las spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ theg pa 'og ma pa'i gzhung spyad nas 'di la sgro dang skur pa la sogs pas smod par byed pa

dang/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ltar spyod na yang/ lta bas ma rtogs shing spyod pas 'di dag 'phyas zlos su spyod cing/ tshig gi gzhung med pas gzhan dang ris su chad nas nang ris mi mthun pas rtsod pa dang

'gal zhing 'phyugs pa'i gzhir gyur pa rnams ni mtshan ma la spyod pas sems can no// de'i phyir na gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di thig le spyod pa nyams pa dang/ dmyal ba rdo rje byed pa dang/ snying rje'i lam las

log pa dang snod ngan pa rnam pa gsum la ni/ tshig 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi bya ste/ de dag la bstan na mnar med pa'i dmyal ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de

la thig le spyod pa nyams pa zhes bya ba ni/ bla ma'i bka' las thig ni drang po le ni gdal ba ste thams cad du drang zhing chos nyid du gdal ba yin pa la/ spyod pa thams cad log par spyad pas/ thig le spyod pa

nyams zhes bya ste/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig gsum nyams pa dang/ khyad par du bla ma'i gzungs ma dang/ bzhugs gnas gsang ba la spyod pa dang/ rdo rje mched dang gsang ba gnyen po'i gsang ba'i mkha' la/ ma rig

pa'i las spyad pa dang/ gsang ba'i bka' nges pa la bka' rkun dang lung med pa dang/ dbang ma nos par mtha' dag la ston cing/ 'dod pa tshol ba'i phyir sgrog pa rnams ni/ khyad par du thig le spyod pa nyams
pa ste/ 'di dag la bstan na gnyis ka dmyal bar lhung ngo// dmyal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i mi lus thob pa la/ mi la sogs pa g.yo sgyu med pa'i drang po rang bzhin gyis dge

ba la gnas pa las/ ngan song gsum gyis spyod pa la zhugs te/ dge sdig don la yang 'dzem pa med cing/ de dag la cher mi blta zhing ma rtogs pas blun po byol song dang 'dra bar spyod pa dang/ gzhan yang
mir skyes na yang shin tu chags shing zhen pa'i dbang gis/ thams cad du 'dod pa la chags te/ gzhan la mi dbang bar spyad pa dang/ gzhan las dam du 'bog pa dang/ ser sna la sogs pa 'jungs pas yi
dwags 'dra ba'i las byed pa dang/ mi'i lus thob pa la bsad pa dang bcad pa la sogs pa dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs dmyal ba dang 'dra ba'i las byed pa ni/ dmyal ba'i rdo rje byed pa zhes
