pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das zan nyid gtad pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu
khyod yang// dri ma 'di ni sku yi rten// 'phan phran 'di ni lus kyi tshad// tsu ta 'di ni bla yi shing// gdugs phubs 'di ni sku yi khebs/ gnas mchog 'di ni bsgrub pa'i gnas// dkyil 'khor
dam pa 'di la ltos// kun bzang yi dam lha mchog bsgom// snying po yi ger 'bru bcu bzlas// rang gi slob dpon 'di la nyon// me mar gsal ba'i mdangs la ltos// lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya chings// rdo rje

gnyen po'i ming nas bos// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor bskor// gdung ba'i sems kyis lha bsrung ste// ma bu'i 'du shes nyer zhog la// rdo rje'i spun la nye bar dgongs// rdzas mchog longs spyod 'di la

rol// bshos dang gal phyi dza gad dang// zla khrom zla rgyas zla tshogs dang// tshe yi snying po tshims byed dang// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ kun gyi zas su thob bya'i phyir// rang nyid rdo rje dpon slob
ste// zhal zas longs spyod 'di la rol// tshe las 'das pa'i zan tshogs su/ gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po

la// khyad par zan dang nor bsngo ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu la chu bsngo ba ni// de ring tshe 'phos lus kyi re bas te// gdung ba'i gnyen dang 'grogs par ma gyur
te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa las// bag chags bkru phyir bsil chab 'di bsngos pas// lus ngag yid gsum sdug bsngal dag gyur cig/ tsha zhing gdung ba'i sdug bsngal dag gyur cig/ hUM de ring
las kyi 'brel pa'i bu smad dang// mi yul 'di na smon lam mthu med nas// gtan du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med pas// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa la// yid gcugs gdungs pas bsams te

mchi ma phyung// sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas// ser sna chags pa med pa'i mdud pa grol// ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas 'di// nam gzhag gtan gyi bshos kyi skal bar bsngo// hUM de ring
yid gcugs 'dris pa'i sha rogs pos// pha ma so sos bskyed kyang yid gcugs sems 'dris pas// mthun par zas zos dga' ba'i rtsed mo byas// bskal par 'grogs kyang skad cig skyo med na// tshe 'phos
lus brjes las kyi re bas te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa la// nam gzhag gtan gyi bzhes pa 'dren lags kyi// ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas 'di// dar cig gsol bas phung po bkrag
mdangs gsal// lus kyi nad skyon thams cad zhi bar bsngo// nam gzhag yun gyi bzhes pa'i skal bar bsngo// hUM 'jig rten las kyis 'brel pa'i grogs po dang// gtan du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med
nas// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa la// brtse zhing gdung ba'i 'grogs pos 'bod lags kyi// las 'phro gcig pa'i grogs po 'di ru spyon// dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i bka' drin

gyis// dam tshig bdud rtsi gsung rab gnyen po bsgrub// tshogs kyi zhal zas longs spyod rgya mtsho la// ci bder rol zhing spyad par 'di ru spyon// mthun pa'i zas za gsang ba'i gros bya yi// bsing bu sngo mthar

'byams su dkar bting steng// dga' sdug bde ba'i longs spyod tshe lo dge// pham par mi dogs rgyal thabs thob par nges// spyod lam gcig pa'i grogs po 'di ru spyon// lha mo chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phen cig

btsug/ ye shes rtogs pa'i mda' zhig 'o skol 'phangs// yang dag cha lu dkyil du brdeg 'tshal gyi// spyod lam gcig pa'i grogs po da tshur spyon// bca' dang nyur mo lcags las me zhig phyung// btang snyoms
lha yi shing la me zhig spung// thugs rje bdag med drod la lhan cig bsro// spyod lam gcig pa'i grogs po da tshur spyon// bkres skom gdung ba bsal phyir 'dzar ba bshams// dar cig gsol bas lus kyi nad
rnams byang// gdungs pa tshims pas lus kyi bkrag mdangs gsal// 'khor ba'i gcong rong de na ci zhig byed// mtho ris dga' ldan gnas mchog yod bzhin du// na rag sdug bsngal gnas kyis ci zhig

byed// breng breng thugs la dgongs la 'di ru spyon// hUM tshe gcig las kyi 'brel ba'i grogs mo dang// yun du 'grogs kyang skad cig skyo med na// mgon btsun pha dang 'grogs pa'i skal med na// 'jig rten pha

rol gnas su phyin pa las// sang sang gsal ba tshangs pa'i sgra ldan zhing// byang chub rgyun thag bsgrengs pas nad dang sdug bsngal zhi// thugs rjes 'dab mas yid bzhin gos dang zas// gdung ba'i glu yis
byang chub rjes dran nas// smra ba'i tshig gis sku gsungathugs dang 'brel// zas dang btung bas sku yi bkrag mdangs rnyed// nam gzhag gtan gyi zas kyi skal bar bsngo// hUM gser dngul mu tig zangs dang

mchong// gzi g.yu shel zangs ra gan dang/ byes yul spyad pa'i bang cha dang// bstad sga 'khor gsum srab mda' dang// mda' gzhu tshon cha ru mtshon dang// ske rags gri gseg go cha dang// hor chub dung rna
gse'i btsod dang// stag gzigs grang srab phub rmog dang// sag rti sha lham su rug rnams// brtse gdung byams pa'i sha rogs pos// mi zad gtan gyi nor du bsngo// kun tu bzang po'i thugs rje
yis// bskal pa du mar mi zad cing// bde skyid longs spyod ldan par shog/ hUM de ring rtse gcig las kyis 'brel pa'i bu sring gis// gtan du 'grogs pa'i dbang dang skal med de// mi lus 'di nas 'jig
rten tshe 'phos te// 'jig rten pha rol gnas su phyin pa las// tshe 'das lus brjes rang gi re bas te// gdung zhing brtsi bar bsam pa'i lcam dang sring// gdung ba'i sems kyis yid dran mchi ma
phyung// sri zhu gus pa'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas// yid bzhin bdud rtsi longs spyod zhal zas 'di// nam gzhag gtan gyi bzhes pa'i skal du bsngo// hUM yid bzhin longs spyod bdud rtsi zhal skyems
'di// sdug bsngal gdung ba'i gnas nas grol ba'i phyir// bsil ba'i bdud rtsi rab tu sbyar ba yis// 'bras bu'i chos dang sbyar ba ma yin kyang// dkon mchog gsum po'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rab

tu gdung ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma phyung// sngon du bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams mthu yin te// mchu la reg na sgo gsum dbang po rno// lce la reg na dran zhing shes pa gsal// khong du 'thungs na nad dang sdug bsngal
zhi// kha zas skom du sbyar bas lus kyi sdug bsngal zhi// byams gdung brtse ba'i bsam pas gnyen bshes kyis// yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal nges bsal ba'i// brtse ba'i bsam pas nad dang sdug bsngal
zhi// mchu la reg pas shes rab dbang po rno// khong du chud pas rlung zhi 'jam la bde// kha zas skom du sbyar bas mdog dang bkrag nyid gsal// yid bzhin bdud rtsir sbyar ba gsol ba yis// bskal pa du
ma'i bdud rtsir 'di gyur cig/ nam gzhag gtan gyi skyems kyi skal bar bsngo// tshe 'das la zas nor gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston

pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das lam nyid bstan pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// hUM song zhig song zhig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod ni// 'jig rten 'di ru rtag
par ma gyur te// da lta skye shi'i las la babs// sa 'di bcad pa man chad ni// 'jig rten pa yi sa yin te// de la chags pa ma skye zhig/ tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod la// rnam par thar pa'i lam bstan
pas// sgrib gnyis spangs nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa la// der yang shin tu mi gnas pas// sa bcu'i ye shes mthar phyin te// kun tu 'od kyi sa las 'das// pad+ma can du gyur pa
las// yi ge tshogs chen sa las 'das// rang byung ye shes 'phro 'du'i tshogs// sangs rgyas sa gsum lhun grub kyis// byang chub chen po'i sa las 'das// stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na// 'og min lhun

grub pho brang du// rgyas pa chen po'i tshal chen yin// skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid du// gdod nas dag par byung ba yi// rang byung chos sku chen po thob// rtsol ba med par lhun gyis rdzogs// thams cad ma lus
sangs rgyas pa'i// dbyer med kun bzang gcig tu gyur// bde ba chen po'i ngang du gnas// ma btsal chos sku rang bzhin thob// ye nas dag pa'i don nyid do// a nas rab tu skye bar gyur
to// shes rab skye med dbyings kyi gzhu// lhag mthong ye shes thabs kyi mda'// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// nyon mongs dug gsum gnad la 'debs// nyon mongs bag chags kun byang nas// byang

chub chen po'i lam thob shog/ tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod kyang// ye shes chen po'i lam song la// chos nyid skye med gnas su song/ gnas mchog de las mi 'da'o// tshe las 'das pa lam bstan pa'i le'u ste
nyer gsum pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das nyon mongs sbyangs te bde gshegs sras su bskyed pa gang// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu
bzang po des// hUM nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshe 'das lus brjes rigs kyi bu khyod la// thugs rje lcags kyus ye shes rdzas drangs
nas// mdun gyi mkha' la dbyar gyi sprin lta bu// kun bzang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs ka nas// phaT kyi 'od zer nag po yis// tshe 'das bag chags gtan nas
sbyangs// pha ni gsod par byed pa ste// Ta ni sreg par byed pa'i mchog/ mtho ris sgo 'geg ngan song sgo 'byed pa'i// dngos grub gegs su byed pa thams cad dang// las kyi sgrib pa bag chags thams cad

kun// phaT kyi 'od zer nag pos bsreg par bya'o// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod ni// las dang nyon mongs bag chags kun byang nas// 'bras bu chos sku chen po thob bya'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi thig le

gcig tu gyur// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sras su byin brlabs pas// sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i yig 'bru gsum// thig le byang chub sems la rab tu thim// sku gsung thugs kyi sras su sku bskyed do// hUM hUM

badzra tsit+ta hUM/ sku gsung thugs las bskyed pa'i sras po khyod// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku thob pa dang// 'gro don rdzogs pa'i sprul sku thob phyir du// ri mor bris pa'i gzhal yas 'dir zhugs pas// tshe

'das rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor thob gyur cig/ chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum thob pas// sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i sras po khyod// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i lha mo
yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo thim par rol// nyon mongs bag chags byang byas nas// sangs rgyas sras thob pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i
ston pa kun tu bzang po la// tshe 'das lus brjes rigs kyi bu de la// sbyin sreg byas pas 'bras bu thob pa ji lta bu// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa
yis// nyon mongs drug nyid dag nas su// thub pa drug gi gnas su skye// rigs drug gtor ma phul ba yis// nyon mongs las dang bag chags dang// bdud rtsi zas dang longs spyod 'ong// bdud rtsi ye shes

chen po'i khrus byas pas// nyon mongs bag chags kun byang nas// zag pa med pa'i lus kyi 'bras bu thob// sprul sku thub pa rnams la skyabs su gsol ba yis// 'bras bu sprul sku chen po'i lus thob bo// tshe
'das sems bskyed byas pa yis// bag chags sna tshogs sems nyid las nas yang// 'bras bu rang byung ye shes sems thob bo// tshe 'das dbang bskur byin brlab byas pa yis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
gtan nas byang nas kyang// 'bras bu bde gshegs rnams kyi sras su 'gyur// rang gi rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor lha la phul ba yis// 'bras bu rtog med lha yi lus thob bo// rang gi phung pos me lha mchod pa
yis// sgrib pa mang po dag ste gnyis med thob// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad la// mchod bstod bye brag mang po byas pa yis// 'bras bu sku gsum lhun grub dbyer med thob// kun tu bzang
po'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa yis// theg pa kun gyi dkyil 'khor zhugs pa yin// 'bras bu theg pa kun gyi yang rtse thob// tshe 'das zan nyid gtad pa yis// bdud rtsi'i zas la rtag tu longs spyod cing// bag
chags sbyangs te gnas nyid spar ba yis// 'bras bu kun tu bzang po'i sras su 'gyur// tshe 'das lus kyi phung po la// mchod pa sbyin bsreg byas pa yis// bde gshegs kun gyi sras su 'gyur// 'khor ba'i

'dam las thar nas kyang// lhag med byang chub chen po 'thob// sbyin sreg byas pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// sdud pa'i gsang bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ston pa'i ston pa kun tu
bzang po la// rgyud 'di gang la gtad cing gang du brgyud nas gang gi 'bras bu thob/ ston pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang po des// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// bsreg tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i bag
chags bsregs// thob tu med pa'i lhun grub skye med thob// brgyud du med pa'i ye shes me lhar gtad// rang byung ye shes rig pa chen po des// bsreg tu med pa'i rig pa'i bag chags bsregs// thob tu med
pa'i rig gsal chen po thob// brgyud du med pa'i longs sku che la gtad// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yi ston pa des// bsreg tu med pa'i 'od kyi sgrib pa bsregs// thob tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe
byad thob// brgyud du med pa'i byang sems che la gtad// byang chub chen po'i longs spyod ston pa des// bsreg tu med pa'i shes bya'i sgrib pa bsregs// thob tu med pa'i byang chub chen

po thob// brgyud du med pa'i 'od lus sprul la gtad// 'od snang 'dus pa sprul pa'i lha mo des// bsreg tu med pa'i 'khor ba'i bag chags bsregs// thob tu med pa zhing skyong lha mo thob// brgyud du med pa'i
mkha' 'gro ma la gtad// ye shes rig pa chos skyong mkha' 'gro mas// bsreg tu med pa'i nyon mongs dug gsum bsregs// thob tu med pa'i chos skyong lha mo grub// gtad du med pa'i mchod rten che la

gtad// rgyal ba bde gshegs mchod pa dang// sgrib pa rnam gsum sbyong ba'i rgyud// sreg sbyong zhi ba'i rgyud chen 'di// bde gshegs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'bar ba'i klong nas bka' stsal to// rin po
che me lha zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
bod skad du/ rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
sems dpa' 'og min gyi gnas/ stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs te// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la sogs te/ byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa las/ sdud pa po phyag na rdo rjes/ mchod pa rgya che
ba dpag tu med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas lan brgya stong du mar phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces zhus so// ston pa dpal rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten du dkon mchog gsum
gyi dbu 'phang bstod pa dang/ las rnam bzhi'i byin rlabs brtan par mdzad pa dang/ dgra bgegs gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir drag po'i phrin las bka' stsal du gsol zhes gsang ba'i bdag po lag

na rdo rjes zhus pa dang/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gdan seng+ge'i steng na/ sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad du thal le gsal zhing/ mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad du ldan pa/ thams cad du bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum du bzhugs nas/ gdul dka'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar
dgongs nas/ nyid kyi gsang ba'i phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung nas/ gdul dka' ba'i sems can thams cad la/ thugs brtse bar dgongs pas bka' stsal to// bdag

dang gzhan gyi dbang du rgyud 'di gsungs so// thog mar brtag pa'i sa dpyad de// zla gam yod pa'i gnas su ni// sa gzhi byin du nag po la// dang por sa bslang ba dang/ sbyang ba dang brtan du byin rlabs drag

por bya/ hom khung dbyibs ni gru gsum du brko/ ngos ni ring po cha drug tu bya ba dang/ thug la chag gang bar bya ste// thur du khru gang brko bar bya/ de'i dbus su me thab bca'/ kha khyer zur gsum pa zhig byas la/

kha ran rim pa gsum po yang/ zheng tshad sor gsum par byas te// de la rdo rje'i ra bas bskor// de yi phyi rim mdzub gang la// bang rim gsum du gcad par bya// stegs bu khru lnga gru bzhi la// 'phang du chag

gang yan chad bya// de nas zhal ni nag por bgyi// ngos ni dmar por byug par bya// sgo ni byang gi phyogs su bstan// kha ran gsum gyi dang po la/ tshig chad song/ de yi phyi rim bang rim la// thod pa mda' gzhu spel

mar btang// de yi phyi rim bang rim la// 'bar ba'i me lce 'khrigs pa bris pa la// de yi phyi rim bang rim ngos gsum du// sgo gsum dag ni dod par bya// de yi phyi rim bar khyams gnyis// sgo bzhi dag dang

ldan par bya// tshon rtsi dmar po me 'od btang// rtse mo thams cad lhor bstan no// thab kyi zhabs su rdo rje dgod// rdo rje'i tshad du sor brgyad pa// sbom du tshad ni sor gsum pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni zlum leb
la// 'byis 'byil yang 'phar du bskor// dkyil 'khor dag gi dbus su bzhag/ de nas dkyil 'khor dbus su bkram// shar lho'i mtshams su yi ge raM// nub byang mtshams su yi ge yaM// kha khyer nang du me

'od bri// de na lha rnams dgod par bya// kha khyer dang po mthon po la// badzra mA le la sogs dgod// de yi phyi rim bang rim la// kau ri la sogs ma brgyad dang// seng ha la sogs phra men dgod// de yi phyi rim

bang rim la// khro bo chen po bcu dag dgod// de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi la// lcags kyu ma dang zhags pa dang// lcags sgrog dril bu bzhi dag dgod// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// de

yi phyi rim snam bu la// pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi dgod// de skad gsungs pas/ 'khor rnams yid rab tu rang ngo// rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra las/ gleng gzhi dang khyad par dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de
nas tsher ma nag po'am/ se skyer la sogs pa yi ni// tsher ma can gyi shing nyid la// chag drug pa yi tshad du bya// mgo mjug ma nor bar byas la// dri chu gtsang mas bsang gtor bya// khro bo bcu yi

sngags bzlas shing// khro bo'i shing rtse brdzang bar bya// bgegs kyi dbang du mi gtang bar// mtshams bcad drag tu bskrad par bya// gdon bgegs bskrad pa'i bsngags la/ sngags 'di rnams dpe dag so rnyed na bsdur/

d+hig a d+hi swA hA/ hUM hrIHlan gsum bzla'o// khro bo'i rtse shing 'di brdzangs pa dang/ sngags 'dis sbyang zhing shes par bya'o// A+oM sarba d+hig ni yaM yaM/ A+oM badzra li li/ A+oM bud+d+ha dz+wa la bud+d+ha dz+wa la/ ma hA raM raM he ma barbe raM/

dred na ma be laM/ ma hA be raM/ yaM dz+wa la raM/ oM badzra ga ra shing/ raM raM ag ni ti raM/ yaM dz+wa zhes bzlas/ thab tu me gzhug pa'i snying po'o// A+oM byaM byaM hUM hUM zhes bzlas/ yang na A+oM bruM bruM ta/ me spar ba'i snying po'o// A+oM

la te shi/ da be ta pa tsa hUM/ bum bu swa ma sa sas hUM/ dzuM swa/ A+oM d+hi pri kha nan/ hUM sarba nan shang ya staM bal/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ yang na rnam pa gcig la/ A+oM taM suM ha hri ha/ hUM hi phaT/ yang na/ oM raM raM hUM/ yaM yaM raM/

zhes brgya rtsa bzlas so// pho nya dpal dang bcas pa yang// kha cig de yi tshig bshad rung// rnog po snang yang gyen du bstan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus nyid du// las kyi tshad 'dzin sngags kyang bzlas// zhes
gsungs so// rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra las/ khyad par sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// dkyil 'khor de yi cha rkyen la// gdugs 'phan zung gcig 'khor du dgod// dkar po'i cod pan rtsi rang
gdang// lcags thag la sogs mda' rgyan dang/ lha bshos dag ni gtor mar bcas// gzhan yang ma lus tshogs par bsags// dar ram ras sam shing yang rgyud// zhal khebs nag po gcig gis
dgab// lcags thag nag pos dkyil 'khor bskor// zur gsum dag tu phur pa dgod// mda' dang dar sna bcas par gzug/ ral gri gsum dang lha bshos gsum// phur pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dang// rtsa chen

drug cu rtsa gnyis ni// dkyil 'khor dag tu dgod par bya// de nas sngags mkhan chas gos ni// sngags kyi chas gos rnam pa lnga// sngags ber sngags thod stod g.yogs smad dkris dang// sngags kyi phu dung la
sogs pa// dar ram ras sam re ba'am// nan tan gyis ni dkri bar bya// g.yab dar sngon dmar kha tshon do// me 'dren mda' dang bcas par bya// de nas 'byung po'i gzugs sam dgra bo'i gzugs// grog

ga'am ras sam shing shun la// gzabs la legs par bri bar bya// yang na rjes kyi sa dag las// ban+d+ha'i shing rtsi dag dang ni// ri bong dag gi ril ma bsre// de la gzugs su byas nas ni// de yi snying gar
ming rus bya// snying po dang ni bcas par bri'o// de la sbrul nag zhags pas bcings// yan lag lnga ni bcings bzhin du/ khro bo'i sku la brtod de bzhag/ de nas mchod rdzas brtsam pa ni// mchod

pa rnam lnga tshul bzhin brtsam// mar khu dang ni sbrang rtsi dang// 'bras chen 'bras kyi thug pa dang// shug gu rting dkar dang ni la du ba// me tog dang ni til mar dang/ 'bru thug dang ni lag sam dang// 'ol kon

dang ni yab the'u rnams su bcas// rin chen lnga dang spos lnga sman lnga dang// snying po lnga dang 'bras kyi lag pan dang// gzhan yang sman gyi stong pa sogs// thams cad ma lus tshogs par bya// de nas khro bo'i

mchod rdzas brtsam pa ni// mar khu dang ni thub pa nag po dang// yam shing nag po tsher the'u dang// dug gsum gyi ni mchod rdzas dang// ril bu gcig la bdun gsum tshogs pa dang// ku sha ske tshe ldong ros

dang// til mar che dang ra snying dang// sha khu dang ni lcags phye rdo phye dang// sran chen dang ni gu gul dkar nag dang// de la sogs pa'i mchod rdzas tshogs pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra
las// khyad par dkyil 'khor gyi cha rkyen dang// mchod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas gsad pa'i las brtsams pa// lcags phye zangs phye rdo dreg dang// ra dug spyang dug btsan dug dang// sha dug
dag dang 'o dug dang// dug gi rigs su gtogs pa thams cad do// dug gi zas su snod dang bcas par brtsams// de nas gsad par bya ba'i phur pa ni// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams sam// gdug pa'i

dug shing tsher ma can// mgo gzhug ma nor par bzhogs te// zur gsum rgya mdud bcas par bya// dug gi gtor ma nag po dang// rdo rje tho ba ral gri dang// brdung bzhi ha ru ni g.yang gzhi dang// hasta g.yas
pa dag dang ni// bud med lham mam brdung gos nag po'am// de la sogs te phyag cha tshang bar bsog/ de nas mchod pa rnam lnga dang// yo byad cha rkyen ma lus pa// kun ka sogs la byin gyis brlabs// byin

gyis brlabs pa'i dri chus bsang bar bya// de dag kun gyi byang phyogs g.yon du bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyi cho ga drag tu bya// de nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor ba dang// khro bo bcu yis mtshams bcad do// de

nas 'od chen shar ba dang// drag po'i las su khyad par bstan// khro bo rnams kyis byin yang bskyed// sems btsan po ra gzud do// rdo rje'i bsgo ba pha mas bu 'tsho lta bu// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las

'gal bar bya ba ma yin no// tshad med pa bzhi'i gzhi bzung mod/ de ltar ma bgyis na las kyi srin por skye ba'i nyen yod/ dpal chen po'i tshul du gnas so// rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra las/ gsad par bya ba'i las
kyi khyad par gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas me blang ba ni/ dur khrod kyi me gdol pa'i me'am/ yugs sa mo'i khyim nas me'i sa bon blang/ de nas me'i bsnyen pa bgyi bar bya// bsnyen pa'i
don ni 'dzab tu bzlas/ de nas cho ga phun sum tshogs pas drang bar bya/ da ni drag po'i phrin las bgyi ste/ 'gugs 'dren drag tu bgyi/ dgra bgegs la sogs pa bkug nas/ dug sna tshogs kyis me bsad de/

'di skad do// shing gi gnyen po me yin te// me yis shing bsreg snying re tshim// me yi gnyen po chu yin te// chu yis me bsad snying re tshim// chu yi snying po dug yin te// dug gis chu bsad snying re tshim// dug gi

snying po sman yin te// sman gyis dug bsad snying re tshim// sman ni lha yi sprul pa yin// sman gyis gang zhig gso bar byed// ces brjod de sman sbyar slar blug ste me gso'o// me gso ba'i yas ltags la/ shug lo

mchan khung gang dang/ mar dkar srungs shig slar me gso'o// A+oM raM raM ba ya hUM/ raM ka la ya hUM dz+wa la dz+wa raM hUM/ ma ma ni raM raM yA/ phaT phaT hUM he raM traM raM/ de nas thugs dam 'di skad bskul/ me lha rgyal po chen po

ste// skyin chen gshibs pa'i khri la bzhugs// rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// me yi ral pas bar snang khebs// shangs nas du ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// ljags nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// shar gyi phyogs nas

me drongs shig/ lho yi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// me yi rgyal po chen po ste// chu glang sngon po'i khri la bzhugs// sku mdog sngo nag ral pa can/ dril chen 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// me yi ral pas bar snang
khebs// shangs nas du ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// lho yi phyogs nas me drongs shig/ nub kyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// pad+ma rigs kyi me lha ste// sku mdog dmar la ral pa

can// shing rta bltabs pa'i khri la bzhugs// phyag na pad+ma dkar po bsnams// me yi ral pas bar snang khebs// shangs nas du ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// nub kyi phyogs nas me

drongs shig/ byang gi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// me lha'i rgyal po chen po ste// sku mdog ljang ser ral pa can// klu lug gro mo'i khri la bzhugs// rdo rje rgya gram phyag na bsnams// me yi ral pas bar snang

khebs// shangs nas du ba'i sprin du 'khrigs// zhal nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// byang gi phyogs nas me drongs shig/ dung sbud ma dang dung mchu ma// dung gi mi mo chen mo dang// dung gi sbud mchu chen mo
ni// g.yas na dung gi sbud pa thogs// g.yon na khyung gi khra thogs shing// gshog pa g.yobs la me bus shig/ mched lnga'i tshig bskul ba ni// ag+ne dmar ser me yi lha// me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
nas// skyin chen kham pa'i khri la bzhugs// me yi ral pas bar snang khebs// spyan nas me stag phyogs bzhir 'phros// zhal nas me yi rba klong 'khyil// ljags nas me yi dkyil 'khor

'dril// phyag na me yi bgrang phreng 'dzin// rgyal chen rigs bzhi phyogs bzhi bsrungs// bram ze pho mo lnga brgya yang// 'khor na gnas pa'i 'khor lags kyi// kha 'bar mas ni me bus la// bram ze rgyal pos

'gal skul cig/ me yi sa bon ma bcug kyang// 'byung ba chen po me yi rgyu// so so'i rgyu las me drongs la// rgya mtsho'i gting nas me drongs la// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang// nyon mongs bud shing bsregs
pa dang// sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// de yi bag chags bsreg dgos kyis// bus shig bus shig me bus shig/ skul cig skul cig 'gal skul cig/ ma ma ma mo'i tshogs 'bar ba// chu klung skem

par byed pa ste// rgya mtsho'i gting du me bus pas// ri rab rtse la ljon shing chags// rgya mtsho'i gting du rdo bcag bas// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas su/ zhe sdang byed pa brdul du rlogs// srid gsum bsreg pa'i me
spar bas// khro bo 'bar ba'i thugs dam bskang// dbang phyug ma dang bran mo'i tshogs// khyed rnams 'dus la las rnams gyis// drag po'i las la khyad par bskul ba'i le'u ste tha ma'o//// de nas dpal

rdo rje sems dpas sreg las kyi le'u 'di gsungs so// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas// du ba mthon mthing chos kyi sprin// zhi ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni// srid pa'i rtse mo
man chad nas// bsam gtan gsal ba'i gnas rnams su// skye mched phyogs kyi thugs dam bskang// dkon mchog gsum gyi thugs dam mchod sprin rgyu// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ me lce 'bar
ba'i mchod pa 'dis// bde gshegs lha yul dga' ldan du// dgra bcom 'gro ba'i don byas nas// rgyal ba'i bka' dang byang chub sems// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil
'khor du// rang rig 'bras bu bskyed pa dang// dpal gyi byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ me 'od 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'dis// lha dang bcas pa'i slob dpon dang// srog gi 'brel ba'i mched lcam la// bdud rtsi
mchod pa dam pa 'dis// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// dgongs pa me 'od 'bar ba bzhin// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// dpal gyi byin rlabs
'phel bar shog/ bdag la thugs rje dpal gyi zhing// dbang gi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying po rdzogs gyur shog/ thal ba ngan song gsum du dbo// bdud
bzhi thal bar brlag pa'i phyir// las kyi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// rdo rje'i rigs kyi thugs dam bskang// 'dod khams gnas rigs nyi shu dang// gzugs
khams gnas rigs bcu bdun dang// skye mched 'gro drug gnas rnams su// so so'i las dang 'du shes kyis// chag nyams pham ltung ci mchis rnams// chag nyams pham ltung 'phro bsabs te// sku
gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur shog/ sbyin sreg gi le'u las/ 'bar ba me'i sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas sreg rdzas rnams bsregs nas// me tog bsregs

pa'i mchod pa 'dis// byang chub phyogs dang rgyal ba'i rigs// thugs dam dkar po bskang gyur te// yon bdag tshe dang gzi brjid rnams// skyed mos tshal gyi ljon shing ltar// dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar
gyur// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 'phel bar shog/ mar ni thams cad kun gyi snying po ste// 'gro ba kun gyi gsos yin pas// bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dam pa 'dis// 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu dang// gzugs
khams gnas ris bcu bdun dang// dmyal khams bcu drug yan chad du// so so'i las dang 'du shes dang// chag nyams pham ltung ci mchis rnams// las kyi pham ltung 'phro bsabs te// sku gsung thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor du// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur te// me lha drang srong 'khor bcas dang// byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs 'phel bar
shog/ 'bru thug yid bzhin rin chen gter// skye 'gro kun gyi longs spyod gsos// longs spyod mchod pa chen po 'dis// me lha drang srong 'khor bcas dang// byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// thugs dam

yongs su bskang gyur te// bdag dang deng gi yon bdag rnams// rin chen gter la spyod par shog/ lag chen 'bru yi snying po ste// 'dod pa kun gyi snying po mchog/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho tshim pa'i phyir// tshim gyur
mchod pa chen po 'di// me lha drang srong 'khor bcas dang// byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// thugs dam yongs su bskang gyur te// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// dbang gi spyod yul tshim byed
shog/ 'o skol bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'dis// skye 'gro kun gyi sman dang gsos// yid bzhin longs spyod 'phel ba'i sman// bdud rtsi zhal zas rin chen 'dis// me lha drang srong 'khor bcas dang// byang chub
mchog chen sum cu bdun// nyon mongs dug sel sman gyi mchog/ rnam par rtog pa'i dug bcom nas// byang chub mchog chen sum cu bdun// thugs dam yongs su bskang gyur te// yon bdag 'khor dang bcas
pa rnams// khams gsum 'khor ba'i bdud bcom nas// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur shog/ zhi ba shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba la dum ku ru swA hA/ shag the'u yi rabs 'di skad do// thugs rje dbang
gi dkyil 'khor du// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin ni// sgo gsum 'khrul pa'i nyes byas kyis// lus ngag yid gsum 'bras bur smin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i

rgyun yang yin// ngan song ltung ba'i gzhi yang yin// de yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yam the'u thabs dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang// dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// sku

gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// byang chub snying por rdzogs par shog/ phung po lnga yi rang bzhin ni// rtog pas 'khrul pa'i nyes byas kyis// phung po lnga ni 'bras bur

smin// ngan song lnga yi gzhi yang yin// rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i rgyu yang yin// de yi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang// dus 'di'i las kyi bag
chags rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs nas// sku lnga 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying por rdzogs par shog/ rnam shes brgyad kyi spyod yul

ni// 'khor ba lnga dang dug gsum gyis// rnam shes brgyad kyi 'bras bur smin// sdug bsngal brgyad kyi gzhi yang yin// nyon mongs brgyad kyi rgyu yang yin// de yi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs
dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang// dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// ye shes brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi
dkyil 'khor du// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur cig/ skye mched bcu gnyis rang bzhin ni// sgyu ma rtog pa'i 'dzin chags kyis// skye mched bcu gnyis 'bras bur smin// 'du shes tshol ba'i rgyud yang
yin// gti mug 'khor ba'i lam yang yin// de yi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs dang shes rab kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang// dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// ye shes
'bar ba'i mes bsregs nas// mdzes pa'i lha mo zung gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur te// thugs rje'i dbyings su rdzogs gyur cig/ khams chen bco brgyad spyod yul ni// bying rmugs

las kyi rnam smin gyis// khams chen bco brgyad 'bras bur smin// byang chub ltung ba'i gnas kyang yin// ngan 'gror skye ba'i las yang yin// de yi sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i phyir// yab the'u thabs dang shes rab
kyis// tshe rabs bgrang ba'i nyes byas dang// dus 'di'i las kyi bag chags rnams// stong pa bco brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi// ye shes chen po'i mes bsreg nas// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par
sbyangs// thugs dam dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// byang chub chen por rdzogs gyur cig/ ku sha bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// rgyal ba'i bka' dang sngags kyi

dbang// mi shes tshul khrims gzhung nyams pa'i/ tshig chad song// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur te// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// dbang dang dngos grub bskyed pa'i phyir// skyed mos tshal gyi ljon pa
ltar// bla ma'i stan la 'dug par shog/ til 'bru bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// deng gi yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams// bskal par bsags pa'i sdig sbyangs te// kun gyi gnas su zhen pa las// thugs
kyi sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bla ma'i gnas su 'byor bar shog/ snying po bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// bdag cag rig 'dzin sngags mkhan gyi// lus ngag yid gsum ldan pa yis// phrin las yo byad

gzhung bsrang ste// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// rdo rjes gtams pa yan chad du// me lce dbal gyis tshig pa rnams// gso zhing gnas su bskang ba'i phyir// byang chub snying por rdzogs gyur te// bdag cag

sngags mkhan rgyal po rnams// chag nyams pham ltung 'phro bsabs nas// yun gyi sgrib pa byang gyur cig/ sbyin sreg las kyi le'u las// rdzas kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste tha ma'o//// de nas sbyin sreg bya ba ni/

sha khrag bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// dur khrod 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// khro mchog rgyal po spyan drangs te// sngon gyi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir// phrin las rnam bzhir mnga' gsol gyis// las kyi 'bras bu

mchis par mdzod// sran chen bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis/ phra men tshogs dang dbang phyug 'khor// pho nya drug cu phyag rgya'i tshogs// thugs dam yongs su bskangs gyur nas// phrin las rnam bzhi'i dbang byin
nas// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ lcags phye bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// lha srin sde brgyad gnas su rnams// gnod cing 'dul ba'i rkyen byed rnams// rdo rje lcags kyu'i 'phro 'du 'dis// gdug
pa'i lus ngag rgyud brlags nas// byang chub klong du bsgral byas nas// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i zhal du bstab// rdo phye bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// dam 'das sri dang las ngan bgegs// gtum chen 'bar
ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mgyogs pa'i tshogs rnams bsdus byas nas// rdo phyes phye mar brlag byas nas// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor du// 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams zhal du bstab// tshwa dang rA snying
bsregs pa yis// dug gsum las kyi rnam smin gyis// ngan song gsum gyi 'bras bur smin// phra men rgya mtsho'i mtshon cha 'dis// 'khor ba'i rgyu lnga brlag pa'i phyir// rang rgyud rlag pa'i mtshon cha

'dis// tsit+ta'i dkyil nas drangs byas nas// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor du// thabs kyi phyag rgyas drangs nas su// rngams pa'i tshogs kyi zhal du bstab// ske tshe bsreg pa'i mchod pa 'dis// phung po
khams dang skye mched dang// rnam shes sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// dam tshig las kyi pham ltung gis// srid pa'i dam dral sdig byed rnams// gshin rje gdug pa'i 'khor bcas rnams// gru gsum mthing nag
dkyil 'khor du// thabs kyi phyag rgyas bsgral byas nas// rak+sha'i tshogs kyi zhal du stob// ldong ros bsregs pa'i mchod pa 'dis// bdag dang deng gi yon bdag la// mtho ris sri dang 'byung po'i
gdon// rnal 'byor dam sri dam bdud dang// las kyi nyes byas pham ltung rnams// rdo rje gshog pa'i phyag rgya dang// mche ba sder mo zang yag 'dis// dkar nag mtshams nas drangs byas nas// las ngan

gdug pa brlag pa ni// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// phra men rgya mtsho spyan drangs nas// ngan song rgyud lnga brlag pa'i phyir// a dza li yi dwogs pa ltar// sa bdag chen po'i zhal du bstab// khro bo'i

sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas 'di skad du// nga ni sngags mkhan rgyal po ste// khams gsum thugs rje dpal gyi zhing// nga ni phyag rgya chen po ste// rgyal ba rigs kyi thugs dam yin// nga ni sman
pa'i rgyal po ste// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes 'bar ba'i me byung bas// srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// dmyal khams gnas ris yan chad du// dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub
sems// 'jig rten lha dang srid pa'i dpal// gnas ris klu dang dug ris sman// lha srin sde bcu'i gnas ris su// me lce mtshon gyis smas pa rnams// thugs rje dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// gsang

sngags thabs kyi phyag rgya yis// bdud rtsi sman gyis gso bar bya// de phyir sman pa'i rgyal po ste// skyes mchog nga yi las byas nas// bgegs kyang btul nas byang chub sems// dug kyang sbyangs nas sman gyi
mchog/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// me lces smas pa gsos par shog/ dbal gyis tshig pa gsos par byed// de nas me lha slar gshegs su gsol ba ni// me lha ag+ne sbyin sreg lta// khyod kyis sems can

kun gyi don// tshul bzhin du ni mdzad lags kyis// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol// gats+tsha mu/ zhes shar lho mtshams su gshegs su gsol// khro bo'i sbyin sreg las kyi le'u las// me lce mtshon gyis
tshig pa gso ba dang// las kyi pham ltung bsal ba dang// me lha gshegs su gsol ba'i le'u ste tha ma'o//// de nas khro bo'i las bya ba'i phyir/ khro bo ki li ki li'i phyag rgyas me sbyang ba

ni// lag pa g.yon pa kha phar bstan pa dang/ g.yas pa kha tshur bstan pa gnyis/ gcig tu sbyar la sor mo bskyod la sngags 'di bzlas so// oM ki li ki li bi li te'u dri ba kri ta ma hA badzra kri ta yo ni kro d+ha na hU~M/

des ni dam tshig gtsang mar byin brlab bo// de nas 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par 'bar ba'i sreg khang du spyan drang ba ni/ lha kun gyi tshig bshad 'dis bskul zhing/ sngags dang sbyar te spyan drangs so// de
nas phyag rgya bcas la 'di skad do// dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das// 'bar ba'i khang du bzhugs nas kyang// sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes su gsol// e h+ye hi

b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra ag+na ye badzra aM ku sha/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha zhes spyan drang ngo// de nas byon pa dang me tog cig thab tu bor te/ pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes gdan du
btings la/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i ched du sbyin sreg stsal na/ me 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs su gsol zhes brjod/ de nas sreg rdzas kyis mchod pa ni/ so so'i sngags brjod cing bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig

tu 'bul lo// de nas bstod pa bya/ de ni drag po bya ba'i las byas so// de nas slar gshegs su gsol/ de nas yang me sbyang/ de nas lha phyi ma rnams spyan drangs te/ go rim gong ma ltar bya'o// drag po las kyi

go rim las/ me sbyang ba dang/ spyan drangs pa dang/ gdan dbul zhing brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba dang/ mchod pa 'bul ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bstod pa bya ba 'di skad do// hU~M khyod ni mgon

po rdo rje 'dzin// khyod ni glang po'i rna ba can// khyod ni bzang po'i rgyan dang ldan// khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin// yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas khyod// khyod ni bde ba sbyin pa ste// khyod ni gzugs ni mdzes

pa'i rgyan// khyod ni me lha ral pa can// khyod ni gzugs ni mdzes pa yin// de nas drag po sbyor ba'i las dang slar gshegs su gsol// de nas yang me sbyang/ phyi ma spyan drangs gdan dbul ba dang/ bzhugs
su gsol ba dang// sreg rdzas mchod pa re re dang/ rtsa ba'i sngags re re dang sbyar zhing/ bdun gsum nyi shur dbul lo// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs rjes 'gro don du// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i rol pa'i skur
ston pa// ye shes bskal pa me chen 'bar ba'i 'od// srid gsum ma rig mun gsal gting nas 'joms// gzhan gyis mi thub sku gsung thugs dang ldan// khro rgyal thugs rjes rol la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M mi
g.yo mgon po ri rab 'dzin// rnam rtog pa yi rlung gis bskyaud// rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa'i bdud rnams 'joms// srid gsum bla med gnas su sgrol mdzad pa// dran pas re ba skong mdzad

pa// ye shes 'bar ba'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed hU~M sgra can// thugs rje chen po nyon mongs kun gyi dgra/ mche ba zil gnon 'jigs byed rgyan gyis bzhugs// yan lag drug
ldan 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed// ye shes spyan gyis ma rig mun sel ba// gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ma rig mun pa sel ba'i

mthus brlabs pa// dad pa'i tshul gyis cho 'phrul ston// ye shes dbyug pas dug gsum rdul du rlog/ thar pa'i gnas su sgrol bar mdzad pa yi// rdo rje dbyug to bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M ye shes ha ya grI

ba rta mchog dpal// sku mdog chags med nub ka'i dmar thag 'dra// 'bar 'phro dbu skra ral pa gyen du brdzes// ma rig tshangs pa kha sbubs bsnol ba'i lha// pad+ma rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M

chags pa'i thabs la dbang bsgyur ba// pad+ma 'dam gyis mi gos dag pa bzhin// 'dod chags kun la dbang bsgyur 'bar ba'i sku// mthong thos dran pas re ba kun skong zhing// ye shes nam mkha' lta bur dbang

bsgyur ba// khro rgyal 'dod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// sku mdog dmar nag bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ tshig chad song// hU~M sku gsung thugs kyi byin
rlabs thugs rjes rol// srid pa gsum gyi skye gnas rdul du rlog/ g.yon pas zhags pa sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar// ngan song gnas nas 'gro drug 'dren cing sgrol// ye shes mi g.yo rdo rje drag/ 'od phung
brjid pas don mdzad 'bar ba'i sku// khro rgyal stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M ma chags pad+ma 'khor lo 'bar ba'i sku// log 'dren bgegs kyi bdud dpung 'joms mdzad pa// log rtogs 'dam skyes bla

med gnas stobs pa// khro rgyal pad+ma 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M mdzad gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// lha dang lha min dbang po nye dbang bcas// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems
dregs pas khengs pa yi// srid gsum gtso bo dpung dang bcas pa'i tshogs// badzra hU~M gis bdud dpung 'joms mdzad cing// thar pa'i gnas su sgrol bar mdzad pa yi// hU~M mdzad 'bar ba'i dbyings la phyag

'tshal lo// gong ma bzhin du lha re re la bstod pa'i rjes la drag po'i sbyin sreg bya'o// las kyi rim pa las/ bstod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas drag po'i sbyor ba'i las bya ba ni/ 'di skad brjod
do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gtum chen 'bar ba la// khro bo'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zag rdzas

la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas btab// rdul du byas la tshogs su bstab// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas kun// 'jig rten khams ni rab

'byams kun// khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// dar phu tsar bu nar phu a b+hi tsa ra mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ zhes bskul lo// e yi tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du 'brel bsdams nas// bcing bsgyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos// myos nas bsad de tshig par 'gyur// zhes brjod do// las kyi le'u las/ drag por sbyor ba'i le'u ste
gsum pa'o//// de nas lha tshogs re re rdzogs pa dang/ drag po'i las bya bar gsungs so// de la dang por drang ba ni/ gong du mchod pa'i khro bo rnams/ tshigs su bcad pas re re nas bskul te 'di skad

brjod do// hU~M khro bo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba// rngam pa'i 'od zer dkyil nas grub pa thog thog 'phro// thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul du gsol// Ar+ya kro d+ha na hU~M phaT/ khro chen mi thub 'bar ba'i
sku// thugs rje'i byin rlabs dpal gyi sku mnga' bas// thugs rje chen po dbu gsum sdang mig can// mche gtsigs rtse las rdo rje gnam lcags 'bebs// rngam pa'i zhal nas rdo rje me stag 'phro// bdud 'dul

rgyal po gdug pa 'dul du gsol// A+oM badzra kro d+ha ne/ dz+wa la ni tid pa ta hU~M phaT/ hU~M khams gsum snang mdzad sku gsung thugs kyi gtso// hU~M mdzad hU~M gi dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bkod// hU~M gis dus
gsum rgyal ba'i gsung las skyes pa yi// me dbal sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can// me dbal sngon pos bgegs rnams 'dul du gsol// trai lo bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad 'phags pa ta kr-ita mi g.yo

mgon// shes rab ral gri bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar/ me lha ral pa can dang biSh+Nu sku la bzhugs// mi g.yo ral gri 'dzin pas gdug pa rdul du brlag/ Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad rin chen
mchog ste ya ma gshin rje'i gshed// byams dang thugs rje ldan pa'i 'jam dpal rnon po yis// ma rig dug gsum drwa ba gcod mdzad pa'i// dam tshig sgrol bar mdzad cing dpal gyi gnas su 'don// brjid

pa ma he'i sgrom du khengs pa gzir// gshin rje thod dbyug 'bar bas bdud 'dul mdzad// ya mAn ta kr-ita kro ta pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad ta kr-id dbyug sngaun 'bar ba'i sku// dbyug sngon 'bar ba dang ni rdo rje
zhags pas sdigs// rgyu tshil rkang dang khong khrag dmar po gsol// ri rab rgya mtsho 'dril zhing ha la'i dug kyang gsol// chu srin rgyal po'i gtsug nas yid bzhin 'bar ba phrogs// ta kr-ita dbyug

sngon can gyis 'dul bar mdzod// nI la daN+Da kro d+ha da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad rig pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin 'phags pa'i sku// asma gar b+ha'i dkyil nas rdo rje 'bar ma 'dren// dbu la rta skad rngam zhing 'tsher

bas ni// stong gsum g.yo zhing klu rgyal 'dul bar mdzad// khyod kyis lha ma yin gyis sdug bsngal sbyang du gsol// ha ya grI pa hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad ta kr-ita rgyal po 'bar ba'i sku// phyag na gdug pa'i

mtshon cha lcags kyu 'bar ba 'dzin// dam tshig 'bral ba bsgral te snying dang thod khrag gsol// bgegs kyi snying nas drangs te khrag 'thung thal bar brlag/ phra men kun dang rol pas dug gi sprul pas nam

mkha' 'gengs// me yi skye mched gdug pa 'dul ba'i dus la bab// TA ki rA dza ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ hU~M mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i dpal 'bar las kyi sku// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram dang ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa

'dzin// dngos grub dpal gyi bdud rtsi mchog gsol ba// hU~M mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis gnod sbyin gdug pa gdul du gsol// A+o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma hA ba la

'phags pa'i sku// phyag na rnga yab dang ni klu yi rgyal po 'dzin// mche gtsigs rtse las rdo rje gnam lcags 'bebs// bgegs kyi rgyal po bi nA ya ka gnon// btsun mo 'phrog cing sbyor ba'i thabs kyis rol// khro

rgyal stobs po che yi thugs dam bskul// ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po ka ma la yi mtshan// khros pa'i spyan bgrad smin ma glog bzhin 'gyu// dbu gsum phyag drug 'tsher bas bdud 'khyil mun
khang 'joms// gzi byin 'bar bas nam mkha' 'khengs// phyag drug mtshon chas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal sel// zhabs drug 'tsher bas ngan song kun bsgral te// thugs rje thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don rnams

mdzod// ka ma la kuN+Da li hUM phaT// hU~M mdzad hU~M gi rgyal po hU~M kA ra// hU~M ni mi skye pa yi chos nyid can// hU~M ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsung las skyes// me dbal sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin can// goms pa'i

stabs kyis brkyang bskum gar byed cing// rgyal ba hU~M kA ra yi thugs dam bskul// hU~M kAr gar dza gar dza hU~M phaT/ ces brjod la 'gugs 'dren drag tu bya'o// drag po las kyi le'u las/ skul ba 'gugs 'dren
gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de ltar 'gugs 'dren lag na phur pa'i las bya ba ni// lcags sna lnga'am shing tsher ma can la sogs pas sor brgyad dang bcu gnyis par byas la/ mgo mjug ma nor bar rtsa ba'i
ngos su mgo byas te/ mgo sor gcig la rgya mdud/ stod zur brgyad/ rked pa sor gcig la rgya mdud/ sman zur gsum par byas pa la/ dang po kho nar stong pa nyid du bsgoms te/ chos kyi skur

byin gyis brlab/ de nas spyi bo'i rgya mdud gzhal yas khang du bsgom/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar hU~M bsgril ma lngar bsgom/ de las dpal he ru ka dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang/ gshin rje'i gshed

po dang rta mgrin dang/ stobs po che dang/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po brjod pas/ yum dang gnyis su med par bsgom mo// de nas he ru ka'i thugs ka nas hU~M mthing nag las sras phur bu skyes te/ lto ba man
chad mthing nag la/ dbu ral pa kham nag zur gsum du 'greng ba/ sbrul dkar nag gis brgyan pa/ thod rlon gyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ spyan gsum bgrad nas g.yon du gzigs pa/ mche ba gtsigs nas zhal

rngams pa/ phyag bzhi pa la dang po gnyis na dgra s+t+wa rdo rje bsnams pa/ 'og ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu zur gsum bsnams pa/ stobs dang mthu dpung la sogs pa ni khro bo thams cad 'dus pa las kyang che ba
gcig bsgom mo// de yi gnas lngar 'bru lngas byin gyis brlab/ sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab/ de nas lag gi 'du shes kyi byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur la/ 'di skad brjod do// lcags sam drag

po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum// khro bo khro mo'i 'khor bsgoms nas// drag por gyur pa'i phur pa ste// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// gdug rtsub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// badzra kro

d+ha khA da/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M/ mA ra Na mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ zhes brjod de gdab bya'i gnas lngar gdab bo// gzhan yang phur pa'i rgyud las byung ba bzhin bskul zhing gdab bo// drag po las kyi le'u las/ bsad pa'i phur
bu'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas brdung ba'i las ni lcags sam/ rdo nag po'i gtun khung gru gsum nang du/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs bcug la/ lcags sam/ seng ldeng ngam/ shing tsher ma can gyi
gtun bus zhib legs su brdung zhing/ thabs dang shes rab kyi mtshan nyid du rtogs par byas la/ 'di skad brjod de/ lcags sam nag po'i gtun khung ni// khro mo rnams kyi gtun khung du// khro bo'i tho bas

brdungs byas na// drag por gyur pa'i tho ba ste// brdung na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// gnod byed gzhan lta ci zhig smos// badzra kha thaM badzra kro d+ha kha thaM/ mA ra Na kha thaM/ zhes

brdung ngo// drag po'i las las/ gsad pa'i brdung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas drag po gtor ma'i las ni/ lcags sam shing tsher ma can gyi snod gru gsum du/ lcags phye dang zangs phye dang rdo phye
dang/ dug sna tshogs/ nas nag gam sran phye rnams bsres la/ khrag sna tshogs dang bsres la gtor ma bya/ kha sle'u nag gis bcad la/ gang la bya ba de khug pa dang/ gtor ma kha phye bas dug gi

rlangs pas shi bar bsams la/ gang la bya ba la gtor bas lus ngag rdul du brlag par bsams la/ 'di skad brjod/ lcags phye dug dang rdo phye rnams// khrag gis sprus pa'i gtor ma ste// ma rga can dang sbyar

ba dang// drag por gyur pa'i gtor ma ste// sbyor bas de gtor brlag par gyur// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// tsa ra na mA ra Na phaT/ trag khaM mA ra Na phaT/ ces brjod la gtor ro// drag po'i las las/
bshig khral gtor ma'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gtub pa'i las ni/ gtan pa drag po'i shing las gri'am ral gri lcags sna las byas pa sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'am/ ye shes kyi mtshon char
dmigs la/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs dug gsum gyi gzhi mo rtsad nas gcad par dmigs la gtub ste 'di brjod do// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas yin te ye shes sku// ye shes sprul pa'i byin

rlabs las// ye shes rno dbal mtshon cha ste// drag por gyur pa'i mtshon cha 'dis// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rgyu// 'bras bu ngan song gsum du 'khor// log rtog 'khor ba rgyun gcod do// tsakra oM bruM tsakra

hUM bruM tsakra swA bruM/ tsakra hrIHbruM/ tsakra hA bruM/ badzra khaD+ga/ ts+tshin+da ha na hUM phaT/ zhes lus dum bur gtub bo// drag po'i las las/ gtub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bstab pa'i las ni/ gzugs kyi phung po

ni/ mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngo ste/ rgyal ba rigs lnga'i gdan khrir gyur par bsngo/ sems ni rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed pa 'di skad do// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rgyu// 'bras bu ngan song gsum du 'khor// dug
gsum rgyu 'bras sbyang ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs khrag bcas bstab// de nas gnas spar ba ni/ 'di skad du/ drag po'i las kyis bsgral ba rnams// 'khor ba'i lam rnams sgo bcad de// rnam shes hU~M gis

bsdus nas ni// hU~M gis ngan song stongs par byed// chags pa'i bde ba bla na med// rgyal ba thams cad hU~M gis bskyed// 'og min bla na med pa'i gnas mchog tu// khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i mtshams su

phaT kyis 'phang// ho yis g.yeng zhing yaM gis 'degs/ zhes brjod la spar nas hU~M gis bstab bo// ta thA ga ta/ badzra ra tsa rat+na ra tsa zhes gnas spar ro// drag po'i las las/ gnas spar ba'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// de nas drag po sbyor ba'i las ni/ gzugs gtubs pa ltar/ dug gtor gnyis bsreg ma thag tu gtor pas/ ye shes kyi mes bag chags dang bcas pa thul gyis bsreg par bsams la 'di
skad do// rdo rje'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// rdo rje gtun khung ldan byas te// drag po'i mthu yis ldan par mdzod// zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas
kyis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus kun// skad cig yud la brlag par mdzod// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// dar pU tsar pU nar pU a b+hi tsa ra/ mA ra Na phaT/ che ge mo zhig mA ra Na phaT/ ces brjod
do// drag po'i las las/ rjes drag po'i las bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas rdzogs nas las kyi lhag chad skong ba'i phyir// me lha lan gcig spyan drangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su
gsol/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang/ sbyin sreg gi rdzas ci lhag pas mchod de/ las ma dag pa bzod par gsol/ me lha slar gshegs su gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha byin la bzod par gsol te/ ma rig
bdag cag lus dang ngag sems kyis// bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje'i che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol// khyed kyi thugs rje nam
mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'gro ba phan phyir tshangs pa stsal du gsol// de ltar bshags pa bgyis te bzod par gsol// drag po'i las kyi lhag chad bskang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas mnan pa'i

cho ga bgyi ste/ hom khung gi nang du thod chen nam/ phag thod bcug la/ thod pa'i nang du dgra bgegs kyi ming rus bcug ste/ g.yam pa sngon po la dbus su 'khor lo bri/ phyogs bzhir rgya gram bri/ zur bzhi ri

rab bris la mnan no// tshig tu yang/ mnan no ri rab brjid kyis mnan// bskyon no 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bskyon// 'phang ngo rgya mtsho'i gting du 'phang// sbyin no gnod sbyin zas su sbyin// gtad do gshin rje'i

lag tu gtad// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og shed na// gshin rje'i rgyal pos chos 'chad kyis// de yi drung du chos nyon cig/ byang chub sems ni ma skyes tshe// nams kyang gtang bar mi bya'o// nam zhig byang chub

sems skyes nas// de tshe gnas ngan de las drang bar bya/ A+oM laM suM laM praM laM/ pra ti ta nan/ byi tsi ya suM b+ha ya/ mo hA ya/ g+ha ta ya/ bag ma ni/ pa tsa laM laM laM/ mA ra Na nan nan nan/ drag po'i las las/ mnan
pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// rdo rje ngur mo'i me rgyud las/ khro bo'i las rdzogs so//// de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpas las rnams bzhi'i tshul gyis hom bya ba 'di gsungs so// thog mar las gang byed

pa'i kha dog bzhin/ phyag rgya chen por bsgyur zhing gnas bsrung/ bla 'og phyogs bzhi byin gyis brlabs te/ re zhig las gang bya ba ma zin gyis bar du/ bar chad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gdon bgegs rgyang
grags gcig tshun chad mi 'da' bar mtshams bcad/ mchod pa'i yo byad sbyar te/ lha bshos dang mchod gtor dang lan chags kyi gtor ma dang/ me'i mchod pa'i rkyen/ phye mar dang/ mar khu dang/

sman dri chu yan chad bshams te/ hom gyi yo byad sbyar ba la/ me spar la ma rig par byas la/ 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs te/ mchod cing gtor ma mchod gtor bsngo ste/ las ma zin gyi bar du mi dgye/ phyi
gtor ni 'phral du dgye/ 'phags pa man chad dang/ phyi gtor du bsdus pa rnams la yang 'di skad du/ dang gnod byed thams cad bkug cing/ sbyin sreg mdzad du gsol/ phan gnod byed pa rnams mtshams
bcad/ phrin las ma rdzogs kyi bar du mi gshegs par stong grogs mdzod cig ces bcol la/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin dmigs/ hom khung zur gsum tshad bzhin brkos la/ kha tshan bskor maN+Dal zheng khru gang

tsam zhig bgyis la/ tshon mthing nag dgye ste/ de'i steng du tshon dmar pos 'od 'bar bri/ rdo zur gsum gcig la/ A+oM AHhU~M zur re rer bris la/ hom khung gi zhabs su bzhag/ de nas shing rlon pa skyer pa dang/

gla ba dang/ shug pa dang/ seng ldeng dang sbyar ba dang/ thang shing rnams phreng gcig tu gshags la srid du khru re re yam shing skam po gong ma dang/ mnyam par bgyis la/ 'di rnams hom khung du 'greng bur brdzang

zhing/ byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po/ A+oM hi sa zhes brgya rtsa brgyad man chad/ sum cu yan chad bzlas shing brdzangs la/ yam shing gi dbus su rdzang ma'i sol ba nyung shas blugs la/ pags pa nag po'am snam bu
nag pos kha bcad de/ me spar nas dar nag po kha gang mda' la btags nas/ me dag gi nyams dang sbyar te sa bon mthe bong tsam mam bag ka tsam cig gsal la/ hom khung gi zur gsum du chu blugs la/ me
nyams che na chus gang/ mi che na me la ma thug tsam mam phyed man chad bkang la/ ha ha ha zhes lan gsum brjod la/ me lha nag po 'khor dang bcas te byon nas/ mnyes shing mdangs phyung bar bsams nas/

shar phyogs nas me lha dkar po sku dkar ser dbu ral pa can phyag na ba dan dkar po thogs pa/ skyin kham pa la zhon pa/ lho phyogs kyi me lha nag po ag+ni sku mdog sngon po dbu gsum ral pa mdun du 'khyil

ba/ phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga thogs pa/ skyin sngon po ru gcig la zhon pa/ nub phyogs kyi me lha dmar po ral pa can/ phyag na ba dan dkar po thogs pa/ shing rta la bcibs pa/ byang phyogs kyi me lha ljang gu gsus po

che/ phyag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ klu lug gro mo rwa ltag pa g.yas su 'khyil pa la zhon pa/ 'di rnams phyogs bzhi nas lcags kyus drangs nas sku las me 'bar zhing hom khung nang du byon te/ zhal nas hU~M dang phaT
kyi sgra sgrogs shing/ ha ha ha zhes gsungs pas/ sku dang zhal gyi nang nas me lam lam 'bar zhing byon pas byin gyis brlab par bsam/ me lha chen po ko'u rA dang/ tso'u rI dang/ pra mo hA dang/
puk+ka sI dang/ ag+ne dang/ tsun+dA dang/ ko'u shi ka dang/ gzi can dang/ 'bar ma la sogs pa'i sku las/ me stag 'phro zhing du ba 'thul bar bsam/ hom khung du byon nas me 'bud do// me 'bar bar bsam/

rlung gi rgyal po sha rkyang mgyogs pa la zhon pa/ lag na ru mtshon dmar po dang rlung gi rkyal pa thogs pa hom khung du byon te me 'ur 'ur 'bud par bsams te/ 'di rnams kun kyang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang/ snying

pos spyan drangs te/ dus gcig tu me 'bud cing 'bar bar bsams la/ gdong bzhi pa'i phyag rgya bcas te/ me spar ba'i snying po A+oM badzra raM raM hUM hUM yaM raM zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/
ha ha ha zhes lan gsum brjod/ 'ur 'ur 'ur zhes lan gsum brjod pas me 'bar bar bsams la/ dbyangs snyan po blangs te bstod pa dang/ me 'bud pa'i las bya ba'i thugs dam bskul te/ g.yab dar
gyis g.yab cing snying po bzla zhing me spar ro// me 'bar nas mar khu phye mar dri chab stsal bas mchod nas/ las ci bcol ba rnams 'grub par gsol/ gdon bgegs sogs kyi ming rus bris te/ bgegs
gtor yang drung du bzhag la/ gdon len te drang zhing hom khung gi nang du gzugs drangs la/ dam gtor spar te dong du bcug la/ me sman chus ma shi ba tsam du bsad de/ yang spar 'bar res la lan re mchod

cing/ dbyangs dang bstod pa dang bskul zhing las bya/ 'di bzhin lan gsum tsam bgyi/ hom khung nang du chu blug pa'i tshe// dza ya dza ya/ zhes sam rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes brjod do// chu'i chu dbal lan gsum
g.yeng zhing bshal bas/ 'phags pa chu dbal dang lha'i byin rlabs kyis/ bgegs kyi gdug sems zhi zhing/ bag chags byang bar bsam mo// hom khung dngos ni rin po che'i gzhal yas khang zur ni sku

gsung thugs shing ni rigs lnga'i thugs dam dang ma bdun gyi 'khor dang khro bo dang khro mo'o// me ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin chu ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/ dgra bgegs hom khung du song ba tsam gyis/

bag chags byang zhing mtho ris su thar ba'am/ yang na 'phags pa rnams dang me lha'i zhal du dngos su bstab cing/ rnam par shes pa mtho ris su spar ro// mnan pa zhig bya na yang/ hom khung du dgra bgegs
bkug la/ lo grangs 'di tsam zhig bar du 'di nas gzhan du 'gror mi gnang bar mtshams bcad cing gzir la dam chu dam gtor byin la/ hom khung nang nas me'i sa bon tsam man chad phyir dbyung/ 'phags
pa dang me lha hom khung du bzhugs pa la mchod de/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags brjod la/ la gor hom khung kha bcad de/ mnan pa'i phur pas steng nas gdab bo// rdo rje ngur mo'i tan+t+ra
las/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gdangs kyi hom rgyud kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal gdangs kyi ma rgyud rdzogs so// bar 'dir sku gdung 'bar ba tsha tsha mchod rten gyi rgyud 'dzud///

rgya gar skad du/ ma hA hU~M kA ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ hU~M mdzad chen po'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dbang chen bdud 'dul rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ bcom ldan
'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ srid pa thams cad yum kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi mkhar mkhyen nas/ yum gyi mkha' bde klong chen po nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rang bzhin/
yi ge hUM dmar la bkra ba/ ser la gsal ba las/ hUM hUM zhes brjod pas/ hUM grangs med pa 'phros nas/ dug gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad gtan nas sbyangs so// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs

pa rnams kyi sku yang mtshon par byed do// hUM de las sprul pa'i sku sna tshogs pas kyang don mdzad do// hUM de dmar ba ni pad+ma he ru ka'i thugs/ hUM de dkar ba ni bud+d+ha he ru ka'i thugs/ ser ba ni rat+na he ru

ka'i thugs/ mthing ba ni badzra he ru ka'i thugs/ ljang ba ni karma he ru ka'i thugs so// re re la sna tshogs su 'bar ba yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs so// de las thams cad 'thor zhing/ thams

cad bsreg/ thams cad dbang du sdud par byed do// de ltar thams cad hUM gis rgyas par mdzad do// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las gleng gzhi dang hUM gi dbye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// sras kyi dam pa he ru ka
des/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yi ge

hUM de las thams cad bskyed cing chub par byed na/ de ni dang po gang las byung// de yis 'byung ba ji ltar bskyed// de las lha ni ji ltar lags// bzlas pa'i thabs ni ji ltar lags// de la nus pa ci tsam
bdog/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ las thams cad kyi ded dpon/ sras kyi dam pa he ru ka/ hUM las thams cad 'byung ba
ste// dang po chos nyid dbyings nas shar// thams cad srog gi sa bon yin// de yis ji ltar 'dod par 'grub// 'byung ba bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// hUM las e 'phros nam mkha'o// hUM las yaM gyi gtsar du
'phros// rlung gi dkyil 'khor de bzhin chags// hUM las yi ge ra 'phros pas// chags pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'o// hUM las yi ge su ser 'phros// gser gyi sa gzhi ser po chags// hUM las keng

'phros ri rab bo// bang rim rim par ldan pa'o// hUM las raM 'phros me 'bar ba'o// 'byung ba rim bzhin de ltar bskyed// gzhal yas zla gam kha sprod la// dbus su sgo gnyis ldan pa'o// zlum po dag la 'khor

lo rtsibs brgyad dang/ gru chad gru zhi sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// de ltar gsal bar bya'o// de ni sgo'i rim pa rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zlum po zla gam bcad// mtha' ma pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi// gru chad sgo
dang bcas pa ni// pad+ma'i las kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// sems can chen po gzugs bzhi ste// zur bzhi dag la lus bskyon la// rkang pa nang brdol mtshams bzhi
dgod// lag pa bar gyi mtshams la dgod// de ni bsad pa 'ba' zhig ste// ma traM zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yin// gru bzhi lham pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus ni thig btab le tshe dgu/ de yi phyi rim zla gam

dgu// de yi phyi rim rin chen 'bar ba dgu// de yi phyi rim gru chad la// gru bzhi sgo ni nyis brtsegs bcas// khyams dang sgo khyud ldan pa ni// khyad par dbang gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yang ni bshad bya

ba// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus ni zlum dang zla gam sgo gcig pa// zla gam phyir bltas nang bltas brgyad// de la rin chen rgyan dang ldan// gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud bcas// mtha' ma me ri 'bar ba

ni// de ni grub pa tshe yi yin// de ltar rim par bsgrub pa'o// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// pad+ma'i sras kyi dam pa he ru des// dbang gi rgyal po la 'di
skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang mchog che// yi ge'i don la bdag nyan 'tshal// gnas pa ji ltar gnas pa lags// bzlas pa'i thabs ni ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bka' stsal

pa/ nyon cig sras kyi dbang gi he ru ka/ yi ge srog gi 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo lnga yi rten du gnas// spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ste// dbus ni zlum po pho brang la// dar dkar yol du phub ba'o// 'dab ma

sum cu rtsa gnyis so// lte ba pho brang thig le la// yi ge oM dkar 'bar ba la// mtha' la hu lu'i yig 'brus bskor ba'o// A+oM ni dkar dmar 'tsher ba la// yi ge mtha' bskor 'dzag 'dzag 'dra// hUM dar chen
bde ba chen po'i pho brang nas// dar dkar yol bres 'od ldan la// rdul gyi gser chen lu gu rgyud// sems kyi yi ge A+oM dkar la// mtha' ma hu lu'i yig 'brus bskor// gser gyi ba thag gzengs pa
ltar// 'phro 'du'i dgongs pa rgyun mi gcad// phar 'phros pas ni sangs rgyas thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub 'bebs// A+o~M hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hU~M hrI dzaH/ de yang
dbang gi bka' yi bzlas pa yin// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab bcu drug/ lte ba ge sar pad+ma 'bur du dod// mtha' ma 'dab ma bcu drug mtshon/ lte ba AM dmar 'od 'bar la// mtha' ma hu lu'i yig
'brus bskor ba'o/ pho brang pad+ma 'bur gyi lte ba la// yi ge AM dmar 'od du ldan// mtha' ma yig 'brus bskor ba ni// mgal me klad la bskor ba bzhin// 'phro 'du'i dgongs pa rgyun mi gcad// phar spros
pas ni rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// 'di yang gsum gyi bzlas pa yin// A+oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaH/ tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas

la// dbus ni dpal be'u rdo rje bskyed// yi ge hUM dmar 'od ldan pa'o// mtha' ma chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// de la hu lus bskor ba'o// hUM tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas khang// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma

brgyad// thugs kyi dpal be'u lte ba la// ston pa'i yi ge hUM dmar de// mtha' la rin chen gser gyi skud pa la// hu lu'i yig phreng bcu gsum brgyus// phar 'phros pas ni rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// slar
'dus pa ni dngos grub 'bebs// 'phro 'du'i dgongs pa rgyud mi gcad// 'di yang dbang gi thugs kyi bzlas pa yin// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di yis bsgrub// oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaH/ lte

ba sprul pa'i gzhal yas na// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la/ tshig kha shas chad// mtha' la hu lus bskor ba'o// swA lte ba sprul pa'i gzhal yas na// stong pa'i yi ge swA ser po// don gyi yi ge hu lus bskor// lcags kyi tsha
tsha brdabs pa bzhin// 'phro 'dus dgongs pa rgyun mi gcad// phar spros pas ni thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub 'bebs// 'di yang dbang gi rin chen 'bebs pa yin// swA hu lu hu lu phaT/

e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaH/ gsang ba me rlung las kyi 'khor lo la// gru gsum gzhu yi gnas chen na// ston pa'i yi ge ha ljang gu// mtha' ma hu lu'i 'bru yis bskor// rin chen rtsar gyi phreng ba bzhin// gcig la
gcig 'phro 'od ni 'dzag 'dzag 'dra// phar 'phros pas ni thugs dam bskul// slar 'dus pas ni dngos grub 'bebs// 'di yang dbang gis las kyi bzlas pa yin// A+oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIHdzaH/
hUM dang po gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// bar du gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas// sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// mtha' mar dbang gi sgra bsgrags pas// ngan song
'khor ba gtan nas sgrol// bdud dang srin po klu rnams zil gyis mnan// dbang gi mdzad pa de ltar mdzad// de ltar spyod pa 'di ltar spyod// sngags kyi byin rlabs 'di ltar 'byung// de phyir hu
lu bsnyen pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ bzlas brjod sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas sras kyi he ru des// dbang gi rgyal la 'di skad gsol// dbang gi rgyal po

he ru ka/ ston pa mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// sgos su bsgrub na ji ltar bgyi// spyi yi bsgrub pa ji ltar spyad// bsad gso'i las ni du yi bstan// las kyi mtha' 'di gang la gsung// zhes gsol to// de nas

dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa'i sras// spyi ru bsgrub pa bstan pa ni// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag la// de la nges par bsgrub par byos// bris pa'i sku gzugs dag
la brten bcas nas// de la phyag bcas bsgrub par bya// dam tshig ma nor gzhung du bsrung// mchod pa dus gsum dag tu mchod// sngags dang snying po lha rnams kun// yid la ma nor dran par bya// 'dod

chags can gyi bud med la// de la smad par bya ba min// khrag chags shing yang gcad mi bya// dmar po'i rigs la smad mi bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bca' bar bya// gsung gis sgra snyan gdon par bya// dbyings dang
btung ba de bzhin bya// gsung gi yan lag stobs su 'gyur// rtag tu yi dam 'ba' zhig bsgrub// de yi nus pa'i mthu dag gis// bdud sde 'khor bcas zil gyis gnon// byang chub 'bras bu thob par

'gyur// de yi yon tan dpag las 'das// de phyir spyi ru bsgrub pa'o// sgos su bsgrub par bstan pa ni// rta yi rgyal po gcig tu bsgrub// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig pa// lha ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan
gcig pa// dbu yi gtsug tu rta mgo gcig/ dmar po ral pa 'khyil ba'o// g.yas na sta re g.yon pa sbrul zhags bsnams// glang chen ko rlon zhing gi g.yang gzhi gyon// stag lpags smad dkris 'og sla 'doms

su bsdus// mi bzad mche gtsigs stag gi khri// dmar po hUM la sngags 'di brjod// de yis rta mchog mgrin du bskyed// oM yod pa e yin/ pad+ma shrI rA ga ha ya hrI da ra d+hi pa e yin hUM phaT/ yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa'o// stong

pa'i ngang las yi ge hUM// de las sngags brjod rta mgrin bskyed// spyan drang bskyed pa de la bstim// gnyis med de la phyag 'tshal mchod pa'o// sman dang rak+ta gtor mas mchod// bsad dang gso ba'i las 'di
bcol// srid pa'i ma mo btul ba'i las la rbad// ces gsungs so// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ spyi dang yi dam bya zhing bsrung ba dang nus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal

te// dbang gi pad+ma he ru ka'i thugs ka nas/ dpal be hUM gi lte ba la// dza zhes brjod pas dpal gyi thugs ka nas// dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza brgyad bar ma chad 'thon to// ku ku ku ku ku ku ku ku rA

tsa zhes brjod pas/ khyi'i rgyal po brgyad du 'gyur ro// rak+sha kha long ka de byang dgos/ yak+sha kha long ka/ trak+sha kha long ka kha ya kha long ka/ du ma ba kha long ka/ ma to kha long ka/ dza le dza lo ka/ mu ka kha long kha ka/ snying
po de yis bskul bas ji lta ba bzhin du las byed do// dur khrod gling ngam nags tshal gnas// de ru dkyil 'khor brtsig par bya// gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor la// mtha' ma khyi brgyad bskor bar

bya// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po bskyed// zla gam gsum la dam rdzas so// bya lug mi dang rta'i sha khrag la gtor ma bya/ ling ga mtshan dang ldan par bya// dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// spyi bor sod la

'doms su mA ra ya// g.yas su hUM la g.yon du phaT// de dang ldan par bsgrub par bya// tshon sna lnga yis byad du gzhug/ de nas dam rdzas tshogs pa dang// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim gyis bsgom// hUM ma nor ma

bcos chos kyi dbyings// snying rje chen po yongs la brdal// rig pa ye shes hUM du shar// hUM las yi ge rim gyis chad// e yaM ra suM keng raM b+h+rUM// e ni nam mkha' khyab gdal dang// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor

te// de las spris rten chu'i dkyil 'khor// de steng sa gzhi brtan mkhregs sra// keng raM b+h+rUM las ri rab gzhal yas khang// hUM dang ku yi 'phro 'du las// dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ ku las dpal gyi khyi brgyad

bskyed// hUM dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs dpal gyi khyi// dpal chen thugs las skyes pa'i pho nya mo// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs bdud sde gdul ba'i phyir// dpal gyi pho nya brtan par

bzhugs// tiSh+Tha badzra/ srid gsum 'dren mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i gtso// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum sgrol bar mdzad cing sha dang khrag la dgyes// dpal gyi pho nya 'jig rten skyong

mdzad ma// bdud 'dul pho nya'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa ba brgyad la yan lag stong// ra sa yA na la sogs rdzas// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la 'bul// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa

ra sa yA na 'di// dpal gyi pho nya'i tshogs la 'bul// ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ zhes dbul lo// oM kA ya sing+ha oM/ wA ka sid+d+hi AH/ tsit+ta sid+d+hI hUM/ A+oM ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha raM khA hi/ ma hA ba liM ta khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta

kha raM khA hi/ zhes dbul/ dpal gyi spyan sngar dam bcas ltar// ma rungs log pa gdul ba dang// mthu dang dbang gi dngos grub stsol// zhes bya'o// A+oM dza dza rak+sha yak+sha dza ya du ni hUM/ de ni drang zhing dbang du

bya'o// 'di ni rbad pa'i snying po'o// rak+sha kha la dza dur ling srog la yaM khug ril dbugs long rba na rbad ya zhung tri yaM yaM/ zhes pa dang rbad par bya'o// hUM dpal gyi pho nya chen mo ste// dpal

chen thugs las skyes pa'i pho nya mo// ye shes thugs kyi khyi brgyad yin// zhabs ni rlung gi 'khor lo yin// snyan ni sgra rnams kun la gsal// shangs ni dug gsum dri ma snoms// zhal ni bdud bzhi rngub par

byed// mig ni nyi zla 'od du 'bar// mjug ma lcags kyus nyams pa 'dzin// kha nas mi yi skyugs pa skyugs// rgyug pa'i stobs ni spyang mo 'dra// khyed ni bsgrub pa las kyi bya ra mdzad// phyogs bzhi mtshams

bzhir rgyug pa'i tshe// phyogs skyong bdud rnams rdul du rlog/ bcol ba'i las kun bsgrub par gyis// dbang gi zhing khams chen po skyong// zhes bskul zhing las bya'o// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ dpal gyi khyi

brgyad bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas// mi yi lus la khyi'i cha byad can/ khyi dang chas pa/ rta dbu la mi'i lus la rta mgo can rta dang chas pa/ gshog pa las mi'i
lus la bya'i mgo can bya dang chas pa/ zhabs las mi'i lus la phag gi mgo can byung ngo// de bzhis ma dad gdug pa 'dul bar byed// de yi sgrub pa bstan pa ni// rbad cing las kun byed pa'o// gcan gzan

gdug can wa 'phar spyang ki khyi rnams min// khra dang g.yag dang/ stag dang/ dom gyi snying de la gtor ma bya ba yin/ sngags ni drag po 'di skad gsungs// oM d+hi ga ru rbad ya/ ku ku rak+sha tsa tu ra yaM/ kwa te raka to

tsa le rbad/ du ra rba sha yaM/ de bzlas rbad par bya'o// de yi las kyi nus pa dpag las 'das// de nas brtul zhugs spyad par bya// de nas bro yang drag por brdung// de nas pho nya drag po dgye// hUM mdzad chen

po'i rgyud las/ brtul zhugs bzhi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas dbang gi zhabs las/ dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad gser gyi seng+ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad du sprul nas/ 'gro ba'i las byed par sprul

lo// de rnams rbad cing b+h+yo bzlog bya'o// rtsang nyi shu rtsa brgyad mde'u thung nyi shu rtsa brgyad la btsugs la/ de la sha khrag bsku dang dgal/ de nas nyung dang tshe dang bcas pa'o// de ltar byas la bdud rtsi gtor ma

rak+tas mchod// de nas drag po'i sngags rnams bzlas// A+o~M sing nga la dzaM ba drag sham ma ril b+h+yo/ ma ri rak+sha ka laM seng nga sbreng b+h+yo/ e ka tsak+sha laM rbad b+h+yo/ 'di ni las kyi bskul ba la/ sa ma rak+sha ka laM tri le tri le

ra ra ra ra breng shar thun ling b+h+yo/ hU~M ma g.yel ma g.yel dbang mo'i tshogs// mkha' la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// dbang gis dbang bskur dbang phyug ma// dpal la brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// srid pa
gsum la dbang yang byed// tshe dang dbugs la dbang bsgyur ma// rbad pa'i las la dka' sla med// traka rak+sha drag po srog la skur// b+h+yo ni phrin las bsgyur bzlog byed// b+h+yo mkha' 'gro dbyings

nas bskul lo drag po'i las mdzod cig/ mkha' 'gro rak+sha si la sogs te nyi shu brgyad// sku mdog cir yang byed ma nges// thod pa rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin// b+h+yo bzlog bsgyur ba'i las mdzod cig/ pho nya srin mo

srog len las la b+h+yo// mi srin g.yag gi mgo can b+h+yo// tshangs pa sbrul gyi mgo can b+h+yo// khro mo gzig gi mgo can b+h+yo// khyab 'jug zer mo mgo can b+h+yo// gzhon nu pha wang mgo can b+h+yo// dbang mo dred kyi mgo

can b+h+yo// smug nag stag gdong lcags kyu ma b+h+yo// dmar mo dom gyi mgo can b+h+yo// zhi ba sdig pa'i mgo can b+h+yo// bdud rtsi chu srin mgo can b+h+yo// ljang nag khra yi mgo can b+h+yo// be con wa yi mgo can b+h+yo// za

byed stag gi mgo can b+h+yo// ser nag ra gdong zhags pa ma b+h+yo// rgan byed bya rgod mgo can b+h+yo// gcig pu khyung gi mgo can b+h+yo// khrag 'thung rta yi mgo can b+h+yo// yid 'phrog khyi yi mgo can b+h+yo// grub mo pu shud

mgo can b+h+yo// rlung mo sha ba'i mgo can b+h+yo// dmar nag seng gdong lcags sgrog b+h+yo// gsod byed spyang ki'i mgo can b+h+yo// me mo skyin gyi mgo can b+h+yo// sna chen glang gi mgo can b+h+yo// 'bar ma khwa yi mgo can

b+h+yo// grub mo sdig pa'i mgo can b+h+yo// ljang nag phag gdong mgo can b+h+yo// bskul lo phrin las grub par mdzod// ces gsungs so// hU~M mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang phyug ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun

pa'o//// de nas dbang chen spyan g.yas g.yon nas/ rtsa dang dwangs ma la dbang byed ma/ rtsa khro bo'i ma mo bcu gsum gyi rbad pa'o// las kyi bdud mo rtsa khro ma cha gnyis so// 'di ni ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro

ma las la rbad par bya'o// A+oM khri mun lan len shag te shug ti la rbad na yaM/ zhung ta rtsa la ya ya/ 'byung po'i ri li ya/ 'byung po ni rtsa'o// sri ni bgegs so// des 'dod cing 'dul ba yin/ dbang gi rgyal po ye

shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rbad/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas las kyi mkha' 'gro rtsa khro ma rbad/ de ltar byas pas las rnams byed/ rtsa dang thig le gnas pa ste/ mi rigs rnam pa bzhi la rtsa rigs rnam pa bzhi yod de/
rgyal rigs rtsa ni mgo yang mtho/ rje rigs 'phar la sdod pa yin// dmangs rigs 'jam la phra ba yin// gdol pa gtum pa nyung ba yin// rtsa la rigs ni rnam bzhi yin// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi rtsa

ni dal la 'jam// khro gtum srin po'i rtsa ni drag la myur/ bram ze nag mo'i rtsa ni tsha la phra// blon po gdug pa'i rtsa ni sbom la ring// bud med byis bu'i rtsa ni rtsub la 'phar// de ltar spyad la brda ba'o// rtsa ni
chen po gsum yod de// dbus kyi rtsa chen dang ni g.yas g.yon no// de las gyes pa'i rtsa chen bzhi// bdud sgo ltag rtsa nag po dang// rtsa chen mkhal ma rtsa chen dang// pus dang gri gug rim

pa'o// de las chang phra rtsa gyes te// de la phyi'i sgo bzhi dang/ nang gi sgo bzhi dang/ gsang ba dang/ tshangs pa gnyis te bcu pa'o// de la rim par bya zhing brda/ zhes gsungs so// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud

las/ spyan nas mkha' 'gro rtsa khro ma dang rtsa'i dmigs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas ma dad pa'i dgra bgegs ni bsgral cing tshar gcad/ sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ thugs rje chen po drag shul
gyis gdul ba mdzad/ bdud sde dpung gis btul/ rgyal chen thabs kyis btul/ klu chen rdzu 'phrul gyis btul/ the brang lings su btab bo// gdul thabs bzhi mdzad do// de nas thugs rje shugs kyis
bsgral ba'i bro brdungs te/ gzi ldan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dbang gi sku gcig bzhugs pa la// dgyes pa mdangs kyi mchod pa 'bul// phyi mchod rdo rje'i tshig drug po// glu yang drug la bro yang

drug/ glu drug gsang ba'i dbyangs dang sbyar// glu drug dbyangs su blangs pa ni// grub pa'i glus ni thugs rje bskul// tshangs pa'i glus ni zhing khams sbyong// gdung ba'i glus ni ma sring mnyes// las kyi glus ni pho

nya 'gyed// sgyu ma'i glus ni dgongs rgyud gsal// 'bar ba'i glus ni bdud bzhi 'dul// hUM gi glus ni 'phro 'du 'khrugs// glu drug rdzogs pa'i blta bar gzhag/ bro drug rdzogs pa'i spyod lam bzhi// gar gyi bro
brdungs byin rlabs che// dbang gi bro brdungs dug gsum 'joms// pad+ma'i bro brdungs chags pa med// khro bo'i bro brdungs dregs pa 'joms// rta bro 'khor gsum srin po 'joms// 'di ni gsang tshig nges
pa'i bro// thugs mchog gsang ba'i snying po yin// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// dgongs rgyud gsal ba bzhin du bsgom// rta bro 'khor gcig dang po la// khro ba'i sprin gyis dbang bsdus nas// dus

gsum rgyal bas rol pa mdzad// rta bro 'khor gnyis bar ma la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs kyi yum dang rol pa mdzad// rta bro 'khor gsum tha ma la// ma srin rgya mtsho 'khor bsdus nas// phra

men kun dang rol pa mdzad// 'di ni sku gsung thugs kyi bro// pad+ma gsang ba'i dam bskangs nas// gdul bya'i bro bzhi byung ba ni// nub kyi phyogs su bro gcig byung// klu 'brug 'dul ba'i bro bo che// kha yang
nub tu blta bya ste// gru mo gdengs nas rkang pas brdungs// kha nas sngags tshig 'di yang bzlas// rA ga nA ga rngubs ya rngub ya// klu rnams kun kyang zhabs kyis btsir// gdul bya'i bro gcig byang du
byung// gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i bro bo che// lag pa g.yas g.yon mgo la khyer// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// A ra ku ru pa ra dum yang ling yaM ste/ gnod sbyin bsgral ba'i steng du

brdungs// gdul bya'i bro gcig shar du byung// dri za'i rgyal po 'dul ba'i bro// lag pa gar thabs bskyod byas te// lha tshogs mang po dbang du sdud// a rag sa mas du du bzlas// gdul bya'i bro gcig lho ru

brdungs// grul bum 'dul ba'i bro bo che// ya ma tsab sha ling bzlog cing// grul bum steng du bro yang brdungs// la la rlung lha 'dul ba'i bro// la la bgegs chen 'joms pa'i bro// rta yi bro ni shar nas

brdungs// rdo rje'i bro ni lho nas brdungs// phung po'i bro ni nub nas brdungs// sprul pa'i bro ni byang nas brdungs// la las za byed chen po 'dul// la las g.yo 'gul med par byed// la las rtsal gyis dbang
du sdud// la las dug gsum btson ra sbyong// la las phur pas dbyings su 'debs// la las sbyor ba'i ngan sngags gcod// la las nga rgyal gshogs par byed// la las thams cad bstan par byed// kun tu

bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// tshom bu brgyad kyi bro byung ba// khro bo kun gzhi mnyam par sbyor// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bro// 'di ni dpal gyi thugs dam yin// 'di ni ma sring dngos grub yin// 'di yang
pho nya'i longs spyod yin// zhes brdung ngo// hU~M mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ bro'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// 'dus pa'i sras chen he ru des// dbang gi rgyal la 'di skad gsol// gang de bsgral ba'i phung
po'am// sems can tshe yi dus byas nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su ltung ba la// brang ba'i thabs ni ji ltar lags// sems nyid don de ji ltar lags// dbang chen khyod las bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol
pas/ dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sems can 'dus byas 'khyams pa la// yang dag rang gnas ma bstan na// ma rtogs rtsol bsgrub byas kyang thar sa med// las kyi he ru ka nyon cig/ rang gi sems

nyid gdod nas ma dag na// 'phral du phyogs tsam bsgom pas dag mi 'gyur// thabs kyi rtsa ba snying rje ma shar na// 'phral gyi chos kyis yongs la khyab mi 'gyur// rgyud nyid dag pa'i don nyid ma shes na// 'phral
gyi dmigs pas rang rig gsal mi 'gyur// rang rig rtsa yis yongs la ma gdal na// 'phral du 'phro 'dus nyon mongs dag mi 'gyur// ye nas btsal med dkyil 'khor ma rtogs na// 'phral du yud tsam rgyal
