ba'i sku mi rdzogs// yid kyi mchod pas stong gsum ma khyab na// bshams tsam phul bas rgyal ba mnyes mi 'gyur// don gyi bsnyen pa khong nas ma shar na// 'phral du mtshan mar brjod pas grub pa med// sems
kyi dbang phyug 'dod dgur ma shes na// 'phral thabs ye shes lnga yi dbang mi chags// rnam smin las kyis brtas pa'i srin po dang// nyon mongs 'dam du 'khor ba rU tra yang// rtogs dang ldan
pa'i lta bas ma btul na// mtshan mar bsgom pa'i rtogs pas gnas mi 'byongs// ye shes rang gnas don 'di ma shes na// 'bad rtsol byas pas gnas mchog yang mi rnyed// dbang gis rgyal pos de skad ces
gsungs so// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las// rang gi gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// las kyi he ru la sogs pa 'khor rnams gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas bstod do// dbang gi rgyal pos
bka' stsal pa/ rgyud 'di zungs shig chongs shig/ klog cig/ ces gsung nas 'khor rnams rang rang sa la 'khod do// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gzung zhing gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig

pa'o//// hUM mdzad chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so// slob dpon rdo rje gro lod dang/ lo tsA ba rdo rje zhang 'drung gis bsgyur ro// bar 'di nam mkha' mdzod kyi rgyud 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mdo 'dzud// zla gsang chen po'i mdo// dpal
rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zla gsang chen po yum rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong na/ ye shes kyi rlung nag ni

'tshubs/ bskal pa'i me lce ni 'bar// khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong ni 'khrug/ mAM sa sha chen gyi sa gzhi ni brdal// keng rus gsar rnying gi ri rab ni brtsegs/ ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang kun tu 'phro ba'i gnas na

brjod kyi mi langs pa'i yang mi lags pa/ 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhe sdang rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gti mug rdo rje

dang// de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags rdo rje dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrag dog rdo rje la sogs te/ rdo rje'i 'khor tshogs thams cad dang/ dbang phyug ma chen mo

ke'u rI ma dang/ dbang phyug ma chen mo tso'u ri ma dang// dbang phyug mo chen mo pra mo hA dang/ dbang phyug ma chen mo bai tA li dang/ dbang phyug chen mo puk+ka sI dang/ dbang phyug chen mo sma sha nI dang/ dbang phyug chen

mo g+hasma rI dang/ dbang phyug chen mo tsaN+Da li la sogs te/ dbang phyug chen mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ phra men ma'i 'khor tshogs rnams la/ seng+ge dang/ stag dang/ wa dang/ spyang ki dang/ kang ka

dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ rnga mo dang/ bong bu dang/ khyi dang/ phag la sogs te khros pa'i gzugs can mang po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rdo rje srin po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ rdo rje srin
mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu dang/ phra mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs te/ phra mo la mos pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dang thabs cig tu yum rnam par dag pa'i mkha' klong du khyab nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
'khor de dag tu sku la 'jug par mdzad do// 'khor de dag thams cad kyang sku las 'thon nas/ sems can gyi don la gnas nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje la sogs sbyar ba 'di// kun

gyis thams cad gsal ba'i chos bstan te// sna tshogs ngo bo sangs rgyas khyab// gru bzhi kun tu dkyil 'khor ldan// 'od zer rnam lngas kun tu 'khrigs// rgyan rnams thams cad rgyas gyur to// de nas 'od zer
brjod pa las// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa// 'khor rnams 'bum phrag bsam yas dang// rigs rnams lnga po 'khor bcas dang// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal
to// e ma'o rgyal ba thams cad kyi// rdzogs pa'i sems ni rang byung ba// bde gshegs kun gyi zla gsang nyid// ma rtogs pa la gnas med do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas/
bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i dam tshig gis mchod do// lus ngag gi phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa zla ba las byung ba// bde gshegs kun gyi zla ba
nyid// mi 'gyur snying po dam pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs ni spobs

na sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ the tshom skye bar byed yin na/ mos pa phra mo rnams lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas bdag cag gi som nyi gcod pa/ zla gsang chen po la 'di skad ces
gsol to// sangs rgyas kyi khyad par yang/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'khor du sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur bas/ srog gi snying po dbul du gsol/ dam tshig bskul du gsol/ brjod pa mdzad du gsol// de skad ces

gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po nyid kyis srog gi snying po phul bas/ badzra shrI he ru ka dza s+t+waM/ tsaN+Da gu h+ya dza s+t+waM/ shrI he ru ka dza s+t+waM/ gnas de phyung ma thag tu/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa gcig tu

gyur to// de nas sku ci yang ma nges pa gcig tu gyur pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rigs so sos bskul ba mdzad do// hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ 'di lta ste/ dza du pra ti ni dza/ ha ha ha ha

ha ha ha ha/ he he he he he he he he/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH de nas so sos bskul ba dang/ de skad ces ni brjod pa dang/ so sor 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur nas/ phyag na rdo rje'ang
'di skad brjod do// e ma'o bcom ldan zla gsang mchog/ bdag byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de skad ces ni gsol ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos rnam dag mkha' klong nas bzhengs

nas/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byin gyis 'di skad ces brlabs so// shrI he ru badzra tsakra/ kA ya wa ka tsit+ta raM/ de skad ces ni brjod pa dang/ las kyi dbang dang ldan gyur nas// e ma'o mi gsung gsung mchog

rgyal po'i thugs// de yi dbang dang ldan gyur nas// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs dang// byin rlabs mthu chen gzi 'phel 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'byor pa'i ting 'dzin rgyas par mdzad do// bcom
ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ byang chub sems dpa' phra mo la mos pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ bdud dang
mu stegs rnams kyis ni// rgyal ba'i bka' la mos pa rnams bzlog cing/ bstan pa la gnas pa rnams dkrug par byed cing/ slob dpon la smod pa 'di dag brlag par ni ji ltar bgyi/ thabs ni gang gis
bsgrub// dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar bri/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phra mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon cig/ las las grub

pa'i 'gro drug rnams// snying po 'di dag brjod bya ste// a nr-i su tri pre du/ dza dza dza dza dza dza/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ baM baM baM baM baM baM/ ho ho ho ho ho ho/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ mi'i mgo la rgyal ba'i

dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'god/ hU~M ha he hU~M b+h+yo/ gru gsum zla gam gsum pa la// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis dang ldan// gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi lho sgo ru// gshin rje gshed nyid
log 'dren steng// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam par ldan// smug nag 'jigs pa'i kha dog la// g.yas na lcags kyu dgra s+t+wa me dbal thogs// g.yon na khrag 'tsho'u zhags pa phur pa bsnams// las kyi rbod
gtong chen po ste// bdud dang mu stegs gzhom pa'i phyir// rbod gtong chen po'i dus la bab/ gang la cis 'dul khyod nyid yin// bya rgod gzugs can kang ka dang// wa dang spyang ki stag gzig 'phro// sder
chags byi la 'ug pa dang// mche gshog sder mo can la sogs// pho nya rnams kyi thugs dam ni// rab tu bskul ba'i dus la bab// mi'i lag pa'i sor brgyad pa'i tshad chen la// khro bo bcu dag bsgom par

bya// phra mo'i ting 'dzin gsal nas kyang// rgyun gyi snying po 'di lta ste// ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nan baM hU~M phaT/ nr-i badzra/ bye ba'am yang na de dag

brjod// de skad ces ni bka' stsal to// zla gsang gi dkyil nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdag nyid log 'dren chen por gyur// ling+ga bshams pa 'di dag ni// dzaHhU~M baM hoHsa bsgoms nas kyang// nr-i

zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di// oM dang hU~M gi bar du gzhug/ mchan khung g.yas pa 'di dag nas// sngags rnams 'di dag gzhug par bya// nr-i dza/ nr-i na dza/ nr-i mu dza dza/ mu 'u+u ra dza dza/ ming dang gzugs la ni ya dza dza/

nr-i A be sha ya/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas ni// mthe bong gnyis ni nang du dgug/ de nas phyogs bcur btegs nas kyang// ming dang gzugs la slar la zlog/ des ni dbab pa'i las bya'o// phyag na rdo rje dang

phebs par 'gyur// lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar la// mthe'u chung gnyis ni sbyar la 'khyud// mdzub mo gnyis ni lcags kyur bcas// 'di ni dgug pa'i rgya chen yin// aM ku sha dza/ nr-i dza/ sngags 'di legs sbyar dngos

su mi 'dug cing zur chag kyang ma nges pas ma phyi sor zhag bgyis pa dpyod ldan rnams kyis dgongs dpyad 'tshal/ pu ga du la shaM ba ri dza gu gu du la/ su ma ti gu gu du la/ nr-i dza/ nr-i dza/ nr-i dza/ pra ti nr-i dza/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba

duSh+tan phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hU~M hU~M/ badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dIp+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ 'di dag bzlas

ma thag tu ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// phyag na rdo rje'ang 'jig par 'gyur// de yi sbyor ba 'di dag bya// dur khrod ras sam shing shun nam// sol ba shang cig las byas pa yi// dgra bgegs

gang gi ling+ga bshams// tsher ma'i shing dang gdug par bcas// tsha ba'i me dang ske tshe dang// mAM sa sha chen la sogs te// sngags pa'i rdzas chen 'di dag rnams// gzhal yas so so'i phyi rol nas// gom pa bcu
gsum bcal bar du// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad bcas// de nas bcu gsum bcal bar du// gru gsum e dkyil snam bu gnyis// de nas bcu gsum bcal bar du// phyi khyams lcags ri chen por

bzhag/ sbyin sreg cha gsum ldan par du// byas na dngos grub chen po thob// phyag na rdo rje'ang khrag tu skyugs// ling+ga mtshan gsum mchod par 'bul// sbyin sreg tha ma 'di nyid la// log 'dren rgyal po 'di la

dbul// oM na maHsa man ta// snying kha rag naM/ nr-i kha rag rbad/ dz+wa la raM shig shig dz+wa la raM/ nr-i pra ta dz+wa la raM/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ raM raM raM/ kha raM/ de nas ling+ga 'di dag ni// gnas mdun dag tu lan bdun
gdab// ma yi mgo la gang bar gdab// yab yum nyi shu tshang ba dang// sprul pa za gsod nyi shur bcas// sgo ba bzhi dang zhe bzhir bcas// ldan pa'i sngags kyis brdung bar bya// cho ga de dag ldan

gyur na// phyag na rdo rje'ang bseg par 'gyur// dgra yi sgo khar byas gyur na// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// skabs sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang gis 'di skad ces bka'
stsal pa/ phra mo'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mdzad pa legs so// dkyil 'khor ni legs pa'o// bzlas pa brjod pa ni legs pa'o// phrin las ni legs pa'o// de ltar legs par bsgrub nas ni// las
rnams thams cad 'grub pa'o// zla gsang dbus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las/ bdud dang mu stegs 'dul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po lus dang ngag sems
gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// gang dag sdang zhing gdug sems ldan// 'byung po ma rungs gnod pa can// 'di dag rab tu bsgral bar

bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bor bsgom// dgra rnams gsad par bya ba ni// rdo rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// lag pa g.yas pas gzung bar bya// g.yon pa lcags kyu 'debs pa'i tshul// khro bo khros pa rngams pa'i
gzugs// 'jigs shing mi sdug gtum bag can// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// brtsams pa'i las ni gsod par byed// dgra bgegs rnams ni gsod pa dang// phyag na rdo rje'ang gsod

par bsgom// nyi ma bcu gcig tshun chad kyis// byas na rgyal bas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug chen pos/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM badzra kI li kI ya nr-i na dza/

bye ba 'bum du bzlas byas na// mthu chen thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas log 'dren la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ kA la ru pa/ kA la ru pa/ kA la ru pa/ k+Shi sngags 'di

yang ma phyi sor bzhag ni dza dza li nI dza ma le/ sa ma ye s+t+waM/ rak+Shu na/ rak+Shu na/ kha la mu rag kha la mu rag mu nri khrag mu ni khrag mu nri khrag/ pa rak+Shi na/ pa rak+Shi na/ pa rak+Shi na/ rang gi srog gi dam tshig phul na/ gzhan

lta ci smos/ srog gi dam tshig snying po phul lo// nr-i sor zhag dza/ tring nri dza/ tri tsi nri dza/ tri tsi nri dza/ tring nri dza/ tring tsi nri dza/ tring ni dza/ kha la rak+sha/ pra ti dza nri/ dz+wa la rak+sha/ pra tri dza ni ni dza/ kha la mu dzi/ de skad
gsungs ma thag tu ni// nam mkha'i dbus kyang rab tu 'dug/ sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun yang// khrag tu skyugs shing brgyal bar 'gyur// dgra bgegs rmongs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra rnams 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bka' stsal to// dang por ma skyes chos nyid dbyings// byang chub sems ni kun tu 'phro// yig 'bru 'phro zhing kun tu
gsal// yi ge'am phyag mtshan phyag rgyar gyur// zhal gsum phyag drug rab tu 'bar/ des ni dgra bgegs dbang du sdud// pho nya rnam par bskul ba ni// rdo rje can sogs rgyab nas phul// lcags kyu can sogs

mdun nas 'dren// za ba'i pho nya tshogs chen rnams// drag po gtum po khro bo dang// stag dang bya rog wa rnams tshogs// khyi'am bya rog seng+ger bsgom// de dag drangs shing rab tu brdung// de ltar bsgoms na
sangs rgyas kyang// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// zla gsang chen po las/ dgra nye bar 'chi bar byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang
chen po la/ khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed pos 'di skad ces gsol to// dgra bgegs 'dul ba ji ltar bgyi/ thabs ni gang lags/ skul ba'i snying po ni ji skad brjod/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas mchog na// rab tu shis par btsal ba ste// 'khor lo pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// yid du 'ong dang dben pa'i mchog/ nges par sa

gzhi rnyed gyur nas// sa bzung bskrad dang bslang bar bya// de nas bud med sgyu ma rgyal// shes rab mtshan ldan gzung bar bya// khang bu ngos 'jam bstar bar bya// maN+Dal 'thas pa'i ngos yin nam rgyas pa'i 'di dag

la// dbus su ma trang bzhi bsnol la// snying gar gru gsum so sor bri// rtse zur nang pa'i phyogs su bstan// lag pa brgyad ni zur bzhir dgram// rkang pa brgyad ni gru bzhir bsnol// so so'i brang gi dbus dag
tu// nr-i zhes bya ba gzhag par bya// de yi dbus kyi dkyil dag tu// thig gis sa bcad yul yang bcad// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// 'bar ba'i bar khyams nyid kyis mdzes// kun tu gru bzhi sgo
khyud ldan// lha rnams rim par rgyas par bskyed// spyan drang bzhugs su gsol nas su// mchod cing bskul dang bstod pa brjod// kA pa li dang ka bu chung// yan lag ring thung dbang por bcas// dngos grub

'byung ba'i rten du bya// dgra bo ma lus dgug par bya// bdag ni khro bo 'jigs su rung// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// sbrul gyi ske rags thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// me dpung thod dbyug 'bar ba

ral gri thogs// dbu gsum smug nag 'jigs shing 'tsher ba'i zhal// mche gtsigs rnam par brgyan cing rngam pa'i tshul// glo snying nang khrol za zhing khro zhing gtum// de ltar 'khor tshogs ma lus kun// thams
cad gtum zhing drag po'i tshul// khro chen tshul 'chang 'bar ba rnams// phyag na ral gri 'bar ba bsnams// de nas gdug pa'i sngags chen dag/ tshig gi brjod pa 'di skad bskul// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta

ya sarba duSh+tan phaT/ kI li kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ ha na ha na dIp+ta tsakra badzra kI la ya/ dIp+ta tsakra badzra dz+wa la

kI la ya/ shag shag tshal tshal/ tsit+ta tshal tshal/ tsit+ta kha kha dz+wa la kha kha/ tsit+ta dz+wa la kha kha/ nr-i tri dz+wa la kha kha kha na maHsa man ta/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Na sa twa da ma ka a si mu sa la/

pa ri shu pa sha ha swA ya phaT/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// grags pa mthu chen sangs rgyas kun// 'jigs shing 'dar nas khrag tu skyugs// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems spa bkong// dgra rnams la ni gdon mi

za// thod pa ma gas ma chag pa// gzugs mdzes yid du 'ong ba la// gshin rje'i gshed po'i tshul du byas// gsang sngags rjes su dran par bya// dbyings phyug ma yang 'gugs par 'gyur// na maHsa man ta kA ya

wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA kro d+ha ya/ a si mu sa la sarba badzra ban d+ha nan/ ma hA ka ra ni tsit+ta swA hA/ de ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas chen po kun// brgyal zhing 'jigs
shing dngangs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// dkyil 'khor dang phrin las su dgod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rje chen pos dam tshig 'di dag gsol to// lus ngag

yid gsum bsad pa ni// bdag gi dam tshig rtsa ba bskyed// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang// dug gsum gzhom phyir bza' bar bya// mAM sa sha chen dri chu dang// rak+ta zhing chen khu ba khrag/ rgyal ba mnyes phyir
bza' bar bya// sus ma rig pa'i sa phyogs su// gcer bur phud de skra bshigs la// gshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// bdag gi lus la bgos nas kyang// thod pa'i phreng bas lus la brgyan// pra
tshil la sogs gzugs brnyan nam// yang na ri mo 'bur du bya// mdog ni smug nag 'tshir bar bya// de nas las kyi lhar bsgoms la// a dang ma yi sbyor ba las// yi ge hU~M du gsal 'tsher bsgoms// hU~M las

rdo rje rtse lngar ldan// de nas phyag rgya dbu gsum pa// rdo rje phyag rgya 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang ldan// g.yas kyi gsum na 'dzin pa ni// kha T+wAM sta re rdor dbyug g.yas// g.yon gyi gsum na 'dzin pa ni// b+han+d+ha

lcags kyu zhags pa g.yon// kha T+wAM gis ni rdor dbyug sbyor// lcags kyi sta res mid pa gcod// b+han+d+has snyod cing lcags kyus drangs// zhags pas bsdams shing zhal tu rngubs// 'di yang dam tshig mchog lags
so// gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// theg pa nyan po spong ba dang// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang// dam tshig rnam par 'dral byed dang// rgyal ba'i bka' las 'da' 'gyur na// dben pa chen
po'i sa phyogs su// dgug cing gsad pa'i las chen ni// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang// nags tshal yid du 'ong ba dang// yid 'ong nags tshal dam pa der// dgug cing ling+ga la ni dbab// de la gsang

sngags brjod par bya/ sa ma ya dzaH sa ma ya dzaH sa ma ya dzaH nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du bzlas// lus ngag yid gsum dran par byas so// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ 'di zhes bya ba mA ra Na/ ch+gai

'di zhes bya ba'am/ sa ma ya'am/ grangs mid brjod par bya/ de nas sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rjes su gdams pa ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid kyi// rdo rje che ba'i dam tshig la// 'di dag rab tu gnas
par bya// bsrung bya bsrung ba'i rgyal po ni// sgo gsum dag gi ma nyams par// bsdam par bya ba'i dam tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ dam tshig bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje'i gshed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems ni rjes su dran pa dang// srin mo ma rungs gtum mo

dang// bdud dang mu stegs ma rungs par// sbyor ba chen po ji ltar bya// de skad ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po'i dkyil nas/ ngo mtshar chen po'i khro bo byung// khro bo'i sngags ni brjod

byas pas// 'di dag rab tu bskul ba'i phyir// oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka dz+wa la bi s+phu ling+gA T+TAT+TA hA' sa ke sha ri sa Ta/ A Ta pa TaM kA ra badzra khur nir+g+hA ta na tsa li ta ba su d+hA

ta la ni shwa sa mA ru to dak+Shi p+ta d+ha ra NI d+ha ra bI Sha Na aT+Ta T+Ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi ta/ pa la pa rA kra ma Ar+Ya ga Na b+hAM ta b+hU ta ga NA d+h+yu Shi ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra mnah+yAM tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ sid+d+hi me di sha

A be sha ya A be sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra bi shA tsAn+sarba gra he ShA pra ti ta to b+ha wa badzra daSh+tAM/ kiny+tsi rA ya se/ i daM duSh+ta kra hi duSh+ta sarba ma bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ ma Ta ma Ta/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu

dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI g+h+raM/ ha ya grI ba ya phaT/ badzrA ya phaT/ badzra gA trA ya phaT/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra daM Sh+ti ya phaT/ badzra khu+u ra ya phaT/ badzra khu+u ra nir+g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ trai lokya b+ha yaM ka rA

ya phaT/ sarba karmi ShA pra ti ha tra ya phaT/ badzra ku la saM trAr+Sha sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// chos kyi rdo rje mchog skyes nas// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar gyur// ye
shes rgyal po rjes su dran// mkha' dbyings grub kyi yongs gang ba// rdo rje mi bzad pa yi 'od// khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba ni// dug rnams thams cad med par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar gyur te rdo rje dpal 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o/ sngags sor

bzhag/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn nI la badzra daN+Da/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu yu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA ba ya gu lA ba ya/ kra ma kra ma b+ha ga wA' nA yu be ga na b+hu tA na shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/

da ra da ra/ ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mA Ta pa la sarba karmA Ni/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+ha k+Sha ya b+ha k+Sha ya/ me da ma hu ru d+hi ra ma s+ya me da ma dz+dza dza ru d+hi ra bri ya/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn sarba

big+ha nA ni/ sarba bid+yA ni/ sarba man+t+ra Ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/ sarba gra hA na ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ marda marda/ i dam+me kAr+YaM sA d+ha ya hU~M/ nI lA ya nI la badzra daN+Da ya tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nAn bi nA ya kA na nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/

dIp+ta tsakrA ya/ sarba sha truM NAM/ hr-i da yA ni pI Da ya/ tshin+da tshin+da bid+yA nAM tshi da ka hU~M/ bid+yA nAM shiSh+ta kaM sma ra sa ma yaM badzra d+ha ra pa tsa naM/ marmA Ni ni kr-in+ta hU~M/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ tu ru hu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ phaT

phaT hU~M hU~M kr-i tAn+tA ya/ bi Shi raM Shi be dra ba Na ka rA ya ha na ha na daN+De na swA hA/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun// 'jigs shing rab tu skrag gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes

su dran// khro bo rgyal po drag po ni// brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dang// cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang gsod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa/ k

un tu sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra NAM/ A+oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/

phaT phaT phaT/ oM u gra shU ya pA Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ A+oM dz+yo ti nir+Ni da/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ oM oM oM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM hA ba la swA hA/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang// stobs chen ma lus kun dgug nas// rdo rje
gsum ni rab tu dran// las rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// char chu dus su 'bab par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum las 'di phyung bas// bgegs rnams ma lus 'gugs par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wA ka

tsit+ta badzra NAM hU~M dza/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas chen po kun// ma lus par ni dran nas 'jig/ ling+ga rkang pa g.yas kyis mnan// sku gsung rdo rje chen po yis// mi g.yo 'jigs pa'i tho bas brdungs// A+oM na maHsa man+ta

kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ a tsa la kA na/ ha na ha na phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn paM hU~M phaT// na mo sor bzhag swa/ a pra ha te bya/ dza la ya/ tra tha ya/ a pa ra na/ tshig 'di brjod ma thag tu

yang// lha rnams brgyal zhing bsreg par 'gyur// mthu chen lha rnams bsregs nas kyang// thams cad ma lus 'joms par byed// rdo rje sbyor ba chen po yis// snying gi dkyil du rdo rje lcags kyu bsam// thams
cad ma lus dgug par bya// de nas phur bus nges par gdab// lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad kyi// snying gi dkyil 'khor du brgyab byas nas// yan lag rnams kyang bcing bar bya// de ni sbyor ba chen po
yin// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ dgra bgegs kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ 'di skad ces

gsol to// lha chen po dang/ phyogs skyong dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar dang/ 'byung po dang/ ro langs dang/ rbod gtong phra mo dang/ dregs pa can mu stegs kyi rbod gtong dang/ mthu rtsal dregs

pa can klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gang dag gza' chen po khros pa'i gzugs can mang po dang/ rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang/ theg pa chen po smod pa dang/ gang dag bkra mi shes par bgyid pa 'di dag thams
cad/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bzlog par bgyi/ gzir mnan gyi las ni ji ltar bgyi/ dgug ni ji ltar dgug/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag nyid gtum bag
'jigs pa'i gzugs// khros pa'i sprin chen 'jigs par gtibs// rak+ta'i chu yis gsher ba'i gos// bgos nas dben sa chen po ru// lha chen ling+ga rkang pas mnan// khro bo'i rgyal po'i stangs stabs
bcas// lcags kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs// nges par bkug c-ing brdung ba dag/ de nas mtshon chas gcad par bya// gang yin pa yi gzugs bris la// dgug cing de la dbab par bya// so so'i sngags
dang ming dag bris// de nas thal bas gsher ba byas la brdungs// bshang gci rul pa'i dri mnams pa// de'i gos la byugs nas ni// bdag nyid du ni bgo bar bya// khro zhing 'khrugs pa'i gzugs can
du// bdag nyid rab tu bsgom par bya// khro bo'i sngags ni kun bzlas nas// ma rungs pa ni tshig bsams nas// mnan nam gzir ba'i sngags byas nas// myur du skom ste 'chi bar 'gyur// brgya ni rtsa brgyad

sngags bzlas na// sangs rgyas kun yang 'jigs par 'gyur// skra bshig gos ni gsher bar bya// 'jigs pa'i tshul 'chang khros pa'i gzugs// khro rgyal 'jigs tshul mang po sprul// ma mo rngams pa mang po'ang
sprul// sha zan tshogs bcas mang po sprul// de nas rkang pas ling+ga mnan// lam po dur khrod khang stong dang// bzhi mdo gling gcig shing drung dang// srin po khros pa'i gnas dag tu// drag po'i las

chen bshad par bya// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu dag/ sor brgyad dang ni bcu gnyis la// sngags ni 'di dag bzlas bya ste// ha ya grI ba badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hU~M phaT/ khro bo'i sngags kyang kun bzlas

la// dgra bo'i sgo'am grong du bya// rgyal ba yi ni sku gsung thugs// ma lus pa ni sbyin pa'i mchog/ nyon mongs rnam par rab spangs pa'i// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi// skabs sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// yang
na smyo'am 'bog par 'gyur// khrag tu skyug cing 'bros par 'gyur// yang na smra col 'bod cing ni// de nas nges par lkugs nas 'chi// yang na thod pa legs pa dag/ slob dpon yon tan ldan pas btsal// he

ru ka dang dbang phyug che// phra men khro bo khro mor bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngags chen dag/ rab tu thod pa'i nang du bri// ma rungs pa yi sgor bzhag na// dgra rnams nges par bskrad par 'gyur// yang na ta
la'i lo ma'am// shing shun gro ga'am ras kyang rung// drag po'i sngags ni kun bris nas// khyim mam gnas su spas gyur na// shi'am skabs sam bskrad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i gsung las 'di phyung

ngo// oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+taM phaT/ kI la ya/ kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM na maHsa sa man+ta/ bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba pA

paM phaT/ ma hA badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ tsit+ta kho la badzra kI la ya phaT// gsang sngags 'di dag brjod ma thag/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sangs rgyas kun// 'jigs shing brgyal nas khrag tu skyugs// ming rus seng
ldeng lcags las byas// sor brgyad pa yi tshad de la// gsang sngags 'di dag brjod nas ni// dgra yi ling+ga la btab na// sangs rgyas dag kyang 'jig par 'gyur// dgra rnams la ni gdon mi za// bdag nyid
lha yi skur bsgoms nas// rdo rje phur bu chen po dag/ de dag lag pa g.yon du thogs// spyi nas brgyab cing rkang par bstim// sprul pa'i phur bu khros pas gdab// myur du btab na 'chi bar 'gyur// gnas

bdun dag tu gdab par bya// oM na maHsa man+ta nAM/ badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha ha na ha na/ tip+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ phur bu rdo rjes btab nas ni// de nas mod la sangs rgyas kyang// 'jigs shing 'dar
nas 'gyel bar 'gyur// dgra bgegs rnams la gdon mi za// nges par 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul// phur bu'i las rnams 'di byas pas// tshangs pa lha chen la sogs rnams// tshig nas rmongs par rab tu
'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ dregs pa chen po thams cad gsad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byin gyis brlabs so// bu mo ut+pal 'tsher ba'i mchog/ lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la// dkyil 'khor rgyas par byin

gyis brlabs// nyams dga' dben pa'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub pa brtsam pa rab tu shis// de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// bdud rtsi rnam lngas skyang nul bya// de nas srad
bu'i sbyor ba dag/ nyid kyis sa bcad snyoms par bya// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// kun tu gru bzhi mu khyud ldan// dbus su dbu dgu 'jigs par

bstan// b+han+d+ha kha sbyor yab yum las// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten du bzhag/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// zhe sdang 'joms byed he ru ka yab yum bzhugs// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lho phyogs su// nga rgyal
'joms byed he ru ka yab yum bzhugs// chos kyi 'khor lo'i nub phyogs su// 'dod chags 'joms byed he ru ka yab yum bzhugs/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i byang phyogs su// phrag dog 'joms byed he ru ka yab
yum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dang po la// dbang phyug chen mo brgyad rnams bzhugs/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis pa la// phra man khro tshogs sprul par bcas// sgo bzhir sgo ba bzhi rnams
bzhugs// phyi khyams lcags ri chen po la// dbang phyug rgya mtsho 'khor tshogs dgod// de nas las kyi skal bde ru// gshin rje 'dug pa'i phyogs chen du// dkyil 'khor gru gsum brtsegs ma la// thod pa
mda' gzhu me ris bskor// chos ni bzang po rgyas pa la// bshang gci'i dam tshig sha chen bza'// de nas las kyi skal bde ru// sngags mkhan gyis ni mi gzugs bri/ tho ba chen po gnam 'phyar nas// de yis

mgo la brdung bar bya// khros pas 'jigs shing gtum por bya// sngags rnams 'di dag bzlas shing brdungs// oM hriHSh+t-I bi kr-i tA na na/ sarba sha truM nan/ nA shA ya/ stam b+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ khrag dang ske

tshe lan tshwa rnams// khro bo gtum pos me spar la// tsher ma'i me la khros pas bsregs// ming ngam rus sam mtshan ma ste// dum bur bcad cing me la bsreg/ nam phyed dam ni nyi ma'i gung// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul

bzhin dbul// bdag kyang khro zhing tshig pa yis// bsregs shing me lhas gzugs phung bcom// de ltar ma byas rmongs byas na// de ni 'jig rten tshe zad 'gyur// dur khrod sol ba cho ga bzhin du bya// ming dang
gzugs ni rab tu bri// rdo rje tho bas btags nas kyang// ming dang gzugs la dbab cing brdung// rdo rje 'bar ba'i hU~M ring las// rdo rje'i me stag phyogs bcur 'phros// rdo rje'i me stag re re
las// ye shes sprul pa bsam mi khyab// ye shes sprul pa'i thugs rje las// rdo rje lcags kyu phyogs bcur 'debs// bkug cing ming dang gzugs la dbab// 'jigs tshul mang pos snying nas drangs// lag
pas sta re chen po brdeg/ dgra yi ming sa bcas par bsgoms// de ltar bsams shing bcad gyur na// sangs rgyas btsun mo'ang 'chi bar 'gyur// rlung la sogs pa'i phyag rgya can// dgra rnams rab tu 'phyar

bar bsams// zhag ni bcu gcig tshun chad kyis// dgra rnams ma lus 'chi bar 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i snying po ni/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ khro rgyal gtum zhing 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gzugs ni rdo rje mi
'gyur te// thugs ni rdo rje sra mkhregs bdag/ gsung ni chags med rdo rje'i gsung// oM AHhU~M dzo hU~M dzo hU~M/ dzo 'u ri dzo 'u ri/ de nas rgyal po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// brtul zhugs ldan par bdag byas
la// dgra bgegs gdug pa thams cad gzhig/ bdud dam dgra yi gzugs byas la// mi ro bor ba'i dur khrod du// gcer bur phyung ste skra bshig la// phan dpyad dgos/ tshun 'di na dgra bgegs gnod byed

pa// bdag nyid khro tshogs rngam par byas// g.yas kyi kha T+wAM gis bsgyel la// g.yon gyi lcags kyus ril ming bya// yang na dgra yi ming byang ni// dur khrod sol ba dag la bya// de la sngags rnams bzlas pa

ni// stong ni rtsa brgyad dag tu bzlas// hom khung gru gsum mthing nag tu// tsher ma'i me la khro zhing dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'ang 'chi bar 'gyur// ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang// dgra yi gzugs brnyan legs su
bya// chu 'gram gnyis su bskul la btab// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tsam dag/ dug dang rtsub pa'i me la bsreg/ me lce dmar nag phyogs bcur 'phro// de yi 'du 'phros bag chags bsregs// 'bar zhing mched
pa dur khrod me// nyon mongs bsreg pa'i me spar bas// khams gsum nyon mongs bsreg par byed// khams gsum dgra bgegs lus dag bsreg/ 'di ltar sbyor ba cher byas na// sangs rgyas dag kyang brlag

par byed// dug gi 'bru'am ske tshe'am// mar las byung ba'i rdzas chen 'dis// rgyal ba thams cad bsad pa la// mchog gi sbyor ba 'di dag gis// khrag dang rus phye dug rnams bsres nas su// rang gi lus la

byugs par bya// ling+ga la ni rkang pas mnan// de nas srin po pho mo rbad// srin po'i las chen sha la dga'// srin po'i las chen khrag la dga'// srin po'i las chen rus la dga'// srin po'i las chen don snying
'byin// srin po'i las chen nang khrol za// srin po'i las ni srog rtsa gcod// srin po'i las ni ngu zhing rgyug/ g.yab mo 'dor zhing pho dod 'bod// mi yi keng rus phung por brtsig/ mi yi thod pa
phreng bar thogs// mi yi khrag gis rgya mtshor bskyil// gzugs khams lha tshogs thams cad kyang// thal mo brdab pas rdul du rlog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// rab tu 'jigs shing brgyal bar
'gyur// srin po smug nag chen po yang// ra la ru lu'i glu yang len// snyan pa'i tshig dang snyan pa'i glus// dga' ba'i rol mo sna tshogs byed// dpa' bo rgod po 'jigs par byed// ma lus bar ni rdul du

rlog/ khrag gam dug gam rus chen la// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas gyur na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// myur du srin po pho mos 'khyer// dgra rnams la ni gdon mi za// oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ oM

badzra kI li kI la ya kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ oM hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ kI li kI la ya/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya kA nAn/ ma hA kI la ya/ ga NA ya/ pa ri

tsit+ta tsit+ta bi ta na ta ka badzra ra ya/ kI la ya swA hA/ bsam gtan pa la sogs pa yang// de yi lus ngag sems kyang gcig/ sems la rtse gcig 'dud la bya// khro bo rdo rje'i sngags pa che// kha mig bgrad nas

'jigs pa'i tshul// lag cha'i tho ba s+t+wa res brdung// ting 'dzin rtse gcig rab tu bsam// 'di ni gsod pa'i khro tshogs yin// nam mkha'i mtha' ni kun klas par// sangs rgyas khro bo'i sprul pa dag/ sprul pa'i
tshogs bcas de kun gyis// dgra bgegs gnas nas bkug nas kyang// mtshon cha 'bar bas gtub cing bcad// phra mo'i byang chub sems dpas kyang// nam mkha' yongs su gang bar byed// khro bo'i sems

kyis khros nas kyang// rngams pa'i tshul gyis gsad par bya// de ltar sbyor ba byas nas kyang// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun kyang// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// rgyal ba'i
gnod byed dgra rnams la// khros shing rngam pas khug nas ni// slob dpon mkhas pa yid gzhungs kyis// byas na 'chi bar don mi za// srin po srin mo khro bo'i tshogs// khro 'khrugs gtum pa mi bzad

pas// ting 'dzin khro bo'i cha lugs bya// ting 'dzin de yi sbyor ba byas gyur na// sangs rgyas ye shes can yang 'chi// rbod gtong rnam pa 'byung ba ni// khra dang bya rog 'ug pa khro bo'i gzugs// khwa ta wa dang spyang

ki'i gzugs// seng+ge stag dang dred kyi gzugs// ma he khyu mchog sha ba'i gzugs// dom dang gzig dang phag gi gzugs// sbrul dang ne le byi la'i gzugs// kang ka bya rgod bya rog gzugs// sre mo smig bu khyi
yi gzugs// de ltar bsams shing khros gyur na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// khrag tu skyug cing nges par 'chi// khro bo kun yang brgyal 'gyur 'chi// de yi sngags ni brjod bya ba// oM na

maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM laM hU~M laM mo hA ya rak+Sha s+t+waM b+ha ya nan/ rkang pa g.yon pas ling+ga mnan// snying gar lcags kyi phur pa gdab// tho bas brdung zhing sta res gcad// sbrul nag

gdengs pa mang pos kyang// de la rab tu dkri zhing gdug par bsam// tshe dang bsod nams phrog nas kyang// bdag gi tsit+ta'i bkrag la byon// nyon mongs lnga rnams bsgyur nas kyang// ye shes lnga ru gnas pa
ste// bdag dang gnyis su med par bya// de nas las kyi skal bde ru// sbyin sreg cha rnams mchod par 'bul// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po la// dgra bgegs de dag gtad par bya// phrin las rnam bzhis mnan

cing bsad// de nas sems kyi skal bde ru// ting 'dzin khros pa'i gzugs can dang// gal te ma rungs pa rnams kun// za zhing khro tshul rngam stabs bstan// hU~M ka ra ya ting 'dzin ni// phyag gnyis rdo rje lu gu
rgyud// g.yas gnyis rdo rje dgra s+t+wa gdengs// g.yon gnyis rnge'u chung phur bu 'dril// zhal gsum dug gsum gting nas rngub// spyan dgu theg chen rnam par gzigs// mche gtsigs ye shes dug gsum

gsol// gsung mchog rnam thar rgya mtsho sgrogs// de yi tinga'adzin cher sbyar na// sangs rgyas kun kyang phung bar 'gyur// 'byung po rnams la smos ci dgos// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las// rtsa ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha yi dam tshig chen po ni// lha yi gnas gsum

'di lta ste// 'dod khams gzugs mas gzugs med khams/ so so'i ming ngam gzugs su bri// tshangs pa brgya byin biSh+Nu dang// khyab 'jug ma hA de ba dang// gzhon nu lang tsho 'dus pa rnams// snying po 'di

yis dgug par byed// de ba dza dza de ba dza// bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang ldan// khros shing rngam pa'i tshul gyis dgug/ bkug na sangs rgyas kun yang khug/ lha rnams kun kyang gdon mi za// lha rnams

khugs par gyur pa na// rdo rje s+t+wa res lhag par btags// byas na lha rnams nges par 'chi// de yi sbyor ba chen po ni// bdag nyid 'jigs tshul rab tu rngam// gshin rje khros shing gdug par bya// lag na lcags

kyu rno bsnams nas// lha yi snying ga nas ni bzung// dbab cing rdo rje chen pos brdungs// phyag na rdo rje'ang 'chi 'gyur na// lha rnams la ni gdon mi za// bdag nyid khros pa'i gzugs su bya// de nas sngags kyi

tshig brjod pa// oM na maHsa man+ta badzra mu ti nan/ ga ru nan/ tshal tshal sum b+ha naM sum b+ha/ de ltar bsnyen cing rab bsgrubs na// sangs rgyas sogs kyang brlag par byed// lha rnams la'ang smos ci
dgos// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// lha'i tshogs bsad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// gnod sbyin pho
mo ma rungs pa// 'di dag thams cad dgug pa'am bcing ba ci ltar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ gnod sbyin pho mo'i gzugs bcas la// phyag na rdo rje khro bag che// gtum zhing 'jigs pa'i gzugs su bsam// sbrul
nag rab tu khro ba ni// 'jigs pa'i skur yang rab tu snang// bdag gi dpral ba'i dbyings nyid du// yi ge hU~M gi tshogs 'dus nas// phyag na rdo rje mang po 'phros// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang nas
kyang// gnod sbyin pho mo'i lag nas 'dzin// snying nas 'dren cing rgyab nas 'phul// khros pa'i gzugs can mang pos kyang// gnod sbyin pho mo 'gugs par byed// bdag gi lus kyang nam mkha' khebs// de

ltar byas shing bsams gyur na// sangs rgyas mthu yang myur du thub// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyang// khrag tu skyug cing mthu stobs ster// gnod sbyin rnams lta smos ci dgos// bdag nyid khros shing

'khrugs pa yis// gsang sngags 'di dag bzla bar bya// yak+Sha dzA la sa ma ya na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tan phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ de skad ces ni brjod

gyur na// gnod sbyin srog lta smos ci dgos// tho ba rdo rje lag na thogs// bshang gci zas su bza' ba dang// sku gsum rdo rje ster ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas drag po mthu chen che// sangs rgyas kun kyang gnon
par byed// des ni gsod pa'i las mchog yin// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'gugs gyur na// gnod sbyin pho mo smos ci dgos// cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub mchog gsum thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan
'das zla gsang chen po las/ gnod sbyin pho mo dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
lding// lto 'phye dri za grul bum tshogs// 'di dag zhi bar bya ba'i don// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// stobs chen khro bo chen po'i gzugs// 'di dag rab tu dgug pa'i phyir// bdag ni rta mgrin

rgyal por bsgom// de yi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// hrIHyi tshogs ni mang po 'phros// dbang mchog rta yi rgyal po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu dag tu 'phros nas kyang// lha ma yin la sogs pa'i tshogs// ma lus
par ni dgug par bya// dbang du sdud cing thal bar brlag/ sbrul nag 'jigs pa'i zhags pa thogs// khro bo 'khrugs shing nag por 'bar// mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu rngam// rdo rje sems
dpa' dbang du 'gyur// lha ma yin sogs smos ci dgos// rdo rus sol ba'am sa'ang rung// ta la'i shun pa'am mAM sa la// lha ma yin sogs gzugs bris te// 'di yi sngags ni brjod byas te/ a nr-i dza dza/ kro

d+ha dz+wa la/ kI la ya/ mA ra ya nan phaT/ oM tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha phaT/ dIp+ta tsakra ru lu ru lu hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi ko rlon gon// thod pa'i phreng ba se ral kha// g.yas na rdo

rje rtse lnga 'phyar// g.yon na lcags kyi phur bu brdeg/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'chi// lha ma yin sogs rdul du rlog/ de ltar byas shing bsgrubs gyur na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob/ bcom ldan
zla gsang chen po las/ lha ma yin dgug pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// klu ma rungs pa 'di dag thams cad ji
ltar dgug par bgyi// dgug pa'i thabs ni ji ltar dgug/ bsad pa'i las ni ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag nyid dbang gi lhar gyur nas// de yi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

du// yi ge hU~M gi tshogs bskyed nas// de nas sna yi dbugs su dri// phyogs bcur 'phros pas rgyal ba'i thugs// slar bsdus gnyis su med par sbyar// de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid// khros shing 'khrugs nas rngam
pa'i tshul// klu rnams rab tu 'gugs par bsam// khro bo'i gzugs brnyan kun 'dus nas// sangs rgyas kun yang 'gugs 'gyur na// klu rnams la ni gdon mi za// de yi sngags ni brjod bya ba// oM nA ga dza/

nA ga sa ma ya dza/ na ni na dza/ sa ma ya dza/ khrag dang ke tshe lan tshwar sbyar// ba yi lci ba sol phyed dang// ske tshe rus pa'i phye ma dang// mar dang sbyar la gzugs su bya// ma rungs klu rnams snying ga ru// lcags kyi
phur pa sor brgyad pas// ma rungs pa yi snying gar gdab// bdag nyid khros shing 'khrugs pa yi// phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su bya// de yi sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs ni// bya khyung rlabs chen mang po

dang// 'dab chags rgyu zhing mgo brnyan sprul// de ltar bkug cing dbang bsdus na// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang khug/ klu rnams la ni gdon mi za// phyag na rdo rje zhal gsum pa// zhabs drug klu
rnams thams cad brdzis// g.yas kyi gsum na bsnams pa ni// kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'bar bas rgol// rdo rje chen pos 'thag cing brdung// 'khor lo 'bar bas dum bur gcod// g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa
ni// rak+ta b+han dmar dang por gtor// bar ma lcags kyu dkar dmar 'dren// tha ma zhags pas 'ching zhing bsdom// mchog gi sbyong ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dra ba
yin// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ klu'i mchog gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ mu stegs log lta'i lta
ba la// zhen cing 'chel ba'i gang zag dang// dam nyams bka' la smod pa dang// log lta dug chen skyon chen dang// log par byed pa'i mu stegs dang// rgyal ba'i bka' la smod 'gyur rnams// ji ltar mnan

zhing brlag par bgyi// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang// nyon cig phra mo'i sems dpa' rnams// mu stegs log lta'i lha rnams dang// gang zag skyon can lta rnams la/ cho ga gong ma bzhi sbyar na// sangs rgyas rdo
rje sems dpa' yang// skams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te shi bar ma gyur na// spogs pa'i cho ga 'di dag brtsams/ dkyil 'khor sa phyogs legs pa ru// byin gyis brlabs shing thig gdab
bo// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i thig/ 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum du bya// sgo khyams 'bar ba chen por bya// de dbus gru gsum 'bar ba la// rdo rje gzhon nu 'khor bcas ni// yab yum gnyis su

med par ston// shar du zhe sdang rdo rje yab yum dgod// lho ru nga rgyal rdo rje yab yum dgod// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yab yum dgod// byang du phrag dog rdo rje yab yum dgod// rtsibs mchan bzhi ni yul du
dgod// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dang po la// khro rgyal yab yum nyi shu dgod// za gsod yab yum nyi shu yang// 'bar ba'i bar khyams dang po la// rim bzhin dgod cing nges par bzhag/ 'bar ba'i bar
khyams gnyis pa la// dbang phyug chen mo brgyad rnams dgod// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la// phra men brgyad dang sprul pa'i tshogs// ma lus par ni dgod par bya// phyi khyams lcags ri nag po

la// dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad rnams dgod// sgo bzhir khro chen bzhi rnams dang// sgo ma bzhi rnams bcas te dgod// thod pa skam rlon phreng bas bskor// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid la// mchod cing dam tshig
rjes su bskul// bdag nyid dam tshig rjes dgongs na// las kyi lha ste he ru ka/ 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// 'khor ba'i gzugs can mang po 'byung// thams cad rgyug cing dbang du sdud// wa
gcig khros pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'gugs par byed// mu stegs log lta can rnams dang// ma lus par ni gsad par bya// cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas khrag tu skyugs shing
'chi// de yi sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// gsang sngags 'di dgabarjod par bya// A+oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAn/ A+oM kI li ni swA hA/ lcags sam seng ldeng phur pa la// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis

brlabs// A+oM kA ya badzra/ A wA ka badzra/ hU~M tsit+ta badzra/ A+oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tan phaT/ kI la ya/ kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wA ka

tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas gyur na// sangs rgyas sku yang 'jig par 'gyur// gdug pa can rnams smos ci dgos// cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub
brnyes// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ cho ga sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// srin po ma rungs pa
'di dag thams cad ni ji ltar zhi bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khro bdag gtum zhing 'jigs pa'i tshul// srin po ma rungs glu blangs shing// srin

po rnams ni dgug par bya// sngags kyi brjod cing tshig gis bskul// gsang sngags 'di dag brjod par bya// rak+Sha sa ma ya dza/ phu lu na la dza/ k+ShaM ba ri dza/ rak+Sha sham ba dza dza/ bdag nyid khros shing ling+ga'i

tshul// rngam pa'i tshul gyis dgug par bya// bdag nyid khros shing 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gyad kyi dor ba'i tshul du bya// des ni bdag nyid chen po'ang khug/ srin mo rnams ni smos ci dgos// khrag dang rus pa

las byas pa'i// ling+ga sku gnag nyid du bya// srin po pho mo de la dgug/ bdag nyid khros pa'i gzugs su bya// lcags kyi s+t+wa re lag tu thogs// rkang pa g.yon pas ling+ga mnan// s+t+wa res mid pa gcad par

bya// snying la zos par bsams gyur na// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyang// khrag tu skyug nas 'chi bar 'gyur// srin po rnams la gdon mi za// mchog gi sbyor ba de byas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos
grub thob// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// srin po gdul ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das byol song rigs can rnams rab tu brlag par bgyi 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rta dang seng ge khyu mchog dang// stag dang seng ge gzig

chen dang// dred dang dom dang dred mo dang// gung dang byi la sre mo dang// spyang ki g.yi dang 'phar ba dang// sder chags chu 'byin phag rgod dang// bse dang kha sgo srin bu dang// nya mid rus sbal chu srin

dang// ce spyang sder chags mang po dang// ba lang glang chen ba men dang// sha ba shan par spre'u chen dang// lug dang ra dang bong bu dang// rnga mo dung dang mig chen dang// sprul dang byi shu pags shu

dang// kha dang chu li ru mig dang// rkang mang rkang med lto 'phyed dang// khyung dang bya rog 'ug pa dang// ngang pa khrung khrung bya gag dang// rma bya ri skegs ngur pa dang// ne tsho khu byug shang shang te'u// sgra 'byin ku khug

shing stag dang// kan ti sgra 'byin dang// rtsa ni rtsa rma ro 'be dang// 'di dag ma lus thams cad kyi// ming dang gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bshang dang gci dang sol ba

la// gang dgug pa yi gzugs byas nas// bdag nyid khro bo'i tshul du bya// de nas sngags ni 'di dag brjod// hri sa ma ya dza// A+oM k+Shi ti k+Shi ti// A+oM nA maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM// A+oM g+ha g+ha/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya// sarba

duSh+tan phaT// kI la ya kI la ya// sarba pA paM phaT// hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya// badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta// badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT// A+oM badzra badzra// bdag nyid khros pa'i tshul chen las// mi rus seng ldeng
lcags las byas// sor brgyad pa yi tshad chen las// gshin rje gshed por bdag bsgom ste// phur bu 'dril zhing btab bsams na// gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgya chen yin// zhag ni gsum ni tshun chad

kyis// brgyal zhing khrag tu skyug nas kyang// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// dngos grub 'byor pa 'di byas na// kun tu bzang po'i dngos grub len// bdag nyid gshin rje ltar byas la// sdang mig khro zhing

'jigs par blta// pha rol dmag tshogs gzhom 'dod na// bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgom// bdag nyid snying gi dkyil 'khor nas// yi ge hU~M chen mthing nag 'phros// phyag na rdo rje grangs med pas// pha

rol dmag tshogs 'joms par bsams// gsang sngags 'di dag brjod par bya// oM badzra rA dza hU~M badzra kI la ya mA ra ya phaT// cho ga 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// bcom ldan
'das zla gsang chen po las// byol song gi dmag dpung gzhom pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// yi dwags kyi sdug

bsngal ni ji ltar zhi bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag nyid gshin rje'i tshul du bya// dbang du bsdu zhing dgug par bya// khrag gi zhing chen las byas pa'i// skyem zhing rid pa'i gzugs

bris la// yi dwags rnam par dgug par bya// sa mA dza dza// oM sarba duSh+tan phaT// yak+Sha krod+ha duSh+tan phaT// 'jigs shing bgrad pa'i gzugs su bsam// des ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang khug/ yi dwags sdug
bsngal rnam pa rnams// ma lus par ni khugs par 'gyur// de nas gzugs la phab nas kyang// lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa// snying gi dkyil du brgyab nas kyang// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma
bcas// rgyal ba'i tshogs su dbul bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba cher byas na// dngos grub rnam gsum thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las/ yi dwags gdul ba'i le'u ste bcu drug
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// tsha grang sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// 'di yi sbyor ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// bdag nyid gshin rje khros pa'i tshul// khro bo gshin rje gshed por bsgom// grong zhing tsha zhing 'dar ba'i gzugs// gro ga'am shing shun ras la bri// gshin rje gshed po'i thugs ka nas// yi ge dza zhes
byung nas kyang// de la lcags kyu dkar po 'phros// lcags kyu de dag thams cad la// dbang gi lha mo bsam mi khyab// rang rtags 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan bsnams// thugs rje'i lcags kyu de dag gis// dmyal

ba'i gnas nas bkug nas kyang// ling+ga la ni phob nas kyang// rdo rje'i glu ni blangs byas te// ye shes lha mo thugs rje'i bdag/ bde bar gshegs pa'i pho nya mos// tsha grang sdug bsngal gnas nas bkug/ tsha

grang sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzod// de nas bdag nyid zhi ba'i sku// cha lugs 'dzum par byas nas ni// dngul gyi phur pa chen po zhig/ de yi snying gi dkyil du gdab// A+oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM// badzra kI la

ya// A+oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya// g+hA ta ya// sarba duSh+tan phaT// kI la ya// kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT// hU~M badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT// mchog gi sbyor ba de byas

na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'ang khugs// tsha grang sdug bsngal smos ci dgos// de yi sbyor ba byas gyur na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las/ tsha grang gi sdug
bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po la// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bgegs chen bzhi po 'di dag
dang// dregs pa mthu chen ma rungs pa// 'di dag rab tu ji ltar gzhig/ rdo rje slob dpon smod byed dang// theg pa mchog las log pa yi// ma rungs sgro skur 'debs pa rnams// 'di dag brlag pa ji ltar
bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ne'u ni wa dang rnam par 'jigs// so gcig la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rnam pa sprin gyi sgron ma dang// rdo rje'i mchu dang
bi na ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon gyi rim// grog ga'am ras sam shing shun la// gzugs sam ming rus bris nas ni// 'khor ba can gyi gzhal yas su// khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la// dri
zhim tsan+dan lde gus bsku// lha rnams rim par dgod par bya// yab yum bcu po tshul bzhin gnas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya rnams// so so'i gnas su dgod par bya// sgo ba bzhi yang tshul bzhin
dgod// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// bgegs chen 'di dag dgug pa'i phyir// bdag nyid khros shing rngam pa'i tshul// khros pa'i tshul gyis bkug gyur na// bgegs rnams 'di dag smos ci

dgos// de yi gsang sngags brjod par bya// mA ra ya sa mA dza/ A+oM badzra aM ku sha dza/ shrI he ru ka dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ bdag nyid khros shing bskul gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa'ang khrag tu skyug/ bgegs chen rnams ni smos
ci dgos// sbyor ba chen po de byas na// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob// bcom ldan zla gsang chen po las/ gegs zhi bar bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang// dmangs rigs gdol pa can gyi rigs// mu stegs ral pa gcer bu dang// kat+ya bu dang nog can dang// bu mo mig rengs ma lus
dang// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan sogs// bshan pa gsod pa'i rigs can dang// ma rungs gnod pa'i rig sa can gang// 'di dag gsod pa'i sbyor ba bya// tshad med snying rje bskyed nas kyang// byang chub sems

ni gzung bar bya// de yi sbyor ba chen po ni// bdag nyid khros shing 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang// sha rnams gtsang sme med par bza'// sems can srog kyang gcad par bya// rnal 'byor rig

pa 'dzin pa dag/ 'byung po khrag gi dri snom tshul// ma kun rngam pa'i cha lugs su// srin mo mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ling+ga srin mo'i tshul ltar bsgom// sbrul nag tsan+da chen por bsgom// de nas las kyi
stegs bu dag/ las kyi skyes bu chags byed pas// me ris bskor te bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi maN+Dal ni// sum brtsegs bya ba'i dbus zla gam// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mdzes par bya// de yi mtha'
ma thod pas bskor// me dpung 'bar bas de mtha' bskor// dmar chen rgyas pas de mtha' bskor// bcom ldan dpal chen zla gam dbus// zla gam brgyad la gnas brgyad dag/ mthing nag ya tha me ri

'bar// da 'og thod pa tshar gsum dang// sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor// rnam bzhi'i las kyi dkyil 'khor brtsam// dkyil 'khor bskal pa 'jigs byed du// phyag rgya 'bar ba za byed kyis// thar bar

rtsad nas bsgral bar bya// bdag nyid 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyis// ma rungs pa rnams dgug par bya// oM nr-i dza/ badzra aM ku sha dza// nr-i dza nr-i dza nr-i dza/ sa ma ya nr-i dza/ ling+ga smug nag 'cher ba

la// nr-i zhes bya bas dbab par bya// gong ma'i sngags dang tshig gis bskul// de ltar bskul zhing bsgrubs gyur na// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyang// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// skams sam yang na
'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// mi myur du bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsungs so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ldan pa

la// dur khrod go ma ye ru bya// gru bzhir maN+Dal bzhi byas la// bzhi las de bzhin chag re bsreg/ de la ma traM gzugs su bya// dbus su snying ga man chad bsnol// maN+Dal chen po'i 'og tu gzhug/ 'khor lo

'bar ba bzhi yi thig/ dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya bca'// 'bar ba'i bar khyams bzhi dag la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod// sgo bzhi rdo rje rwa ba bzhi// mgo brnyan yan lag sprul pa'i gnas// de nas phyi

khyams chen po la// rdo rje me ri phreng chen btang// skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor// me dpung bskal pa'i bu yug bri// sgo bzhir gru gu rdul dang sbrul gyi phreng// b+han+d+ha dpal chen ldan pa la// dpal chen yig bris

kha sbyar yum// ka ba bcu la sogs pa la// brgyad bri dbus su gnod par bya// las byed brgyad dam bcu gnyis bri// 'byung po gdol pa nga rgyal can// chags sdang ti mug rgyu yis bslad// 'byung po dug gsum

bshig pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor sgrub pa chen po bshad// ru dra lnga yi nyon mongs can// ye shes chen po lngas gzhom phyir// tshogs bdag dpal chen he ru ka/ 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs pa ru// khro ba'i mig can

spu gri thogs// ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas// rtsa yi dbus nas bzung nas kyang// snying rje chen po mnyam pa yis// dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang// 'khor ba'i dgra bgegs gsad pa'i phyir// khro tshogs rngam

pa'i sprin 'phros pas// rngam pa gtum 'thung mgyogs pa'i tshul// seng ge stag dang dom dang dred// phyag brnyan phyag chen phab nas ni// sha dang rus pa khrag la dga'// ma lus par ni gsang nas su// mgo ni lho
nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bting// dur khrod dbang phyug nga nyid che// ye shes sku ste sangs rgyas mchog/ gnon pa'i dmag tshogs thugs rje can// ye shes rnon po mtshon cha
yis// dgra bgegs ma lus rgyun bcad nas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thab bzhi brtsig/ zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod bzhin// dbus su 'khor lo thog tu brtsig/ shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar// mthing
ga nag po thal mchog sbyar// shar phyogs zlum po pad+ma bzhi// lho phyogs zla gam zur brgyad rgyas// nub phyogs zla gam gzhu dbyibs dbang// byang phyogs zur gsum mngon spyod drag/ snying ga

'khor ba'i thab tu bya// rigs kyi yab lnga brtsigs par lha// mi shes 'brel ba lnga yi hom// thugs rje lnga yi hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes lnga yi me spar nas// 'bar ba'i bsreg rdzas
'di rnams kun// rgyal ba kun la rab 'bul lo// rnam dag chos dbyings hom khung du// mtshan ma'i chos can yam shing la// ye shes chos nyid dag pa'i mes// bag chags mtshan ma bsreg sbyangs te// bag

chags ngan pa'i hom khungs du// sprul pa chags pa'i yam shing la// byang chub bde chen me spar te// 'khor ba 'khor bsreg yam shing byung// he ru zhal gyi hom khung du// dug lnga lnga yi yam shing la// 'joms pa

lnga yi me spar te// rnamapar rtog rdzas bsreg byas te// snang srid b+ha ga'i hom khung du// dbang phyug yum bzhi'i yam shing la// rdo rje sku mchog me spar te// srid pa'i dngos mtshan bsreg sbyangs thim// phrin las

rnam bzhi'i rdzas rnams ni// zhi ba la ni dkar po'i tshul// rgyas pa la ni ser po'i tshul// dbang la dmar po rab tu shis// mngon skyaud la ni nag por bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rnams// so so'i lha

rnams so sor bsgom// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba de byas na// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// zhag ni bcu gcig tshun chad kyis// skabs sam khrag tu skyug nas 'chi// mchog gi sbyor ba 'di byas pas// sangs

rgyas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos// sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bka' stsal to// a dang ma yi sbyor ba las// yi ge hU~M du rnam par gsal// hU~M las rdo rje rtse lngar

A+oM// de las khro bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lag na lcags kyu s+t+wa re thogs// bkug nas s+t+wa res bcad nas kyang// ling+ga sha chen sbyar nas kyang// de dag sreg pa'i rdzas su bya// de ltar sbyor ba byas gyur na// zla

ba phye ni tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas phyag na rdo rjes khro bo bcu

mthar phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di thon to// kun tu grub bzhir ldan pa la// che chung tshad med gnas kyis sbyar// ma traM gzugs chen bsgyel ba ni// de yi snying
gar bang rim gsum// dang po gru bzhi dmar por brtsig/ gnyis pa gru gsum mthing nag bya/ gsum pa zla gam smug nag bya// mgo bo yan lag drug dang ni/ gsang ba'i sgo chen gnyis brgyad la// chag phyed
stegs bu gru bzhi brgyad// de la yab yum brgyad rnams dgod// gru bzhi gru gsum zla gam la// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// de nas bar khyams bar ma la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya
dgod// de nas bar khyams phyi ma la// chag phyed pa yi stegs la bcu'i// khro bo'i ming dang gzugs su bri// de nas sgo ba chen po bzhi// de nas stegs bu gong dang 'dra// phyi rol lcags ri nag po

la// phor thogs brgyad dang gzhong thogs brgyad// lha bdud bcu gnyis dgod bar bya// sha zan mgo brnyan mang po'i tshogs// rngams pa'i tshogs can mang po'ang sprul/ dzaHhU~M baM hos dgra bgegs khug/ de nas

lha yi pho nya 'khor bcas mang po khug/ de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir// de yi sems yid mang 'khrugs pas// kha TAM 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bsnol// ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ha ha pra pe sha phaT/ dgra bgegs mA ra ya

phaT/ nr-i ma ra na ra be sha phaT/ lcags sam seng ldeng las byas pa'i/ phur bu chen po de nyid la// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// rin chen lnga dang sku gsum dang// khro tshogs 'bar bar byin brlabs

pa'i// phur pa snying gar gdab nas kyang// tshe dang gzi brjid 'phrog par byed// A+oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tan phaT// kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT// hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya// badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya

ti// kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hU~M/ oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAn/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dIp+ta tsakra hUM phaT/ khros shing 'khrug pa'i tshul gyis gdab// phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis gnan par bya// dug dang 'dres pa'i

gtor ma sbyin// gu gul gyis bdug nyung kar gdab// shag shag tshal tshal myos myos// de nas yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg/ dza la skye tshe da pa ra byi ta hUM phaT// de nas bsnyen cing bsgrubs gyur na// ma dang
mkha' 'gro dbang du 'du// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis// dngos grub dam pa'ang ster par 'gyur// 'bar ba'i 'khor tshogs ma lus kun// bran gyis bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// de ltar
sbyor ba cher byas na// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig par 'gyur// mtshan ma can lta smos ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// yongs su grub pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos// dbang gi dam pa 'di bka' stsal to// phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang// sgrub pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang// rgyal po'i dbang dang rgyal thebs dbang// nyan pa'i
dbang dang kar ma'i dbang// drod 'dzin dbang dang ging gi dbang// mchod pa'i dbang dang sgrol ba'i dbang// bsgom pa chen po la gnas dbang// 'di dag rab tu bskur bar bya// dbang gi snod kyang 'di lta
ste// dad ldan sri zhu che ba dang// ci la'ang chags med gtong ba dang// khyogs dang rkang 'gros glang chen dang// nor dang bud med dbyig gi mchog/ ci la'ang chags med stong ldan dang// 'di la

dbang mchog sbyin par bya// nus pa'i dbang dang phan pa'i dbang// phyag rgya rdzas dang snying po sbyin// A+oM swa ti ha/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// rin chen sna bdun bkra shis

brgyad// gzungs ma mtshan ldan grags pa can// stag dang seng ge dom dred gdan// zhing chen g.yang gzhi sbrul nag dang// glang chen ko rlon me dpung dang// thod phreng zhag gi tshom bu dang// thal chen rak+ta'i tshom

bu dang// yan lag ring thung dbang po'i phreng ba dang// gsang ba'i lha mo brgyad rnams dang// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor man chad nas// thang shol 'bar ba chen po dang// b+han+d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba rnams// dbang

nod chen po de la sbyin// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i dbang mchog kyang// dbang nod rgyal po de la sbyin// dbang phyug rgyal po'i gsang ming yang// dbang nod rgyal po de la sbyin// phyogs bcur yongs su grags pa
yi// dbang mchog chen po ma lus kyang// dbang nod rgyal po de la sbyin// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// dbang gi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen

po// 'khor tshogs bskal pa'i me dpung dang bcas pa dang// phyag na rdo rje 'jig pa dang bcas pa la// lha mo mdangs 'dzin mas bstod cing mchod pa/ kye ma ho/ dmar gyi gtor ma chen po dang// sha chen mAM sa

rak+ta dang// dri chen khu ba zhun chen dang// rus pa sha dang tsan+dan dang// rgyu zhags dbang po'i tshogs mchog dang// rang byung gdod nas dag pa'i rdzas// gnyis med don la sbyor ba'i phyir// dag pa chen po gzi

ldan bzhes su gsol// bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'chi med g.yung drung dbyibs// dag pas dag pa chen por bzhes su gsol// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ sbyor ba'i mchod pa chen po rnams// rdo rje glu dang gar gyis byos// tshig

dang sgra yis bstan cing mchod// dag pa'i chos nyid bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dis// rgyal po yab yum mchod dang bskangs gyur te// de ltar mchod cing bskangs gyur na// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// bcom
ldan 'das zla gsang chen po las// mchod pa'i glu'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas zla gsang chen po nyid// mi dmigs chos dbyings rnam par dag/ byed spyod thams cad dmigs pa med// las
rnams dag pa'i dbyings su gcig/ chos sku ro gcig 'gyur med dang// gzung 'dzin mtha' las rnam par grol// skye med dbyings kyi ngang du gcig/ chos sku ngo bo mnyam rdzogs mchog/ bcom ldan 'das zla
gsang chen po las// chos nyid rgya mtsho'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen pos phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thugs kyi brnag pa zla dkyil

nas// zla gam dbang chen dkyil 'khor du// sgro skur rnam par spang ba'i phyir// mu stegs log lta lta la dga'// dad med dam nyams dam las log/ byang chub thag pa gting nas chad// de phyir phyag na rdo rje
khyod// bdag gi bka' gsang dam pa 'di// khyod nyid la ni rab tu gtad/ rgyal ba'i gzhung mchog dam pa 'di// bka' gsang rmad nas byung ba'i mchog/ zla gsang nag po rgyas pa'i dpal// yon tan rgyas pa'i
mchog chen 'di// phyag na rdo rje khyod la gtad// bka' gsang gzhan las khyad 'phags pa'i// gsang ba sku gsung thugs las byung// nyan thos rang rgyal 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i skams lings byed pa'i
dpal// phyag na rdo rje khyod la gtad// ces gsungs so// yongs su gtad pa'i le' ste nyer lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das zla gsang chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//// rdzogs so//
gsang ba'i snying po/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ longs spyod chen po/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa
med pa thams cad dang/ so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar

ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu'i dus bzhi'i
sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad/ so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang/ kha dog la sogs pa rnam

pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pas spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang dang/ shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs sna tshogs dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/
dri sna tshogs dang/ ro sna tshogs dang/ reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la/ mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo

nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang// stobs glang po che'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul rta'i

khri dang/ dbang rma bya'i khri dang/ thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la/ sku mdun dang rgyab med

pa/ thams cad du yang zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa/ bsam gyi mi khyab pa thams cad du/ sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis

mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa// bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin

gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang/ de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ le brgan dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang/ sra ba'i dbyings

dang/ mnyen pa'i dbyings dang/ dro ba'i dbyings dang/ bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til

gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang/

btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba dang/ bsnam par bya ba dang/ myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje

snom byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang/ btsun mo 'das pa dang/ da ltar dang/ 'byung ba dang/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang// 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg pa dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg byed

dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg bya dang/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ bdag tu ma yin pa dang/ mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa/
de lta bu'i thugs kyi tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag

nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// e e ma e ma ho/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang// rang

snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las sel med pa yi yon tan yid bzhin rin po che// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi

gnas nyid do// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po/ thams cad ma
lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes/ btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer

med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho/ rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po

kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// thams cad ma lus
chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de
nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun du bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma'o phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa

gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po las// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i
chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas

pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad
kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
gsang// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad
dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med pas 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod
pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang// gzhan du min las shin tu gsang// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad dang/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las/ 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab
par smin pa la/ thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang
longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan
gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la
ched du gleng ngo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i/ rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snel gzhi

dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer/ thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de/ bltams
pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ dka' thub mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa dang/ bdud btul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang/ mya ngan 'das pa la sogs

par ston pa'i thub pas/ dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang/ thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad kun tu gzigs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan

pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu don spyod pa dang/ zag pa med pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang/ kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs bsam

gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/

'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang byang chub kyi theg pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pas/ ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon

mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por/ chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo// gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel
bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug
myong bar 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams

ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod pas// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig

ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi
'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i
phyir// byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags pa// gsang ba'i

snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang mthun phyogs
su// ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston ming tshig la dngos po med// ces brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid/ sku dang gsung

dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho// srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtogs las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs
pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang bsgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams las// gzhan

na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas/ thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de
bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu

gyur nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar/ chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba
'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// aH rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par

brtan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha

na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH i I/ u U/ e ai// o au/ 'di dag phyung bas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos nas/

chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// ho de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad
ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge 'phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de

nyid nges// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming// tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems// bdag med
mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang// dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi

bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge 'go nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo

mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa'o// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tig ni shes rab ming du smra// shad ni thabs chen tshigs
