pa 'ga' zhig byung ba sngags rnams rgya dpe la brten nas khrus khang lo tsA ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes zhus dag nan tan mdzad pa'i dpe khungs btsun dang/ bod skad la rgya 'grel par bkab/ bod 'grel
g.yung TIka gnyis la legs par gtugs nas/ rdo rje brag sprul pa'i sku mchog/ 'dar pa lo tsA ba ngag dbang phun tshogs lhun grub/ rnam gling paN chen dkon mchog chos grags gsum gyis zhus dag bgyis
skabs dogs gnas rnams 'di gar mig lam du phab ste dpyad gzod pa'i lugs su byas pa'o////

rgya gar skad du/ g+huh+ya gar+b+ha ta thA twa ni sh+tsa ya mA yA aSh+ta ka tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ sgyu 'phrul brgyad pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po
la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ gzhi tshad med

pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ ye shes rin po che sna

tshogs kyi phreng ba dang/ chun 'phyang dang shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs sna tshogs dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ ro sna tshogs dang/ reg sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung ba la mi

bsgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa'i/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang nang

du gyur pa na/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang/ stobs glang po che'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang/ dbang rma bya'i khr-i dang/ thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'od

gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la/ sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing/ mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa/ thabs dang shes rab

kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po
dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang/ de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ le brgan dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu 'bar ba la/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang/

sra ba'i dbyings dang/ mnyen pa'i dbyings dang/ dro ba'i dbyings dang/ bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/

dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snoms pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myang ba

dang/ btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba dang/ bsnam par bya ba dang/ myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang/ byang chub chen

po rdo rje snom byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang/ btsun mo 'das pa dang/ da lta dang/ ma nges pa dang/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang/ khro bo 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg byed
dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ bdag tu ma yin pa dang/ mtshan mar ma yin pa'i dbyings la sogs pa/

de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi langs pa dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje/ btsun mo bya ba mo
chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du dbyer med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang
mA la kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid
las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun

tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum ni dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga
nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal yang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas
sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi
chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med
las thams cad 'gags// 'gags pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa
med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang// btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab

par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa ched du 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang// ngo bo
nyid kyis rab tu gsang// gzhan du min las shin tu gsang// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid
yin pas dbye ba med na'ang/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las/ 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la/ thugs rje chen pos sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas/ ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyi sprul// sna tshogs lus dang gnas la sogs// bdag dang bdag gis so so'i 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcing med
de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// bcing med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna
tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du gleng ngo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes

bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong
gsum gyi stong chen po re rer/ thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res/ 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de// bltams pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ dka' thub mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa
dang/ bdud btul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba la sogs par ston pa'i thub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar

gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste// 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang// nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang byang chub kyi theg pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pa

dang/ ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin

pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las ldog pa dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur gos su med par ston
pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su
'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin
med las cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir/ byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos

mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang
rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// zhes brjod pas thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang/ de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin
gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las

mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha
ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad
ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam

sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// zhes brjod pas

chos thams cad yi ger bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas pa de kho na sems nges par thams cad mkhyen to// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i le'u stong phrag brgyad pa las/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rdzogs pa chen
po'i tshul rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste dang po//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bzhed nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub pa// rdzogs chen rtogs
pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi yis brgyan pa'i khyams// kun tu gru zhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung
bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/ 'khor lo
rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang/ myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang// thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag dang bcas par

gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dang// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang// bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan pa rnams// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po

che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon
tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yis// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis
grub// ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad dang/ dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi langs pa'i zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ oM dzi na dzika hUM badzra d+h+r-ika/ swA rat+na d+h-Ika/ AM A ro lika/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika muM d+hA t-I shwa rI/ lAM

dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShiM hi rA dzA ya/ traM A gar+b+hA ya/ hri ha hUMM bA da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri gI ti ra go\u0f85haM/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hiM ni

s+sa raM b+hA ya swAhA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hUp+pi pra be sha ya/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM d+hi pa su gi rI/ hoHgan d+he tsit+ta/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyan+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM big+hAn+ta kr-ita

phaT/ A+oM ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA krod+hI shA rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwA rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa r-I dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA karma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/

hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta A+oM/ a a a badzri b+ha dra sa man+ta oM/ A+oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne truM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne praM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne ye swA hA/ A+oM oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya
ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so// rab tu grags so// kun tu grags so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang/ bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bdag nyid chen po'i

ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las byung ngo// A+oM ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ka\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya be

k+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ThAn dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga

ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/
zhes brjod pas thim par gyur/ 'od zer gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dgos pa chen po'i glu blangs so// A+oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi

rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs ho// A+oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra

chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// A+oM sku gsung thugs ky-i rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho/ A+oM mi

dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po ho// A+oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal

ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub ho// A+oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun

tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che ho// zhes glu blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mnyes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i

sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po gdul ba'i nga rgyal chen po'i gzi brjid bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdau rje'i

bdag po/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ hUM hUM hUM bi shwa badzra kro d+hA dz+wa
la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hUM/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/ phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed thon par gyur nas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem

chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go/ thor thor/ rab tu thor thor/ kun tu rab tu thor thor ro// 'jig rten drug gi stong khams thams
cad na/ dbang che ba dang/ gzi brjid che ba dang/ mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal/ rab tu brgyal kun tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid/

'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngams pa skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen pa'i khrag 'thung/ sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de/

dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang/ dur khrod

kyi bdag po chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum gyi tshul du bzhugs so// khro bo'i sprin phung gi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ shar phyogs na bzhugs so// la la

ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te/ lhor bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+ma chen por gyur te/ nub tu bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po las su gyur te/ byang
phyogs su bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang/ rngams pa'i nga ro dang 'bar ba'i klong na/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis/ dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/

gshin rje dang/ yi dwags khyo shug gi gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo'i tshogs kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas de dag gi 'khor dkar mo'i tshogs

dang/ rkun mo'i tshogs dang/ rmongs mo'i tshogs dang/ thal byed ma'i tshogs dang/ spos mo'i tshogs dang/ gtum mo'i tshogs dang/ sme sha can gyi tshogs dang/ ma tshogs mo'i tshogs rnams kyang/ 'bar ba chen
po'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag char bcas nas 'khod do// de nas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ wa
gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ kang ka'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ dur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ 'ug pa'i gdong
chen mo'i tshogs rnams 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar rngams pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor/ srid 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs

dang/ rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs dang/ shin tu+u gtum mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag

dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rngams pa'i skad kyis/ hUM hUM hUM ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas/ gtum po chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po
kun phyung/ nang khrol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs za zhing/ khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi

'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// oM badzra ma hA kro d+ha a mr-i ta aM aM aM/ zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs

pa thams cad de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snam nas 'thon te dran pa rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs de dag kyang/ dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku
'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs par mthong ngo// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pa rab tu zhums pa'i smre sngags/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo
dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing// snying yang 'gas shing gtub gyur cig/ rul myags tshigs nas brlag pa dang// dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas/ dkyil
'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes
bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so sor 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan
pa'i// sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma
bsgrubs na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar mchi// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang// ma dang sring mo dang bu mo thams cad kyis
mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal tu gsol// zhes smras so// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dges pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du bkod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i le'u stong phrag brgyad pa las/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
pa'i le'u/ khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par spros pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis 'grub

par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngams pa las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo// A+oM sarba

ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha

na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT A+oM karma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI

sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI bi da ma hUM phaT/ A+oM hri shru ta sa ma ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi shwa

hUM phaT/ badzra gau rI ha/ badzra tso rI ha/ badzra pra mo he ha/ badzra be tA lI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra sing ha mu khA he/ badzra byA g+h+ri mu khA he/ badzra sr-ing+ga la mu khA he/ badzra shwa na

mu khA he/ badzra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khA he/ badzra kaM ka mu khA he/ badzra kA ka mu khA he/ badzra u lU ka mu khA he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza ting dza/ badzra a mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu ho/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo

b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi a na ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ raM/ a li u li tA li tA pa li/ daM Sh+ta ko na rau dri/ khaM raM yo gi nI/ khA hi ho/ hUM ha he phaT/ zhes brjod
pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun tu tshig go/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis dang/ rab tu gang/ kun tu
gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i tshogs chen po'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/

de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams

gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sprul la sogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi sbar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung// smug nag sngo

nag ser nag dang// dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngams pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sprul dang thod phreng nyi zla'i

chas// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// ral gri dgra s+t+wa gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi

phyag rgya dang/ sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas rab mdzes shing// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas

'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u stai lnga pa'o//// de nas
bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan
'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya'o// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par byed// mnyam pa'i sgrub rdzas chen po dang/ bdag dang mnyam
pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yis// bde gshegs yon tan
rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing// gsal la yid gnyis med pa na/ dkyil 'khor chen
por 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcur thams cad khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig
'di ched du brjod do// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'o// mnyam pa mnyam par sbyor ba

yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dang// gso la nye bar mi brtson dang// skad cig yud tsam smra mi
byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi langs// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig

nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung// dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam

tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbyer// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po tshe// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa// rtogs 'dul dam tshig de snyed 'phro/ zhes brjod
pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur ro// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mchod sbyin dang dam tshig gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen po lhun gyis grub pa dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen

rngams pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab// rdul du byas la
tshogs la bstab// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yo// myos nas gas te 'tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

mchog/ 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas
gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par bstab// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nasabasdams// 'gugs 'gyur rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang// ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi
tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa
bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' spro phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar bstab// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams bskyod// gzi
brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// yA yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum chen rngam
pa'ang lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum rngams 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar pa lhan ne'i tshogs la bstab// yA yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

du// lu gu rgyad du sbrel bsdams nas// 'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab
bsgrags nas// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad byed par 'gyur// mdzod
ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// lhan ner
'dod na lhan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med pa byed// bzhad

gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun yang 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ rbad cing
gtong bar byed pa ste// thams cad cad byed pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngams pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i

me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'khyug pa bzhin// mche ba bzang yag za byed che ho/ hUM rngams pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// gtum chen ri rab 'bum snyil skad// a la ha

la'i gad rgyangs che// spyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hUM khro

bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i tshogs// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de
dpung rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'joms par byed// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje

rlung ste 'thor rlung che'o// zhes ched du glu blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/

de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par bzung ba'i phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye kye/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung
'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor 'dzin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang// gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma
gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di

las gzhan mi mnga'// sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung// de nyid nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las bskyed pa yin// sa rab rig pa
'dzin la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings/ sku gsung thugs lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs

so// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
pa las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma sang+gI ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// pad+ma dkar
po rgyas 'dra'i spyan// pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs// rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs// lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul

dka' 'dul ba bo/ 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can// rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa// snying rje che dang shes rab dang// thabs kyis 'gro don byed pa'i mchog/ dga' mgu rangs
pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang// bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs
pa'i// byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod// nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang// bla med 'bras bu 'thob bya'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ ye shes sku
ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che zhing// don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// 'das pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// yang dang yang du gsung ba gang// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags
'chang// dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du// glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ci nas bdag 'gyur phyir// nges par 'byung gi bar du
ni// bdag gi bsam pa brtan pos gzung// nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang// mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal// gsang dbang

lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol nas thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi
zhal nas ljags bzang ba// ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing// bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i

'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang nas// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// snying rje che dang ldan gyur pas// 'gro la phan

pa'i don du khyod// ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gyi// ming brjod pa ni don che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// lag na rdo rje khyod
legs so// gsang ba'i bdag po de phyir ngas// khyod la legs par bstan par bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan
shAkya thub// gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang// gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed
rigs chen dang// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang// rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas// tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing// gnyis su med par 'byung ba

dang// mi skye'i chos can 'di gsungs pa// a A i I u U a ai au aM aHs+thi to hridi/ dz+nyA na mUrti ra haM bud+d+ho/ bud+d+hA nAM t+r+ya d+hA bar+t+ti nAM/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da/ pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya wA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa

nA ya te na maH/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa

spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi

dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa

chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bongs che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba

ste// nyon mongs chen po'i lcags kyu mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang// sgyu 'phrul chen po don sgrub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dga'
bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po'i mig 'phrul can// spyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste// tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po// brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin// bsam

gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// stobs po che la thabs che ba// smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste// byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying rje chen po blo yi mchog/ shes

rab chen po blo chen ldan// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba// rdzu 'phrul chen pa stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// srid pa'i
ri bo chen po 'joms// mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang// drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rig mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i

mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen

bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste// sa bcu la ni gnas pa po// shes
bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po// rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma
med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med dang gnyis med ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par
gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'j-igs byed// kun tu 'gro ba'i don yod stobs// de bzhinagashegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor

lo bsgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog/ tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas

pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden pa dang bden par smra// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong// 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul// nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung
ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral bas dbang po thul/ bde ba rnyed pas 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pas rnyog pa med// rig pa dang ni rkang
par ldan// bde gshegs 'jig rten rigs pa'i mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa// bya ba byas pas skam sar gnas// shes
pa 'ba' zhig nges gsal ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// legs pa'i lam ni ston
pa po// don grub bsam pa grub pa ste// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes ye shes
'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog/ so so rang rig mi g.yo

ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod paN can// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang// sangs rgyas thams cad
skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog/ shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med// chos las 'byung ba srid pa sel// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ skyes ma thag tu 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha'

las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// sngags mchog mnga'
bdag rig sngags rgyal// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig
dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod cing rjed pa drang srong che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags can// dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin

pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug

'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje

snying// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje'i snying po mkha' 'dra ba// mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// grags chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa// hI

hI zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje drag po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes

sgrogs// mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa// rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzang// skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje

'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can// rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu'i lus// sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs// rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang
ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam dbyangs chen po'i sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig pa// nam mkha'i mtha'

klas sgra sgrogs pa// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste// zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen
ldan// chos kyi gaN+Di sgra bo che// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams thams cad
snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// tshugs pa med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas// dar ba chen po chos kyi tog/ 'jig
rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig/ gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te// 'jig rten slob
dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten yid gcugs pa// skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed

pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin// ye shes dbang bskur cod paN can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug
bsngal zhi// gsum sel mtha' las grol gsum thob// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po// sems
can kun gyi klu chen po// yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang// khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi
mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan 'dod sems can mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la// khyab bdag dam
shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung// bkra shis kun gyis bkra shis
pa// grags pa bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' chen rol mo chen po ste// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs// mchog tu dga' ba grags pa dag dpal// mchog ldan
mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog/ 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can// ral pa mun dza cod

pan thogs// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga pa me tog thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po pa// tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che// gtsang

gnas dam pa go'u tam// bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa shes// mya ngan 'das tshangs pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan
'das dang nye// bde sdug sel bar mthar gyur pa// chags bral lus las 'das pa po// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra zhing zag med sa
bon bral// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rig dam pa po// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul

'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma mtha' ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// ye shes lus can de

bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med// kun tu lta bas mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ba lta na

sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing// nad do cog gi dgra che ba// sdug gu
'jig rte gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par// chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs// 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying
rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor
che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje// sangs rgyas kun

gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags bral la sogs chags pa
che// kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil klung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal

po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang// che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag/ theg pa chen por sdug bsngal gcod// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo

dzi na dzika/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rigs// pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang// brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba

ste// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang// kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang// sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// sprul pa'i

'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos

kun khong du chud pa 'chang// chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog 'byung ba'i mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang// sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum
pa// ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du
gcig dpa' ba// mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// blo ldan sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan// brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing// gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal

ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon// rkang pa ya gcig mthil gyis gnon// rkang mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang// tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas
gnon// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos don ma lus rnams la dga'// stong pa
nyid dga' 'dod chags blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa// srid gsum dga' ba chen po ste// sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar

mdzes// sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar// cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse// skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang// nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'jig rten khams
brgya kun bskyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang// dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog spos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug/ sems can kun

gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun yi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas// nges par
'byung ba kun la mkhas// nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas// nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang// bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa

can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i
sku// bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// theg pa gsum gyis nges
'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag/ las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las brgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon
mongs nye ba'i kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing// rnam shes don ni 'gag par
byed// sems can kun yid yul dang ldan// sems can kun gyi yid rig pa// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug/ sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun
gyi yid dga' ba// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ phung po lnga don dus gsum du// skad
cig thams cad bye brag byed// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang// lus med lus te lus kyi mchod// lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gzugs rnams sna tshogs
kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags las byung yi ge med// gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags
don kun skyed pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge brgya// rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// yan lag med pa'i rtsis
las 'das// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo can// bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing// ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul

pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha dang lha dbang lha yi lha// lha yi dbang po lha min bdag/ 'chi med
dbang po lha yi bla// 'joms byed 'joms byed dbang phyug go/ srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba// staun pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi spyin bdag che ba
po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa
sel bar byed// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os// bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i
mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab// 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa// kun la phan pa'i gang zag

mchog/ dper bya kun las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste// phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po
bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod

'dud// yang dag mthar 'gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod pa 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs
rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud// sangs
rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba
khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud//// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sku/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes sku yongs su dag pa'o/ ma 'dres pa/ thun mong ma yin pa/ khyod kyi dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ mgu ba chen po bla na

med pa bskyed pa dang/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ khyod kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gsang ba yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs shing/ yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ bla na med pa'i don ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang/ ma thob pa thob par bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i bar gyi phyir ngas bshad cing yang dag par bstan te/ bkrol zhing rnam par phye ba gsal bar byas so// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ 'di ni ngas

khyod kyi rgyud la yang gsang sngags thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs so// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ gzhan yang ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye

shes dang/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba shin tu yongs su dag cing byang ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs pa'o// bde bar gshegs

pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings bla na med pa thugs su chud pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par mdzad pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs nyid do// thams

cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi lung ngo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes

kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa// dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i skye gnas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing ngo// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'o// theg pa chen po'i
gzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung gnas so// 'phags pa'i lam thams cad kyi mtha'o// rnam par grol ba rnams brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam skye ba'i gnas so// de bzhin gshegs
pa'i gdung mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs can thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud

bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde pham par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung ba bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i lam bzhi la
gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to// sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid 'dul ba la brtson pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// nyon

mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad las rnam par grol ba'o// rdzas thams cad las thar ba'o// sems kyi g.yeng ba thams cad

zhi ba'o// 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad sel ba'o// ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo la mi 'jug
pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i gdugs dang// rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi

sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rtogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med par so sor rtogs par mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi rdzogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad yongs su dag
pa'o// sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o// ming yang dag

par brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang// gzhan yang ci skad du bshad pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di// sems

can thams cad kyi lus dang// ngag dang yid la kun tu spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog

pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams
cad nges par 'jig par byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o// ltas ngan dang bgegs thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o// bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du

spong bar byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ dregs pa dang/
ngar 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba
rnams kyi dran pa dang// shes bzhin yang dag par skyed pa'o// bla na med pa'i shes rab dang// yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang// stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal

dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang// bstod pa dang grags par byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad rab tu zhi

bar byed pa'o// shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams kyi yang shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// shin tu dag byed rnams kyi yang shin tu dag byed do// shin tu 'byor ldan rnams kyi yang shin tu 'byor ldan no// shin tu

bkra shis pa rnams kyi yang shin tu bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob med pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen

no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo// 'khra sa med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa bla na med pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o// nad thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po chen po'o// blang ba dang

dor ba'i dngos po bye brag phyed pa'i shes rab nyid do// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par byed

pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o// 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku thob par bya ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pa'o// zang zing dang/ mi 'jigs

pa dang/ chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su+u rdzogs pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa bcu thob pa'o// chos gnyis dang
bral ba'i phyir/ gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do// sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang/ gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag

pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do// blta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing brgya stong ma lus par sel ba'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// ming

yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi ming yang dag par 'dzin pa ston pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ gzhan
yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa gang la la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ gnyis su med pa'i
don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa/ ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ ma nyams shing lhag chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang/ yig 'bru 'di nyid kyis nyin

gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang dam tshig bzhin du/ ci lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang/ ming gi don
gang yang rung ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku la dmigs te/ kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad rtog pa'i mchog rnyog pa med pa'i dad pa dang ldan bzhin pa dang/ mos pa
dang de kho na nyid yid la byed pas sems rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni/ dus gsum gyi dus med pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus te gshegs nas/ chos kyi sgo thams

cad ston par mdzad de sku yang ston to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzad de/ sku dang
gsung dang thugs thams cad kyis de'i rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob bo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phan gdags pas kyang phan 'dogs par mdzad do// chos thams cad la

mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang sgrub par mdzad do// dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug par 'dzin pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang nye bar

ston par byed do// ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyobs pa rnams kyang/ sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus sna tshogs kyis/ mdangs dang
stobs dang gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa dang/ gsang sngags dang/ phyag rgya dang/ mngon par rtogs pa dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed do// gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags kyi

rgyal mo ma lus pa dang/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang/ bdud kyi dgra dang/ phyir zlog pa dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po thams cad dang/ nyin mtshan phyad par skad cig re re la spyod lam thams cad du

srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang po dang/ drag po dang/ tshan po che dang/ kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ smin drug gi bu dang/ nag po chen

po dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu lha dang/ ku be dang/ 'phrog ma dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ nyin mtshan phyad par 'gro yang rung/

'greng yang rung/ 'dug kyang rung/ nyal yang rung/ gnyid log kyang rung/ ma log kyang rung ba na/ srung ba dang skyob pa dang/ sbed par byed do// mnyam par gzhag kyang rung/ mnyam par ma bzhag kyang rung/

gcig pur 'dug kyang rung/ skye bo mang po'i nang na 'dug kyang rung/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang na 'dug kyang rung/ sgo kha dang/ sgo khang dang/

khri lam dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ grong bar dang/ tshong khang na 'dug kyang rung/ khang stong dang/ ri dang/ chu klung dang/ tshal dang/ nags tshang tshing na 'dug kyang rung/ gtsang sbra ma byas

pa dang/ ra ro ba dang/ bag med par 'dug kyang rung ste/ rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du ci'i sgo nas kyang mchog tu srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed par byed do// nyin mtshan du yang mchog tu bde legs su 'gyur

bar byed do// gang yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gzhan dag kyang/ gza' dang/ rgyu
skar dang/ ma mo rnams dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan rnams dang/ ma mo bdun po gang yin pa rnams dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ srin mo dang/ sha za mo gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang 'dus shing gcig
tu mthun par dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ mdangs dang/ stobs dang/ gzi brjid mchog kyang de'i lus la 'jug par byed
do// nad med pa dang/ stobs dang tshe 'phel bar yang 'grub par byed do// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ gzhan yang ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di/ gang gis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du ma nyams par yi
dam du lan gsum du kha ton du byas te bton tam/ glegs bam du byas pa klog cing brjod la/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs yid la dmigs shing/ gzugs
dang mthun par sems te/ de'i gzugs dang mthun pa bsam gtan byed pas ni/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ ring por mi thogs par de nyid kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems can chen po de ni nam yang ci ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro

ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par blta ba dang/ blta ba ngan pa'i rigs su skye bar

mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bzhugs na yang des dam pa'i chos spang ba dang/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang nad

dang/ mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal ba'i nang du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// snyigs ma lnga'i dus su yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang/ dgra dang/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ci nas

kyang dman pa dang/ dbul ba'i 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dri ngas dang/ skur pa dang/ smad pa dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ gtam ngan gyi 'jigs pa yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyud dang rus dang
rigs bzang po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes pa dang/ gzugs dang/ kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams la sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ 'grogs na bde ba dang/
mthong na dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams la mdzes pa dang/ skal ba dang ldan pa dang/ tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yang skye ba dran par 'gyur
ro// longs spyod kyi gzhi che ba dang/ 'khor mang ba dang/ longs spyod kyi gzhi mi zad pa dang/ 'khor mi zad par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog dang/ yon tan mchog dang yang ldan par
'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la yang gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ thabs dang/ stobs
dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang/ smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// mi blun pa dang/ tshig gsal ba dang/ sgrin por 'gyur ro// shes
nyan can dang/ le lo med pa dang/ chog shes pa dang/ nor mang ba dang/ sred pa med par yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla

mar bkur bar yang 'gyur ro// des sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang/ sgyu rtsal dang/ mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang/ bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang yi ge'i sgo nas shes par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang/

'tsho ba dang/ kun tu spyod pa shin tu yongs su dag par spyod pa dang/ legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang/ legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyang

mi brjed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa la nam yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur

te/ rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ don dam pa'i ming yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu
gang zag de ni/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags shing/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams shin tu bsgrubs nas/ ring por mi thog par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos su mi 'gyur bar/ sems can thams cad la bla na med pa'i chos ston pa dang/ phyogs bcur dam pa'i

chos kyi rnga sgra chen po rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ oM sarba d+harmA b+hA wa swa b+hA wa/ bi shud+d+ha badzra a A aM aH/ pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA ya du ta sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na kA la ya many+dzu shrI

pa ri shud+d+ha tA mu pA dA ya ti aM aH/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIH/ b+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mur+t+ti wA' gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa tsa sarba d+harmA/ ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ de nas dpal ldan rdo
rje 'chang// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs
gzhan dang lhan cig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang

ni// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// 'di ni rna dag legs pa'i lam// zab cing yangs la rgya che ste// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed
pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so//// 'di sgyu 'phrul bzhi bcu pa yin/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'o// bcom ldan
'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang/ so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med

pa'i/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhi par

gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus par mnyam pa thams cad/ so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu

'khyil ba/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te/ rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang/

chun 'phyangs dang/ shar bu'i rgyan dang/ gzugs sna tshogs dang/ sgra sna tshogs dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ ro sna tshogs/ reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa/ rang byung la/ mi bsgrib par gsal ba'i

rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na/ mi 'jigs

pa seng ge'i khri dang/ stobs glang po che'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang/ dbang rma bya'i khri dang/ thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang/ gos

pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la/ sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad tu zhal thal le bar gsal zhing/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par

kun tu snang ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las/ thams cad du rdzogs pa'i tshul/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi
phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po

dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po de dag kun kyang/
mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ leb rgan dang ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang/ sra ba'i dbyings dang/ mnyen pa'i dbyings dang/ dro ba'i dbyings dang/
bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs

so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang/ btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang/ mnyan par bya ba

dang/ bsnam par bya ba dang/ myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang/ byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed
dang/ btsun mo 'das pa dang/ da ltar dang/ 'byung ba dang/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang/ 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang/ 'joms pa chen po
reg shes dang/ btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang/ chad par ma yin pa dang/ bdag tu ma yin pa dang/ mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par

bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung

ngo// e e e ma ho// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang/ rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang

yon tan phrin las sel med pa yi yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid

nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po/ rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po/ thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes/ btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo
la 'jug par gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// A+oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod
yul ba// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi
dang yang dag ldan// dbang dang skal min bsam pa'i rig/ nang dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyis sbas pa yi// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// zhes
brjod pas/ btsun mo bya ba chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba chos kun tu bzang mos// bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba
la mnyam par gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bsam yas na// nI la

lta bur gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas// byang chub mchog gi nang gtan dgrol// mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed
nas// 'gro lnga skye bzhir dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma 'o// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA la kI/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug
ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod
pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos// bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di
