brjod do// e ma ho// phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying
po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs pa
nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su

bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho/ ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gags// 'gags pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// gnas pa med
la thams cad gnas/ gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa

med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang// 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong// 'gro 'ong nyid nas 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/
btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes par khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna
tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang// ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang// gzhan du min las shin tu gsang// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo

nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin par dbyer med na'ang/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las/ 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la/ thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po
skyes nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang
bdag gis so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcing med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// bcing med rnam par grol med

pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya
ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis/ snrel gzhi dang/ yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu
mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer/ thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res/ 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba rnam pa lnga'i don mdzad de/ bltams pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/
dka' thub mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa dang bdud btul ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par ston pa'i thub pas/ dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa

dang/ thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu spyod pa dang/ zag pa med pa

kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang/ kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu gsung

bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// de ltar snang bar gyur nas/ ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po/ snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang

'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang/ bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog

pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por/ chos kyi sgo mo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dbang gis

phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i 'khrul pa las ldog pa dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gos su med par
ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do// e ma ho dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa// snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i// gzhan gyis mi 'phrog rang bzhin rgyal// mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// rtog
pa'i bag chags stug po yis// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang// rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul
gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab

pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang// gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur
nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang
bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir// byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos

mngon dang// dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin
gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'debs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang mthun phyogs
su// ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston ming tshig la dngos po med// ces brjod pas/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun

gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho// srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las spros// rgyud drug
skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang// gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed

med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams las// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi gsungs pa yang/ de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang/ rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/ de la chos
nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang/ nam mkha' kun la khyab kyang/ mngon par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na/ me long

g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste/ gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so// zhes gsungs nas/ yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por
chu klung kun 'bab ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa ma lus mtha' yas 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i// sa bcu rim gyis bsgom pa'i
rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang 'thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyi sa rab thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu
'jug/ dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden bzhi'i don rtogs rab tu spong byed cing// ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i// rgyun zhugs la
sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro// theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun pas 'byams par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu

med// 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsung// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin

no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur kyang// rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis

kun la khyab pa yis// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang// so so rang rang blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang// 'khrul pa'i log rtog blo nyid snang ba ste// de bzhin nyid kyi
dbyings la 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang
rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gsum du mthong// theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// nam mkha'i dbyings nyid
gtos ni bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang// 'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang// nam mkha'i dbyings la 'gyur zhing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni
mtha' yas par// sku gsung yon tan phrin las rmad byung dang// 'jig rten gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang// 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang// de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba

med// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang/ rigs rgyud chad pa dang/ rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdo bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i

yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// a/ rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams 'phro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus

kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha

nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ 'di dag phyung bas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu
g.yos// kun tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma'ang dmigs su

yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal

por de nyid nges// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming// tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems// bdag
med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang// dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sbrul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor
bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge'i mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku

gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa'o// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tsheg ni shes rab ming du smra// shad
ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag

nyid// Na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni dra bas bstan pa nyid// da ni dra bas lham me nyid// d+ha ni dra bas 'khril ba nyid// na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs

kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyithugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+ha ni

ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste// ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang

'jigs par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag med dag pa ste/ Sha ni chad pa yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag

med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed
yi dwags su// ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// o ni thams cad 'jig par byed// au ni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus// zhes brjod
do// a ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a

ho// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i
dam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin// a ho/ zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i
snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'i phyir/

sngags kyi rgyud phyi pa dang/ nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad la yang bco brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir/ khams nyi shu rtsa
gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang/ rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin/ gsang ba'i dbang po dang/ gsang ba'i yul gnyis ga yang/ skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin

pa'i phyir// shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsang bar bstan pa'i phyir/ nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ngo mtshar gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang
bzhin gnas// ye nas dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang// gzhan du min la shin tu gsang// don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyud// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsungs// 'di ni

byang chub snying po'i mchog/ a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byong// skye
mched khams rnams bco brgyad po// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma yi// dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings yin te// sems dpa' rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang po thabs// dbang po yul
nyid shes rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad byang chub sems ma yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang// thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid

do// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med// 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba'i byang chub 'grub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed cing de las

spro// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mar ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro nas// mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo
bzhi rnams dang// mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas pa dang// smon pa'i byang chub sems yin no// g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// dgug dang 'dzin dang de
bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang bsgyur te// bde ba'i sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba
'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'ong gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshims byed dri bsung thim// ltar mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas
kun tu 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil drod 'jam pa'i dbyings// a la la ho// gsang dbang pad+mar ldan gyur nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod
med rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma can yang rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes

tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las// khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bco brgyad 'byung ba'i

gnas yin te// byang chub 'grub pa'i gzhi yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yin te// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma'i bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang
chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur na// gsang ba mchog 'phrul chen po spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang dbang mchog gis
'byin par skyed// 'di ni rtsa gcig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur// khab
len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song bskal par ltung bar 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang// shes rab rgya chen blo zab pa'i// blo brten snying rje dbang ldan

dang// rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang la bstan// gzhan du sbyin par bya ba min// zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// shin tu zab pa'i phyir rgyud gzhan du ma bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlab dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnams bzhi yis// thams

cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM ru shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams
kun// rnam smin mUM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la// hUM du shes

pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo glu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil

'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes snyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// sgrub pa nyi zla snying po de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blang// mkha' 'gro gsal
'bar che la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam par

dag/ dbyings su thims nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur gyur 'od zer 'phros bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang ba
mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang// rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing// mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i
zhing// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub// lnga

dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs

dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro

mo'i tshogs chen po// pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyi// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang
gnas shing// spyod pa ci la thogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phros 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med

gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal 'bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob
'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad

kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro 'phreng bsgom// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs
dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang// ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde
dang// ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo rgyu nyams med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam

pa thob// sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las/ lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ sngags 'chang rnams lhar bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i
phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad
bdag med pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu

ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'phros pa yi// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin rlabs ya
mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang rig pa'i thabs las byung// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang// dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med
'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma
chags pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan// zag med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// tA la'i rang bzhin ljon shing gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong
ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba'i de nyid nges
pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang// gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor

dang// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog bstan// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus
nas/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcur thams cad la/ nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bzhed nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// rdzogs

chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang// kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin

phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung// nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo

rgyal po rgyal mo dang// g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang// myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang// thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dang yang ldan par gnas// bar

khyams la ni thub drug dang// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang// bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri
dril bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser leb rgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul
can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil ba ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi

phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang// 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// kha dog so sor mig yor tshul// tshul
nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so sor 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang// las 'phro'i dbang gis
so sor snang// dngas ma dkar dang chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// gzhan
yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams 'jal

bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang// de nas sa bcu

rim gyis 'byang// bla med yang dag byang chub 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod

yul kun tu maN+Dal// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad

mi shes kyi gter du gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du/ dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba/ zhing gi rdul snyed gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i
dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo// a ho// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig
dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam spros spros pa med// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi

rdul snyed du// ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// a ho// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas/ 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang/ nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing/ kun tu bzang po dgyes te/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus
pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// tshad dpag tu med pa/ rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang 'byung
ba la bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba tshad dpag med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i/ srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te// mtshan 'dzin
'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung// dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang// 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos
bkur dbang phyug dang// gzhan yang 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i khams gnas pa// bdud rtsi'i ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar gcod pa'i// 'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid
du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rigs pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// zag med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par

gyur// b+h+ruM/ rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol par mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin gnas pa'o// dus bzhi'i

rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las byung// spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges

pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa'i// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can zhes bya// rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can
gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus kun bsdus pas// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par sbas pa yi// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud
pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthar gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba// thugs rje byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba

yi// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur// zhes nyid la nyid ched du brjod do// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs drwa ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// b+h+ruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he hUM badzra d+h+r-ika A+oM dzi na dzi ka/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika AM A ro lika/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h-Ika/ muM d+ha twI shwa ri/ lAM dA+e Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pyaM rA ga ra ti/

tAM badzra ra ti/ k+ShIM hi rA dz+wa ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hri ha hUM pad+ma pA da ma/ dziM ku ru pA Na/ hUM la s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hrIHgIrtai ra ho haM/ a nir+t+yai rA ga ya mi/ mai d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hIM nis+sa raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA

ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe a be sha/ baM rI paM su gi ri/ hoHgan d+he tsit+ta/ hUM ya mAn ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-i ta phaT/ hUM pad mAn ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyAn ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA

badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ A+oM ma hA rat+na d+har ma hA krod+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ A+oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ a

a a badzri b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ A+oM mu ne kriM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne truM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne praM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ A+oM mu ne ye swA hA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ka ru NI ka/ dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM

hoH/ oM aM hUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ A+oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor

ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya hoH zhes brjod pas/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab
par grags so// rab tu grags so// kun tu grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang/ bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi

de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las phyung ngo// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA a dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa

b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA pra t+ya da be k+Sha NA badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM ma hA kri t+ya a nuSh+ThA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA

wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU

dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsang// sgra dang ming tshig kun las
'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar byung// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya

mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen drwa ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don phyung ba'ang// thams cad pad+ma'i ngang du gyur// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste// theg pa mtho
dman thams cad dang// log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs// gsung pa nyid na brjod du
med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis so sor go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman
bsam mi khyab// de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang// de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung// ljags
kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang// thugs rje'i gsung gi byin rlabs kyi// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gi 'gro don rnams// de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos
kyang// dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dkyil 'khor byin bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pas/ nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sngags phyi mo sor bzhag/ A+oM hUM badzra satwa hUM badzra pra b+hA ni hUM/ mUM badzra gan+d+he mU?M/ aM tsakra maN+Da la A+oM/ lAM badzra gan+d+he b+hA

ShA lAM/ swA rat+na pra b+hA Ni swA/ mAM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha mAM/ AM badzra pra b+hA na AM/ paM badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na paM/ hAM khang+ga tik+Sh+Na pra b+hA na hAM/ tAM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na tAM/ k+ShIM rat+na pra b+hA na k+ShIM/ hUM badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA shA hUM/ traM khang+ga pra b+hA na

traM/ traM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na traM/ hrIHpad+ma pra b+hA na hrIH hrIHgan+d+ha badzra g+hA ShA pra b+hA na hrI/ hA badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na hA/ a badzra gan+b+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na a/ mai ka la pra b+hA na mi/ hUM badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA ShA hUM/ th+l+hiM pra b+hA na maN+Da la th+l+hiM/

swAM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA haM pra b+hA na swAM/ hUM rat+na swAM sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+hA na swAM/ hrIHbadzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na hrIH/ mAM ut+pal nI la pra b+hA na muM/ a badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na a/ phaT badzra a ma mung+ga ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ A+oM badzra gan+d+ha

b+hA ShA pra b+hA na A+oM A+oM/ phaT ma hA badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ hUM ma hA rat+na badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+ha na hUM hUM/ phaT hrIHpad+ma mung+ga ra pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ oM ma hA badzra pad+ma badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH a karma mung+ga ra badzra pra b+hA na phaT
phaT/ a karma badzra gan+d+ha b+hA ShA pra b+hA na hUM a a a/ zhes brjod pas/ phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar 'gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bde bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bstan
pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas thams cad du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don
chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// a/ thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer thig le kun// thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim// gsal 'bar sprin gyi
bdag por gyur// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge'i spyod yul yongs ma yin// zab cing rgya cher
rab sbyangs pa'i// gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang// rgyal ba sngon byung thams cad
kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na'ang med// dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad
thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings nyid rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang// rgya
dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag
gshegs dang log rtog dang// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyis// de la gsad cing gzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod
pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras med pa dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par 'gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor
lor bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor bsam yas kun// rgyal ba kun gyi dbyings
su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// hoH/ chos rnams thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa/ shin tu
gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ched du brjod pa 'di

brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po'i phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi

ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// A+oM dang mUM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi

sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mUM bsgrengs rtse mor dril
gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi spas nas thugs kar bkan// A+oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil
zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lam gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi
sbas nas thugs kar bkan// swAM rtser 'bar ba'i rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ mAM gyi rtse mor dril gsil
'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i dmangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM gyi rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul
gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pyAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar

bkan// hAM gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos ma brten// 'bru+u bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga
las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal klu zhing la sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin
chen phraing ba dang// pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma// mar me byug pa la sogs pas// las la 'khril zhing chos la brten// dbu rnams 'byo nas 'dud pa'i

tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya chen po ni// mi mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnon pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram las kyi

gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH/ sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang// 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg par dang ni pi wang

dang// go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i skyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna

tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i
dang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du// bcu
gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang// phyin ci log rnams bsam
yas dang// zhi khro'i tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun byas kun tu snang// dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig
ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang 'phro ba'ang de bzhin nyid// mdor na bsgul bskyod thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa'ang

min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// mthe bong mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// mthe bong gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bong chags pa che// mthe'u chung mthe bong legs pa mchog/ hUM ho mdzub mo gnyis

sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don// srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/ bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad// traM te hUM ha/ mdzub mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog/ gung mo steng 'og 'jam

dpal mchog/ srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ mthe'u chung steng 'og smra gsung yin/ hrIHb+haM traM hoM/ mdzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog/ gung mo rgya gram srung bar byos// srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin
mchog/ mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad/ ha truM a b+haM/ phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis
phyag rgya ldan pa yi// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam pa gnyis// dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge so sor gsal ba yis// gar du
bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// dzaHdang hoHla sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rje 'ching// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ mtshon cha'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsum thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// rdo rje

sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro// e ma ho rdo rje che mchog gis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma

g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// hUM rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed

rdo rje 'chang zhes bya// hUM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen 'dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da'

dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// hUM/ phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rdo rje rdo rje drag chen

dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad
rdo rje nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rdo rje'i gsung phyung ba'o// hUM badzra dz+wa lA na lArka hUM phaT/ A+oM lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni// sku gsum thugs kyi ye shes

te// sku+u gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin/ snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas// ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro// e ma ho 'khor lo che mchog gis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol

ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// A+oM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// 'khor lo 'chang
rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya// A+oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa
dang// dbang chen 'dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' bka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag

rgya zhes ni grags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// A+oM 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshigs dang bcom la

sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las 'khor lo gsung phyung ba// A+oM tsakra

dz+wa lA na lArka A+oM phaT/ AM/ lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// pad+ma sems dpar rang gnas pas// pad+ma dgra s+t+wa

gsor zhing spro// e ma ho pad+ma che mchog gis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas

gdab// AM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// pad+ma 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya// AM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni
btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen 'dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag

nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni grags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// AM pad+ma dgra s+t+wa drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing
bshigs dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad pad+ma nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de la pad+ma'i gsung phyung

ba/ AM pad+ma dz+wa lA na kA na AM phaT/ swAM/ lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// yon tan chen po dpa' bo yin// rin chen sems dpa' rang gnas
pas// ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing spro// e ma ho rin chen che mchog gis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// ces kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas
na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab// swAM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes
bya// swAM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang// dbang chen 'dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji
bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni grags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// swAM/ rin chen dbyug pa drag chen
dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshigs dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams

cad rin chen nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rin chen gsung phyung ba// swAM rat+na dz+wa lA na lArka swAM phaT/ hUM lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku
gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// las kyi sems dpar rang gnas pas// ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro// e ma ho lam gyi che mchog gis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba

ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pa// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// hAM rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// ral gri 'chang rgyal thams

cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya// hAM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang/ dbang chen 'dus la
brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni grags pa

yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// hAM ral gri ral gri drag chen dang// rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshigs dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba

rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad ral gri nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yin// de las phrin las gsung phyung ba// hAM karmA dz+wa lA na lArka hUM phaT/ mUM lus ngag
yid gsum dril bu ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// kun tu bzang mo bsnyems ma yin// kun tu bzang mor rang gnas pas// ye shes dril bur gsil zhing spro// e ma ho
sangs rgyas yum chen gyis// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen yum du gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas

gdab// mUM kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las// rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su brtan pa'i phyir// mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya// mUM jiltar rgyal po gnas bshams te// rgyal po'i gtsigs
chen byed pa ltar// bde chen yum du gnas pa dang// dbang chen 'dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi

gnas// bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni grags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// mU?M dril bu dril bu drag chen dang// yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang// 'dul ba thabs kyi
rgyal mo yis// phye zhing bshigs dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad dril bu nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kyang bkang ba

yin// de la chos sku'i gsung phyung ba/ mUM g+haN+De dz+wa lA na lArka mUM/ zhes brjod pas/ phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ thabs dang shes rab 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nas yid dang chos mthun par// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje

dang// shes rab dril bu chos la brten// hUM dang mUM gyi snying por 'bar// de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar// A+oM dang mUM gyi mchog tu brtag/ shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs// 'bar ba'i phung po chos la brten// de
las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni// 'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste// de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor// de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor// de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa// de las pad+ma phyag bsnams

'dzin// de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod// de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor// de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis// A+oM dang mUM gyis mtshon bzhin du// rdo rje rtse bcu thabs
chen po// thugs kar bstan pa'i tshul du 'bar// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin// mUM las phyag rgya chen po ni// dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum// mchod nas

chos la brtan par 'dzin// thams cad kun tu phyag rgya yis// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang// sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba byang chub pa'i// sangs
rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs// de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa// de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// A+oM hUM swAM gyi rtser 'dzin pa// nyid las yang dag bskyed tshul
du// shes rab yum du shin tu brtag/ rdo rje 'bar bas rab brtan pas// thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro don phrin las 'char// yid dang chos su rab

brtags pa'i// rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las// rdo rje drag po lan gsum gsor// gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur// bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du// rdo
rje lan gsum gsor ba yis// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i// thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa ni// yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur// mi
bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas// oM dang haM ni ma thal bar// lan gsum gsor chen thugs kar bsgom// lhan ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// A+oM dang haM ni thal tsam du// kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas
te// lan gsum gsor bar gang brtson pa// tshe dang skal ba 'phel bar 'gyur// longs spyod ci 'dod 'phel bar 'gyur// de la zla kham mdog dmar gsham bsham// dpral/ 'brel yang bdug bar mnyam pa
lan gsum gyis// khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas// yid la dmigs pa'i las thams cad// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// de las gtum pa'i mdog gnag ste// drag tu phaT ces brjod pas

ni// kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing// bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa// khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu// rgyang ni ring du 'phang na ni// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges// A+oM badzra da ha dz+wa la ha na

badzra pa tsa dz+wa la badzra hUM phaT// chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa// sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te// shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag/ skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo// lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das// chos

sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las// rab tu gsor la gang brtson pas// mUM la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar// mUM gyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// kun tu dbang bsgyur yid 'ong ba'i// 'dod pa

bzhin du mthun pas 'grub// oM badzra g+haN+De pa b+ha Sha yin nam/ sha d+harma d+ha ra/ hUM hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na

nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms
par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga

spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang// bdud rtsi lnga nyid rab bsnyams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang

gru bzhi pa// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan// nyung 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri// bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang// rgyan

phreng btung dang bro bas bskor// glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi// sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jo ma sems ma yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan

par// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag la'ang de

bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin po

che yi gzhi// mdzes par bri zhing spras pa dang// kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang// rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon shing tshal// glu

dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang// rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mor rdul snyed
kyi// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig char du// chos kyi
dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings na dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// mnyes nas
grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brten pa
yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang// khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs
pa// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de
nas slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod
na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs na// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i

dbang// rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung// yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/ phyag rgya chen po'i pang du ni// dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du yang// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du

bya// yang na sa gzhi rab bsnyams la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang// gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong

grogs// thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang// nyi shu 'am ni rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan
gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa

lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis br-i bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dbye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge 'am gdan nam snying po'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin rlabs ya mtshan
rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs las phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pas// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus
dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs bcu
kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyis// rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma

yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du 'byung// shes rab dbyings nyid
de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba sngon byung skyob pa dang// byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed

nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po'i mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing// yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// zhag ni sum

cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid
snang ba// bsam gyi mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang// 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i
tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang// rgya chen gsung las don byung ba'ang// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang
dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang// log par rtog btags rnam dag cing// ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel
pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam

pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// rdo rje bkod pa
gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis// dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di
gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus man+d+hala'i// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas ni// rig pa rang dbang
gyur pa yis// mnyam la mnyam par mi dmigs pa'i// chos sku phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa
yis// rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin sku yi gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang// yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin
chen sna tshogs la sogs dang// 'byung ba bzhi las gyur pa kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byams kyi// don du mi 'gyur
yongs ma gsungs// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la thim byas te// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas

te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'phro 'du yis// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya ste// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms nas// mA ma kI
ni rgyun chags la// yang dag chos sku'i phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dri med chos sku'i phyag rgyar

gsal// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// ting 'dzin rim par gsal bsgoms te// bsgrub bya ma lus lhun rdzogs phyir// sra brtan can gyi rang bzhin la// chos sku'i phyag rgya gzugs su sbyor// dbyings dang ye

shes gnyis med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog rnams dang/ byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu
rdzogs// 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a ho// chos sku'i phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du
'grub// drag po gtum po gdul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag por bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi ling ga gnan par bya// gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur// mi mthun
phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya grI war bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal
bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding// ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du 'du// mthu chen rnams kyang phyi bzhin 'brang// bran bzhin las rnams byed par
'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdog 'drar phyag rgyar bsgom// gang 'phel chos sku'i gdan du gzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs

na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// gtum po ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher
ba'i chos skur bsgom/ gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid
du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a ho// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen

pos ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgom the tshom med par 'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med par nges

'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi lha bsgrub na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung// bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris nas// chos kyi don rnams

rtogs par 'gyur// rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas// skye rga na 'chi med rtogs 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal
med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang// tshad dpag med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi 'chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen

pos/ rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mar

bskyil// rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// trAM gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// trAM/
gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog gang// gsang ba kun la'ang mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa la// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i

ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// A+oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bzung// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal

ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hAM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim// oM/ khyod ni rdo rje las yin
gyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya mang po'i 'du 'phro kun// khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i theg le'i ngo bo nyid// hrIHyi phyag rgya'i

tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim// A+oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// mthun par gsang bsgrag gzhan du min// bskyod

chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM A+oM swA+oM aM hA rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// A+oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs brtsam pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing

brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang// go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang// gdugs dang bum pa bza' dang btung// snying po lnga yi dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan
song thams cad med pa dang// gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur// lus dang phung po bcas pa
yis// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yis// bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs pas// de nyid byin gyis brlab par 'gyur// pho nya 'phro 'du mang po
rnams// sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing// de yi dgos pa byed pa dang// sgro dang skur pa la sogs pa// de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por
'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po// mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs

nas// lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub nye bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzud par gnas// mchog
tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen por lhun bsgoms shing// byang chub sems su brtan par gzung// bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling
ga gzhag/ a/ shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab// dug gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya
'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing// nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsal ba'i sman// thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi

khyab// mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang yang// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang// chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyid

gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pa 'bru gsum ste// yang na yi ge 'bru lnga'o// lnga pa'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la// ye
shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen zlum zla ba gang ba yis// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi// gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang// pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po
che// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing nyung 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom// shes rab spyan la 'dris pa dang// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod

par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom// shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam yas spro// spros kyang hUM las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang
phyogs bcur bri ba med// spros med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge mUM du thim par 'gyur// thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing 'dris pa dang// phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar

bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgom// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis sam// zhal gsum phyag

drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhan yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// rin chen pad+ma dril
bu 'bar// phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang// nyi zla gza' skar gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi
ba phyogs gcig shes bya sbyang// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing// bde gshegs 'khor yang dga' bar byed// de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang// sdug bsngal thams cad
yongs mi 'byung// lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yongs mi skye// bde gshegs 'byung dang bskal mi 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo
rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul drwa

ba'i rgyal po bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam
bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin A+oM du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs

sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mUM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la// hUM du

shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub pa dang ni

sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// sgrub pa'i nyi zla snying po de// 'gro drug dus

gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen po mnyes sbyar zhing// dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i lce yis blang// mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran

rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// hUM du byung bas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim pas phyag rgya 'bar// sku gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal

ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang// rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag
rtogs shing// mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa

yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yi// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par

bsgom// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs
te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen po// pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams
kyi// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing// spyod pas ci la'ang thogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med

pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus
chos skur 'dus// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po/ rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa bas mngon rdzogs

pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo
ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal go thogs med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan

pas// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid sbyor ba'i gzungs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha

dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i// sa yi khyad
par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbyings dngas pa'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par ni bsgom
par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhon du ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor
bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// ces ched du brjod pas// rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur te// sku gsung thugs dang yon
tan phrin las rdo rje las// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// a ho/ ma mthong rmongs las chags pa yis// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab

snang ba'i// zab chen spyod yul log par rtog btag ming tsam du// A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid// phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

ni// nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsal// mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/
tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus nas// dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye
nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par
rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang// rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgras btags ming tshogs la// brtan pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong
nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// sku gsung thugs rigs kun mnga' ba'i// bde gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po
shes rab de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yum dus rig pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta
