zhing// snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba// rol mo'i
dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhir mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma
lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang bsgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma
lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
sgrol ba yi// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun dam lhun gy-is grub// 'di ni sangs
rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma
lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig
rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bsnyen nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par

'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po

mchog/ thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung// snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bsten// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la
'phyar bas gal te sbyin// dus min par ni srog zad nas/ bsreg dang sbrebs la yun rings gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de
kho na nyid nges pa las/ shin tu gsang ba'i man ngag gi le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos// dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las/ gsang ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di
ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho 'o lus thams cad bde ba che// dus gsum bde gshegs shes rab mchog/ gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi

'byed cing// ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin// 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum cig char rdzogs// dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam rtog mi

bskyed ye shes brjod du med// bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa// khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing// snga rabs phyi rabs dag dang dbyer med pa'i// mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de
dag las// bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa// dad ldan 'ga' yi 'tshams par ci theg gi// bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pas// gzhan du 'tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems

can gyis// bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag cag gzhan du 'tshol bas sangs mi rgya// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing// bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te// shes rgyud ci yin

gang gis ngo shes shing// bya byed las 'phags gyi nar 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la spyod pa byang chub thob// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yongs med pas// bran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de// ma
snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rig pas dpyad cing nan tan dang// mchod cing bsten pas byang chub thob mthong ste// nam mkha' bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur// nam mkha' med
par gang gis shes pa ni// sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do// rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam nas rnam dag cing// mi rtog sa ler gnas la rtog pa
mdzad// bsnyad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin// bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter// ma bkag pa las 'byung zhing 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems shes gdags su
med// ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing// thob rgyu med pas ye nas bde gshegs yin// zhes brjod pas/ chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa

nyid kyis mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// e ma ho ma bsgrub
grub chen po// grub pa chen po ye shes che// blang dor med pa'i sa chen po// mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// rtogs pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad la yang me long bzhin// bltas kyang
gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo// gang na gsang chen 'di yod par// me ma mur gyi dong 'bog la// spu gri'i so ni gtams pa la// 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos// khongs na gnas pa'i yang khongs su// lcags

kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo// dbyings nyid la ni dbyings spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod// de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las/ gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma
lus pa 'dus pa ston te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang// 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin pas// nges pa med par yang dag

gsung// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang// ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor

zhing// sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs la thabs mi rnam par sbyor// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje

mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang// yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// de

ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis bo d+hi rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med// gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing spro// byin
rlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam dag lam min te// rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin// thams cad rang rig byang chub
sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing// 'bru lngar bsdus pa'i thabs chen te// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// bya ba med las
byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang rin chen rgyal// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// rang sems gzod nas bstan pa yin// zhes ched
du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag

po// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas btags pa la mngon par zhen pas/ yang dag pa'i lam dang
bral ba dag/ gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas// rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i

dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang/ 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang na yang ci ma rungs snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang/ pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug
bsngal drag po de dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal brgyad/ shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing

bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo// de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang/ yi dwags ltogs pa dang/ skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang/

gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang/ yong med par yang 'gyur zhing/ shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang/ lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tshams par gyur par bskal pa chen po drug tu

skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang/ sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dwags srin po chen po rab tu gdugs pa gtum po/ lus gcig la mgo bo brgya

pa dang/ mgo sna tshogs pa dang/ lus brgya la mgo bo gcig pa dang/ lus sna tshogs pa dang/ yan lag mang po dang/ yan lag sna tshogs pa dang/ gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa/ 'khor rab tu mang

po dang/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa/ gzugs dang/ nga ro dang/ dri dang/ kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa dang/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang/ grang

ba dang/ tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus/ klu'i ris dang/ lha ma yin gyi ris dang/ lha'i
ris dang/ tshangs pa'i ris dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che man chad dbang du bsdus so// de sngon bsten pa'i stobs kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas/ thugs rjes 'dul bar

gyur te/ thams cad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so// e ma ho 'gro ba yongs ni bde gshegs lam yin te// sdug bsngal sel mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang// yon tan rmad byung che ba'i rang bzhin
'di// sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon po yin// rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms// kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje'i sku mchog ste// rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas// thugs
rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mchog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing// byang chub sems kyi lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun
la bde ba gcig pu pa/ a ho/ dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzod/ byin rlabs kun gyi bde ba nyid la snang// zhes brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la/ kun las
rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas/ mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i sgyu 'phrul drwa bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu srid pa gsum gyi bdag po

'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas/ khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du byung ste/ hi hi

zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis rin chen pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas/ gnyis su med par 'khril ba'i dgyes pas thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM/ bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la man+d+ha la/ phaT phaT

phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/ phyogs bcu rdul phra mo snyed thon par

gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun
tu shig shig go/ gtor gtor// rab tu gtor gtor// kun tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba gzi brjid che ba dang

mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal/ rab tu rgyal/ kun tu rgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid/ 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngams pa'i skyi bung zhes

byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po// khrag 'thung sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te// dur khrod

chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng 'bar pa chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyod shug gi

gdan la/ brkyangs bskums su bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang/ la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te/ shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po

rin po cher gyur te/ lho phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te/ nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te/ byang phyogs su bzhugs

so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang/ rngams pa'i nga ro dang/ 'bar ba'i klong na/ dbu gsum phyag drug/ zhabs bzhi/ dri za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ gshin rje la sogs pa
khyo shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so// srin mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// rigs lnga'i he ru ka gcig tu bstims te bsdus nas gcig
gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas/ dregs pa chen po la sogs pa/ gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs bstan nas/ mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros brlang pa'i gtum

tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtums sems kyis rngams nas khros so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ thams cad kyi bdag nyid des

dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas/ rngams pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyi shin tu phros nas/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod nas/ dbang phyug chen po la
sogs pa/ gdug pa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang/ dbang po kun phyung/ nang khrol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas sha kun zos/ khrag kun 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas hUM hUM hUM

b+h+yo/ e A ra li/ dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa nyung 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dregs pa

chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang/ tshangs ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu mo dang/ dmar mo

dang/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ srin mo dang/ za ba mo dang/ dga' ba mo dang/ ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang/ gcig pur spyod mo dang/ yid 'phrog mo dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo

dang/ gsod byed mo dang/ me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chen mo dang/ chu lha mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang/ bum rna sngo nag chen mo dang/ gsus 'dzin ser

nag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang yang bran g.yog dang yang g.yog/ 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis/ yang
rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen po snang bar byas nas// de dag kun kyang dgyes pa chen po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs nas/ sku dang/ gsung

dang/ thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// oM AHhUM badzra pra we sha a la la ho// zhes brjod pas/ 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur
nas// dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ dga' ba mo dang/
gsad byed mo dang/ nag mo chen mo dang/ dmar ser chen mo dang/ sngo nag chen mo dang/ ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la/ tshangs

ma dang/ 'khrug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ 'jug sred mo dang/ gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la/ bdud rtsi mo dang/ zhi ba mo dang/ be con mo dang/ zab mo

dang/ srin mo rnams 'khril to/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i pad+ma'i sku la khrag gis myos ma dang/ gcig pur spyod ma dang/ yid 'phrog ma dang/ grub mo dang/ rlung mo rnams 'khril to/ bcom

ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las kyi sku la/ me mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byed mo dang/ sna chen mo dang/ chu lha mo rnams 'khril to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i dkyil
'khor de dag gis/ hUM hUM brjod pas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas/ shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha zhes brjod pas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ dkar mo tshogs dang/ rkun

mo'i tshogs dang/ rmongs mo'i tshogs dang/ thal byed mo'i tshogs dang/ spos mo'i tshogs dang/ gtum mo'i tshogs dang/ sme sha can gyi tshogs dang/ ma tshogs ma yi tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang/ ngo
mtshar dang bcas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang// rang gi lag cha dang chas nas 'khod do/ de nas

shin tu dgyes nas/ he zhes brjod pas/ seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang// byi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs

dang/ kang ka'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ dur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang/ 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang/ ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas 'bar ba

chen po'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas/ phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par khyab nas/ phaTaces brjod pas/ rdo rje sring 'gro ma'i

tshogs dang/ rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang/ rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang/ ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas 'bar ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi sgor shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'isprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas/ thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi

gnas ga la bar yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun/ thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs nas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo// oM badzra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+ha aM aM aM/ zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen

po de dag gi bsnams nas bton te/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor bcug pa las bsnams nas u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam kun 'thung ste/ dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de

dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya phyag stong brgyad brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na gnas par bzhugs par mthong ngo// de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun

tu dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo// de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pa rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su
mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma byas na/ mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing// snying yang 'gas shing gtub gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang// dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par
shog ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas// dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang// ma dang sring mo bu mo
rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag so sor 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa
yang// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung// ma lus rdzogs par bdag
cag bsgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying// gas gtub dum bur rul bar mchi'o// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i
tshogs dang/ ma dang sring mo dang/ bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen
po'i 'bangs su mchi// dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi

dbang bskur te/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas

bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag/ dam tshig gis 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen po'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag

gis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngams pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo// A+oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra

ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM

phaT/ A+oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ A+oM sarba ta thA' ga ta ma hA krod+hI shwa rI dz+wa la ni sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ A+oM ma hA badzra da ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI dz+wa li ne phaT/ A+oM ma hA sUr+ya

rat+na ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI bi da ma hUM phaT/ A+oM hrIH shru ta sa ma ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI khA hi hUM phaT/ A+oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI bi shwa hUM phaT/ badzra gau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pra mo he ha/ badzra be tA lI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da

lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma rI ha/ badzra sma sha nI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sr-i ga la mu khI he/ badzra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra kri ta mu khI he/ badzra kaM ka mu khI he/ badzra kA ka

mu khI he/ badzra u lU mu khI he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza tang dza/ badzra a mu khe hUM/ badzra lo ka baM/ badzra b+hasmi pa la ya ba tu ho/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu

ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi/ A na ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHraM/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje'i khros pa'i rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// A+oM

badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wam/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/ a li u li/ tA li ta pA li/ daM Sh+tA go na rau dri kha raM yo gi ni khA hi ho/ hUM ha he phaT/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab tu

tshig/ kun tu tshig/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bar ro// thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs gang rab tu gang kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/

khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// dbang po yum dus rig pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod
chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms nas// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/// bla med chen pos de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse

gcig dang// rtse lnga rtsedagu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re re

'byung// rdo rje pad+ma der sbyor na// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor
bsgul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo/ lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams
cad dang// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan/ yan lag thams cad bsgul bsigs na// ba spu'i bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu'i

khams mang rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang// khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje brag
steng dang/ me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thong

gshol nr-i sbar dang// rdo rje gtun chen dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug

pa dang// gshin rje zhing chen rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sprul dang ti ra'i dbyug pa dang// khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams sked par gtubs// byang gi
bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin po che yi dbyug to dang// nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis
gdul bar gyur// gal te de yis ma dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs// i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po'i sde kun rab tu

'dul// shar lho'i mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams// me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdu// lho nub mtshams kyi
bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/ rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdu// nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung
gi ba dan nr-i mgo gdengs// shin tu drag po glang po'i brjid// tshig bsrung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdu// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba// phyag rgya ri rab chen po
ste// phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// 'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus
bsreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lo dang// mda'

gzhu tho chen gri chen dang// rdo rje mdung chen dgra s+t+war bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri'i so dang ni// mda' dang mdung dang ti ra dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni// ti ra

dbyug tho chen po dang// 'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes dkrugs shing zhal du gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje chen po rab tu
'bar// nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rab tu

gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// pad+ma chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje rgya

gram rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// khro mo rnams ni khro dang mthun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten

'das mdo che las bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ de dag gi dkyil 'khor
bstan pa'i phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis

kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs// khyu mchog ma he gzigs dang stag/ gtum pa'i dom gyi sbar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung// smug nag sngo
nag ser nag dang// dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs mnabs// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sprul dang thod rlon nyi zla
bcas// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang// ral gri dgra s+t+wa gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang

yul gyi phyag rgya dang// sgo bzhir phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing// slas dang byi mo'i tshogs kyis gtso// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes
brjod pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen pos// bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung ngo// a ho// skal par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lor brjod dka' ba'i// ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyi
rdul snyed bsam yas pa// ro tshogs khrag la rngam pa'i dpung gnyen kun bkye nas// zhen pa'igatum mo shin tu bsal dka' ba'i// mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis// snyigs mar
bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun ngam zil gyis gnon// rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab// de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun 'byung kun tu bsal// ho/ chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod
mi lang// dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang// 'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid bar// drag po bdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab// bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi
lang// bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun tu rtog/ de rnams zil gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par// rkyen du bcas nas sbun bus 'bras bu sminapa rab smin ltar// dgyes pa chen po
bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs// dpag med bsam yas lhun gyis grub pas rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal// ho// khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing// zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid
dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yongs ma yin// de nyid gnyis su med pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab// rigs lnga'i khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i// rnam

dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings nyid yin te gsang ba yi// snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal// ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ khro
bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos nyid kyi byin rlabs dang/ yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// A+oM sangs rgyas

rnal 'byor chen po ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snying po mchog nyid de// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid// 'di yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing// srid pa
'jig rten thams cad kun// sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs

pa'i// snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis// nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum ni// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing// phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo

mtshar tsham rngams kyis// chos bzhin rnam dag che ba'i lha// ye shes sku ste khyad par che// chags pa'i tshogs kyi mtshan ma ni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku// gtum rngams gdug pa yis mtshan pas// zhe sdang

chen po nyid kyi sku// gdul bya'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing// chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na// gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku// snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba// sku gsung thugs las 'phros pa dang// rgyal ba

nga yis mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku// gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis// thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid skur rdzogs// stong gsum
stong gi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul du dbye ba la sogs pa'i// bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan// de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi

dbyings// chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po thig le bsam yas nyid// 'jigs byed dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag/ sgyu mas mtshan pa'i drwa ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil
'khor sngags// gcig la gsum du mchog tu bsngags// yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do// bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che// ming dang
gzugs dang dbur gyur pa// phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags// brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku// ci yang med las cir yang snang// bskal bzang mchog gi sgyu 'phrul ba// drwa ba'i dkyil
'khor rab tu rdzogs// brtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan// spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// ji bzhin chos nyid yul la sbyor// rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la

gzigs// pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid sku gsung// mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad pas// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba yi// me yi tshogs kyis gzhan dbang zlog/ bdud rtsi'i zhing du

sbyor bas na// bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa// ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs po che// mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams

pa ni// shes rab tshogs las sprul pa dang// thugs rje drwa ba'i byin rlabs kyi// 'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa// dbyings nyid bde la bskyod pa ste// khros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// rta yi gar stabs rdzu
'phrul gyis// gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mtha' klas par// rtsed mor mchog gi phyag rgya ni// brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul
te// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rang dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa// zil gnon khros pa'i

phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod// gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul ba// drwa ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni// khros pa'i dam tshig snying rje yis// mnyam pa'i thig
ler bkod pa ni// gshin rje'i gshed po gdug pa'i rgyal// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden// 'gro la mgon du gyur pas na// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i// chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i

sbrul// dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i// g.yang gzhi glang gi pags chen bgos// 'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa// mi g.yo mgon

zhes mchog tu bsgrags// nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa// nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste// kun tu bzang pa'i spyod yul la// sngag kyang 'dug/ sngags kyi snying po de nyid la// hUM hUM hUM gis sdud za 'thung// rdo

rje thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// hUM mdzad ces ni rnam par bsgrags// mi 'byed gti mug chen po ni// nyon mongs rgya mtsho brngub pa'i phyir// b+han+d+ha rlon chen 'thung bar snang// 'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen
po// bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa// rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed// 'jigs byed thabs kyi dam tshig gis// bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug

bcas// rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i ye shes ni// zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen po// rdo rje'i sku yi byin rlabs kyis// thig le mi g.yo bde ba las// rang

bzhin rol pa chen pos ni// rdo rje phra men pho nya'i tshogs// khams gsum gdul bar yang dag mdzad// ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid// ha ni thig le zhi khro snyoms// ha ni thig le dbang chen yin// ha ni thig le drag po
nyid// ha ni thig le rol pa nyid// ha ni thig le'i phrin las nyid// ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul// ha ni thig le las kun rdzogs// he ni thig le ye shes thugs// he ni thig les gsung snyan pa// he

ni thig les tsham rngams lce// he ni thig le rol pa nyid// he ni thig le dbang rgya yin// he ni thig le drag shul pa// he ni thig le thugs chen rdzogs// he ni thig les dkyil 'khor pa// 'jigs byed mchog gi
sgyu 'phrul te// drwa bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/ hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// hUM ni ye shes thugs sku nyid// hUM ni ye shes thugs sku gsung// hUM ni ye shes yid bzhin las// hUM ni thig le ye shes

so// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni gsung gi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i sku yi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i thugs
kyi thugs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho// dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho// gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho// pho nya 'du 'phros
dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho// byin gyis rlabs kyis dgyes pa ho// chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho// ye shes rol pas dgyes pa ho// ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho// gnod pa spud las dgyes

pa ho// chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho// des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/ chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya
pa las/ dgyes pa chen pos byin rlabs dang// yon tan gyi tshogs ston pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po
dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo

bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso/ btsun mo'i 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de
dbus su// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi
gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs
nas// bdag nyid drag por bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed pad+ma rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang
bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por bcos
tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs pa'i phrin las rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang
bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs
nas// bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan

dang cha lugs la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par// tsham rngams chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang// shes rab thabs su shes pa dang// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa
dang// bda' la sogs pa'i yon tan dang// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyis// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du sgrubs// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las// 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ ched du
brjod pa 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yul gyi dkyil 'khor
bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang// lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad// rang gi rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis brlab// ljon
pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang// me reg mtshon gyis bri bzhin du// goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab// 'jigs byed sku gsung thugs 'khor bzlas// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu
dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo ji snyed 'khor
du bya// bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis bzlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te// 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing// thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul du// de yi
gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim// dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing// ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin// pho nya 'phro 'du mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par

gyur// yang na sa gzhi rab bsnyams la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rdo rje dud chen dmar rtsis dgang// dung dang srog shing gsar rnying

dang// zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang// ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang// nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor las// gdeng dang

bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba med par rab tu bsgrub// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor mthun pa nyid du sbyar// zhag ni sum cu
phrag drug gam// drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig
las// nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa

chen pos// sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do// sngags sor bzhag/ a ki du na dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro ti ri he sha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka badzra ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sarba

duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka rat+na ma hA

krod+hI shwa rI b+hi d+ha mu kha hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka pad+ma ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI khA hi hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba a

mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hI shA rI bi shwa rU bi hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka ma hA sa ma ya ha he hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/

oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pany+tsa shrI he ru ka man+dA dz+wa la ma hA maN+Dal kA ya wA ka tsit+ta oM oM oM oM/ hUM hUM hUM/ swAM swAM swAM/ AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM/ badzra ma hA kA pA la khaD+ga daN+Da na dz+wa la sid+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka a ma du mi sid+d+ho d+d+ha be/

saM ha ra Na hUM hUM hUM/ ma hA yo ga ad+d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru lu a la la ho// hosems nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka/ tshom bu'i dkyil

'khor bsam yas kyis// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig/ oM badzra krod+ha sa ma ya hoH/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM AM hUM/ su ra ti s+t+waM/ ka ma la ma hA su kha mA li ma nu+u sa ma na dz+wa la

ni d+hA na/ bi dun yin nam/ a ba yo ga khA hi/ a la la ho// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i/ sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so bzhi
pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya

ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma sa ma yo gi nI dzaH/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jigs rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po

kun tu pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa las/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du// srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to// de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing// A+oM a b+hi tsa ra pa shi na zhes brjod pas/ lha'i tshogs dang/ klu tshogs dang/ gnod sbyin chen

po dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs la 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang ha ha a b+hi tsa ra tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas/ la la ni lus shin tu brjes te ri
rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// la la ni mngon sum can mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yangs 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med

cing rdo rje'i theg pa smod pa zhig/ yongs kyi 'jig rten gnas pa mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ A+oM pad+ma sa ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu ru lu huM/ zhes brjod pas/ kun tu sku chags pa'i
bdag nyid dang/ kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang/ kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang/ kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang/ kun tu phrin las chags pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang/ lho dang/

nub dang/ byang dang/ dbus chen por khrag gi rba klong/ keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid du snang bar gyur to// de yang kun tu sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/

kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang/ zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang/ rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng

du gnas par gyur to// de las mchog gi snying po chen po/ ma hA rat+na ti la ka'i dbur gyur pa las/ rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na/ 'jigs byed chen po'i thig le'i snying po nyid dbu gsum

phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de nyid du sku dang dbu dang phyag dang zhabs dang 'khor stong khams kyi rdul rnyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas khebs par mthong

ngo// de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos/ skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po thong thong de lta bu byed dam zhes pa las/ de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis/ oM a b+hi tsa ra pa shi na/ hUM

hUM hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje'i theg pa smod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag
nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te/ rab tu brgyal nas/ ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par/ keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to// de nas

'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+ThA badzra/ AM AM zhes pas/ gdug pa'i blo dang bral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brjes te/ lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to// de nas

dgyes pa chen po'i dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang

yon tan dang phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di/ nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las phyung ngo// A+oM khrag mang rba klong 'khyil pa yi// keng

rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum// 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang// gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid pa'i// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis

mdzes// thod sprul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// ta na mang po lha chen brtan// dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang// phyag dang zhabs ni brgyan pa yi// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// 'jigs byed chen po khrag

'thung ba'i// rdo rje snying po thig le'i thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni// dgyes pa chen pa'i tshul 'chang ba// phyogs bzhir grwa dang bcas par ni// sprul pa'i
rnal 'byor phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar ba'i phyag bsnams chen po ni// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang/ pad+ma'i gzhal med rnge'u chung brdung// zhing gi

zhags pas 'ching ba dang// kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang// sgo bzhir phyag rgya rab mdzes par// bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po
rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so
lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid
kyis// sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par// 'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin// shin tu phra las sbyangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes// tshom

bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni// rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// A+oM dang mUM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la rdo rje phra mos gang// phra rab sa
bsdus mthil du gzung// yum gyi tshogs su gsal bar brtag/ gang gi yul yang dbang du 'gyur// mi mthun gzugs su brtag pa ni// drwa ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhu// lugs ma bzhin du hUM du brtag/ de
las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung// gsang gnas ngag lam haM du bya// rlung lha'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ drag po lce yi sbyor ba yi// gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang// bdag nyid hUM gi tshogs bcas
pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ger bsgom// bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs// mUM du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// brtan pa a yi 'phro du yis// nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu bsgom// brtan 'gyur a yi

snying po bzlas// nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang// rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o// de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba// rab tu blo yi theg gnas

ni// gzhan du nam yang mi bstan cing// zhon dang spyan dang 'tshong la sogs// longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang// rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no// rmongs la 'phyar dang brtson 'grus zhan// nam yang sbyin par ma

gsungs te// smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du// sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la// srog chad kha yi gtam bzhin du// nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// byed pa rdo rje k+Sha yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi'i gleng gzhi'i
lam// kun tu bzang po thabs tshul pa// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba// kun tu bzang mo shes rab tshul// kA la ye shes thugs

kyi thugs// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de yi chos khams a la bstim// chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtag/ sa chu me rlung 'byung ba
rnams// de yi dbyings nas 'byung ba ni// 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag/ mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par// gom pas 'dod par 'dod pa dang// chu la sa bzhin 'gro ba dang// bsreg bya 'bar ba'i

dbus gnas dang// tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang// phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis

brlab// 'di man gyi laM 'di rnams la las zhes dang tshon zer ba rnams la tshogs zhes pa'ang 'dug/ k+Sha laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid
yid lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid gsal bar mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// oM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du
ni// de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// swAM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs
su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad par lam mchog go/ chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// A+oM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i
dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gsung lam mchog grub pa'o// chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// hUM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu

'phrul drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni phrin las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni// rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya

bsgom// de nyid ha dang k+Sha nyid de// mUM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// de nyid hUM laM phyag bsnams pa// rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam

par brgyan// yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs// dbus gnas hUM gi lo tsa na// lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing// hUM hUM hUM gis lan gsum du// rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab// mUM gyi tshogs kyis lha
rnams bskul// 'bru lnga brgya bcing byin gyis brlab// bskyed pa rdzogs pa gsor ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// bcu

pa drag po mthing nag dbu// 'gying pa'i gar gyis gsor ba yis// gsung snyan sgra yi bro bsdebs pa'i// phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na// phaT phaT hUM gis gsor ba yis// snying po thugs rtags phyag bsnams
pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las// bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad// brgyan pa sgeg pa pho nya dang// tshangs dang dbang po 'dod dbang dang// mdor na bcu gnyis

gling gi bdag/ drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can// dngangs shing brgyal te blo stor nas// bum pa bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur// lha mo glu mo brgyan pa dang// rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang// gnas dang gter dang
bgo ba dang// gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang// ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying

po de kho na nyid nges pa las// sgyu 'phrul chen po bstan par bzung ba/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// thugs rjes 'gro ba
'dul ba'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas rnam dag chos sku las// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su grub// thams cad
'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor 'gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// dug tu ma gyur gang yang
med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang// sus kyang ma byas sus byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings// lus gnas longs spyod sna tshogs dang// sdug bsngal
'khrul 'khor ma lus dang// khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang// dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong// rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing

sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog por// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba byang
chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyi pha rol phyin la spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi'i mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi'i gnas ni byang chub
sems// bdud rtsi'i las ni rnam rtog sbyong// bdag ni dpal rdzogs 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyangs shing mtho ris 'grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel
bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang// rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ klu dug rbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dug

rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// A+oM hUM trAM hrIHa la sogs/ yang na yi ge aM gis bya// yang na yi ge hrIHyis dgang// dug rnams

bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hUM bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rjes bdag rtog 'dul bar byed// nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor

zhing// byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// A+oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// rmongs pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang// thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'o// trAM bdag nyid nga

rgyal yon tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par
byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// a bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus 'grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/ phyogs
bcu dus bzhir 'phro ba'o// mUM bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las rnams

dag byed cing// dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsum ste// lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng// raM gyis
bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru gsum

'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal// de nas longs spyod lnga kun la// ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang// lha mo lnga
dang sman lngar bsgom// A+oM hUM trAM hrIHa/ A+oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM bi shud+d+he a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ A+oM AHhUM/ zhes brjod

pas thams cad dag par gyur// dbyings su thim pas bdud rtsir gyur// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig la'ang lnga lngar dbye bya zhing// mUM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag las// lhag

pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rig pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing// 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// sgyur byas
gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'dus nas// de las gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a ho// e ma'o lhag pa'i byin
rlabs kyis// bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang mUM// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku

mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma'i gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang

byi mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// a ho// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don
yod grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de las bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba
yid bzhin skang bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhir phyag

rgya dag dang ldan// a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chu dri chen mAM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang// gzhan yang 'dod yon sna tshogs rnams// dbye'am yang na mi dbye

bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i
nad sel zhing// dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang// bskal pa yun ring gnas pa dang// dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs// bdag nyid yi ge hUM gyur

nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// A+oM AM hUM du gyur par bsgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom// gzhan yang yi

ge'i tshogs pas gdab// 'thung na ngan song sgrib pa sbyang// tra thA/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing// lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par
'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob 'gyur na// lha srin

la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste so
brgyad pa'o//// de nas dgyes pa chen pos/ de dag gi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga

nyid// khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas// de nyid sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa// drwa ba mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar
gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam kun khengs par// hUM gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom// lus nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs gzung bas// kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying

nang bdag zhugs la// dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spyang// dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang// gang du bya bar phyin par byed// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas
bdag gis gzugs bzung la// dal bus hUM zhes bsdus pa yis/ bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar

gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// A+oM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid a yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying
nang bdag zhugs la// hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzang dang// snga bas logs spyod 'du ba dang// gnas par dga' ba bzhin du
'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag gis gzugs bzung la// dal bus A+oM zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la gzung bar 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi
rten gyur pa// phyogs bcur gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam kun khengs par// swAM gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom// lus nyid swAM gyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog

ser po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// swAM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la// blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'du// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par
dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// rgyas pa bdag gis gzugs bzung la// dal bus swAM zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la gzud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya
nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid dag lam kun khengs par// AM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid AM gyi tshogs su bstim// gang la bya

ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dmar po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying la bdag zhugs la// AM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang// ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de
yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na// dbang gi bdag gi gzugs gzung la// dal bus AM zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la chud

par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// hAM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid hAM gyi
tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ljang gu'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hAM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod
gzugs// dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang// zhe sdang can rnams gdul bar 'gyur// 'dod pa can rnams 'dul ba dang// nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur// de yis bstan pa 'dzin par
byed// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing// gnas par dga' ba bzhan du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro zhi'i gzugs bzung la// dal bus hAM zhes brjod pa yis// mi snang ba yi
gzugs su 'char// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis
'byung// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ nyid

kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir// 'gro ba sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum// dbab par bya ba'i

gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs mUM du brtag/ de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// mUM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// de
zla'i ngang tshul des bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// lam du zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams A+oM du
bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs 'gyur bar// mUM gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par rnam par bsam// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam

shes byin brlab ngang du brtag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i
grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcing// des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas// gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje'i rigs// dpal

ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum// shin tu chas kyis sgeg pa la// gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ 'bru lngas byin brlab lam du brtag/ de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// lAM gyi

tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis brlab// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na
ka/ shes rab yum dag ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje'i
rigs rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa hUM gi 'phro

'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlab ngang du brtag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// bsgom
dang bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu'i stengs kyis bskul bar gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis// rigs dang mthun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom// yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter// dpal ldan

sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo// chags shing sgeg pa'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlab AM du brtag/ de
nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// AM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba la// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlobs// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// yon tan gter gyi gzugs
bcas nas// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde
gsal spro thim// rin chen rigs rnams swAM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu

bsam// bstan pa swAM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlab ngang du brtag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa'o// 'phro 'du rigs
dang mthun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom// gso dang gsad dang pham

dang rgyal// gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang// ci 'dod 'ong dang smra yang rung// mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang// bcing ba'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum// bde chen gar
dbang gzugs 'dzin pa// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// dbang po gnas lnga byin gyis brlab// de nas gnas lngar shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga
mtshan// las bzhi 'bru bzhi pAM du brtag/ de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// pAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba la// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis brlab// de nyid
mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzul thabs
yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// ming dang snying po bcas pa dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams AM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang
gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa AM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlab ngang du brtag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos
dbang yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa'o// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni// bsgom nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i lcags sgrogs mchog gis bcing// chags pa chen

po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas// ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags// dpal ldan grub pa sgyu 'phrul ba// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa

lcug phran la sogs la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga dang// 'bru lngas byin brlabs tAM du brtag/ de ni e yi tshogs yin te// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// tAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid tAM gyi
lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mchog gi tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya gram byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang

gnas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang// rgya gram mtshon gyis khengs pa dang// so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje las rnams hAM du bsgom// snod

gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal ba gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hAM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlab ngang du
brtag/ gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa'o// phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dgyes pa

gar gyi gsung snyan zhing// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhes// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// phyogs bcu 'gro dang 'phrog pa dang// tshe bsrung ba dang las rnams dang// mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i
mchog/ rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod pas// rnam par smin pa'i tshogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i

che ba'i yon tan nyid du mkhyen to// mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo// a ho bsam bya bsams par zin pa yis// bsam pas mi
zin bsam mi khyab// bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang 'brel ba'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral mi dmigs pa// de nyid

yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi
bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos// che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di// sku dang

gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo// dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams// kha dog grangs bcas ma bslabs pas// shes pa blo che khong yangs la// zab par spyod la mi skyo bar// zas bsrungs gos brjes

dam rdzas sbyin// dung chen snod du chu yis bsing// rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang// dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dbog/ A+oM dang mUM gyi blo brtan nas// gsang bas mtshan

ma snga nas sbyang// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// phung po khams dang skye mched sbyar// longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzi na A+oM/ A+oM badzra ku

la hUM badzra/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta swAM rat+na swAM/ oM pad+ma ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ a ro lika/ hA pra dz+nyA hA d+hA twI shwa rI mUM/ deSh+ta ra ti lAM/ mo ha ra ti AM/ rA ga ra ti pyAM/ badzra ra ti tAM/ mUM mUM mUM/ lAM lAM lAM/ mAM mAM mAM/ pAM pAM pAM/ tAM tAM

tAM/ e baM ma yA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+waM ho/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par/ dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang// spyan ma chen mo dang/ mA ma kI chen mo dang/ gos dkar mo chen mo dang/ dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol

ma chen mo'i rang bzhin nyid du kun tu snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi
'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// gsang ba'i snying po phrin las kyi rgyud bzhi bcu pa rdzogs so//// ! 'di sgyu 'phrul le lhag yin/ 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na// de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas// nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par 'dus par bstan te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'das dang da ltar ma
'ongs dang// 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang// ji snyed brtan

g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing// sems can kun gyi gzhir gyur pa// de dang gnyis me dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi

mtshan nyid de// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang// yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang nas btsal kyang mi

rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// de ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis bo d+hi rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig
gam 'di zhes brjod du med// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du med/ gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// byin rlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i
don smra ba// de ni rnam dag lam yin te// rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin// thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum
tshul bsgoms shing// 'bru lngar 'dus pa'i thabs chen te// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// bya ba byed pa byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma
tog dang rin chen rgyal// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// rang sems gzod nas brtan pa yin// lha srin la sogs yod pa yi// nor 'dra rin chen ma yin te// bo d+hi'i dkor ni rin po che// sku gsung mi zad
par ldan pa'i/ rgyan gyi 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// dang por don rtogs mthar mi gtong// chu srin phyag rgya ji bzhin du// spyod yul kun tu tshad dpag med// ces gsungs
so// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i snod bcud bdag la 'dus pa dang// longs spyod dang sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// yang dag don gyi gsang
mchog gi/ bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams
cad yum gyur dbyings su thim// gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por gyur// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po

ni// rtog ge'i spyod yul yang ma yin// zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i// gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig
rten brtan g.yo dang// rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na'ang med// dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs

chud pa'i// nam mkha'i ngang du thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil
'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang
gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kyis// de la gsad cing gzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma
yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs
par 'gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// rdzogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor bsam

yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// hoH/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste
gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang// 'bru lngar gnas pa'i byang

chub ste// oM dang mUM du 'brel drwa yis// byang chub rdo rje dril las byung// spyir ni brjod pa thams cad kyang// kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a// skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga// de ni byang chub sems yin
te// gnyis med byang chub mchog 'byung ba// gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor ba// zad med rin chen gter yin te// mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags// e las 'phros shing ar 'dus pa// gsang

ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba// kun la khyab cing sna tshogs smin// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khongs nas bsam mi khyab// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// yon tan mi zad gter

du 'byung// hoH/ ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le'i ngang// ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul// snang byed nyid na bya byed med par
gnas// ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dam pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas// dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas
shing// mnyam pa rnam bzhi'i don rtogs mchog gi gnas// rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus// ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus// chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler
'jug/ ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul maN+Da la// ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan// thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis// dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor// chos rnams rang

bzhin nyid kyis stong// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang// dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam// phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni ye
