shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// a ho// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges pa'i don bkrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar
bsdus// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus// lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus// gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te// a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim// a ho// mi dmigs
stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang// mi dmigs de bzhin nyid kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes chos kyi dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med
mi gnas pa'i// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rnam par 'phro// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings
dang dbyings kyi ye shes 'byor pas na// byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor brjod mi long// a ho/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma
lus par/ mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ 'gro ba thams cad la/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod
par bstan pa dang/ rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/ de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkhas kun la

khyab kyang/ rnam par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na/ me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste/ gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so// zhes gsungs nas/ yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam
nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bab ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha

rol phyin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rim gyis bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyi sa rab thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig g.yor tshul shes
pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden bzhi'i don rtogs rab tu spang ba yis// ye shes

bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro// theg pa gang du bstan par ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun nas 'byams

par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med// 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mir ni skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo

sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu khyab gyur kyang// rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni
skal med rigs chad pa yin no// chos ky-i dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang// so sor rang rig blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu
ba yang// 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur
na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong// theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa
na// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// nam mkha'i dbyings nyid gtos ni bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang// 'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur
kyang// nam mkha'i dbyings la 'gyur zhing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yon tan phrin las rmad byung dang// 'jig rten gtso mchog ma lus thams cad

dang// 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang// de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa
dang// rigs rgyud chad pa dang// rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ 'khor bsam gyis mi
khyab pa thams cad kyang// nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing// kun tu bzang po dgyes te/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi
khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ rgyas pa mtha' dbus med par khyab cing/ 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba tshad dpag
med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung// dbang bsgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin
gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang// 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bskur dbang phyug dang// gzhan yang 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i khams gnas

pa// bdud rtsi'i ro yi dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar gcod pa'i// 'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen

dbang bsgyur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// zag med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par gyur// b+h+ruM/ rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs/ rdo rje mnyam
nyid thugs su chud pa yis// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol par mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa// dus bzhi'i rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil
'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung// spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi langs pa'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje'i dbang gis

'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can zhes bya// rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs
bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa/ thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i
mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba// thugs rje'i byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i

gnas// yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro/ rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur/ zhes nyid la nyid ched du brjod de/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las gzhal med khang dbub
pa thabs drwa ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nam

mkha'i mkha' dkyil dngas pa yi// yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnams 'byung ba// sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar// raM/ srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar// haM/ dbang po dang ba'i dkyil

'khor du// spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhu// a/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// thugs rje'i byin rlabs rmad po che// hUM 'gro drug sna tshogs don byed pa'i// 'di ni byang

chub mchog tu gsungs// ho bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong// tra thA/ sman bcud len gyis dug sbyang bzhin// phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag/ bdag med gnyis kyis 'dag par byed// hrI bsal zhing gzhag par bya

ba med// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka med// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor// A+oM rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// phyogs bcu'i khams
rnams dbang bsdus nas// thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su gyur// rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa// shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim// thabs

dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas// chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khro mor gyur// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du
gyur pa dang/ rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mes sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ khro bo rngams pa'i tshogs su byas nas/
ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// byang chub mchog gi snying po ni// mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyi/ dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing// rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par

'gyur// drag po gtum po bsgrub pa ni/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung// lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgom zhing// mngon du byung ba'i zhal 'bar

de// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lhar gyur nas/ ling ga yang nas yang bsdus te// dbyings kyi dkyil du bstim par bya// hUM gis bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phang// zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du// rnam gsum tshul
gyis bzlas nas su// yang nas yang du gsal bar bya// 'gro lnga sems can thams cad du kun// dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur// sa ma ya yang lhag par 'jibs// sku mdog dud ka la sogs dang// mche
gtsigs khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang// zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba dang// gang la goms par bsgom par bya// bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags gdon// mngon par dbang
pos bltar yod par// ril bur bsdus nas dbyings su mchod// the tshom med par 'grub par nges// dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa// dpa' bos dgos pa yod pa'i phyir/ kun la phan pa de gyis shig/ ho/
hUM dza phaT dang s+pho la sogs// 'dren pa'i mchog tu de gsungs so// mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa yang// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du// smon pa'i byang chub lam du gzhug/ mtshan ma'i bag chags med par
bya// dbyings nas spros shing a la thim// a he// thugs nyid la ni thugs brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal pos 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshogs chen por bsgyur nas/ thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra

ba bstan pa yi// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par// b+h+ruM dang tsakra'i 'khor lor sprul// 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen hUM// gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// raM/ nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang po'i

gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// phaT/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// raM/ khros pa'i me dpung rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs par 'bar// tsakra/

khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes// ha he/ slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang// ci bgyis zhes dang chas te gnas// ti ra'i rgyu ma'i

zhags pa dang// nr-i yi tsit+ta za zhing rgyug/ shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas// ral pa muny+tsa cod pan 'bar// phyogs bcur khebs pa'i gshog pa gdengs// rdo rjes gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar// raM/ so so'i

rang sngags skad gdangs dang// sgra skad nga ro drag tu 'don// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo ru lu// khro bo chen po tshogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal 'bar ba// bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom// so so'i rang
sngags bzlas nas su// rgyud drug sems can thams cad dang// ma rungs gdug pa thams cad kun// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bkug nas ni// lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim// lha yang rung ste brlag par

'gyur// ho// gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni// 'byor pa rnam pa kun gyis mchod// nr-i yi tshil dang che ba'i mar// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgyun du 'bul// a ho// yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad// stong ngam

'bum du dbul bar bgyi// nag pa'i tsher ma can dang dug shing ngam// gzhan yang bsreg rdzas gdug gsum dang// mnan pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor spyir
bstan pa'i hom/ oM hUM trAM hrIHa/ hom thams cad ma lus par 'dir 'dus pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal pos// thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di
brjod do// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms shing// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba brtan par gnas// thams cad hUM du bsdus nas ni// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom// me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du// me

lha ag ne dzaHsa bkug nas// raM zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya// hUM gtum po'i tshogs chen rab tu 'bar// dud ka nag po'i mdog 'dra ba// 'bar

ba'i 'od zer mang po 'khrugs// nyi ma'i thod sprul mang pos brgyan// seng ge glang chen stag rngam dang// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams// phaT dang hUM dang ha la'i sgras// skad drag phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'

'khrugs// phaT khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// yul dang gnas kyi phyag rgyar mdzes// ha he/ slas dang byi mo bran mo dang// b+h+yo/ ci bgyis la sogs tshogs kyis bskor// so so'i stan dang lag cha

dang// rngam pa'i nga ro rang sngags sgrogs// mi sdug gtum mo'i gzugs can dang// shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya// bdag nyid phaT kyi ngang nyid du// gsal 'grib blo goms rtag tu bsgom// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa
bsdus nas su// rgyud drug sems can kun bkug nas// khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang mthun// gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma
bzhin// mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang mthun// a/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi// zhal gdangs spyan bgrad khro zhal bsgom// rdo rje gtams pa gdengs pa dang// thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis

bskor// hUM sgra drag po'i tshogs kyis 'bar// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkug nas su// zhal du bstim nas lhag par 'grub// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// 'khor gyi tshogs kyis snga ma bzhin// stong pa'i tshul du
rbod gtong bya// hUM gtum po dmar smug mchu ring po// 'bar ba'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor// 'od chen 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// 'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig rngub// hUM khro bo'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams

dang// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// so so'i rang sngags rdzogs par gdon// ha he b+h+yo// gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis// hUM rdo rje thugs rje'i byin rlabs
kyis// 'jig rten khamasas rnams kun bkang ste// gtum 'khrugs ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje'i mthu yis btul bar gyur// hUM zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams

kun// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// hUM/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ drag po hom gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma bsdus pa
zhes bya bas/ 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus// dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar// thams cad ma
lus dbyings su sbyor// hrIHdkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las// 'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang// rdo rje lcags sgrog bsdams pas bskor// gzhan yang rgyan gyi dam pa mchog/ kun gyis de la brgyan cing

bskor// me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// pad+ma'i rigs kyi khro bo bsgom// dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni// gzhan yang sprul pa mang po yis// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi
steng 'og bskor// rngam pa'i rang sngags drag tu sgrogs// hrIH/ bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste// dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba thams cad dang// gdug pa'i yid can ma lus

kun// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bkug nas su// dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya// dgos pa 'grub cing ngan song sbyang// hrIH/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dra bar// mtha' ma
pad+ma ljon shing dang// bar ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bskor// gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun la mdzes par brgyan// bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas// mchod pa'i lha rdzas

sna tshogs dang// zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams dang// dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa// lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin// rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni// 'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi// ci 'dod las

de 'grub par 'gyur// sngags ni yi ge raM dang hrIH// mdog ni dmar smug 'od po che// phyogs bcur khyab cing hrIHla bsdu// dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod// hrIHrdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis// phyogs bcu mtha'
klas rab 'byams kun// dpal dang gzi byin che la sogs// pad+ma 'bar bas de bsdus nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang// gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs// ci 'dod las rnams dbang du
'gyur// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// hrIH'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig nyid la dbang du bsdus// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// hrIHsgyu

'phrul drwa ba las/ thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdus te/ dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi
dbyings nas phyung ste ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrugs// bsod nams zhing 'gyur mchog tu 'bar// phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' gang bar

bsgom// rdo rje rin po che yis bskor// rgyal ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam// trAM ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar// dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs dang// khro bo
kun kyang dga' 'phro ste// 'od chen dkar po 'bar ba dang// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bskor// mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang// dkar la dri zhim shing rnams
dang// gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul// bdag nyid rin chen rab 'bar nas// trAM// dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar// khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te// mngon du gyur

pa'i dkyil 'khor du// pA sha hoHdang dzaHhUM gis// phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste// dbyings su thim par 'od 'phro bsgom// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// sgyu
ma'i ye shes brtan pa yin// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni// rin chen dbyings la rdo rje 'bar// dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis 'khor bar bskor// gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis// phyogs bcu khyab par
mchod cing dbul// yon tan rgyal ba'i zhing dang mnyam// trAM/ glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun// mchod yon rin chen dpal 'phel gyis// phyogs bcu gang

bar rgyas phul nas// thugs rje'i dbyings kyis rgyas par rol// ho trAM/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang

med// trAM/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen
por bsgyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med// bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// bde gshegs nyid las mi gzhan
shar// A+oM dkyil 'khor zlum po 'bar ba las// 'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing// 'od ni ser por 'od du 'bar// rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs// bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya// dkyil

'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sa bon yi ge A+oM ser te// me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams// kun kyang rdo rje gti mug ste// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang// 'khor lo
phyag rgya 'bar ba dang// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan// gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu// phyogs bcu gnas pa thams cad kun// tsakra lcags kyus bkug nas
su// dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim byas nas// gtum 'khrugs gdug pa ma rungs pa// lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar 'gyur// A+oM gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba

yi// A+oM dang seng ge'i mgos bskor te// brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun// rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya// rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar// rgyan rnams zhi la dkar po dang// byang chub mchog 'bar

lhan ner bsgom// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo// gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun// zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gar dang glu yis mchod byas te// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// gdug pa'i yid
ni rnam bor nas// lhan ne'i dkar po'i 'od du gyur// bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar// ho/ A+oM gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la zhi mdzad
de// zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med/ oM/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas/ zhi ba'i hom gyis le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas// rgyal po tshe mtha'
yas su sprul nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan bsdus te// b+h+ruM dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du// ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bskor nas// bzhi

bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yi phyogs bcur gang bar bsgom// b+h+ruM dang dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag sems la thim par bya// nr-i nyid dngos sam yid bzhin
mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yin// tshe bzhag gnas ni 'di yin te// yang nas yang du dgug byas te// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang// dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba

yis// brtan zhing 'khor los dgab par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal po tshe dpag med par bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan phreng sna tshogs
rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang// yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang// gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs

kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med kyang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus thul bar bya// dbang du tshe dpag med par bsgom// tshe

bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang// tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub chen dang// thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro

'bar// phyag ni rin chen gang ba yi// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel

med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul bar// sngags bzlas cho ga bar ma chad// 'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya// oM oM oM oM oM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ swA swA swA swA swA/ AM AM

AM AM AM/ hAM hAM hAM hAM hAM/ b+h+ruM b+h+ruM? b+h+ruM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu yu/ She She She She She/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ a a a a a/ oM/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bde gshegs lnga yang tshe
dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga'itshe rnams dbang du

bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe dgug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten
khams dkrugs te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang// bang snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'bru+u la bstim nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de// nr-i yi

gnas lngar bstim par bya// A+oM A+oM badzra ka ba tsa badzra rak+Sha hUM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ phyag rgya srung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig dmigs med dbyings

su thim// A+oM yid bzhin bum pa rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// 'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar bcas// sngags mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma
nyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu de yis// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs
kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nasade bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa pos 'gro ba
rang dbang med par smra ba zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// kun tu bzang po'i thugs rje'i dang// sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan

rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje'i khams kun zhing sbyar te// oM dang mUM du 'byor par bsgom// thams cad dbyings su thim par bsgom// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

dam pa dang// thig le man tra de dag tu// nr-i thal man tra bzang po'i thig/ rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang// rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang// 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yi// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum

bri// dkyil 'khor rgyud dang ldan par bya// mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par 'bul// yaM/ dud ka ye shes 'od 'phros nas// AHlas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu grangs med pas// de yi snying du

gzhug par bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ga nas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya// oM dzaHhUM baM ho \u0f7fa mr-i su tri

pre du ming pra be sha// ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te// khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni// srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis// bar du mthe bo de drangs te/ oM ming pra be sha
A AH// thal ba yungs kar drag tu brdeg/ ming de khong du gzhug par bya// babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcings// gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni// lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni
mchod par bya// gdon zhig na ni tsan dan gur gum bsres nas ni// der blud sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM badzra d+ha ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gal te smra ru mi btub na// lag gnyis sor mo phyir

bsnol te// khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar// gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtugs// sngags A+oM badzra b+hA Sha dzi hA pra be sha hUM hUM/ zhes lan mang du bzlas pas// ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden
pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lce yi thor tor a dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// A+oM dza d+hIHdmar po bsgom byas na// gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur// bdag nyid Ta ki hUM bsgoms la// a

dang nr-i la sogs pa yi// lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung// oM Ta ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya// pra be sha ya bzlas par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhUM baM hoHte// gzhag cing

dbab pa'i sa de ni/ byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum pa me long 'bar// gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad ni// smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyag rgya rdo rje

sbar mo sder// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug/ dzaHhUM dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu// bcol zhing bya ba de bzhin no// Ta ki hUM dzas mi btub na// ha ya grI wa gnas dad yul// zur phyin mgo mjug
mnan nas ni// drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bar// gzir zhing drag tu drang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dgug pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung// nem nur

med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs las zin nas// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil// ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang// gzhan yang

dgos pa ci yang rung// oM badzra a mr-i ta hUM/ a a a/ oM ma hA badzra a mr-i ta phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do// oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA// zhes bzlas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang// ye shes lnga

rdzogs nyid la brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ sngon goms blo brtan 'dris pa yis// yang nas yang du mngon gsal du// byang chub mchog gis rtag sgoms shig/ de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni// 'jig

rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda phrad skad kyi dngos grub thob// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ pra dbab pa'i mdo'i le'u ste bcu bzhi
pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las hom rnams kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so// dang por de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris pa bsgom/ de nas bdag gi snying gar A
dkar zhing 'tsher ba zhig bsgom/ a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang/ phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom/ 'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim/ ma dang a las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil

'khor ldan zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom/ hrIH las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ hUM shin tu 'od 'bar bar bsgom/ snying gi dkyil du rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba zhig phyag rgya dang ldan par

bsgom/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang yig 'bru dang/ phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/ 'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/ 'dug na 'bru bzhis mtshams gcad/ rtag tu hom bya/ tshogs dang mchod pa yang

bya/ mang po mi nus pa'i don du hom gang bgyi yang rung/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyir ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ drag po yang rdo rje/ dbang pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyas pa rat+na he ru ka/ zhi ba bud+d+ha he ru ka/ spyan

drang ba ni/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drangs/ mchod pa dang/ ar+g+ha dbul ba ni drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril hUM/ zhi ba la mgor ril oM/ bar ma rnams la yang de

bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la shIn+taM bsnan// spyi la so so rang sngags rdzogs pa/ drag po lho/ dbang nub/ rgyas pa byang/ zhi ba shar/ spyir gang yang rung gru gsum dang thod pa kha

gdangs so// zla gam dang/ pad+ma dang/ chags med do// phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang/ chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang/ las kyi phyag rgya dang/ thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya

dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang/ lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las hom rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa

chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub nye bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs
la gzud par gnas// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing// byang chub sems su brtan par gzung// bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par
bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga gzhag/ a/ shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas/ 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab// dug gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od
'phro thim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing// nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman// thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam mi
khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang yang// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang// chos kyi dbyings su thams

cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste// yang na yi ge 'bru lnga'o// lnga po'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor
bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi// gzhal yas
'od zer 'bar ba'i khang// pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing yung 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom// shes
rab spyan la 'dris pa dang// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom/ shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam

yas spro// spros kyang hUM las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcur bri ba med// spro med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge mUM du thim par gyur// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing

'dris pa dang// phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgom// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal

gcig phyag gnyis sam/ zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan// rdo rje
'khor lo ral gri dang// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang// nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma
lus bsgom// thugs rje byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya sbyang// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing// bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed// de ltar bsgrub pa'i tshog mchog

de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang// sdug bsngal thams cad yongs mi 'byung// lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yongs mi skye// bde gshegs 'byung dang bskal mi 'gyur// byang chub
gzungs la zhugs pa yin// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul drwa ba
las// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho ye nas rnam dag chos sku las// log rtog

rnam pa gnyis su grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// dug tu ma gyur
gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu+u gcig las// mi mthun khyab par so sor snang// sus kyang ma byas sus byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings// lus gnas longs spyod sna tshogs dang// sdug
bsngal 'khrul 'khor ma lus dang// khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang// dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong// rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs

shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba

byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin la spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi'i mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi'i gnas ni byang chub
sems// bdud rtsi'i las ni rnam rtog sbyong// bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyangs shing mtho ris 'grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel
bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang// rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ klu dug rbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dug

rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// A+oM hUM trAM hrIHa la sogs// yang na yi ge AM gis bya// yang na yi ge hrIHyis dgang// dug rnams

bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim parabya// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hUM bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rje'i bdag rtog 'dul bar byed// nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor

zhing// byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chos sku ste// rmongs pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang// thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'o// trAM bdag nyid nga

rgyal yon tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par
byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// a bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus 'grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i
mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir 'phro ba'o// mUM bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te/ le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// ye shes drug gis nyon

mongs sbyangs// dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams sbyangs pa sku gsum ste// lam lnga sbyangs pa ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing ho yis g.yeng// raM gyis
bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru gsum

'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal// de nas longs spyod lnga kun la// ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang// lha mo lnga

dang sman lngar bsgom// oM hUM trAM hrIHa/ oM badzra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM bi shud d+he a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM zhes brjod pas/ thams cad dag par gyur// dbyings su thim

pas bdud rtsir gyur// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig la'ang lnga lngar dbye bya zhing// mUM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i

ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rig pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing// 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// rgyur byas
gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'dus nas// de las gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a ho// e ma ho lhag pa'i byin
rlabs kyis// bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang mUM// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku

mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang

byi mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// a ho 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod
grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin

'bar// re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya

ldan par byed// a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chu dri chen mAM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang// gzhan yang 'dod yon sna tshogs rnams// dbye'am yang na mi dbye

bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlabs// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i
nad sel zhing// dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang// bskal par yun ring gnas pa dang// dngos grub chen po thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs// bdag nyid yi ge hUM gyur

nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// oM AM hUM du gyur par bsgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsi 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom// gzhan yang yi

ge'i tshogs pas gdab// 'thungs na ngan song sgrib pa byang// tra thA/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// lus kyi nad rnams thams cad sbyang// lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med
par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum po'am lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob 'gyur

na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'chang rnams lhar bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir/
ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho// ye nas rnam par dag pa yi// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams
cad bdag med pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu
ldan// thams cad khyed pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje'i byin rlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga dang sku
gsung thugs// byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang rig pa'i thabs las byung// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang// mtha' dbus med par rgyas par
gnas// stang smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas
rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma chags pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan// zag med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// tA la'i ljon shing rang bzhin
gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang
ba'i de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang// gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i
dkyil 'khor dang// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog bstan// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'idakyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag

pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod
pa 'di brjod do// dbang po'i yul du rig pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing// mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas

su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// bla med chen pos de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse gcig dang// rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu

gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung// rdo rje pad+ma der sbyor
nas// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na// sangs
rgyas dkyil 'khor thamams cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad
dang// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad mnan// yan lag thams cad bsgul gsigs na// ba spu'i bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu'i khams

mang rdul snyed du// khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang// khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje'i brag steng

dang// me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thong gshol

nr-i spar dang// rdo rje gtun chen dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen nr-i mgo'i dbyug pa

dang// gshin rje chen po'i rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang ti ra'i dbyug pa dang// khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams sked par gtub// byang gi bgegs
rnams 'dul ba ni// rin po che yi dbyug to dang// nr-i mgo gsum gyi dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis 'dul bar
'gyur// gal te de yis ma 'dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs// e sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po'i sde kun rab tu 'dul// shar lho mtshams kyi

bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje ye shes me chen 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams// me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdu// lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje
srin po'i mgo can te// rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdu// nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan nr-i mgo

gdengs// shin tu drag po glang po'i brjid// tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdu// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba// phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// phag chen po ni phyag
na bsnams// 'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus bsreg par byed// chu yi
dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus 'khrud par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lo dang// mda' gzhu tho

chen gri chen dang// rdo rje mdung chen dgra s+t+war bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri'i so dang ni// mda' dang mdung thung s+t+wa re dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra'i dbyug to chen

po dang// 'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cing zhal du gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar// nr-i
mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rab tu gsol// nub kyi

khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// pad+ma chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang// rdo rje rgya gram rab tu

'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// khro mo rnams kyang khro dang mthun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo

che las bshad/ sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin shegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po/ dpal shrI he ru kas/ yum kro ti shwa rI dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad

nas/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros nas/ 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang/ dbang po dang/ bdag po dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ sde
dpon dang/ 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/ 'jigs byed chen pos lha chen po rnams dang/ da lta dang dus phyi ma'i dus su/ la la ni tshe 'phel
ba'i las su bskos/ la la ni longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen po la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir
yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni skams shing 'pho bar bskos/ gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par
bskos nas/ ched du brjod pa'i 'di brjod do// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du bsdus// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan// thabs
dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni rang byung lha yi lha// byams dang snying rje ldan par rol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// thams cad kun la spyod
gyur kyang// bag chags sogs par mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par// gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med
phyir// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gang nas 'byung ba'i lha khro bo dang/ zhi ba gang la goms pa de gsal bar bsgoms nas/ ting nge 'dzin las su rung zhing lhar gsal

bar gyur pa dang/ rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to// lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta baM// ma hA de ba hUM dzaH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lha yi dbang po'i snying ga nas// yang nas yang du

rnam par drangs// ma ma trag sha ma hA de gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM/ lha gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar// lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar// lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni// yid

bzhin bdud rtsi bum chu gsol// g.yon na rin chen sna lnga ste// lha rnams kun gyi re ba bskang// btsun mo u ma dang gnas pa// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan// bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang// lha yi

gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul// lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu// srog dang ldan par bzla' bar bya// mdun nas dzaHhUM baM hoHsa drang// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// je nye je nye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal
gyur nas// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor rnams thams cad kyang// de grub dbang med 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi sgrub
pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// rig sngags 'chang gi don sgrub tu// rgyal po bzhi yang dbang du bsdus// bdag nyid rigs
bzhi'i he ru ka/ gong nas byung ba'i don bzhin bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing// lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom// bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par// yang dag don du gsal bar

bsgom// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung// gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan// lag g.yas rdo rje dril bu la// lag g.yon bdud rtsi'i bum pa gsol// gzhan du yul 'khor srung la

b+h+r-i ta sh+ta/ 'phags skyes po la bi rU D+ha ka/ mig mi bzang la b+hi rU'u bak+Sha/ rnams yod pa dang ma mthun pas dpyad// in/ sngags rnams sor bzhagatra sA ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ tra mi ta hUM hUM/ su ra ta bag ta dza dza dza dzaHhUM hUM zhes lan 'bum bzlas
nas// bdag nyid rdo rje he ru kas// 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drang// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de yis lha nyid dbang gyur nas// las ni gang 'dod byed
par gzhug/ thams cad thams cad 'grub par byed// kun la 'byin cing kun la za// lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun// ma lus par ni yang dag 'du// bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brangs// rgyal po

'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/ sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin// phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'du byin rlabs kyis// 'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus/ b+hi d+ha

ra sta ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ gr-ih+Nagr-ih+Na dur bid swA hA/ hang hang hang/ rat+na dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes snying po lan 'bum du bzlas te// srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya// bdag nyid rat+na he ru ka/ 'phags skyes po yi
snying ga nas// dzaHyis rab tu bzung nas ni// bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang// gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mdog ni gser gyis

mdog tu 'bar// 'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub// rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul
yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing// lha nyid du ni gsal gyur nas// rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni// shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste// lag

g.yas bdud rtsi'i bum pa gsol// lag g.yon 'dod yon lnga yi tshul// nub phyogs klu rnams re ba bskang// sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// de ni rab tu dbang bsdu phyir/ b+hi ru ta ka swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ nA
ga shi ni/ bi ma pag bim pag dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni// de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu// bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas// mig mi bzang gi snying ga nas// dzaHyis rab tu bzung nas
drang// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i// dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus pas// bdag gi las rnams
rdzogs par byed// rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing// rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag

bzlas// ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang// rnam thos dag ni rtag tu bsgrub// gzugs ni rinachen baiDUr+ya// yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum

chu gsol// dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes// bai shra ma NA ya swA hA// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ku be ra bam bam/ kar kang kang yang 'dugakar yang yang dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par// yang

dang yang du bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dzaHyis rnam thos snying nas brang// dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin

'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu// rin chen spros shing las rnams bsgrub// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ lha chen po bsgrub pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing

sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam
nyid dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus maN+Da la// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang dbang gyur pa yis// mnyam la mnyam
par mi gnas pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs shing
bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin sku yi gzugs brnyan bstan// rtogs dang mi rtogs rang rig dang// yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la
sogs dang// 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byams kyi// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// de bzhin
ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te/ thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi

dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgom nas// mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la// yang dag
chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis

med par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang// byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs//
'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a ho// chos sku'i phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i da kyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du
'grub// drag po gtum po 'dul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag por bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi ling ga gnan par bya// gtum po drag po'ang brlags par 'gyur// mi mthun

phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad ma lus gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya grI war bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal
bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du bting// ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du 'du// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang// ci 'dod las rnams byed par
'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom// gang 'phel chos sku'i gdan du bzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yon

tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos

sku bsgom// gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbyings su sdud// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a ho// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang

'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgom the tshom med par 'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi

lha bsgrub na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung// bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dang spyi yi don

rtogs nas// skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la/ nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor

bsam yas dang// tshad dpag med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a hoH// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan
gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te/ mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ shin tu gsang ba'i phyir/ gsang

sngags kyi rgyud de phyi pa dang/ nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir/ khams nyi

shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin/ gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyis ka yang/ skye mched dang khams rnams 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i
phyir/ shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin
gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang// gzhan du min la shin tu gsang// don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyud// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsungs// 'di ni byang

chub snying po'i mchog/ a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched
khams rnams bco brgyad po// byang chub sems dpa' sems ma nyid// dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings yin te// thams cad 'byung ba rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang// dbang po yul nyid shes rab pad+ma'i

dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang// thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams

cad skye zhing 'byung/ kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed cing de las spro// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mar ldan// gnyis med byang chub

sems 'phro na// mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang// mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i

byang chub sems// g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// 'gugs dang 'dzin pa de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang gyur te// bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur
sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyed pa phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshims byed bro
bsung thim// lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phros pas kun tu 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings// a la la ho// gsang dbang pad+mar ldan gyur nas// chags pa med
pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma can yang rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes

tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las// khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bco brgyad 'byung ba'i

gnas yin te// byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang
chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang ba mchog gis
'byin par byed// 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// blta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang 'tshig par 'gyur// khab
len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yi// blo brtan

snying rje che ba dang// dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// shin tu zab pa'i phyir rgyud gzhan gyi nang du ma bshad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor khams

nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas// thams cad ma lus pa dbyings su sdud pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ chos thams cad yid dang chos
su 'dus par bstan pa dang/ shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so/ thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'dus/ rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings
dang dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas/ tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad ces brjod do// don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no// thams cad ma lus mi lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid

de// de bzhin dbyings nyid sna tshogs mang po thabs su snang// thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin// de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog
gi gnas gyur pas// ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med bsgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste// rgyu 'bras ye
nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin

mdzod// gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// nga dang bdag med sna tshogs mtshan ma dbyer med pa// stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin nyid du 'dus// rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

zad med gter chen spro// 'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa// skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog/ ye nas ma
bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gis gsal// thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen ngang du bsdus// phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang// zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas
rin chen mchog chen kun// skye med dbyings dang rang rig gnyis su yang dag 'ub// mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa// ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog

gnas// ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs// lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan// 'gro med 'ong

med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad// a hoH/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ sa bcu dang/ sa gnyis dang/ thabs kyi mchog dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus
par yid dang chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod

pas// thams cad skye shi med tshul du// mnyam nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug par bya// bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par// yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya// sku
rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang// zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// mngags pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtang// thams cad ma lus

dbang du bsdu// bsgrub pa gcig gam yang na gnyis// gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya// pho nya mang pos nr-i bkug nas// zhing la yang dang yang du gzhug/ snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung// de nas ting
'dzin bdud rtsi yis// lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni// bzlas pa'i tshul ni rnam gsum dag/ rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum// de yi bar nas bzlas par 'byung// 'od zer lnga dang ldan

par bya// zhing de ldem ldem po gyur dang// bdud rtsi lnga yis bsku bar bya// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod// gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgom par bya// dbang po lnga dang dbang po'i tshul// yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i

tshul// rdo rje'i ting 'dzin de yis bsgom// de nas zhing de 'gul gyur nas// shin tu zhags pas bsdam par bya// yan lag rnams kyang gzhum par bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan// de nas nub tu thod pa

bstan// ha ya grI ba'i skur bsgoms shing// sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas// phyogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim// de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas// rdo rje'i ting 'dzin de yis ni// brtan pa nyid du bsgom

par bya// de nas sbar sbar byed pa dang// a nr-i pre du gang yin pa// rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dbab// thod pa'i kha nas nr-i phyung nas// rdo rje'i ting 'dzin so yis bcad// rdo rje'i sngags bzlas khong du

bstim// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya// de nas zhing de langs pa dang// rdo rje byin nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya// las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/ zhing des rab tu smras pa'i
tshig/ dpa' bo ci bgyis mi rga skye med chos rnams dang// las rnams ma lus kun bgyid do// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang// ri
brag gnyan po bgegs gnas dang// nags khrod stong pa tsher ma can// ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma can// rab tu rnam par dben pa dang// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'iganas// de dag tu ni bsgrub par

bya// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang// bcu drug man chad bsgub par bya// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams// lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas// 'bru rnams sna

tshogs bcang bar bya// rtag tu tshogs chen mchod par bya// rtag par dag tu ma ldan na// gsum dang lnga ru bar mi gcod// kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'// btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te// mar me rtag tu

gtang bar bya// rgyu ni nr-i yi mar las bya// yan lag bskuru ba'ang de bzhin no// sdong bu pad+ma'i rgyu las bya// snod ni dung chen srub med pa// lcang lo yod dang med kyang rung// de byi su tra ma byung ba// mdog ni ban

glang can la yod// rdo rje'i bsgrub pa bar gcod phyir// rtag tu mtshams ni gcad par bya// nr-i yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas// sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid// de la kI la ya byas nas// phur bu'i sngags dang khro
sngags kyis// lan 'bum du ni bzlas nas ni// lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'od 'bar gzugs kyi sku ru bsgom// de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du// sgrub po
rdo rjer bsgom par bya// bsgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa// phyogs bcu rnams su mtshams kyang bcad// dngos grub ma thob bar du ni// bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum// bag yod mgo la me sbar
bzhin// bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya// de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du sdud// rdo rje'i rigs mchog 'khor rkyen
rnams// yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni// lus sbed nus nas mngon du dbyung// de ma yin par shin tu gsang// ro langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyor zhing// dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs 'di skad ces gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub
ni// mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te// ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur

na// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN+Da la// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong// longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing// ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun
grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// 'di ni rdo rje mnyam yin no// dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi
gzhi rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang// thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang// sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya// de bzhin yang dang yang goms nas// de nas phra

mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgoms kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'du/ yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// slar yang yi ge hUM du
bsdu// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang// 'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang// slar yang hUM la bstim par bya// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings
su thim// thim gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar// shin tu 'tsher bas gsal bsgoms la// thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom// de bzhin nyid du 'dres gyur nas// a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// a ma
gsal bar 'byor gyur nas// nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar sgom// hrIHgsal pad+ma chags med bsgom// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang// thams cad bsdu

zhing phra bar bsgom// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// mthing ga 'tsher la gsal ba yi// 'od zer 'phro bar rnam par bsgom// 'od zer dbyings su slar bsdus nas// shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom// rdo
rje 'od 'phro gsal 'bar nas// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje
'dril dril bur yang 'dugabar bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang// dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom// gzhan yang 'phro 'du sna tshogs bsgom// blo yi shes rab che chung las// rim pa bzhin du bsgom
par bya// yang na cig char bsgom par bya// nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu// chu dkyil dngas par gsal ba bzhin// de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des// ji ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub// mkha'
la 'phyo dang rig 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la sogs thog med 'dzul// chu la mi 'bying mes mi 'tshig/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jig mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por

sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang bsgyur cing// tshe dang dus la bsring bstung dang// stong gsum nyung 'brur shong ba dang// yungs 'brus stong gsum bskyed pa dang// ji ltar
dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma spangs
par rig 'dzin sa// ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston// 'gro ba ma lus don yang
byed// las rnams thams cad kun byas nas// skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung 'thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan// mthar phyin bya ba med par 'grub// bsgrub

med spang med chos kyi dbyings// 'ong med 'gro med de bzhin nyid// 'di ltar bsgrub te bsgoms byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang// tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur// theg

pa dman par yang mi 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// shin tu gsang ba'i tshig tu dngos grub myur du thob par bya ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas// sgyu dang drwa ba 'brel gyur nas// sku

mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas// mthun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo// de bzhin dri bral sku mchog dang// bde gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus
te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rje'i sku// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun ston pa// thabs kyis 'gro 'dul skur ston te// byang chub mchog gi

rdo rje'i sku// chags med zhing du sku ston pa// dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du snang// sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// log 'gro rtogs pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i

skur yang ston// de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku// las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku// thar dang ma thar sna tshogs kyang// sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog
ni// badzra zhes su gdags pa yin// ji snyed sku stan bsam yas pa// thams cad ma lus rdo rjer bsdus// 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa yin// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas

byung// sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang// 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na// dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad// thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang// gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te// dbyer med de
bzhin yongs kyis so// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu dus gnas thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gir dbyer med pas// ye nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag/ 'di ni dngos grub

mchog yin par// kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las// sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma

las bshad de 'od la ma 'gyur zhes 'byung// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas/
sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyan po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas
dang// rdo rje'i theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang// rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// blta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tshams par
bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang chub med// thams cad ma

lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla ltar yod pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// gnas ngan
dus na log rtog nyid// gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs nas// bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so'i rang bzhin des she
na// yang dag lam nyid bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo chen gyis// thams cad dngos po med par bshad// dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang// ha la ha la'i dug

rnams kyang// bsgrubs na ra swA ya na'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi

dngos grub kyang// gong na med de de yin te// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang// rang dang spyi yi don brtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam
par spro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings su rnam par sbyor// gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni// ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad// rang gi mtshan

nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo nyid la sogs brtags pa// rtog pa'i sgyu ma klung gyur te// log rtog spros pa'i rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste// bzod pa'i

chos nyid mig gcig yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim// sgyu ma'i

dngos por rtogs pa na// sgyu mar rtogs nyid mi dmigs pas// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang// skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos sku'i phyag rgya che// mi
dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la// rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang// chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyis ka dbyer med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur
nas// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste// mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du
med// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin// zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan pa/ kun la mnar sems rtog pa yin// sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// 'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// spyi yi

mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spang bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa// dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs
na// sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang// chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med// snang ba thams cad
bdag med chos kyi dbyings// mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid ro gcig ste// thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin nyid yin pas// kun dang dbyer med chos sku'i phyag rgya yin// mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar
sems pa// rtog pa'i yul gyis kun nas mnar sems te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po

yin// mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa// gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid

de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// khong nas 'gying zhing sems khengs pa// pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal
stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas// kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying nyid// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te// chos nyid mi dmigs sgyu ma'i 'gying bar

skyes// skye 'gying nang na chos nyid ro gcig ste// 'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs ngang gis dag/ 'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar 'gying bar
skyes// 'gying bas yul gzhan zil gyis gnon pa yin// chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir// don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur nas// thugs

kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni// nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// zhi bsgrub nga

rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags rang gi mtshan nyid ni// sred pa kun la zhen pa ste// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma chags bsgrub tu med// chos kyi
dbyings su ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod cing chags pa sgyu mar sred// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams bdag las mi

gzhan te// spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigs su med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod cing chags rtogs pa// yul dang
'dod chags nyid kyang chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma dang ni mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden pa gnyis kar dbyer med ro gcig pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po

yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags sgyu mar spros pa ni// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags mtshan nyid rtogs pa nyid// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan
nyid yin// chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan// thabs kyis

sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// phrag dog spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// dog pa spangs shing yangs bsgrub med// chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid

ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// phrag dog pa yi sgyu ma nyid// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// phun sum tshogs pa sbyor ba yis// thabs kyi sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// rgyal

ba kun dang dbyer med pas// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar gzhan gyi phun tshogs la// phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang// rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med
pa'i// bden pa gnyis ka ro gcig pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun tshogs la// phrag dog rnam par spros nas ni// gdul ba'i bya ba

bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// phrag dog rang dang spyi bstan pa// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// dog pa spangs shing yangs bsgrub med// sems can rnam pa mang po kun// nang gi chen po
