lnga sogs bstan// rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar nyes par dri mthong na yang 'dugami mngon na// sngags kyis
yongs su zin pa'i nad// kun la gnod par byed mi nus// de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yi// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// lam gyi dge spyad stegs
bcas kyang// mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma lus kun// byang chub snying rjes bsad na yang// bsod
nams dpag tu med pa 'thob// ma bsad na ni sems can yal bor te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ gang phyir byang chub sems de
ni// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal// nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par yang dag gsungs// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// thabs dang
shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub
lam// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma

grub la// sgyu ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni// nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol// thabs chen dag gis ma zin na// dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor don dam ldan

pa yis// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyod kyang// rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis ka yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba stong yongs su yang byung/ par shes pa ni// de
ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur kyang// grol la thar bar mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya

byed kun// rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang ltung// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang// phal la med pas mi rung na// sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yin// skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi dang du
blang bar gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na// sku gsung rdo rjer dbang thob 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas su de phyir gsungs// mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtogs na// byol song la la chos dang ldan gyur

kyang// drang srong 'tsho dang rtags mthun dang// ji srid 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams yongs kyis dag pa yi// rnam bzhi tshul gyi don rtogs mngon// rgyu rnams rang bzhin
dag pa dang// 'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te// don dam gnyis med rang bzhin dag/ kun rdzob sgyu mar ye nas dag/ rgyu yi mtshan nyid dag pa ni// phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin
gnyis snang ba// gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyu nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa de// rdo rje byang chub

sems yin te// sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur gum chu// so so'i lus las gnas pas dag/ don dam dmigs med dag pas ni// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang/ gang gi ngo bo ma yin te// skye
'gag med par ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang// chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang// de bzhin gshegs par ye nas

mnyam// de bas gtsang sme med par spyod// sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya// de bas sems can phyin ci log/ chos rnams dag par ma shes te// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs

pas// kha cig ji srid 'tsho bar zos// kha cig drang srong bzhin du rtsA chu zos// zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i

dbyings su yang dag rtogs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rtog pa'ang mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'ang mtshan// mtshan ma gnyis ka

rnam spangs te// mkhyen pas dbus la'ang gnas mi 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag gsungs// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang// dri chen dri chu rak+ta dag/ sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bza'// dngos grub ya

mtshan chen po 'grub// tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin// mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje'i sa// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gsang

ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis// yi dam mi spang rtag bsgoms shing// yi dam/ ye nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spangs dge sbyor don med 'gyur// lha nyid mi

spang don nyid ni// lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi// bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i// dus gsum bde gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag po ste// phyag rgya chen
po yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don// dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa don med 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor
nas su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs 'grub// rdo
rje'i slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa'i 'dren pa po// long ba dmigs bus 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob dpon de la smod pa ni// dper na mun khung

sgron bsad na// mthong ba'i don mi rtog pa bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam thag yun ring du// bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon// de bas de la gus pa rtag tu gyis// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas// shin tu gtso

bor blang bar bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas// shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni// bla med byang chub 'gro ba'i yul// chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus// byang chub rig rin

chen 'dzin sar nges pas// de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni// rang la rang gis mtshon btab nas// rang srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar// rang gis gcod cing phung bar 'gyur// tshe 'dir mi bde sna tshogs pa// mi

'dod bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang// ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i// sdug bsngal kha brgyud myong bar 'gyur// yun ring rtag tu mi thar ba'i// shin tu nyam thag myong bar
'gyur// grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod// gnyis med dang bas rjes spyod spun// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdung// zhes gsungs// gsang ba gzhan la mi
bsgrag cing// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas// mnyam pa'i spyod pas la dor te// phal dang mi 'dra yang dag rtogs// ma
rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang// skye bo kun la rab tu gsang// gsang ba'i brda ngag sna tshogs gsungs// thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin// gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te// thugs rje chen po thabs
mkhas kyis// snod ma yin dang blo rtul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang// brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di// las 'phro ngan la bsgrags gyur na// dper na gtsub shing mes gtsubs na// gtsub

shing nyid kyang tshig par snang// gzhan yang 'tshig par 'gyur ba bzhin// chos don bzang po me dang 'dra// skal ba chung zhing shes rab dman// blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams// mnyam pa nyid la skur 'debs

pas// ngan song gsum du 'phen par 'gyur// gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong// gsang ba spel bar byed pa yang// smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing// sdug bsngal chen mo myong bar 'gyur// de phyir sems can

don phyir gsungs// rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku
gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med
phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang bsgyur te// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod
pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mi khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la// dmigs med gcig dang du mar
bral// mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i// ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med// mnyam pa chen po'i phyag rgya yin// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon tan skyon

rnams skye 'gag med// gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam// kun rdzob chos nyid dbyer med pa'i// mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par// snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i// phyag rgya chen pos
phyogs bcu dang// dus bzhi khams gsum thams cad dang// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// yon tan skyon rnams thams cad kyang// sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas// sngags 'chang rgyal pos rtogs
byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med// ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na/ phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang// rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
gsung thugs// thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// ma 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi
khyab// mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom// de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste// de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// lus dang
ngag sems brtan gyur na// byang chub rab 'byams 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po las 'das na// nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// sngags kyi spyod pas don

bsgrub pa// rmongs pas gal te 'da' byas na// de yis srog kyang der zad 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung dang sngags bzlas dang// phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa bzhin// brtson 'grus che dang brtan pas bzung// rnal
'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na// mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri'i so la nan tan du// skyes bus myur du ma bzung na// lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan med pa'i
sngags pa la// 'chi'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don ldan ma nyams dag byas shing// brtson 'grus cher
bskyed myur bar 'grub// sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgyar gsal// cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs// tshogs na yang ni nges pa med// ma tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lha sbyor

bas// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang// 'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med// ces gsungs pa'i tshig tu'o// dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bco lnga mdor bshad pa'i
le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga pa'i mdo 'di ltar yang bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
kyis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du// dbyings su ro gcig don bsdus te// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam pa'i zhing du

sbyong bas na// chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bde chen mi zad rin chen gter// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku// nyon mongs sdug
bsngal 'dod chags ni// lus dang zas kyis bsgribs gyur te// yi dwags sdug bsngal gnas su 'gro// skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur// rnag khrag ngan skyugs rtag tu mthong// de la spyod pa'i dbang
yang med// rtsub cing gdug pas bsrung bar 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang ni// 'khor ba'i lam lnga'i sgo bcad cing// bde gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed// yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur// thugs

rje'i tshul gyis khro ston cing// shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jug/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhi ba yis// yang dag mchog gi bde ba 'grub// ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni// bdag dang bdag gir dbyer med de// rang
bzhin med pa'i dbyings su rol// thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang// kun tu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba// shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyang// sems can nyon mongs dug

sel 'gyur// thams cad zhing sbyor nga rgyal ni// yon tan spyod pa'i mdzod yin te// nga med bdag med mi dmigs la// su zhig de la nga rgyal bskyed// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// shin tu rgyal ba'i
khyu mchog 'grub// lha srin bdud sde tshar gcod pa'i// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob// phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba// nga dang bdag med don rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis med de// bde
mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub// phrag dog dngos po mi shes shing// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur nas// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// de nas yi dwags gnas su 'gro// gal te yul sa rnyed
gyur na// shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur// gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la// dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni// nga dang
bdag tu 'dzin pa dang// phyin ci log la phrag dog ste// thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor// bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub// nga med bdag med dbyings
su thim// lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur// yi dam lha ni rtag bsgoms na// rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi// bdag gis kun tu dbang bsgyur te// rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje slob dpon
smad mi bya// yon tan rin chen gter chen po// thams cad ma lus ston pa ste// nyon mongs ma lus rtsad gcod pa'i// bla med 'bras bu 'thob par byed// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po las// shin tu lhag pa'i

bkur sti bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// phyag rgya chen po rtag tu gzhag/ sngags ni rtag tu brjod par bya// nyin yang lan gsum

mtshan yang lan gsum du// mkhas pa dag gis rgyun du bya// bar ma chad par bsgrims te bzlas// gsang ba'i man ngag gzhan du spel mi bya// rdo rje'i lce yi tshul yod kyang// theg pa dman dang ma 'dres pa// skye

bo phal par smra mi bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la// mngan dang 'phya sems smad pa dag/ rdzi phyogs tsam du'ang smad mi bya// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// bdud rtsi sman rnams rtag tu spyad// bla med grub

pa'i gsos yin pas// gtsang sme med par bza' bar bya// yid bzhin bdud rtsi dbang byed 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog chen po ni// sangs rgyas lnga po de yin pas// mi spang

rtag tu bsgrub par bya// dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba// gud na yod pa ma yin te// rang gi blta ba dam tshig yin// mi gtong phyir yang dam zhes bya// gzungs su gyur pas dam zhes bya// rdo rje ma nor lam ston
pas// de la yang ni tshig ces bya// yang na de bzhin bka' bcag pas/ mi khom gnas su 'tshig par 'gyur// dam tshig ces ni de la brjod// rdo rje rigs kyi bsgrub bya ba// sbyor dang sgrol bas mthar phyin

'gyur// sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin// sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor sgrol dang// dbang po'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang// thabs chen dag gi sbyor
sgrol dang// mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la rdzogs// shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu+u sbyor// thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang dbyings su+u thams cad

sgrol// rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje'i sprul pa ji ltar ston// sbyor sgrol phrin las bdag la rdzogs// byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'phro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// rig
'dzin bde ldan 'thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul// rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te// theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod// zad mi shes pa'i
gter yang 'grub// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ thugs rje'i sprul pa dpag med kyis// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus

mkhyen// 'gro ba nyid nas nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du 'khyer// 'khor ba nyid ni bde gnas so// chos kyi dbying dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu

'phrul drwa ba las smad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang bshad pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di

nyid las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'i dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje thugs rje'i ngang// dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i// brgyad brgyad drug cu zhing du sbyor// tsha ba rnams la

bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil drod 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa// thugs rje'i byin rlabs de ltar ston// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig

ni// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// ji ltar bde ba'i ro myong bzhin// myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med// chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// yi dwags gnas rnams tshar
gcod cing// lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa yi// nyon mongs gnyis ka med par ston// gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nga dang bdag med dbyer med pa'i// shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis// dran smra
med pa'i sdug bsngal bsal// rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol// byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing// thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar

ston// phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig ni// yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni// thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam sbyor zhing// dog dang yangs pa gnyi ga med// rgya chen yangs pa'iblo
ldan pas// 'di la mi chud gang yang med// thams cad yangs pa nyid du sbyor// lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed// nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa

la// nga dang khyod ces bya ba med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// gnyis med mtshan nyid brnan du med// che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas// bya ba dag ni med par bstan// nga rgyal bdag med rtogs pa
yis// dregs pa'i gnas rnams stong par byed// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa'i// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas

na// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor

zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang rig nyid la gnas pa yi// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma lus

de bzhin nyid du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ka med// yang dag kho na nyid du'o// bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus rnam par dag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// bde
dang mi bde gnyis ka med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang btsan pa// yang dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs// bshad dang nyan dang gnyis ka med// de bzhin nyid du yang dag
'du// dus bzhi'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad
dang// 'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi// mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor// lhun grub ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//

'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi// byang chub lam chen 'di yin te// thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus// byang chub don

grub ye nas rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa che mchog rigs su nges// rigs de byang chub brtan pas bzung// thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings
shes na// rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin// skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// byang chub kyi zhing
bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// phyi nang gnyis kyi gnas pa dag/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su thim// mdor na
zhing khams ma lus par// yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis spras pa rnams// zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye
shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gsang sngags chen po bsgrub 'dod pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can ni// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/ de
ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni// rdo rje'i bzhugs gnas yin par bshad// mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam par byang dang nyan mongs gnyis// so sor yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs
gnyen pos bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i

mchog/ gzhal yas khang rten zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas ni// dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye
shes rgyu las grub pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// zag pa zad las grub pa yi// nam yang 'jig med chos kyi dbyings// sna tshogs kun tu bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gdos po can gyi chos
min pas// ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du 'grub// rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na// stong par bya ba'am mi stong bya// thams cad dbyer med ngang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che// thams cad khyab par
yungs 'bru'i tshul// bsam yas mtha' dbus med pa'o// 'dren byed gnas stongs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig log rtog bsam yas kyis// 'jig rten khams rnams brgyud cing 'khor// 'khor ba'i rgyu

dang 'bras bu gnyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// yang dag byang chub sems rig na// ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// lam lnga ston

byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te// nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtogs dang mi rtog gnyis ka med// gnyis med de ni yang dag

lam// thabs dang she rab ngang nyid du// shin tu mnyam gzhag rtogs bya zhing// bla na med pa ston par bya// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang// de bzhin nyid kyis ma
brjod kyang// sems can blo yi rim pa bzhin// so sor 'tshams pa kun la gsal// 'di ni rdo rje'i theg mchog ste// rgya mtsho'i klung du chu 'babs bzhin// thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid// theg
pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa// rab tu rtogs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo chen rab ldan pas// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// thugs rjes ston pa bsam
mi khyab// don dang mthun pa 'ba' shig ston// mi mthun zhags pas 'khor ba gcod// bde gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus// sgyur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam

tshig ni/ rang rig ye shes dbang thob nas// dkar po tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang// de bzhin dug gsum byang chub ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs sdug

bsngal thar byed lam// thar dang ma thar gnyis ka min// thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba
gnyis// sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la// theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad

mtshan bzang dpag tu med// thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// spyod yul thams cad smon nas mkhyen// de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la// gnyis su med pas
dbang bsgyur te// ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing// thams cad byang chub mchog tu gyur// ye nas dngos po med pa la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rig 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig

ni// shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// rtag tu yangs pa chen po bsgom// rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug
pa yi// brgya brgya dag tu bsnur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa'o// zag med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab chen po rnam dag pas// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes
dang spyod yul gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas// zad med rin chen gter du 'gyur// mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog/ 'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi
khyab// bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yis// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med pa'i// de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i
rigs// thams cad gnyis su med pa la// bsgrub dang grub pa yod ma yin// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// de la lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang// phyin ci log gi blo log nas// log rtog gnas na longs spyod pa// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'khrul rtog blo ngan bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs
mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas// byang chub lam chen rtogs par ston// gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig tu

btags nas ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang// rdo rje'i gsung la spros pa med// spros med de ni sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu brda 'jal ye shes gsung// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma
chags med pa'o// bsgyur bzad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te// thams cad ye shes dbyings su
bstim// zad med ye shes gter ldan pas// thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
ni/ thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la// gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang// sngon gyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// thar dang ma thar gnyis pa la// so so ji ltar

'dod pa bzhin// chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis// thar pa bskul zhing ngan song sbyong// rang rig dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de ni ji snyed yod pa yi// mtshan
ma sna tshogs btags pa yang// rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang// ye shes rnam par
dag pa'i yul/ yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i// brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag/ thams

cad thugs su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// thugs la thugs ni mi gnas pa'o// 'dud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs
rgyas// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor te// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas// bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis// dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom// ma rig log 'dren 'dul mdzad de// chos kyi
dbyings su thams cad thim// stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi

khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad gdul bya chud ma zos// ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing// ye shes tshogs rdzogs kun tu ston// ye shes gsung
mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cing yang snang// snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de// de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes

ni// kun la dbang bsgyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang// 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// bsam yas ye shes rdo rje'i gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab

ste// mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung// sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa dang// dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar pi wang lag thogs nas// sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung

'gyur yang// dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid// phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad dang// dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun// phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi// thams
cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

dam tshig ni// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas snang ba rdo rje nyid// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka min// yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de/ rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi// ma bcos ma byas ngang
gis gsal// 'jig dang gzhig par bya ba min// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag/ de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// thar

pa rnams la dag pa'i sku// rtog pa can la 'khor ba'i lus// so sor 'tshams par don ston cing// ston pa nyid na dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang// kun la de ltar rtogs par byos// lhun grub bde

gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// byang chub snying po yod pa ltar// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad
kun// bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na// bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas// spyod yul thams cad smon nas shes// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas// thams
cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// gong na med pa'i sa gnas pas// thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin// thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min// de bzhin nyid la dbang
bsgyur nas// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud bdag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gzugs
snang thams cad ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pa// de bzhin yul gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun nas 'khyil par
gnas// zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zag bcas gnod sbyin nor 'dra ba// sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni// zag med 'phel 'grib med pa
yi// mang po spros pas phra mi 'gyur// nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin pas// thams cad kun tu khyab pa'o// rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma
lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// rnam rtog rkyen gyis glo bur du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rar gnas// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang
bzhin med pa'i don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/ gzung 'dzin dral byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyin ci log tu rnam brtags pas// bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang// de la 'dzin pa
gnyis zhugs nas// rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams cad stong pa yin// dngos dang stong nyid mi gnas pa// de rtogs sdug bsngal dral byed

yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'byung ba lnga la brten gyur pa// thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas// skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin// de

bzhin gshegs rab rnam gsum gyis// le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod// de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na// bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla na med pa'i
dkyil 'khor dang// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyis ka dag/ rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin no// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa ni// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid

na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don phyed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byang chub sems su don gcig pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// nyon mongs
lam nas grol bar byed// nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang// phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// de rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o// rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad

lhun gyis grub pa dang// sgyu ma yig yor tshul shes pas// gnyis ka rang rig nyid du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// ming tshig sgra la mi
brten par// blo yi gting du go bar byos// sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang
chub lam de ring ba min// byang chub sems zhes brjod pa ni// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// brjod med spros med ces bya ba'i dam
tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang// so so'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa// ba spu'i cha tsam brjod pa med// bsod nams chen pos bstangs pa yis// sangs rgyas

zhing nyid dag pa'o// las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas// de gnyis dbyings las spros pa med// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam dag sku gsung sprul pa dang// che mchog sna tshogs
bstan pa yang// byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te// snang ba nyid na dbyings su 'ub// phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis// khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor// de nyid log rtog sna tshogs snang// de

las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla med byang chub smos ci dgos// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun
tu khyab// ji lta ba yi ngang gnas la// de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas// gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su yis bcos shing su yis rtogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos
rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi// sus kyang ma bcos ngang gis gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul te// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// skyes bu blo stsal rab kyis rtogs// thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa// zad pa'i dus med yin bzhin mdzod// bdag dang

bdag gis med pa yi// shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung// chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang rig ye shes don rtogs nas// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung 'thob// byang
chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis// chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi
'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis yang dag rtogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su dgod// phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/
phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang// rtog pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang// snang ba nyid na dbyer med de// mtha' dbus med de zlum po yin// de bzhin rang gi rig pa yang// mtha' dang dbus med du ma
min// gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o// thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing// thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na// mi zad
par ldan rgyan 'thob ste// kun tu zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang

ldan// thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyis ka min// sna tshogs

snang ba thams cad kyang// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o// shes rab nyid thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi
dbyings nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung// 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang// thams cad shes rab dbyings las 'byung// mnyan bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab
kyis// shes rab thabs kyis don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor bar gyis// gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros
nas// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa'o// de yis ma byas gang yang med// kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig/ bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na/ gzhan gyis mthong bar

ga la 'gyur// thams cad sbyor byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas lha dang lha mo yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang// dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid
yum du sbyor// dus bzhi lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor// yang na shes rab dbyings ma la// bde gshegs dkyil
'khor kun bkod la// bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas// byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa
dang// 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// bde gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag
rdzogs// bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na// ngan 'gror mi ltung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba nyid// sbyor ba
nyid na ma lus bsgral// thams cad ma lus par bsgral ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed par// gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kun// bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa yis// dbyings su
yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu phra ba chen po yis// thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs
kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya// ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te// ye shes me chen
bsgoms byas nas// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstims byas te// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur// de ltar bsgral bar kun byas

kyang// bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga po gzhig pa la// bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zha// ma bshigs na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsad byas na// gnas pa nyid na dngos po
med// sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang// sus kyang zin cing sod pa med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// phyin ci log las

bzlog byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang// shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// nyon mongs
sdug bsngal rtsad bcas nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma
lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gir gzhan na med// rang bzhin ngang gis bdag med pa// kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang// spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med// thams cad ye nas stong pa la// gang
gis len cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// thogs pa med par spyod 'gyur yang// 'ching bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen po yin// ma

lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings// de ltar rang rig yin par bshad// gnyis su med par rtogs gyur nas// blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang// rdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams

cad kun// ye nas dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin ngang gis 'od gsal la// ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyis// ming dang tshig la dngos po med// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa
la/ so so'i mtshan ma dngos por bzung// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yongs med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang// rjod par byed dang brjod pa med// chos rnams thams

cad rdzun du snang// rdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod de// rdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin// thams cad rdzun gyi tshig bzhin no// rdo rje'i 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thog ma med nas phyin ci log/ bdag
dang bdag ces med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom
nas// rdo rje'i dbyings su thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams// gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba

min// 'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis// chos kyi don po mchog nyon la// 'khor ba spang med sangs rgyas shing// thams cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba zhes
bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de// rang rig dbyings kyi ye shes dang// sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis
ni// gnyis su med par 'byor byas na// nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos
rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// pad+ma 'dam nas skyes pa 'dra// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// bdag las gud na gcig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon
mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing// don rnams sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje'i rigs kyis thams cad bcom// rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin// pad+ma'i rigs kyis chags med 'gyur// sku
gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs te// mnyam pa'i dbyings las sems kyis blta// skye 'chi med par lhun gyis grub// sku

gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// rang byung ye shes gnas med yin// mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang// bla med byang chub skur

snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go/ nyon mongs med
cing bla med sgra// ma brjod stong gsum grags pa yi// gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa nyid nas stong gsum med// de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang
dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa// bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs
mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang bsgyur ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan gyur na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ub// spyod yul ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar
dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung// mi zad rin chen gter chen 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi// bo d+hi'i dkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bya byed med par rnam bzhi

mdzad// mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med ngang gis dkyil 'khor la// chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs

kyang// byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyi// brjod pa nyid na yongs med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang// de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid

yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis
kun tu khyab// snod bcud ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni

nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung// thams cad kun gyi gnas rten
te// de bzhin theg chen bla med la// byang chub sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas// theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung// thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i
dam tshig ni/ bdag med ye shes rang rig gis// dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsreg/ rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang// sems kyi phra rtog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas nas// 'khor
ba ma spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye shes tshogs// thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad
ni// sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur// mnyan bsam bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas nas// pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrub// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas
te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad bkod// khrus kyi mchog ni 'di yin no// g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul gyis g.yogs par 'gyur// sems
dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas// ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la gzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor bar gyis// ma bcos ye nas de ltar
gnas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig phyin ci ma log pa'i// gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag
yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ji ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs// mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin// chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes par

bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid ni 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang// de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o// so sor

snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang bdag tu ma brtags pa// de ltar bu yi ngang du snang// chos rnams sgra ltar shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang// dngos po med las

dngos po'i sgra// brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon pa gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gud

na med// chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang// yod pa ma yin kun tu
mnam// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// dri yis rab tu tshims gyur kyang// dri dang snom pa gnyis su med// chos thams cad ro ltar shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam
tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad byung// de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang// rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yis// rnam shes dbang po'i yul tshogs na// ro yi dbang

po thams cad 'grub// ro dang ro ru rtog pa yang// rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos rnams thams cad reg bya ltar shes pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzugs rnams lbu ba rdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi chu bur
bzhin/ mtshan 'dzin smig sgyu bzhin du gnas// rnam shes sgyu mas dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong// de nyid bsod nams tshogs chen po// bde ba
chags med ye shes yin// 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yang dag nyid la gnas byas na// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs// sgyu mar 'dzin pa
yum gyi dbyings// gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med// gcig la'ang lnga lngar bshigs pa dang// thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus ma byas kun tu 'byung ba

zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gshegs su sgyu mar snang ba dang// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong// rigs dang rgyud du brtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med pas// phyi

nang snod bcud rnam par snang// snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog 'du byed
mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar bus pa shed ma bye// bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// 'du

byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen

pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin ye nas zlum// thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i

dam tshig ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rang byung ye shes chen pos kun tu khyab// rang byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi// bdag la
gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// ye nas bde gnas zhing du'o// chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas dbyings su ro gcig
pas// de la nga bdag ma gtogs pa// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo tsam med// thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas// rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'go/ shes rab mchog gis de ltar
rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos// thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis// bdag rtogs mtshan ma kun bshigs nas// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya

ru// thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs// rtogs pa nyid kyang dngos med la// de nyid sna tshogs sar snang ba'i// snang ba nyid na bya byed med// de nyid 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya

ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la su zhig gsang// gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la// skye dang 'chi ba
de la yod// ye shes can gyis brtags pa na// skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas// ngan song gnas rnams yan chad
du// yang dag par ni dbyer med de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas pa// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub rgyu yod
pa'o// thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par spyad bya ste// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad// de bzhin
gshegs pa lngar yang brtags// gzhan yang stong khams thams cad ni// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyad// thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs
dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i rigs mchog ma gtogs pa// theg pa dman dang lta ba dman// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur// mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis kun khyab kyang// nyon mongs sdug

bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs// de yis yang dag nyid ma mthong// thams cad bsrung du med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge

gnyi ga med// nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med// de bzhin nyid kyi klong gyur ni// bde dang mi bde dbyer med de// ye nas dag mnyam nyid du gnas// de la bsrung du rdul tsam med// thams cad bsrung ba
med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can khams gsum 'khor ba ni// thog ma med nas sems yan gtang// phyin ci log la 'byol nyog spyad// gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags// des na
'khor bar rtag tu 'phyan// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo g.yeng ba yongs spangs te// nga med bdag med mnyam par bsrung// thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje sems

dpas bkas bcad pa'i// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// de bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na// yak+sha khro bo me dbal gyis// snying nas drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de yi sdug

bsngal bzod blag med// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// dam rdzas so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rigs lnga so sor dbye ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ rin po che ni rta yi sha/ pad+ma nya yi sha chen
te// don yod nam mkha' lding gi sha/ bde gshegs rigs ni sha chen no// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// nges par dang du blang ba'o// yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu// yang na mtshan nyid med par
brtags// ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ de bzhin nyid kyis rgyas btab pas// gnyis su dbyer med ting 'dzin bstan// de ltar sangs rgyas sems can ni// rang gi byang chub
sems yin pas// dus gsum na ni rgyal ma bzhugs// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa'i// brjod pa'i tshig las 'das pa de// rgyal ba yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// de ltar shes pa rgyal ba bas// thabs
mkhas shes pa'i ting 'dzin yin// phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni/ bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba las// thams cad kun la yod par bshad// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil

'khor ni// bla na med pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje'i rigs mchog thams cad kyis// bar ma chad par rtag tu 'grub// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur// bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub// skye 'chi med pa'i

bde 'grub ste// sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur// spyod yul thams cad smyon na shes// gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song gnas su skye// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla

med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad// rigs chad nyid du skye bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas// rtag
tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la// sku ni 'ja' tshon tshul 'dra bar// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom// lha yi sku rnams gsal
bsgoms na// bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag par bsgom// yi dam lha de spangs

byas na// ngan song mi bde rtag tu myang// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad pa'i don ni/ sngags dang phyag rgya bar mi gcad// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin// don
mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rtag tu mnyam gzhag phyag rgya yin// dug gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te// yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas// dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags// yid brtan rtag

tu bzlas bsgom bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phyag rgya bskyed dang yi ge A+oM// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin// byang
chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pas// chags med zhing du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing// 'khor ba'i lam rnams stongs par byed// ma rig mun sel sgron me yin// long ba rnams kyi
dmigs bu mkhan// de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi spun yin te// thog ma med nas las mthun

pas// blta spyod mthun pas 'dir skyes te// gcig la gcig ni mig 'drar bya// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// spyod pa ngan sems dpya byas na// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// de bas dam tshig 'da'
mi byed// gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab// phyin ci log gis rab bsgribs nas// dbul po'i gter dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra// de
bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir shin tu gsang// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ de la gsang don bstan gyur
na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod tshul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par khrid// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas shin tu gsang
bar bya// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i// thar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na// sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin// theg pa mtho dman don nyid ni// so sor 'tshams par
bstan dgos so// dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu spyad// chags pa med par gyur pa dang// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung// ma rtogs pa
yis spyad gyur na// yi dwags srin po'i gnas su skye// yang na dam tshig 'di lta bur// ji ltar spyad kyang dam mi 'da'// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur/ 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba
na// mnyam pa de yi dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bya lam nam mkha' gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung

chen 'phyo ba bzhin// yid kyi rtog tshogs ma lus pa// chu la nya chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor blta ba de ltar ltos// de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab gyis// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting sbos// rdo rje theg mchog khas
'che la// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par/ gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing// thugs thub dag gis spyad byas pa// dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam
pa'i rang bzhin gang yang med// mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med// ci la'ang mi gnas kun la spyod// spyod par byed dang spyod pa med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin skye ba
na// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yon tan mi zad gnas kyang yin// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing// kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la// chos dang gang zag bdag med na// 'di ni byang chub sa
pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing// rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa// chos rnams lus thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po
yod blta zhing// spang dang mi spang byed 'gyur ba// 'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin// dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing// dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi yi skye gnas te// 'dod khams dag tu 'khor
ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing// tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi// rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing// gzugs sogs dag la rab tu rtog/ de ni tshangs gnas rim par skye// mnyam pa'i

gzugs med ma rtogs par// ming bzhi med par ma shes te// skye mched bzhi la gnas gyur pas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye// thams cad mnyam par ma shes nas// ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing// snying rje yang
dag med gyur na// 'di ni mi bzad chen po yi// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin// chags med dngos po mi shes nas// thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing// lus kyi sgrib dang zas kyi sgrib// yi dwags
chen po'i gnas su skye// nga dang bdag med mi shes shing// chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas// shes rab mi gsal don med pas// dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs// 'di ni byol song gnas su skyes// shin
tu nga rgyal cher skyes shing// thams cad bdag gir yongs bzung bas// kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed cing// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// theg mchog mtho man thams cad dang// 'jig rten lta
ba thams cad kun// ye shes chen pos rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med// shes rab chen po'i mig ldan pas// mtho dman gnas dang lam drug
gnas// so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs// sngags mchog bla na med pas ni// mtshan ma kun dang mi brtag par// mnyam pa'i ngang du thams cad med// kun kyang mnyam pa nyid yin pas// 'jig rten

'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so so'i lta ba brjod mi lang// spyir ni log rtog bsam yas pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyi// gzung 'dzin drwa bas bsgribs gyur te// ci yang med

la cir yang snang// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de ltar rtogs na bde 'gro'i gnas// rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni// ci ltar spyod kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen

lding ba bzhin// chu la rkyal chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung chen 'phyo ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta// ral 'byor spyod pa chen po ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong

bar 'gyur// de la su zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu yi ngang du spyod// 'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin// lta spyod ya char ma gyur

par// sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad// kha cig lta ba mnyam nas kyang// spyod pa dag dang yongs mi mthun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang// mnyam pa'i lta ba yongs mi shes// kha cig lta spyod gnyi ga
med// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// bla med theg chen ngang gnas ni// don dam du ni dbyer med de// kun rdzob tu ni thams cad

la// dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu yang dbyer med de// lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni// bla
med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni nor bdun no// kun rdzob nyid du mnyam rdzogs so// mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam par
dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba yang// dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod gnyis na rnam par dag/ dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams
cad kun// rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus// ma lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin// mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung
ba// yon tan chen po gnas yin te// zhing khams mi zad gnas kyang yin// 'di ni rin chen rigs su gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// chags dang chags par bya ba med// de bzhin nyid du

gcig pa ste// nyes pas mi gos pad+ma yin// thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas// 'di la bya ba rdul tsam med// ma byas bzhin du don grub pa// skyon yon byang chub nyid du sbyor// 'di ni las rnams grub pa
yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa yi tshul rtogs te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// dam tshig chen
po'i mdo rnams las// 'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sra zhing brtan pa'i gnas yod
pas// dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te// 'di ni sa chen yin par bshad// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing// mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di ni me yi rigs su
bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la/ ngang gis ye nas 'byor ldan zhing// mnyen chags nyid du gnas pa ni// yang nas yang du rgyud ma chad// mi bde dag pas chu chen yin// chos rnams ma lus thams
cad la// dngos por snang la gzung du med// bskyod nas thams cad kun smra ste// 'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nam mkha' chen po yis// phyi dang nang gi go

'byed pa'o// thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de// 'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang// thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'ub// nyon mongs

lnga po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs// dngos med rtogs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro// de
bas thos bsam bsgom pa yis// yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la chags byed de// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis

gnas// ma chags pa la chags pa dang// shin tu chags mchog chen po yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin// thams cad pad+mar brdzus las skyes// rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa

ru skye// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyin ci log la zhe sdang zhing// zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang

nyid ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med de// de ltar ma rtogs kun la sdang// de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes// des na zhe sdang nyid du mthong// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// zhe sdang thugs rje chen
po yin// gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// don dam dang ni dbyer med pas// kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos med pas// de la su zhig bdag tu
'dzin// thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi gti mug yin// de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas byas nas// phyin ci log
dang theg dman la// shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang// nga rgyal zhi ba so so min// rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus// 'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag par shes par byos// phrag dog

mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom// de bas phrag
dog chen po yin// phyin ci log ni bdag tu bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pas shin tu dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam// de nyid shes pas las rab grub// phung po

lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phung po lnga por snang ba yang// kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul// so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing// lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshigs byas na// so so'i

mtshan nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la dngos bzung na// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston// snang dang mi
snang gnyis su med// de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas// gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi/ bde dang mi bde dngos po

med// gnyis ka ma yin lung ma bstan// sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang// tshor dang 'byung ba gnyis ka stong// stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin// de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin// 'du shes mtshan nyid
bshad pa ni// gsum sogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin// so so'i mtshan nyid bshigs pa na// dngos po med de de bzhin nyid// dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun tu 'jug/ khams gsum ma
lus thams cad la// mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab// khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan// 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas// rtsa ba brgyad po grangs
'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kun la 'pho// de rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin// med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung// de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas// khams gsum btson ra

kun tu 'khor// yang dag don phyir rig pas ni// 'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de// de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med de skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol par mdzod// sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin
par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te// de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// kha dog dbyibs dang rigs rgyud min// gang yang ma yin de mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te// mtho ris 'gro'am

ngan song 'gro// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang shes na// 'di ni ye shes chen po yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la/ ye shes lnga yis kun khyab

kyang// rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong// ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dag dmar dang ser ba dang// ljang gu la sogs nag
por bstan// chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar bar bstan// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// pad+ma
rA ga zhes brjod de// chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med phyir yang dmar po'o// yon tan gter chen zad mi shes// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la// zad
med rin chen gter gyur pa// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma
lus rdzogs par byed// kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med// kha dog nag po'i dngos po la/ tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin
kun la shes par byos// phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya'i phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par
bya// sems can ma rig ldongs pa la// nyon mongs ma lus bsal bya'i phyir// ye shes sgron ma'i 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// de phyir de la shar zhes bya// sems can ma lus thams cad
la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing// ma rig mun pa nub gyur pas// de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ye shes chen po bdag med pas// sdug bsngal

rab tu byang byas pas// de la byang gi phyogs zhes brjod// de ltar ma lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub// rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur pas// de ni yon tan chen por rdzogs// de ltar chos
rnams ma lus kun// rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta// ma rig phyin ci log rnams

kyis// phyogs rnams so sor bzung gyur nas// rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing// phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin// dngos po
bzung bas khams gsum 'khor// gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang/ lha dang lha mo'i dngos por brtag/ bdag dang lha nyid gnyis med pa'o// sgra rnams sna tshogs grags

pa yang// sgra nyid dngos po med par shes// sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni// chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin// dri yi dngos por snang ba yang// dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// dri snom chos nyid dri yin

te// shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos por snang ba yang// ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ror bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro// bde ba de yis tshims par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang// reg

bya'i dngos po yongs med de// reg byar snang ba longs spyod yin// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis// dbang po yul la chags gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing// ngan song
gsum dang mi khom brgyad// rtswa dang sog ma'i me bzhin du// khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de bas ye shes chags med rtogs// byas la mi sogs bsod nams byos// kun la spyod cing mi gos

pas// ye shes chen po rtag tu bsgom// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// don dam skye ba med par mnyam pa dang// kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang/ don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa
dang/ chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang/ rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin
nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'// yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid
de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang// 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang// 'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed// rtog pa kun gyi

mtshan mar snang// 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas// thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni// chos
rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung// med dang yod pa gnyis ka min// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang// snang ba nyid na dngos po

med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te// de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa

yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung// so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni// thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam// mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// rnam par

shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni// rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// de nyid chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing// kun kyang dbyer med nyid yin pas// thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul// thams cad kun la yud rtog cing// rtogs dang brtag par bya ba med// dus gsum du'ang mi
dmigs pa// 'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin// log rtog dbang gis spyod yul spangs// dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med dang// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam
pa rnam lnga de ltar brtag/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang// thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtag/ 'di ni yang dag rtags pa yin// chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam

tshig ni/ bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'pho 'khor lo'i tshul// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang// 'khor gyi khro
bo khro mo yi// yang dag 'das pa dkyil yin te// 'jig rten 'das pa 'khor yin no// tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur zhing// byang chub sems dang ma chags
pa'i// gnyis su med par thim gyur na// tshogs chen nyid kyang rdzogs par ldan// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// gzugs
mdzes lha dang lha mor brtag/ thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni// chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang// ngan song sbyangs shing thar lam ston// stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang// thams cad 'jal ba'i
sgra yang yin// bde ba tshims byed bsod nams de// brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin// 'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung// chos nyid dngos po med pa la// gri yis mchog tu tshims byed pa// bsod nams
tshogs chen yin par bshad// de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na// rigs 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar byed// ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri// kun tu bde gnas thob par byed// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma
lus la// bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur// tshims byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur// dngos por mi 'dzin ye shes tshogs// de lta bu yi ro mchog gis// thams cad kun la tshims par 'gyur// yi
dwags gnas su longs spyod ldan// dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yis// bde ba chen po yongs rdzogs pa'i// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// rnam pa mang po brgyan pa dang// sbyor mchog dag gis
longs spyod na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur// bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar gyur na// sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par
byed// tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// kun la thogs pa med par spyad// thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'dul bar byed// yon tan
chen po 'phel bar byed// khro bo gtum po'ang zhi bar byed// thams cad kun la spyad bde ba// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbyings su sdud pas dkyil yin te// 'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis

bskor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// de lta bu yi tshul du gnas// 'khor gyi phra men tshims byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu// rtag tu mnyam gzhag khro bo'i tshul// 'khor
rnams khro rnams de bzhin te// mdog dang phyag mtshan thams cad dang// sngags mchog dam pa ma lus gdon// de nas phra men 'khor bsdus nas// so so'i las dang mthun byas te// so so'i gnas su gzhag
par bya// dbang du bsdu dang bsgo ba'i thabs// ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du byas// ma lus thams cad byos shig par// lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// 'dod yon lnga
yi sbyin pa gtong// de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brten na// rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya// de
ltar bsgrub pa'i ngang 'chang ba// ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// theg dman spyod pa yongs mi 'gyur// mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur// skye 'chi med

pa'i g.yung drung thob// sangs rgyas zhing dang sbyor bar byed// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
las/ bdag dang sems can dbyer med par yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing// bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir// ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs

so// kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// srid gsum ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing// yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang gis de ltar rig

pa de// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas// lta spyod mthun par zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor
yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'o// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun grub cing// de ltar gang gis rtogs gyur pa// de ni ye shes mig can yin// de yis yang

dag snying po mthong// de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa// shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba// sems dpa'i mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin// de
bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rtog nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal dngos po med bsgoms na// mthong thos
la sogs myed pa'i tshul// rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// 'grub 'gyur nyid la dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis// bdud dpung dkyil du tA la
btsugs// thams cad byang chub zhing bsdus te// gdug pa ngang gis mi dga' nas// tA la bcad bsams kyang mi chod// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang ting 'dzin mthun gyur pas// de nyid rdo rje'i
zhal mthong yin// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te// ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal ba// thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// kun la dbang bsgyur cis mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med
de// las mthun ji ltar snang ba bzhin// bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod gcig/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong yin// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chen por rags pa thabs su rtogs// so
so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtogs// gnyis med 'brel ba thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir// yod
dang med pa gnyis ka min// gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus nyid dbyings su ma phye ba'i// thams cad de lta bu yi ngang// mnyam nyid dbyer med cis mi
tshugs// de nyid sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de// sems dpa' nyid dang rigs mthun pas// de nyid rdo rje'i zhal mthong yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i phung khams

la// gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig/ sgyu mar snang bas gzugs brnyan tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs ston// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnam shes byang chub
sems// yul dus bo d+hi chen po yin// bdag rtogs rnam bzhi khro bo yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings gyur kun tu bzang// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'

yin// gang zhig de ltar rtogs gyur na// sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs mthun pa// de nyid rdo rje'i zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang// sgra yis mtshon nam

don ston pa// kun kyang yi ge ming tshig bzhin// gang yang dngos yod ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang// snang ba nyid na gang yang med// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang// dngos po med de yang dag

nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa yi// rigs mchog dam pa'i rgyu yin te// rdo
rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang// byang chub sems la gnas bcas
pas// dper na mngal dang sgo nga bzhin// mngon du mi 'byung bsgribs gyur kyang// rtsal chen 'dul ba 'byung ba bzhin// rnam rtog gzugs ni bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur zhing// rigs mchog
dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar mnyam pa yi// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde ba can gyi zhing yang 'thob// byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi ston
pa'o// lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i rigs mchog kun la spyod// tha mar skye rga na 'chi 'di la sogs pa yi// sdug
bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rdo rje'i rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje'i rigs su 'dren par byed// bdud sde

tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul// bla
med theg par sangs rgyas tshul// lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// kun la mthun pa'i tshul ston yang// de bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston// chos rnams ma lus thams

cad kun// de lta bu yi ngang du gnas// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// nyid la nyid de skad brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab kyis rdo rje sems dpa' zhal
