mthong ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs snang ba ste// snang ba'i dngos po rnam bshigs

na// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos med pas// gzhig na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi// nam mkha' de nyid lngas bshigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i ngang du thim// thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad

cig ma// snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te// rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid// nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni// kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la// nga dang bdag tu rnam par rtog/ bde sdug mtshan ma so sor
'dzin// kun gzhi dngos po med pa la// bag chags stsogs pa'i gnas med de// snang ba'i dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis blang du med// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// de ltar sgo byed dngos po
med// med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pas// khams gsum btson rar rtag tu 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni// snang dang mi snang gnyis ka la// skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin// rtog pa nyid kyang ma

'grub na// yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub// yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni// snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa// phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med// da ltar rang bzhin dmigs su med// rtsi shing ka na rlung 'phyo
'dra// rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa// 'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba// de gsum gcig dang so so min// de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs
yin// gcig pa ma yin so so min// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing// gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin// rtogs na sangs
rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni// shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba// yangs la rgya che gting zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas mi 'ong gar mi
'gro// 'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min// shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang// dbyings dang
dbyings kyi ye shes kyang// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// sems can ma lus thams cad kyis// de ltar khong du chud par byos// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang// bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems

can ma lus thams cad la// snying rje'i thag pa ma chad par// nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing// byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la// snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyangs

nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen pos skyong bar byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la// las kyi sgribs pas mi gos shing// thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la
'gyod ma byed// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtogs mi byaid de// bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma med par bya// chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas// de la dngos
dang rtog pa med// nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang ba thams cad dngos med pas// yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan
nyid med pas mi dmigs so// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang// bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun la smon cing chags su med// byang chub sems rnams thams
cad ni// shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas// rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu// byang chub de nyid sems yin no// sems dang byang chub
dbyer med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang// dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub// bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad// skyes bu
blo rtsal rab ldan pas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par bshad// spyad pa nyid na chags pa med// dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong

yang// snang ba nyid na dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ste// ri bong rwa dang mo gsham bu// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod
kyi// thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med// thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// dran med rdos pa ma yin pas// rtog med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gdos po
can gyis chos med do// shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o// thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dam dbyings yin te// gzhan nas btsal zhing bzhag tu med// yod las btsal na sgro btags
'gyur// med las btsal na skur btab ste// yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta

bu// tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang// don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgom// de lta bu yi don rtogs na// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyod kyang// theg chen bsgom las nyams pa med// gang gis don ltar ma

rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas// don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na// tshig gi mnyam pas 'tshang mi rgya// de bas don tshig
ldan par byos// 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du

gcig/ rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// des ni byang chub snying po len// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las dbang po dang yul du
'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir// thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus

shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la/ 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang/ dam tshig ni gnas yin no// phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
do// gsang ba de nyid kho na las// byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye nas dbyer med de
bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ub// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid ngang las ma gtogs pa// log rtog nyon
mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi// rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas
shing// phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su// las rnams rab tu rdzogs par byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ ye nas
rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin// 'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o// rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa// bcu gsum don grub bde gnas sa// mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas
pa'o// rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// thams cad shes rab ngang du gnas// rigs lnga bde gshegs yab yum du// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thabs dang shes rab

nyid la rol// de nyid ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug pa dang// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs
pa// lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang// yan lag stobs chen bsgul bsigs kun// nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang// rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas// 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa// rang
byung chen po lha yi lha// thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed// dpa' bo zhes kyang gdag par bya'o// las dang las kyis mi gos pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing// ma chags pa la chags pa
dang// shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la// sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes// yon tan mi zad gter du 'gyur// 'di ni mi zad par ldan pa'o// sku gsung las rnams
rdzogs byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// gdul ba'i don chen bsam mi khyab// 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang// thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub
pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro// rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gnyis med gcig pa ste// lhun

grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du// phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni// thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin// dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na// sems can kun gyis yongs mi 'da'// de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya

yin// kun la khyab cing thams cad snang// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun// mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na// 'di lta bu la rtag

tu gnas// de lta bu yi blo med na// rdo rje'i rigs su yongs mi bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
nges pa las/ glu gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba 'di/ nges par ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi// thams cad dbyer med maN+Da la'i// nyi zla shar
ba'i gzhal yas la// pad+ma chags med gdan bting nas// rin chen zad med pho brang sa// che chung tshad ni dpag med pa'i// byang chub bde gsal dkyil 'khor la/ bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas// ma lus
kun bsdus dbyings bsdus nas// lus bskyod yan lag bsgul bsig dang// dbang po lnga yi lta spyod kun// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// gong gi dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas// bdag nyid dbyings
las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas par bsgom// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor du// lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms nas// bro thabs gar gyi phyag rgya dang// glu dbyangs tshig gi sgra

bsgrags shing// phyogs bcu'i skye gnas ma lus kun// rdo rje lhun grub sku mthong zhing// chos kyi dung chen sgra yang thos// sgrib gnyis byang nas byang chub 'grub// bde mthong rnyed pa grags 'gyur ba// bsod
nams tshogs chen 'grub par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas// thams cad dbyer med dbyings su sbyor// gnyis med dbyings gyur byang chub sems// 'od zer 'bar bas phyogs bcur
gsal// sangs rgyas zhing sbyang rig 'dzin bskul// ngan song gsum rnams dag par byed// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung// rgyur byas 'bras bu smin grub
na// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rdzogs// bde ba'i thabs chen thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab bde mchog brtan ldan rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// rak+ta byang chub dum gcig 'bar// gnyis med
zung du 'brel gyur na// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab ldan// rgyan mchog mdzes pas kun brgyan nas// ting 'dzin 'od 'bar gsal bsgoms te// phyogs bcu
gang 'bar dkyil 'khor spro// ma lus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs dbyings nas dkyil 'khor mchod// spyan gyis gzigs dang snyan gyis gsan// dri dang ro dang reg bya'i gnas// thabs dang

shes rab nyid gnas shing// bde mchog ro yis tshims par byed// spyod bzhin chags dang gnyis med par// tshogs chen dag kyang rdzogs par ldan// b+h+rUM dang tsakra'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi zla 'khrugs pa'i sa
gzhi la// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting nas// thabs dang shes rab chags med tshul// yan lag dbang po thams cad kun// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa dang// ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o// ye
nas ma bcos yongs kyis te// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor// yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi'i 'khor// kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya
dang// thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te// phyogs bcur spro zhing ngan song sbyong// gnas su bsdu zhing dkyil 'khor bstim// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// bde gshegs zhing du rnam par
sbyang// yan lag chen po lnga bskyod na// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du 'dzud// snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag/ bzang mdzes legs pa'i gos bgos na// 'od zer sna

tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur// de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar// ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar bsgom// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting gi// bdag
dang dbyer med nyid du'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas// shar gyi phyogs su kha bltas te// seng ge'i stabs chen mchongs par bya// lce dkyil yi ge hrIHbsgoms nas// lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas
dang// hrIHyang bsam gyis mi khyab spro// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba// gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags// sgra dang
ming tshigs so sor gsal// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs// thar dang ma thar gnyis ka brjod// nges pa kho na yang dag tu// de bzhin nyid kyis yongs ma gsungs// rna ba'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor
du// trAM gi yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas// rna dkyil phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab spro// trAM yang bsam yas 'od 'phro 'bar// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos// 'gro drug
'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos// sgra dang thos pa gnyis med pa'o// de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams// so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas// yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma
lus dang// 'gro drug ma lus thams cad kun// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol// dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis// kun la tshim par yang dag mchod// 'gro drug ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar 'tshams

pa'i don yang byed// thabs mkhas thugs rje de ltar ston// kun byas byang chub nyid du'o// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// thabs dang shes
rab ldan bsgoms te// tshom bu gcig gam yang na gsum// lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te// thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du// lha gsal 'od 'phro bstim byas te// dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar
bsgom// ting 'dzin shin tu gsal bsgoms nas// bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par// gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o// de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis// blta spyod ya char ma gyur
par// dkyil 'khor dag la gsal bsgoms nas// dbus nas shar phyogs kha bltas nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen bskyod byas shing// lag gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas// bro dang gar gyi phyag rgyar bya// dkyil
'khor 'od zer dkar 'phro ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag/ shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar// thabs dang shes rab bde 'grub shog/ cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yis// bdud bzhi dag ni 'joms
par byed// theg mchog rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin sa// thabs dang shes rab bde 'grub shog/ bdag nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med par shog/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// thabs dang

shes rab gsal 'gyur shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// ma rig mun pa med par byed// thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bar// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ shin tu sra zhing skye shi med// rdo
rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa// 'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung// thabs dang shes rab byams ldan shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// yon tan phyogs su kha bstan te// lus bskyod yan lag bsgul
bsigs nas// stabs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i gter// zad med nor bu rin po che// ma lus kun gyi re ba skong// thabs dang shes rab bde 'grub shog/ nam mkha'i
dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa// yang na thams cad gser btso ma// dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shes// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang// thams cad mnyam pa'i
ngang gnas nas// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te// thabs dang shes rab mnyam 'gyur shog/ bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che// ye nas chags med byang chub zhing// yang dag nyid du thams cad
gnas// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// yan lag dang po bskyod byas te// gar rnams shin tu gsal byas nas// stabs chen
dag kyang brdung bar bya// chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// thabs dang shes rab bde 'grub shog/ las dang nyon mongs nub gyur
pa'i// bag chags mtshan ma rdul tsam med// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ byang chub chags med dkyil 'khor ni// gang nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbyings// mi gnas tshul gyis dbyings na
bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te// lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing// phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur
nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya// yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sgrib pa thams cad byang byas nas// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ sku
gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdud bzhi bcom nas mi mthun bsal// bya byed med la don rnams 'grub// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa// sna tshogs ma lus
'gyur ba'o// ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ thams cad ma lus don grub pa// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// nan tan chen po'i bya ba rdzogs// thabs dang
shes rab myur 'grub shog/ sdug bsngal drwa ba tshar bcad de// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ bde gshegs ma lus thams cad
kun// phyogs dus kun tu bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pas// bde gshegs kun la rnam par 'phro// thabs
dang shes rab ldan pa yis// bde ba'i dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bsdu// thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi// nang du ma 'dus gang yang med// de nyid bde gshegs dkyil 'khor nyid// thabs dang shes rab
bde grub shog/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbus bsdus shing// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro// phyogs bcu gsal bar gang gyur nas// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa
yi// thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te// thams cad kun tu bzang por ston// thabs dang shes rab gtsor 'grub shog/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la// chos kyi
'khor lo chen po bskor// thabs dang shes rab mchog 'grub shog/ 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyi rgyu yod pas// ma mthong rmongs la nam mkha'i mdog/ thabs dang shes rab dbyings 'grub

shog/ sku ni sna tshogs cir yang snang// thabs chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya'i tshul// lha mi rnams la dge
bcu'i tshul// dud 'gro rnams la e na ya// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston// de lta bu yi skur ston pa// thabs dang shes rab sku 'grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan
bsgoms nas// rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan// yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor dgod// ye shes rgyan gyis bro yang brdung// gnyis med dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul// mtha' dbus med pa'i
dkyil 'khor du// lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub tu// thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ chos dbyings dam pa bdag med pa// mi dmigs dbyings su ma lus 'dus// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med
pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyings 'grub shog/ bde gshegs dkyil 'khor dbu bskyod na// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bsgul bskyod na// rig 'dzin zhing khams dag par
byed// rkang chen dag gis stabs mchongs na// 'gro drug gnas rnams stongs par byed// spyan gyis phyogs bcur bltas byas na// bdud bzhi'i dpung rnams pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab ma lus
kun// de lta bu yi don 'grub shog/ thams cad ma lus de bzhin te// de ni gang yang mi dmigs la// skye dang 'gag dang gnas pa dang// 'ong dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med// rnal 'byor bro gar rtsed 'jo

dang// sna tshogs byed la byas pa med// de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// rnal 'byor las rnams 'grub par shog/ thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// de lta bu yis longs spyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa// yun ring chos kyi bde spyad nas// bla med rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dpe byad

mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan// mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang bsgyur te// spyod yul kun tu maN+Da la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du
'grub// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// de lta bu yis las rnams bya// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang// lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas 'byung dang skal mnyam 'gyur// theg pa dman

par yongs mi byed// ngan song gsum du yongs mi ltung// gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i// gnas ngan sa ru yongs mi ltung// rdo rje'i theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lus

byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med// skad gdangs snyan zhing 'gro don byed// bdag gis longs spyod thams cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// tshan po che yi mthu

stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed// gzhan la gnod pa yongs mi byed/ snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan// mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par spyod// mthar ni skye shi
med pa'i sa// sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che// bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad la// dbang bsgyur spyod pa'i dngos grub thob// rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don// ljags kyi dbang po

bkram nas ni// gsang don nges pa'i don ston pa// bla med mchog tu 'grub par shog/ bla med byang chub thor tshugs can// shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas// mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur// theg mchog rdo

rje de lta bu// dkyil 'khor mi zad 'byung ba'i gter// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// byi dor byas shing shin tu gsal// bskal pa grangs med gnas gyur kyang// sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul// skye shi med pa rdo

rje yi// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter yin te// yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ldan// bla med byang chub 'grub 'gyur nas// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par shog/ tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig/ thams cad

kun gyi ston pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog/ de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs// sku gsung thugs kyang 'grub par shog/ rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab
tu// ldan pa rnams kyis dus thams cad// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyad cing// glu dang gar dang bro thabs bya'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ bro gar rtsed 'jo'i le'u ste so gsum
pa'o//// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang lung gi spyi gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul le lhag bstan pa'o////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra sa twa mA yA dzA la gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta twa de sha ma hA la Di ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba las/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na bstan pa rol pa chen po'i rgyud ces
bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// bdag nyid kun tu bzang po'i gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// thams cad 'dus
pa'i bdag nyid mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos// phyogs bcu'i stong gsum kun gsal mdzad// rigs kyi phrin las sna tshogs pa'i// kun don dkyil 'khor chen po nyid// rang bzhin sprul pa bdag
nyid kyis// 'khor lo gsang ba'i gnas chen bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i dbyings// ma lus kun 'dus 'bras bu'i mchog/ kun nas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// gsang sngags zab mo'i theg
pa kun// ye shes gsal ba'i bdag nyid can// yon tan kun rdzogs phrin las mdzad// 'di dag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// rol pa kun 'jug rgyu yi gnas// tha dad min la tha dad snang// dkyil 'khor
kun nas sna tshogs pa'i// 'og min lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// mtha' dang dbus med 'khyil pa'i bdag/ mdzes pa'i rin chen kun gyis brgyan// tshad med ye shes 'khor lo'i gnas// chos

tshogs mtshan ma'i gnas 'joms shing// ma bkod ye nas brgyan pa yi// rigs kyi yon tan kun 'byung gnas// yang dag tshul gyis log lta 'joms// mya ngan kun bral grong khyer che// khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud

bcas// phyogs bcu rgya yongs ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par bklubs// chos nyid snang ba'i bdag nyid can// ye shes nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag/ rang rig don mthun rtags kyi tshul// rtse mo nor bu 'bar ba
la// rigs kyi mtshan ma rgyan du bcas// ngo bo gnyis med 'khyil pa'i bdag/ de las bsam yas grangs med pa'i// tha dad sna tshogs 'jigs pa med// de bzhin nyid snang rang bzhin med// dbyibs dang kha
dog rnam spangs pa'i// rnam pa tha dad bye brag mchog/ khyad par yon tan gnas kyis mdzes// lha dang mi sogs tshad 'das shing// dpag med rigs kyi rgyan rnams dang// kun nas sprul pa'i lha mo'i

tshogs// kun nas rgya yang ma chad pa'i// phreng ba chun 'phyang shar bu dag/ ye shes bkod pa ma 'dres pa'i// 'dod yon tshogs kyis rnam par bklubs// phyogs bcu kun nas 'khrigs pa yi// rang byung zhi rgyas
dbang drag brgyan// mtha' yas mdzad pa kun ston cing// tha dad spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// sgrib med gsal ba'i bdag nyid can// bsam 'das rgya chen grangs mang kun// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal

sgo// sangs rgyas theg pas rnam par spras// phyi nang gsang ba zab mo yi// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs ldan// phyi dang nang med ye shes dngos// mtha' dbus med pa'i bde chen dbyings// rgyu rkyen lam dang thabs
kyi chos// de dag 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can// mi 'jigs rnams dang stobs bcu dang// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dbang bcu yis// thogs med gangs chen mtsho lnga'i bdag/ mtshan ma rtags kyi gnas rdzogs

shing// thugs rje byang chub sems nyid ldan// kun nas ma chags rnam par dag/ kun 'byung rin chen brtsegs pa'i khri// kun tu sgrib pa med pa'i mchog/ thams cad rang gi dkyil 'khor nyid// de dag nyi shu rtsa
lngas brgyan// rnam par bkod pa'i sku chen po// thams cad gsal ba'i byed pa mchog/ thams cad ma 'gags theg pa'i tshul// zab mo rgya chen gsang ba'i sngags// don kun nges par gcod byed pa'i// rang gi
ye shes 'gyur ba med// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dang// dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid can// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phrin las 'jigs byed snyems dang bral// chos sku spyi yi bdag
nyid can// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i gnas rdzogs pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs kyi bdag/ nyi shu rtsa lngas mngon par rdzogs// bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad kun// sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid
che// A li kA li mnyam gnas pa'i// zhabs gnyis pad+ma bsnol ba'i rgya// brtul zhugs skyil krung rigs kyi bdag/ kun nas thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// ye shes drug gi bdag nyid kyi// phyag rgya rin chen
'bar bas mtshan// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// dril bu pad+ma ral gri 'bar// mthing ga dkar dang dmar ba'i mdangs// rigs kyi rin chen dbu rgyan mdzes// cod pan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ drug pa'i
rigs rnams kun gyi gnas// zhal gsum phyag drug mnyam pa'i stabs// rin chen 'bar bas nye bar spras// gtso bo chos kyi mdzod snyems pa// kun bzang yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul// gnyis med byin rlabs
ma 'gags pa'i// gtso dang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rdo rje chen po thugs kyi mchog/ rigs bdag rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid// bde gshegs 'khor lo sku yi dbyibs// zhing khams mtha' yas rgyal ba'i

tshogs// yon tan rin chen che gnas 'byor// de dag gdod nas kun rdzogs mdzad// gsung gi pad+ma rnam par dag/ chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// phrin las kun gyi mthar phyin pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
kun rdzogs mdzad// chos dbyings me long mnyam pa nyid// so sor kun rtog bya ba grub// nyon mongs lam kun rnam dag pa'i// rigs kyi bde gshegs thams cad mkhyen// byang chub sems nyid 'gyur ba
med// ma 'dres las kun rnam par dag/ yon tan tshogs kun lhun grub cing// chags pa chen pos kun spyod pa// de dag phrin las sna tshogs kyis// rang rig zhing khams chen por sbyor// phyogs bcu kun nas

'khrul pa yis// 'byung ba che ni rnam par dag/ gsal snang rdo rje dbang phyug dbyings// sra mkhregs bde gshegs phyag rgya ste// sdud cing gzung med yon tan dbyings// gsal dro smin pa pad+ma'i chos// spyod pa'i
phrin las kun rdzogs pa'i// don mthun rtags kyi phyag rgya nyid// btsun mo dam pa'i cha lugs kyis// de dag dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad// dam pa chos kun sna tshogs pa'i// tshul rnams yang dag rdzogs
pa'i sku// khams gsum spyi nas rnam dag cing// zag med rigs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// til gyi gang bu ji lta bar// bar mtshams med par mtha' yas pa'o// de tshe 'khor gyi byang chub sems// dkyil 'khor
chen po'i phyogs kun nas// rdo rje bkod pa'i gar dang ni// glur bcas mngon par 'khod gyur pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can// smon lam thugs rje'i stobs rdzogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
gnas mdzes par// ye shes 'gro nas rnam par dag/ byang chub sems nyid sa chen po// kun khyab rdul phran nam mkha' nyid// thugs rjes pad+ma sna tshogs ston// las kyi phrin las stobs rdzogs
gnon// rnam shes bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis// de dag yul bcas dag par mdzad// thabs bcas ma 'dres byams pa'i stobs// sgrib med mun pa'i tshogs sel zhing// kun nas spyod pa bzang po nyid// shes
rab chen po mthar phyin pa// gsung gi dbang po rnam dag pas// rigs kyi ye shes gsal bar sbyor// ma lus gzugs sgra dri ro'i tshogs// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag/ de dag thabs dang shes rab
kyis// yi ge'i gnas kun mnyam pa nyid// kun nas kun tu bsam yas pa'i// dus rnams lha mo'i bdag nyid do// mi mthun mtshan ma'i phyogs 'joms byed// der rdzogs gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan// phyogs
kyi don rnams 'joms mdzad cing// phrin las rigs kyi ye shes rdzogs// lus kyi chos kun rnam dag pa'i// khro bo chen po'i mthu stobs ldan// rtag chad mtshan ma'i g.yul rnams 'joms// tshad med bzhi
rdzogs rtog gnas sel// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// phyi nang dkyil 'khor brtan mdzad cing// rigs kyi 'khor lo kun rdzogs dag/ stong khams kun tu mtha' yas par// de dag dkyil 'khor
gsal bar snang// gnyis med mnyam pa chen po'i sku// grangs med brjod kyis mi lang ba// gnyis su med par brtan par bzhugs pa'o// de nas rigs kyis sangs rgyas kun// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta
bar// mi rnams don kun bstan mdzad de// ma 'dres stobs kyis rnam par spags// de tshe bde gshegs mthu stobs kyis// sku gsung byin brlabs bsam yas dang// dkyil 'khor bkod pa kun snang
mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam 'phrul gyis// rol pa'i byin rlabs mtha' yas ston// mthar thug med pa'i 'jig rten 'dir// ngo mtshar mtha' yas ltas kyis gang// g.yo dang g.yo ba chen po dang// bskyod
dang bskyod pa chen po yi// sgyu 'phrul rol pas ma lus kun// rnam dag dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs mdzad// rigs kyi rgyal ba thams cad dang// byang chub sems rnams yi rang ste// sna tshogs mchod pas spro
mdzad cing// yang dag don rdzogs gsol ba 'debs// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i rgyud chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i gnas// de dag mngon 'byung rdzogs byed pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras bu mtshungs pa'i

don// rab tu mos pa smin byed cing// thabs kyis phyag rgya gsang ba nyid// stong phrag brgya pa'i rgyud chen po// mgon po brtse ldan mtshungs pa'i lam// ma lus yul kun thabs 'di nyid// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
bla na med// khyod nyid rgyal ba kun gyis yab// dang po'i rdo rje chen po nyid// rab tu mi gnas stobs rdzogs pa'i// bdag po chos kyi ting nge 'dzin// phra rgyas zag med kun grol ba'i// ye shes
brtan pa'i gnas 'di nyid// mtshan ldan mtshan rnams kun nas dzogs// e ma ho byang chub sems nyid don// de nas yul kun rdzogs pa'i don// thugs rje ye shes dri ma med// thams cad thabs las 'byung ba
yis// byang chub sems 'di rang 'byung gnas// mi shigs dkyil 'khor brtan pa nyid// bdag po rang gi stobs rdzogs pas// ye nas yul kun rnam par dag/ thugs rje chen po snang ba'i shugs// byin rlabs
yul bcas ji ltar snang// de dag rang gi las bzhin du// glo bur 'khrul pas rtog 'dzin cing// phyi nang yul sogs rnam spyod pa// thugs rje dag pas ji ltar bsgral// de dag dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs
pa'i// rigs kyi gnas rnams sbyor mdzad cing// phyag rgya gsang sngags stobs rdzogs pas// tshad med yul kun rdzogs pa nyid// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam grangs kyis// bye brag mkhas pa'i spyod yul
las// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dag/ don dam kun rdzob rnam par spyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'di// tshul bzhin dmigs par bya ba'i thabs// de las lhag pa'i don snang zhing// phyi rol 'byung
tshogs 'gro bar bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i rigs mchog nyid// shes rab chen pos yul mthar phyin// cha shas cha shas med pa yi// byang chub sems gnas drug pa'i
gzungs// ma lus yul kun sbyong mdzad cing// gnyis med ye shes chen po'i bdag/ chos kyi gnas kun rdzogs longs spyod// sprul pa'i sku rdzogs 'gro ba'i mgon// sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor

dang// lhag pa'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi// rang bzhin mngon par rdzogs pa'i shugs// ye shes dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// rang bzhin lhun gyi grub pa dang// rtogs pas mngon par yul sbyor ba'i// thun mong khyad
par rigs bcas rnams// gdul bya kun gyi don bzhin du// bye brag ji ltar 'tshams par snang// 'dir ni lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dang// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor ma bcos pa// de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu
yi// tshul bzhin brten pa'i rnam par spyod// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya sngags rdzogs pa'i// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon snang zhing// rang gi phrin las brtan pa'i

bdag/ tshogs sgrub ting 'dzin rgya chen po// bsod nams ye shes mngon rdzogs byed// phrin las bye brag stobs kyi ni// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dag spyod pa// bzhi brgya mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings// de dag
phrin las ji lta bus// yang dag bya ba rdzogs par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos// sa gzhi mnyam la gnas rdzogs pa// phyogs mtshams kun tu shis pa'i las// mngon par

bsngags pa ji lta bur// yang dag dkyil 'khor thig gdab cing// yang dag tshon gyi las rnams dang// phyag rgya'i bye brag kun rdzogs pa'i// rgyan chas bkod pa bla na med// dngos grub phrin las lhag gnas
shing// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i tshul dag gis// las kyi lhag chad rdzogs byed cing// mnyes shing shis pas 'dod pa'i don// ye shes dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por sbyor// lhag
gnas sta gon bum pa dang// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas rnams rdzogs// de dag bkra shis cho ga bzang// nye bar bsnyen pas gsal bar 'gyur// 'jug pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du// rnam gsum nus pa mthu
dang ldan// bde gshegs brgyud pa'i byin rlabs lam// dad brtson shes rab ting 'dzin stobs// sbyin bsregs gsang ba'i las rdzogs shing// 'dod pa'i las kun nye bar sbyor// mchod sbyin rgya chen gtor

ma'i tshogs// de dag yul kun rnam dag 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul rgyas pa'i tshul gyis ni// lam lnga dang ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang// sum cu rtsa lnga lnga bcu rdzogs// bye brag dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni// cho ga kun rdzogs mngon
par bsngags// sangs rgyas theg pa bsam yas pa// de dag tshul rnams mtha' yas pa// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thabs ldan rdzogs pa'i yan lag tu// smin
pa'i lam mchog bla na med// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// rang gi dam bcas sdom pa rdzogs// yul mchog khyad par 'phags pa la// byin rlabs sngags kyis nor bu blangs// phan dang nus pa'i
dbang thob cing// rim bzhin dam tshig brtan par gnas// de dag khyad par bye brag gis// don kun gsang ba mngon gyur pa// thun mong sdom pa thams cad dang// gsang ba'i dam tshig bla na med// lnga gsum

nyi shu rtsa lnga dang// sum brgya la sogs bye brag gis// thabs kyi theg pa rnam par 'phags// de dag gsang ba chen po'i chos// khyad par dam tshig rnam pa bzhis// thams cad gnyis med mnyam pa nyid// ma lus
yul kun rnam dag cing// nges pa'i don rdzogs zab mo nyid// grogs brten mi mthun phyogs bcas pa'i// khyad par yul kun ji lta bus// rang rig gnas rnams 'gro bar byed// thun mong la sogs
rnams spyad pa// ma lus rten cing 'brel ba'i chos// thams cad tshul 'dis rdzogs byed cing// skad cig yud la lhun gyis 'grub// dgug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol// gsod dang gsad dang 'pham dang
rgyal// gnas kyi phyag rgya kun rdzogs pas// don kun gsang ba ston par byed// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing// tshe dbang bkra shis byin rlabs
ston// ma lus kun 'dus rdzogs par gyur// thun mong rnam par bsngags pa'i chos// thams cad las byung stobs ston pa// de dag gsang ba chen po'i mthus// ma lus rdzogs shing rnam par dag/ nam mkha' rdo

rje sra 'byung zhing// 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang// chu rgyun 'babs pa'ang de bzhin te/ 'jig rten khams ni 'thor ba dang// thams cad stongs shing ltung byed las// byin rlabs ngo mtshar yul 'byung
ba// gsang sngags phyag rgya ting 'dzin stobs// de dag tshul rnams kun rdzogs pas// 'phags pa kun gyi gnas rdzogs te// rigs kyi zhing khams che gnas 'byor// sku dang ye shes sprul pa'i mchog/ zag pa
med pa'i dngos grub kyis// don rdzogs nor bu rin chen tshul// thabs kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi la skyes// yul rnams mngon par sbyor byed pa'i// thog ma mtha' ma'i las kun
dang// cho ga phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas// phyag rgya bzhi yi yul sbyor zhing// rim bzhin bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu mchog/ thams cad theg pas 'dul mdzad de// bstan pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam yas
dag/ grangs med dbye bas don bzhin spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// phrin las kun tu ma 'gags chos// thabs mkhas sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i gnas// don mthun rnal 'byor spyod pa'i
yul// bdag gzhan las kun rab tu rdzogs// mnyam pa chen po'i phrin las sogs// de dag bstan pa bla med pa'i// tshul 'dis rgyud chen zab mo nyid// nye bar spyod pa ji lta bu// de dag yul dang sbyar bya
ba// bye brag cha shas rdzogs pa yi// don kun ston pas bshad du gsol// de dag the tshom rtogs pa'i tshogs// nges par mgon pos bsal bar mdzod// byin rlabs bla na med pa'i lam// 'di na 'jug pa'i
yan lag dag/ mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa'i chos// yang dag rgya chen rdzogs par ston// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa dang// sa gnas lam gyi bye brag dang// bstan pa'i bsdu don ji lta bur// yang dag
bka' stsol thugs rje can// kye ma ho// thabs dang shes rab yang dag sbyar ba'i mthus// phyi nang dkyil 'khor yang dag tshul chen po// rigs dang rigs can rnam par sbyor mdzad cing// don kun gsang ba

rdzogs pa'i gnas nyid yin// rab tu sbyangs pa rnams kyi nges don 'di// yang dag 'bras bu'i tshul gyi rgyur bcas sbyor// mtha' yas zhing khams ye shes chen po'i gnas// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor rnam

par dag/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba las/ bstan pa'i tshul gyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de
nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin kun tu bzang po nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor la zhugs shing// rang rig kun la longs spyod mdzad// bde gshegs kun gyis bsngags pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen
po'i don 'byung ba// de dag sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// rol pa kun ston mtha' yas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// tshul 'di yang dag don mdzad phyir// gsang sngags byin rlabs mtha'

yas pa'i// ngo mtshar yul kun snang bar mdzad// mtshan nyid sna tshogs kun spyod pa// de dag mtshan ma rgyun gyi ste// mtshan ma med pa'i gnas rdzogs pa'i// lhan cig skyes pa'i yul rnams gsal// gnyis med
mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings// byang chub sems rdzogs ye shes don// skye ba med las thams cad skyes// thams cad gnyis med rdzogs pa'i dbyings// rang rig chos kun rnam dag pas// zab mo'i dkyil 'khor
mtha' yas rdzogs// chos kyi sku las bzhengs mdzad de// thugs rje chen po'i rnam 'phrul gyis// snod bcud dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bdag/ rigs kyi 'khor lo kun rdzogs pas// de dag don kun gsal
mdzad cing// theg pa'i don 'di bka' stsal te// e ma ho thams cad rdzogs pa yi// byang chub sems nyid dkyil 'khor che// byin rlabs yul sogs 'byung ba'i gnas// rig pa'i ye shes brtan pa
nyid// phyogs dang phyogs chos las 'das pa'i// tha dad min pa'i yul kun 'das// dus gsum kun gyis mi 'gyur zhing// de dag skad cig cir mi snang// de la 'byung sogs rnam dag cing// skye 'gro tha dad
de nyid dbyings// yod med mtha' bzhi las 'das pa'i// rgyu rkyen gnas skabs ma skyes pas// 'jig cing 'gag pa'i dngos dang bral// phyogs bcu mtha' rnams zhi ba nyid// ye nas ma bcos dben par

gnas// rigs kyi rgyal po thams cad dang// snying po'i ngang du 'bral ba med// de las de byung de snang ba'i// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya'i mchog/ srid pa gsum ni dag pa'i zhing// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan

gnas// phung po lnga nyid rigs lnga'i gtso// 'byung ba'i chos rnams rnam par dag/ yul kun mnyam par sbyor ba'i mthus// ma 'dres dkyil 'khor mngon sangs rgyas// thabs kyi phyag rgya rdzogs pas na// thams

cad dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid// ces rgya cher gsungs so// de'i tshe na zhing khams chen po mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i tshul gyis yang dag par gnas so// de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rang gi btsun mo dang mnyam par sbyor zhing/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis/ kun la gsal bar mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas
sum cu rtsa drug gi byin rlabs kyis/ rang gi gnas thams cad du gsal bar mdzad do// nang gi 'gro ba ma lus kun// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad de// tshor ba

rin chen 'byung ldan yin// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas nyid// 'du byed don yod grub pa'i sku// rnam shes rdo rje mi bskyod pa// ye shes rnam pa lnga bdag nyid// byang chub sems kyi snang ba las// rang bzhin
rdzogs pas gnas kun sbyor// phyi rol 'byung sogs yul rnams kun// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// sra brtan rdo rje spyan ma ste// gsher sdud lha mo mA ma kI// smin byed sreg mdzad gos dkar

mo// yang zhing g.yo ba sgrol ma'i mkha'// stong gsal nam mkha'i kun bzang mo// rags pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// mtshan nyid med pa shes rab yum// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// rigs kyi dkyil
'khor rgya chen po// khams dang skye mched rnam dag pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' gnas kun mdzes// rang bzhin ma bcos lhun gyis grub// stong gsum 'jig rten grangs med pa'i// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
bsam yas kun// kun bzang ye shes rnam bkod pas// thams cad ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// kun rdzob snang ba mtha' yas pa// me long chu zla 'ja' tshon ltar// snang ba ma 'gags gsal ston
cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa'o// kun tu bzang po'i chos rnams kun// sangs rgyas bstan pa rdzogs pa nyid// de las lhag pa'i don spro ba// dmigs pa'i yul rtog kun dang bral// zhes gsungs
shing thams cad de lta bu'i ngang du gsal bar gyur to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi ngo bor ston par mdzad de/ ma lus mtha' dag brtags pa'i chos// ye nas dbyer med rnam par dag/ gnyis
med gnyis su med sbyor zhing// gdod nas ma btsal lhun gyis grub// de nyid ye shes chen po yin// byang chub sems sprin rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi theg pa 'di// gzhan nas btsal ba'i gnas
med do// rang bzhin bde ba'i ngo bo las// mi gnyis nyams su myong ba'i tshul// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rnam par thar pa chen po'i mchog/ skye 'gag gnas dang dmigs pa dang/ 'gro 'ong

yul kun rtog bral zhing// de dag gnyis med lhun gyis grub// mnyam pa chen po'i rgyan gyis rdzogs// gsang ba'i theg pa bsam yas pa'o// 'di ltar snang zhing srid pa'i chos// thams cad don kun rdzogs pa'i
las// 'khor ba'i ma rig rnam rtog tu// sna tshogs yul bcas rtog pas bsgribs// rang bzhin bde gshegs gdul bya yi// snang ba gsum gyi ngo bo la// 'khrul pa'i snang yul 'dzin bcas

pas// tha dad rtogs pa'i chos rnams snang// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yi// bya ba chen po'i gnas rdzogs shing// bstan pa'i don kun bsdu mdzad de// gsang ba'i tshul 'di bla med pa'o// mtshan nyid rnam pa
gsum dag gis// de nas chos kun mtshon par byed// rgyu yi chos kun shes pa'i yul// rkyen rnams 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'bras bu smin pas rnam par grol// theg pa'i rim bzhin rdzogs spyad
pas// rig 'dzin ye shes mngon grub cing// rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// mthar phyin sa nas lhun gyis grub// gsang ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyis// phyag rgya'i ye shes mngon par sbyor// de dag yul kun
gnas 'joms pas// mi mthun tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med// ye nas gsang ba chen po'i chos// rang bzhin gsang ba'i bzhir 'gyur zhing// don dam kun rdzob rnam par dag/ thabs dang shes rab zung 'jug

gnas// ngo bo nyid kyi lam gsang ba// shin tu gsang ba'i 'bras bu rdzogs// snying po gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis// don kun bstan pa gtan la 'bebs// thams cad kun 'byung rgyu nyid pas// rgyu yi theg pa bla
na med// 'bras bu'i chos kun rnam dag cing// ma lus don kun bsdus pa nyid// gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud// 'bras bu'i theg pa zhes bshad do// sa mchog lam rnams kun 'dus pa'i// nges pa'i phyag rgya

bla na med// rgyu yi de nyid byang chub sems// rnam gnyis 'brel bas kun bskyed rdzogs// 'bras bu sku mchog ye shes che// rang bzhin byin brlabs shugs kyis snang// chos rnams thams cad skad cig mar// de

nyid nges par gtan la 'babs// bya ba rdzogs pa'i dus nyid du// ya mtshan pho brang dkyil 'khor rdzogs// nges don gsang ba rmad du byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i yul// byin rlabs chos rnams kun
gyi gzhi// 'di nyid bstan pas rtogs par 'gyur// e ma ho bde gshegs ngo bo nyid// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor las// khams gsum 'gro gnas ma rtogs pa'i// gnas dang sde bcas thams cad
kun// brtags pa'i mthu yis kun snang zhing// de nyid stobs kyis de nas 'khor// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod tshogs// mi mthun skal pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rgyu 'bras gnas kun so sor smin// gnyis
su 'dzin pas 'ching 'gyur la// rang gis rang rgyud rnam par bcings// de dag rtog pa'i nad chen gyis// thams cad kun nas rnam par gzir// yang dag bstan pa'i don rnams kyis// thabs ldan rgyud rnams
grol mdzad de// bstan pa'i bye brag bsam yas pas// gdul dka'i tshogs rnams grol bar 'gyur// gdul dka' kun ni rmongs pa dang// bstan pa'i sgron ma gsal mdzad cing// stong gsum
'jig rten mtha' yas pa// rigs bdag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sku// kun tu bzang po'i bdag nyid kyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas rnams// rnam par 'phrul bas kun spro mdzad// zhe sdang las kyis
gdungs pa la// rdo rje'i rigs mchog mi bskyaud pa// zhe sdang chen pos 'joms mdzad cing// zhe sdang rgyud kun grol bar mdzad// de ltar bcom ldan thugs rje mchog/ don kun bstan pas rnam par 'dul// ma
rig rnam rtog mun pa'i tshogs// bde gshegs 'khor lo che nas sbyor// gti mug chen pos dag mdzad de// gti mug lam bcas rnam par grol// kun nas 'dod pas gdungs pa la// bde gshegs pad+ma gsung
gi sku// 'dod chags chen pos 'dul mdzad cing// yang dag mthar bcas sbyor ba mdzad// nga rgyal gnas kun stobs rdzogs la// rin chen dkyil 'khor che nas sbyor// nga rgyal chen po'i yon tan mchog/ der
bcas mtha' rnams rnam par dag/ phrag dog nyid kyis 'khor ba la// de nyid rnam dag thugs rje'i mchog/ las kyi rigs mchog don yod grub// mtha' yas yul kun rnam par dag/ de la sogs pa'i nyon
mongs sogs// grangs med las kyis mnar ba la// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor nyid// mi mthun sprul pa bsam yas pa// skad cig nyid la 'dul bar mdzad// ma lus theg pa bsam yas
kyis// ma lus 'gro rgyud rnam par sbyangs// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus te// rang rig zhing khams tshogs rgyas par// rnam par bkod pa'i gnas rdzogs
mdzad// bde gshegs kun tu bzang po nyid// rigs sbyangs bsdu ba'i dkyil 'khor na// rang gi longs spyod ci lta bar// dkyil 'khor rgya chen rnam par 'phrul// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal che rnams dang// phyogs
mtshams dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i tshogs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri mtha' yas pa// phyogs rnams kun tu spro mdzad cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam yas pa// ma lus 'gro ba'i don
bstan mdzad// rab tu spyod pa dri med pa'i// blo gros mchog rnams 'dud par gyur// de dag rab dga' sbyangs pa'i mthus// rang gi ye shes dri ma med// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gcig pa dang// gsum dang lnga
dang dgu la sogs// mtha' yas grangs med skyob pa'i sku// zhi dang drag po sna tshogs kyis// ngo mtshar yul kun 'bar ba bzhin// gnas skabs thugs rje chen po'i shugs// mi gnas mun pa rab rib
sel// yang dag lta la rnam par dgod// gzhan yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang// dbang dang drag po sna tshogs kyis// rigs mchog thugs rje tshad med pas// mi mthun gnas kun rnam par dag/ 'gro

ba drug po ma lus pa// thub pa chen po'i sprul sku yis// thun mong khyad par gnas sbyangs te// 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi rnams dang// byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas sogs// ma lus don kun bstan pa'i sgo// de nas
chos kun rnam par dag/ bya ba chen po mthar phyin cing// gzhan gyis 'jug pa rab tu ston// 'di ltar 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// thams cad don kun sangs rgyas mchog/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor

nyid// bya ba lhun grub rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor 'brel ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis// gsang rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal zhing// yang dag ston pa mnyes par mdzad// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu

bzang// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i mchog/ de nyid kho na'i don rdzogs pa// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i tshul bstan pa// thog ma tha ma med pa'i dngos// ma lus kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rol mo bde ba'i gnas

rdzogs shing// byang chub mchog gi snying po bzhi// srid dngos zhi bar rnam par sbyong// gsang ba'i theg pa bla med mchog/ rnam gsum sprul pa bskyed par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// byin rlabs dag
pa'i mdangs bcas pa// shes rab dbyings dang sbyor mdzad cing// dkyil 'khor rol pas kun khyab mdzad// rgyud chen gsang ba'i don rnams kun// sbas bshad brda yis rnam par 'byed// de tshe gsung
dbyangs sna tshogs pas// mi gnyis rgyud chen mtshan ma sgrogs// ji srid sbas tshig brda don rnams// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// e ma dbyings kyi las can te// ma 'dres thams cad rdzogs byed
pa'i// 'di zhes nye bar mtshon pa ni// e sogs rnam bzhi'i dbyibs can gnas// skad ces gsal byed las ming can// bam dbyibs thig ler bcas ston pa'o// mAr+tha ma nu sdom byed yid// las can rnam
shes de dag la// gsal bar go bor bshad par 'dod// pa sgra don dam nges pa'i rgyud// yA na theg chen 'di nyid do// dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab par// de min kun tu mtshon par byed// thams cad rang gi
las can nyid// dkyil 'khor gsang ba mtha' yas shing// ma lus theg pa bla na med// don dam rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// ye shes chen pos bskyod mdzad cing// las kyi rtog pa rnam par dag/ bcud
'dus thig le chen po ni// snang dang stong pa la sogs pa'i// brjod bya ma lus rdzogs pa'i yul// rtogs tshogs sangs rgyas bzhi bcu lnga// snang bas phye phyir gnyis su med// de gnas pad+ma rigs
gsum pa'o// gnyis gsum brgyad kyi khyad par can// tha ma gnas dang yon tan gyis// mngon par mtho bas 'og min te// las dang bcud kyi mtha' bral ba// ye shes bzhi la dpag mi rigs// dgos pa
'byung ldan rin po che// ye shes lnga yi 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas ngo bo gnas bcud kyis// spyi bor shin tu 'khyil bar gnas// nyung dkar ser gyis dpag par ni// sa ya bcu gsum bde bas

brgyan// 'dod yon khyad par can gyis mdzes// gang yang bde byed phyi nang bral// bde ba chen po'i ro nyid la// 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs par ldan// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas
yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung rgya chen po// rang gi ngo mtshar yul gyis 'khod// kun kyang gnyis dang gnyis sbyor ba'i// cha lugs dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// mang po tshogs pas mtha' yas
sgo// de dag bye brag grangs las 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'di// brtul zhugs chen po'i bdag nyid can// bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir// dngas snyigs med par kun tu gsal// sgra dbyangs
gsung gi gnas bzhi yi// dbye ba gsum gsum ngos gnyis dang// bzhi bcu gnyis su gyur pa yin// sa ya bcu gsum la sogs pa'i// skye 'gag gnas pa'i ngo bo yang// rten can ji bzhin rten de bzhin// nyi
zla thabs dang shes rab kyi// ro gnyis mnyam par dus gsum bzhugs// dngas ma thig le chen po yi// bde ba dngos spangs ye shes snang// ma 'dres rang gi don bzhin du// sa gsum dbang phyug mchog tu

'gyur// 'dzin pa'i nam mkha'i tshogs bral zhing// stong pa'i mtshan ldan byang chub nyid// rab tu zhi bas grol ba yi// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// mtshan nyid kun bcom bde chen po'i// rang gi ngo bos
ma grub na// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs zhes bya// gzugs sogs lhag pa'i thig le ni// las dang yon tan mngon ldan phyir// rigs kyi rgyal po nyid du brjod// bcud

lnga khu ba'i thig le ni// rgyu dang gnas kyi kha dog ldan// ro dang las dang de bzhin te// rang gi mtshan nyid kun tu snang// mkha' sogs nang gi 'byung ba dang// ye shes 'byung lnga'i las dag gis// bskyod phyir
dbyings su brjod pa yin// btsun mo'i thig le snod bcud khyad par gyis// til gang lta bur mkha' gang ba'i// dkyil 'khor tshogs chen brjod mi langs// ma skyes mi shigs snying po can// dngos med rol mo
sil snyan gar// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ gnyis med theg le'i bcud 'dus pas// byang chub sems gnas rang bzhin nyid// mig sogs rang gi thig le ni// las dang ngo bo 'bras bu'i

phyir// sems dpa' chen po nyid du brjod// nyes pa zad phyir rdo rje ste// rang gi gnas kyis phye ba'o// gzugs sogs nang nyid phyir snang ba// rang gi rtsa bcud bcas pa dag/ bde ba bskyed phyir btsun mo
nyid// dus rnams rlung gis go phye ste// byams pa la sogs ye shes bzhi// de bde rim par bskyed pa yang// ting 'dzin dbang du nges par gsungs// mtha' rnams yul la zhen pa yi// ma lus chos kun rnam
par dag/ thams cad yul las dbang bcas pa// bde ba bskyed pa thig le ste// khams gsum kun gyi gnas rdzogs pa// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mthus// rnam shes las byung dmigs pa'i
tshogs// mtshan nyid rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dga' dang rjes su dga' ba dang// dga' bral lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// kun rdzob lugs las 'byung ba dang// don dam lugs las bzlog pa gnyis// yan lag
nying lag rgyas 'gyur te// ye shes chen po'i yul mthar phyin// mchog gi bla ma zhes bya ba'i// tshad med bzhi gnas snyoms 'jug pa'i// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa yis// tshul rnams rdzogs pas bstan par
'gyur// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis// brtags na rang gi rtog pa bzlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// bzlog bya rgyal bas ma gzigs sam// thig le zung 'jug bde ba yi// sems mtha' log

pas go phye nas// dkyil 'khor drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig le rang shar ba'i// snang ba mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// chags sogs nyon mongs las rtog rnams// 'dul phyir sprul pa zhes su bshad// sgra
dbyangs gsung gis bstan pa la// nges par grags pa kho na nyid// phung sogs rtog pa'i 'jig rten kun// log rtog sgyu ma snang tsam las// nyi zla bden nyid las nyid kyis// ma skyes mnyam la gnas gyur
cing// phung sogs lha yi dkyil 'khor du// rang snang rang rig mngon sum gsal// dus gsum dag tu mi 'gyur phyir// theg pa 'di yi thabs kyi rdo rje bshad// de dag yul rnams mtha' yas pas// thabs

las thabs byung 'phrul ba'i tshul// ngo bo nyid kyis grub byed cing// yang dag spyod pa rnam par grol// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba nyid// rnam par rtog pas mdor bsags shing// las kyi khams rnams dag

byed pa'i// sems dang sems dpa' spyod yul nyid// snying po don kun rin chen mdangs// kha dog lnga yi bdag nyid la// srog dang rtsol bas bde 'dzin zhing// phyi nang yul kun spro bar mdzad// sangs rgyas
kun gyis theg pa 'di// brda tshig sbas pas don ston cing// grangs can bye brag 'dod rnams la// de dag de nyid grol byed pa'i// don mthun bstan pas bshad pa yin// snang ba rgya mtsho chen po
bzhi// ma g.yos rang gi ngang las byung// de dag rim pas rdzogs 'gyur te// rnam par mi shigs gzugs nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya sbas pa'i tshul 'di yis// rab tu rtog bcas

grol 'gyur te// rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang po'i gnas/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de

nas rgyal ba thams cad kyi// byin rlabs ngo mtshar bla na med// kun nas mi bsgrib dri med cing// yang dag ye shes chen pos grol// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i gnas chen po// rgya chen
grangs med rigs kyi gtso// gnyis su med pa'i don gyis sbyor// gsung gcig tshul gyis don stsal cing// ngo mtshar bshad pa'i gnas la 'jug/ kun nas sku yi dkyil 'khor tshogs// tshul lnga rdzogs pas

'bras bu nyid// de nyid rgyu mthun rkyen gyi bzhi// don kun gsal ba rnam dag pas// ngo mtshar yul 'di rmad du byung// chos sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pa rang bzhin 'od gsal sku// ngo bo nyid mchog

kun gyi gzhi// de dag rnam par mtshon byed pa'i// zab mo rgya chen sngags kyi tshogs// yi ge med pa rig pa'i gsung// longs spyod rdzogs pa rdo rje dang// yan lag bsam 'das tshangs pa'i dbyangs// tshul
lngas thams cad don brjod mdzad// yang dag mtshon pa'i dpe las 'das// rnam par mi rtog ye shes che// kun rdzob cir yang ma 'gags pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa kun nas spyod// chos dbyings me long lta
bu yi// mnyam nyid so sor kun tu rtog/ bya ba'i ye shes las chen po// dus gsum sgrib med gsal mdzad cing// byang chub sems kyi gnas rdzogs mdzad// rnam gsum byin rlabs sbyor ba'i mthus// yon tan

tshogs rnams kun la spyod// zhing dang pho brang yon tan dang// longs spyod rgyan dang btsun mo'i tshogs// gdan dang rgyan chas la sogs pa// mi bsgrib longs spyod ldan pa lngas// phyogs bcu kun tu ma 'gags

pa'i// rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs longs spyod// thabs mkhas phrin las mdzad pa yi// ma 'dres kun tu spyod pa'i tshogs// zhi dang rgyas mdzad dbang drag po// mnyam pa chen po lhun grub rdzogs// de dag phrin
las rnam lnga yis// don kun bstan pa 'dul mdzad cing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs pa'o// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo nyid// kun nas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ yon tan phrin las rdzogs
pa'i stobs// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid can// rigs kyi zhing khams kun sbyor zhing// sangs rgyas theg pa bsam yas kyis// don kun spro ba rgya chen rdzogs// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgya chen po// byang
chub sems kyi dngos nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang snang// rang bzhin ye nas ma bcos pa'i// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par rdzogs// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i mthus// zhing khams chen
por grangs med pa'i// rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i gnas// sa dang theg pa'i don rnams la// rigs kyi gtso bo sangs rgyas mchog/ rnam par 'phrul pas kun mdzes shing// don kun dran pas rdzogs pa'i
yul// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bsam yas rnams// drwa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par rdzogs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chen po// kun nas zhing khams chen po'i bdag/ de dag sprul pa'i sku rnams

dang// mnyam rdzogs 'khrul pas 'jig rten sbyong// thub pa chen po skyes bu mchog/ drug gi gdul bya ma lus dag/ thabs kyi theg pa sna tshogs kyis// kun nas phrin las rgya chen tshogs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo

rje las// rang gi las bzhi rnam par ston// yan lag phan tshun snrel zhi dang// spyi tshugs 'jig rten drug rnams su// bcom ldan thub sku bsam yas pa// stong gsum zhing khams rgyas mdzad de// 'dul ba rnam
pa bzhi dag gis// 'gro ba kun gyi don mdzad de// kun nas sku yi phrin las dang// gsung mchog yon tan mtha' yas pa// de dag snang ba'i sgo mtha' yas// thun mong khyad par mdzad pa'i tshogs// bcu gnyis
la sogs bstan par mdzad// mngon par shes pa'i sgo mtha' yas// rab tu zhi ba ma 'dres pa'i// theg pa'i bye brag bsam yas pa// so so'i don bzhin bsam yas rnams// rab tu spyod pas rnam par
dgrol// mi dge bcu las bzlog byed cing// tshad med bzhir bcas bsam gtan bzhi// lha dang mi gnas rdzogs pa yi// dge ba tshogs nas ma bsgribs pa// legs spyod sdom pa bzang las byung// las kyi
bag chags dag byed pa'o// 'khor nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa'i lam// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam dag pa'i// rgyun zhugs lan cig 'ong ba dang// mi ldog dgra bcom brtul
zhugs mchog/ rang rgyal byang chub rdzogs pa'i lam// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos// de gnas 'khor ba'i mtha' 'gog cing// mya ngan 'das par mngon par gnyer// ma rig 'du byed rnam shes
dang// ming sogs gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg pa tshor ba sred pa dang// len pa sred pa skye rgas shi// chos rnams mngon par dga' ba'i mthus// 'phags pa'i ye shes zad pa med// nyon mongs las dang
sdug bsngal gyi// cha shas rgyun gyis yul las 'das// yang dag dgra bcom chen po'i sku// dngos med nam mkha' dngas pa'i bdag/ shes rab snying stobs las kyi mthus// sbyin dang yang dag

sbyangs pa dang// rnam par grol ba'i gzhan rgyun sel// theg pa chen po'i mtshan nyid can// bdag gzhan rgyud rnams grol ba'i blos// yang dag ye shes spyad pa spyod// pha rol phyin pa rnam bcu yis// sa bcu ye

shes rdzogs mdzad cing// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams dag/ ma 'dres gzungs kyis sbyang byas te// yang dag theg pa'i gnas rdzogs pas// 'gro ba thams cad mgron du gnyer// tshad med bsdu ba'i dngos po

yis// spyod pa rgya che 'dzin dang bral// yang dag bsod nams ye shes dag/ thams cad rdzogs pas 'bras bu nyid// rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu'ang gsang// snying po chos kyi don las byung// sku dang gsung

dang thugs kyi bdag/ rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul drwa ba nyid// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rang snang bzhi// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ni// ma lus kun gyi don rdzogs 'gyur// rang bzhin rnam dag
de bzhin nyid// thams cad gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya// zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can// phyogs rnams gang gis brtags byas kyang// yang dag don gyi dmigs dang bral// ma lus bde ba chen po'i
dbyings// rang bzhin gcig tu rdzogs pa la// rnam par bkod pas ci zhig 'grub// bya ba med las bya ba'i tshul// bden pa gnyis su dbyer med pa// 'di dag sangs rgyas theg pa'i mchog/ lha mi stobs ldan
la sogs pa'i// sgyur bcas lam las rnam grol bas// 'bras bu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ chos rnams kun gyi rgyu nyid de// de dag 'bras bu bzang po'i tshul// snying po'i don kun rdzogs pas na// ma lus

kun 'dus gtan la 'bebs// ji snyed theg pa bsam yas pa// de dag gsang ba'i snying po bzhi// don kun ngo bo rnam dag pa'i// de nyid nges par rmad du byung// de ltar bstan pa sna tshogs pas// ma lus chos
rnams yang dag rdzogs// rang bzhin ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas// sngon 'byung sprul pa'i tshul gyis ni// dus rnams kun tu 'gyur med cing// yang dag mthar thug gnas rdzogs par// dkyil 'khor bstan

pa'i ngo bo nyid// ces gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las// rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas
ting 'dzin chen po yis// dgongs pa'i don kun mnyam bzhag pas// chos rnams ji ltar gnas pa yi// ting 'dzin ye shes rten rdzogs mdzad// de tshe 'khor gyi gtso bo dag/ rab tu gus pas gsol 'debs
shing// snga ma'i don chen las 'byung bas// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos// dgongs pa'i don kun mnyam rdzogs par// thugs rje chen pos rkyen slong
zhing// ma lus 'jug pa'i don bzhin bstan// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun// sems nyid ye shes dag pa'i dngos// yul dang dbang po rnam shes tshogs// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid// thams
cad don kun rnam par dag/ byang chub sems kyi ting 'dzin ni// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te// de dag rang gi chos rnams kyis// bskul ba'i yul las rnam par 'das// kha dog dbyibs sogs ma nges
pas// de dag mtshan bcas dpag tu med// ting 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// pha rol phyin mchog stobs rdzogs par// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes te// de ni chos kun lam las skyes// dngos dang 'jug pa'i
mtha' bral bar// thig le mi shigs bstan pa'i dngos// rin chen sna lnga'i 'od zer can// 'byung 'jug gnas la kun bskyed cing// g.yas g.yon phreng ba'i tshul bzhin du// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshogs

bskyed// mkha' dbyings sprin las char gyi rgyun// glog gi phreng ba 'od dang bcas// sangs rgyas theg pa bla med pa'i// bye brag gnas kyi tshul 'jug pa// de dag don kun rdzogs pa'i gnas// rang rig stobs

bskyed grol bar 'gyur// gang du dri ma med pa yi// nges pa'i mdzod can snying po las// 'od zer sna lnga'i rgyun 'jug pa// thabs kyi yan lag rnam bdun gyis// mu tig phreng ba'i tshul bzhin du// bskor ba phyag
rgya yan lag bzhi// nges sbyor thabs dang shes rab ste// dbyangs dang gsal byed las 'phros pa// khams gsum yi ge'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thig le'i rgyal po mi shigs pa// yang dag bstan pa'i ngo bor
brtags/ 'od zer yi ge 'bru lnga yis// rang gi mtshan ma'i gnas rgyas shing// khams gsum spyod pa rnam grol mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// thabs 'di sgyu 'phrul dga' ba dngos// yan
lag bdun gyi snang ba las// yan lag bdun gyi 'bras rdzogs 'gyur// rang gi ye shes brtan byas pa'i// phyag rgya sngags kyi rgyur ldan pas// phyogs mtshams bla 'og kun gsal zhing// dkyil 'khor gnas
rnams bstan par 'gyur// yang dag bsod nams ye shes tshogs// rab tu sbyangs pa'i stobs rdzogs te// dam pa rgya chen mtha' yas pa// khyad par bsngags pa'i rgyun gyis 'jug/ phyogs rnams kun tu bkra

shis pa// nye reg 'thor 'thung sngags kyi chu// rig pa khro bo khro mor bcas// byin rlabs phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyangs// thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid// mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa dngos// A+oM ma hA kro d+hI shwa
rI sarba tra pre sha ta ya/ A+oM AHhUM/ rigs kyi me tog sngags dang bcas// rigs kyi tsan+dan bdug pa'i spos// phyogs bcur rnam par spro byas te// brtan par bkra shis byin rlobs 'gyur// bde
gshegs kun gyi sbyor ba yis// lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal byas te// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dang// rigs kyi dbu rgyan mtshan byas pas// rnam gsum sems dpa' 'khor lo yis// thams cad kun

rgyud rnam par dag/ ma lus dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas pa'i// thugs rje sngags kyis bskul mdzad cing// yang dag spyan 'dren brtan par gnas// A+oM AHhU~M/ badzra sa ma ya ba ha/ ta thA ga ta sa mA dza hU~M/ thugs
rje chen po'i mtshan nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor bskyed gnas brtan pa dag/ dam tshig pho brang gnas bzang por// rim pa'i gdan bcas brtan par bzhugs// oM thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// gsang

ba'i theg pa bla na med// don 'di yang dag sbyor ba'i mthus// mgon po nyer bar brtse dgongs mdzod// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro bo rnam spros pas// phyogs bcu'i
bgegs rnams bcom mdzad de// mtshon cha me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs// mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su spro// bskal pa'i mthar thug tshar bcad cing// ma rungs pa rnams bshig pa'i mthus// phyi yi rgya mtsho

chen por 'pho// rdo rje la sogs sa gzhi la// ra ba gur dang 'dra bar 'gyur// yang sprul mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas// me 'od 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'o// oM badzra dz+wa la rat+na ma d+ha la b+h+ruM/ sangs rgyas kun gyi
bdag nyid kyis// mgon po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i dngos// yang dag sku yi dkyil 'khor nyid// mtshan ma'i 'od phreng rgyan gyis brjid// rigs gcig rigs gsum rigs lnga dang// rigs drug rigs
dgu nyi shu lnga// rgya chen phyi yi nam mkha'i dbyings// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo mchog/ gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas pa g.yon pa dmar ba'i mdangs// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen
dang// dril bu pad+ma ral gris mtshan// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan rdzogs par// rnam gsum sems dpa' bdag nyid la// 'khor lo oM yig gsal ldan pa// gsang sngags phreng bas mdzes byas
pa'i// bzlas brjod thig le phra mo'i tshogs// rigs kyi sku rnams spro zhing bsdu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas chen por// yan lag lnga yis rdzogs byas te// dngos grub dkyil 'khor brtan par
gnas// 'dod chags chen po'i gnas 'jug pa'i// gsung gi bdag po gsal ldan pa'i// pad+ma rwa ga'i mdangs gsal zhing// dam tshig 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// zhal gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// sngo dang
dkar ba'i bzhin rgyas par// kun nas 'od zer phreng bas bklubs// sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can// gsang sngags phreng bas 'khrigs pa yi// 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
nyid// gcig dang gsum la sogs pa'i bdag/ lhag par mos pa'i gnas bsgoms te// pad+ma AM yig dpal ldan par// thabs dang shes rab phreng ba'i gnas// dpa' bo thig le rdzogs pa nyid// 'od phreng
sngags kyi rnam pa yis// phra mo rdzogs pa'i bar du bsgom// gnyis med ye shes rnam grol bas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor brtan par 'gyur// mchog ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i gnas
su ste// mtha' yas dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'bar// rten dang rten gnas mnyam snyoms shing// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma sna tshogs dbus// mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// mthing ka dkar dang dmar ba'i
'od// rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'i tshogs// sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can// thig le phra mo'i cha rdzogs par// bzlas pa'i yan lag ma nyams shing// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor brtan par mdzad// kun
nas yon tan rdzogs pa'i chos// rin chen gnas kun longs spyod pa// de nas pho brang brtan pa'i dbus// dkyil 'khor bye brag mtha' yas kun// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rgyan
gyis mdzes// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od// rin chen la sogs mtshan mas brgyan// sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can// rin chen gnas 'bar swA yig las// 'od bcas phreng ba'i rgyan gyis

mdzes// phyag rgya chen po snyoms 'jug pa'i// yang dag chos sku bde ba spro// thig le phra mo'i gnas rdzogs pa'i// grangs bcas mtshan ma rdzogs bcas te// bzlas brjod la sogs sbyangs pa'i mthus// rin chen
dkyil 'khor brtan par 'gyur// yon tan chen po'i bdag nyid du// ma lus kun 'dus rdzogs par gnas// phrin las mtha' yas khyab pa'i tshogs// las kyi rigs kun rdzogs pa yi// gtso bo don yod grub
pa nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// zhal gsum phyag drug brjid pa'i sku// ljang sngon g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar// rgya gram la sogs mtshan mas mdzes// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtha'

yas par// sems dpa' rnam pa gsum ldan zhing// sna tshogs rdo rje hA yig las// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab rgya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun ston pa'o// theg le phra mo'i cha rdzogs pas// ji srid
dkyil 'khor brtan byed cing// mtshan ma'i rang bzhin sngags ldan pas// bzlas brjod la sogs bstan pa'i tshogs// don kun mtshan ma med pa nyid// bde gshegs kun gyis 'khor lo yi// cho ga stobs
brjod dpa' bo che// mi shigs yan lag brtan byas pas// dngos grub don kun gsang ba'i tshul// mdun gyi 'khor lo la brten te// kun kyang phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul zhing// rgyun bshags
rjes su yi rang dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// mya ngan mi 'da' brtan par gnas// yang dag byang chub lam la gnas// phyogs rnams kun nas lus 'bul zhing// rjes su gnang ba'i bka' thob
nas// de dag spyod pa rgya chen po// ma lus 'gro gnas la bltas te// sdug bsngal thams cad bsal byed cing// bde ba'i tshogs rnams bsgrubs byas te// thar pa mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// don rdzogs btang
snyoms chen po'i dbyings// yang dag bsod nams rgya chen po// mi dmigs rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa nyid// ye shes tshogs kyi gnas yin no// gzhi rtsa mtshan ma kun dang
bral// phyi nang yul kun ma skyes pa'i// thams cad gnyis med byang chub sems// ma lus don mchog gsang ba'i gsang// 'gro la khyab pa'i thugs rje nyid// rang bzhin ngang gis rnam par dag/ thams cad

mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yi// stong gsal rigs pa'i ye shes nyid// mun la snang byung 'od kyi tshul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ye shes stobs rdzogs kun tu bzang// glo bur sprin gyi tshogs dngas

pas// nam mkha'i 'od bcas gsal bar snang// dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug po// g.yas dang g.yon ni sngo dang dmar// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// dril bu pad+ma ral gris mtshan// dbu rgyan mgur chu do
shal dang// snyan cha phyag zhabs gdub bu phreng// ral pa 'bar ba'i thugs rje can// na bza' 'od zer mtshan dpes mdzes// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa la// rigs can yum sbyor mnyam pa'i stabs// sku
gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang// ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas// thugs rje'i 'od zer phreng ba yis// ma lus dkyil 'khor rgya chen tshogs// stong gsal nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// rlung gi dkyil
'khor rgya chen gtams// de dbus bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho nyid// 'byung chen gser gyi gzhir bcas par// kun nas me 'od 'khrigs pa'i dbus// 'og min gnas sogs rim bzhin chags// 'khor lo chen po'i
sa gzhi la// khang pa gru bzhis rnam par brjid// phyi rol ra ba'i rim bzhin 'khrigs// theg pa kun gyis brgyan pa yi// rta babs bzang po rim bzhin brtsegs// rnam thar brgyad kyi bdag nyid can// sangs
rgyas theg pa bsam yas pa'i// pa tra'i phreng bas mdzes byas pa'i// theg pa bzhi yi 'jug sgo nas// tshad med bzhi bcas phrin las rdzogs// rin chen dra ba dra phyed dang// shar bu phye ma'i phung pos
brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs// rdo rje rin chen mtshan ma dang// zla phyed rdo rje mi 'jigs stobs// 'dod yon lha mo phyogs bcur 'khrigs// lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che// nyi

shu rtsa lnga'i rtags rnams kyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor mdzes byas pa// phyi dang nang med gsang ba'i mchog/ dbus kyi pho brang 'khor lo nyid// ye shes lnga yi don rdzogs shing// theg pa chen po'i tshul nyid

mdzes// rdo rje 'khor lo phyag rgya'i tshogs// ka ba gdung bcas dra ba dang// dbu rtse nor bu bzang pos mdzes// rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma la// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar bas brgyan// mngon par 'phags pa'i
gnas rnams su// rin chen 'bar ba'i khri steng la// mi 'jigs bzhi dang stobs bcu dang// rdzu 'phrul bzhi gnas dbang bcus brgyan// thogs med gangs chen mtsho lnga yi// 'od gsal thabs dang shes rab

la// ma chags chu skyes rnam par dag/ phyi rol byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// rnam dag 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ldan// khro bo rdo rje'i brag chen rnams// thugs rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor
sa gzhi la// 'od 'bar phreng bas 'khrigs pa'o// gtso bo chos kyi sems dpa' nyid// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad cing// kun gyi byin rlabs brtan par
gnas// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes rgya chen po// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi dbyings// byang chub sems kyi gzugs can te// dang po'i yi ge las byung ba// 'od gsal kun nas
rgyas pa dag/ dbyangs kyi phreng bas nye bar mnyes// kun tu rnam par 'phros pa'i mthus// de dag phrin las brtan mdzad cing// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsaganyis rdzogs// phyogs kyi rigs rnams bsdu byas
te// rang gi dkyil 'khor brtan par gnas// gnyis 'gyur phreng ba rnam par dag/ 'od zer rgyun gyis mdzes pa'o// thugs rje chen po'i 'od gsal ba// gnyis pa'i yi ge sder bcas rnams// rten dang brten
pa'i gtso 'khor tshul// 'od 'bar kha dog lnga yi mdangs// ma lus spros pas sngon bzhin du// sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang po'i tshogs// nyis 'gyur thabs dang shes rab ste// g.yo ba'i tshogs bcas gang du

nyid// sna lnga'i phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// gsung gi sa bon rdzogs pa la// thugs kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i tshul// gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng ba dang// thams cad kun gnas sangs rgyas pas// de dag dkyil

'khor rdzogs par mdzad// gsang ba yum gyi 'od zer gyis// snying po'i dkyil 'khor brtan par gyur// rab tu rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid// rang gi sngags kyis brtan gnas pa'o// yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya
che// thams cad gnas kun snyoms 'jug pas// gtso bo thub pa chen po'i sku// rab tu rdzogs pa bzhin rgyas pa'o// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dag/ rab tu rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid// thig le la

gnas thig le mchog/ thig le chen po mnyam ldan pas// byang chub yan lag rnam par 'phro// tshul rnams bgrod pa med pa'i lam// thabs dang shes rab rgyas pa yis// rdo rje rnam bzhi dag pa'i tshul// rab tu

sbyangs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog/ de dag bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rigs kyi 'khor lo che gnas sbyor// sangs rgyas kun dang gcig pa'i blos// nye bar bsnyen pa'i rgyun ldan zhing// byang chub sems kyi yi
ge nyid// rang gi gnas su rdzogs byed pa'o// de dag goms pa gsal ba dang// mi shigs thig le brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thabs rnams bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// mngon
sum rigs kyi skur sbyor zhing// sa yi khyad par sbyor mdzad pas// rdzu 'phrul legs par gzhan rgyud sel// yang dag grub pa chen po'i mchog/ rtags kyi phyag rgya gnyis med sku// khams gsum gnas rnams
rdzogs byed pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs kyi bdag/ theg pa'i mtha' rnams ma 'gags par// kun 'byung gnas kyi cho ga nyid// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ phyogs bcu kun nas bsags

pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rdzogs pa// sna rtse thig le rin chen lnga// dbang po drug gi yul dang ldan// yan lag bgrang dang bgrang 'das par// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi ldan zhing// ji srid bstan pa'i gnas su

bzhag/ byang chub sems kun rdzogs pas na// bcu drug cha shas grangs las 'das// mi ldog gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor sbyar ba'o// rims bzhin dbang po drug gi yul// spro dang bsdu ba'i
yan lag gis// gsang sngags phyag rgya skur rdzogs par// rigs gcig gsum dang lnga la sogs// thabs kyi yan lag bsam yas shing// zhing khams gnas kun dag par byed// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen

dang// pad+ma mtshan bcas ral grir bcas// 'od zer sna lnga'i phreng ba nyid// kun nas 'khrigs pa'i sngags dang bcas// gsum gyi dam tshig ye shes che// kha sbyor thig le las rdzogs pa'o// phyag rgya gsang ba'i
yi ge mchog/ bdun 'gyur drag po'i gsang tshig bcas// ma ning gnas las grol ba yis// rang gi sangs rgyas thams cad la// rin chen ga'u'i bcud rdzogs pas// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par
'gyur// gnas dang gnas min gsang ba'i yul// phra mo'i sems kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tha snyad thams cad 'gog byed cing// khams gsum skye 'gro rnam par dag/ yang dag 'phel bas goms pa dang// brda yi
ming tshogs sum cu gnyis// thig le 'od zer sna tshogs dang// rab tu zhu bas bde chen dbyings// ji srid brtan par gnas pa'i dus// kun 'dzin yi ges sdom byed cing// dbab dang 'khyil dang

spro ba dang// slar bsdus yang dag ye shes gnas// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug rnams// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye brag rdzogs// don kun gsang ba ji bzhin nyid// bya ba chen pos gzhan rgyud sel// tsog pu rus
sbal gsum sogs kyis// gnyis med 'khril ba'i cha lugs dag/ mthar gnas dbang po gzhan du bsgyur// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rang nyid kyi// phyag rgya bde ba mtshan mar bcas// nyon mongs gnas kun

grol byed pa// sgyu ma'i dpe byad ye shes nyid// dang po'i sangs rgyas bzang po la// rigs rnams rdzogs pas dbu brgyan cing// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod// me rlung sbyor bas bskul byas te// thig
le 'od zer gyen 'bar bas// smin byed khyab pa bde ba'i mchog/ rang gi gnas su rnam par 'khyil// sprul pa'i 'khor lo cher rgyas so// 'od dmar chags pa'i ri mo can// AM yig sngags kyis phreng bas
ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas rnams su// bde chen thig le'i tshul bzhugs shing// de ming bor ba'i sgra dang bcas// thabs kyi tshul gyis rnam par spags// chos kyi dkyil 'khor hU~M gis rdzogs// dkar
ser 'od zer lnga yi mdangs// gnas brgyad yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes// shes pa brgyad gnas ye shes rdzogs// bya ba chen po'i don kun ston// de dag skye dang 'gag pa dang// yang dag sbyangs pas kun grol
zhing// gnyis med ye shes brtan pa'i tshul// sgra gnas brjod pa'i tshul ldan pas// gsang gsum dam tshig sngags kyi gnas// bcu drug bdud rtsi 'dzag pa yi// dkar dmar 'od zer phreng ba can// AM yig

dbyangs kyi yi ge rgyas// kun 'byung brjod pas yi ge ste// spro dang bsdu bas dag pa'i tshul// mi 'gyur bstan pa'i thig le nyid// haM yig snying po byang chub sems// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing// kun+da
ngang gi 'od gsal mdangs// sum cu rtsa gnyis yi ge'i tshogs// 'khor lo'i gnas la snyoms 'jug cing// rang gi dkyil 'khor brtan byed pa'o// dga' dang rjes su dga' ba dang// dga' bral lhan cig

skyes pa yi// yan lag cha shas kun rdzogs pa'o// gnas skabs chos kyi bye brag gis// dngos grub phrin las brtan byed cing// 'dod pa'i yul kun rnam par sbyang// tha dad don rdzogs rnam dag pa'i// ye shes
bcu drug rim gyis rdzogs// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba las// A li kA li'i gnas rdzogs te// nyi zla'i 'od zer 'phro ba dag/ rab tu goms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs// bde chen sdig bral gzugs su
gnas// mtshan nyid ji bzhin tshul bzhugs pas// phyag rgya'i thig le 'bebs par byed// nyi dkyil rdo rje la gnas pa'i// hU~M yig 'od bcas rin po che// cha shas kun rdzogs sku yi dbyig/ snying

po sa bon gsang bas mtshan// pad+ma AHyig las mtshan pa'i// gru gsum chos kyi b+ha ga bzang// ge sar ze'u 'bru'i snying po can// rten 'brel ho yig mdzes par gnas// g.yas dang g.yon ni sbyor ba yi// ma
lus chags pa chen po'i dngos// dam tshig chags pa'i brda bskul zhing// phyag rgya bzhi yi snyoms 'jug pas// yang dag ye shes rdzogs par sbyor// nyi zla dus gcig 'char ba yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
gsal bar rdzogs// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byed cing// yang dag rdzogs pas gnyis su med// 'gro gnas rgya chen ma lus dag/ dbang bskur rnam par dag pa'i mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa
nyid// rnal 'byor chen po gsal bar mdzad// pho brang gdan bcas yang dag rdzogs// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// rigs rnams dkyil 'khor gsal brtan cing// cho ga rnam pa gsum dag gis// thar
pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ rang bzhin rigs mchog lhun gyi grub// phyi rol 'gro ba'i gnas spros te// zhing khams chen po rnam par dag/ rigs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid// 'bras bu rdzogs pas dkyil
'khor che// thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba yi// cho ga rdo rje brtan po'i bdag/ gsal byed oM yig las 'phros pas// sna tshogs sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ bde gshegs kun gyi gnas 'jug cing// rigs kyi

sku rnams rdzogs par mdzad// rnam dag pad+ma'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mchod cing// byang chub sems tshogs rab tu bsdus// gsang ba'i phyag rgya dkyil 'khor nyid// 'od tshogs thugs kyi
dkyil 'khor las// thugs rje'i nyi ma rnam par spro// rig pa'i dngos grub bzang po dag/ byang chub sems kyis brtan par mdzad// gnas lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa las// mtshan ma lnga po 'od dang
bcas// mi gnyis brtan pa'i sngags kyis brgyan// rigs lnga'i dam tshig brtan par 'gyur// byin rlabs kun nas rdzogs pa yi// ye shes lnga yi don mtshon cing// rnam par grol bas brtan byed cing// de

dag sangs rgyas theg pa'i mchog/ rang nyid chos kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// ji srid dkyil 'khor rnam gnyis dag/ phyogs kyi cha shas rnam phye ste// bye brag yul kun sbyong byed pa'i// rnam par grol ba'i dngos grub
nyid// ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga dag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi yul bcas sbyor// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas te// rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mdzes// thun mong bzlas pa'i yan lag nyid// dkyil
'khor kun tu byin brlabs shing// de dag sems dpa' gsum gyis mdzes// yi ge dpa' bo 'bras bu'i sngags// 'od bcas 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi// ji srid mtshan ma'i rdzas ldan par// sku
gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas bzung// brtan pa ma gyur mi gtong zhing// gsal zhing rdzogs pas kun tu spro// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las rnams kun// cho ga 'di yis rdzogs par 'gyur// de dag lha rnams kun gyi
gnas// rab tu rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul// gsang sngags rgyal po'i phreng ba dag/ rnam gsum phyag rgya'i gnas rdzogs par// myur dang bul ba la sogs kyang// don bzhi brtsams pas dngos grub
