mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha gnas dag/ yang dag sbyor bas brtan pa nyid// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i mchog/ yon tan phrin las gnas rgyas par// phyag rgya bzang po rnam lnga la// sa bon sngags kyi phreng bas

brgyan// rigs lnga'i bzlas brjod brtson ldan pas// rim mam cig car rdzogs byas te// nor bu gang bar gyur pa dag/ pad+ma'i gnas su yang dag spro// spyi gtsug la sogs rnam lnga dag/ 'khor lo'i phreng ba ji

bzhin du// yang dang yang du sbyor bar bya// las kun dang po las sbyor bas// dang po'i sems tsam sbyangs byas te// dang po'i mtshan ma ma rdzogs par// yang dang yang du bslab par bya// rim gyis ye shes la

sbyor te// cung zhig dbang dang yang dag dbang// shin tu rnam par grol ba'i mthus// rang gi bsam gtan la spyad cing// yul grol rten gyi bye brag kun// rim gyis sbyor ba'i stobs kyis gsal// mtshan ma'i
bzlas pa sna tshogs dag/ mtshan bcas rgyun gyis rim bzhin te// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// thams cad gnyis med sbyar bas grol// de dag cha shas las 'das pas// mi gnyis brtan pa'i ting nge

'dzin// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rtsol ba las// rin chen sna lnga'i phreng ba dang// 'khor lo rgyun gyi mnyam rdzogs pa'o// lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang// nyi shu rtsa lnga sum cu sogs// nyi khri chig stong dbye ba

yi// grangs ldan grangs las 'das pa yi// cha shas thig le'i mtshan ma nyid// 'byung ba sna lnga ye shes 'od// drug pa rdzogs pas sku gcig tu// gnas dang kha dog nyi shu lnga// rten dang grogs dang bye brag

gis// dus tshod kha dog dbyibs dang rgyan// nyin dang mtshan mo'i bye brag bzhin// 'phel dang 'grib pa'i cha shas kyis/ 'khor nas mya ngan 'das pa bskyed// de dag rab tu rdzogs pa'i mthus// khams gsum

yul kun gsal mdzad cing// gtso dang sprul pa sna tshogs pas// thog ma mtha' ma med pa'i dbyings// zag pa med pa'i ye shes nyid// ma lus yul kun rnam dag rdzogs// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sku// 'khor
dang mya ngan 'das gnyis med// rab tu grol ba'i bde chen mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid// shes rab che dang thabs chen po// cha rnams rdzogs pa gnyis med par// 'od gsal thig le mnyam
pa'i dbyings// 'gog pa'i cha shas rnam par dag/ zung du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do// dngos kun rang gi ngo bo las// rab tu brtags pas gzhan rnams 'jog/ de dag tha dad gnyis med sems// byang chub
sems kyi ting nge 'dzin// zhi ba chen pa'i rgyal ba rnams// de dag yul dang bcas 'das shing// don 'di bstan pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyogs dus ma lus nye bar sbyor// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa

dang// ye shes chen pos gsal 'gyur zhing// phyag rgya sngags bcas ting 'dzin gyis// bskul cing gnas nas spyan drangs te// dam tshig phyag rgya brtan par byed// mnyes pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pa// phyogs
rnams kun du spro byas te// dkyil 'khor gnas su brtan bzhugs gsol// ma lus yul kun rdzogs byas te// sku khrus gdan bcas bkra shis mchog/ gnyis med 'dud pas phyag 'tshal zhing// phyag rgya bzhir
gnas brtan par byed// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dag/ lha mo rol bcas mnyes par sbyor// bstod tshig dbyangs kyis gsol gdab cing// dngos grub phrin las rdzogs par bskul// dam tshig dkyil
'khor yang dag par// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te// gnyis su med par mnyam sbyor zhing// phyag rgya'i cho ga brtan par gnas// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// sku dang gsung thugs bsam yas

kun// so so'i zhing khams rdzogs pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin brtan pa'o// rang snang sku yi dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye ba yis// rdo rje mtshan

brgyad byed pa dang// khyab 'jug gsum yang de bzhin te// rim par bkod pa rang snang bas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// ji snyed bsgyur ba'i sgra rnams 'byung// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yi// ngo bo

nyid du nges pas na// khu ba rtsa ba'i gzugs dag gis// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'o// b+h+rUM yig sna tshogs b+ha gar 'dus// las dang ngo bos dag pa nyid// sangs rgyas rin
chen za ma tog/ byin brlabs skyob phyir sngags su brjod// rags pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// rang bzhin med pas shes rab yin// thams cad mi 'gyur rgyas 'debs pas// yul kun gsang ba'i phyag rgyas
'debs// bdag gzhan ngo bo mi dmigs pas// thams cad yul kun rnam par rol// bde gshegs lnga yi mtshan ma yis// rang byung ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// de nyid dngas ma'i ye shes lnga// ma rig
gnyis sogs bzhi po dang// mi phyed phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags// dbyings su skyob pas dga' mar brjod// las kyi bde bas sgeg pa ni// chags pa'i dam tshig dus yin no// slar yang lan gyis
'brel bas ni// gnyis ka dgyes pa'i mchog tu bshad// ha dang si yi bde sgra dag/ bdag gis chags pa thob pa'o// shin tu bskyod pa'i bde ba nyid// kun nas bskyod pa rlung zhes bya// thams cad gsal bar

rnam par ston// ma lus bsnyen pa'i sngags dang bcas// kun gyi tshor ba rtog byed cing// yang dag myong ba chen po'i yul// don kun ston pa'i gnas rdzogs par// rab tu snyan pa'i sgra dang bcas// dri zhim yul

kun gsal ba yi// myong ba'i dbang ba dngos bdag nyid// gnyis 'dres 'dzin pa zhes bya ste// de nyid phye ba las byung ba'o// me tog bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid// bdag po'i zhal du thim par bshad// shin tu bsdam
pa'i rim las byung// gsal ba'i ye shes bde ba che// kun gsal brjod dang 'dra ba'i sgra// gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// rnam shes gsum 'das rdo rje ni// ye shes lnga rdzogs thugs nyid do// dbyings
gsum rnam dag 'dus ma byas// kun tu de bzhin gnas byed pa'o// mi gnyis rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin// shes rab dbyings las phyag rgya'i sku// grags pa kun bdag gsang sngags te// mi shigs thig le
brtan pa'i mchog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs pa'o// phyag rgya gsang sngags bsdu ba'i tshul// byang chub sems sogs bde ba'i rgyun// gnyis su med par brtan gnas pa'o// ma lus dgug cing gzhug pa

dang// mnyes sdom brtan pa'i las dag gis// sku gsung thugs mchog rdzogs byas te// phyag rgya'i don kun gnyis su med// mi bskyod byed po yum dang bcas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// byams pa sa
snying de bzhin no// gzhan dag rang gi phyag rgya ste// gshin rje gshed la rtag par bshad// thub chen rdo rje 'dzin 'chang ba// zla dang bral ba dpa' bo che// gnas gsum khyab 'jug yi ge las// khams
gsum byin brlabs gzi byin bsdus// rang bzhin rdo rje gsung gnas pa// rgyu gnyis tshul gyis rang snang ba'o// lte ba rnam gnyis zla ba la// sngo ljang yi ge swA hA gnyis// rjes bsdu 'od bcas yon tan
las// yan lag rdzogs pa'i yid bzhin ldan// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// bsam zhing brjod bral rigs pa'i gsung// rnam pa lnga yi sngags dag gis// byang chub rdo rje gnas bsdus shing// ming

tshogs yi ge mngon par ston// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba'i ye shes kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu mngon rdzogs 'gyur// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs la// rang gi rtags kyis nye bar
mdzes// khams gsum las rnams rdzogs par byed// de dag yul kun rnam dag pa'i// sku yi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po// 'dul bcas rigs kyi 'khor lo bsgyur// brjod pa'i gsang sngags phreng

ba'i rgyun// gsung gi phyag rgya chos kyi gnas// rtsa sngags snying po'i sngags rnams dang// nye ba'i snying po rig par bcas// dam tshig phyag rgya brtan byed pa'i// rdo rje bcings pa'i khyad par la// rig pa'i yi ge spro

zhing bsdu// rten byed ye shes kun gyi bdag/ kun tu las rnams thogs med pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa'i bdag/ de dag phrin las kun gyi gnas// las kyi tshogs rnams rdzogs byed pa'o// thabs dang shes

rab 'khril ba yi// phyag rgya'i ye shes rdzogs pa nyid// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// ma lus kun 'byung rol pa'i tshul// mi bskyod rdo rje rtse lnga pa// zla ba'i thig le yi ge dngos// rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi

zla lnga// zla ba'i thig le yi ge nyid// thig le thabs shes lnga gnyis rnams// sprad pa'i dus la snang ba yi// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'byung// dbyings dang ye shes bdag po nyid// oM dang mUM du rang bzhin
gnas// twa dang thig le'i 'dab ma rnams// rang gi gnas su bsnol mar 'gyur// rab tu'ang 'dres par gyur pa las// rgyal ba'i ye shes bde chen po// myong phyir thob pa zhes su gsungs// thig le bzhi bsdus

gcig tu 'gyur// rlung gis bsdus pas bkan par brjod// zhal gyi lam dag gang rgyas pa// phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes pa'i sgra// zla ba'i nyi mas bsgribs pa yis// chu skyes rab tu rgyas pa ni// dril bu'i sgra dang ldan

pa'o// phyir 'byung tshul gyis gang 'byor pa// ltung ba med phyir brtan par bshad// zla ba'i thig le rjes mthun par// dril bu'i phyed kyis 'byor dgyes pa// mtha' gnyis non pa'i byang chub sems// phyag rgya chen

por 'di brjod do// rab tu brtags pas ye shes nyid// shes rab gnas su rnam par khyab// rten 'brel rgyan gyi bde ba ni// dbang bskur gsang ba rmad du byung// shes rab thabs kyi rtsa gnas su// dra ba thig
le yi ge gnyis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor gnyis su bslab// b+ha ga 'dus pa'i nyung 'bru ru// khams gsum 'gro gnas bsdus byas te// rtog tshogs dkyil 'khor mngon du byas// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor spyan

drangs te// rig pa'i so so'i gnas su bstim// skyed pa ha sa'i sgras gang ba'i// bdag nyid chen po lnga yi rgyun// steng sgo nas 'byung bde ba'i bcud// so so bzhi bcu gnyis la thim// kun nas bde ba'i ye shes
che// rgyal ba'i mchod pa mchog tu gsungs// bco brgyad phrag gnyis bum pa dang// drug gnyis zer gyi sbyangs nas ni// dbang bskur byin brlabs bde thob pa'i// theg pa chen po'i dbugs phyung ba'o// zhes
kun nas dga' ba'i gsung gis thams cad mngon par brjod do// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las// ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas byang chub sems rnams kyis// gnyis med ye shes mngon rdzogs par// theg pa'i lam mchog spyad pa'i tshul// bsod nams ye shes rgya chen po// sangs rgyas kun
gyi gsang ba nyid// ma nges 'gro rnams smin byed dang// de nas yang dag 'khor lo'i mchog/ thog ma'i gnas 'byung rdzogs pa nyid// ci 'dra gang zhig mngon par bsngags// thams cad spyod pa'i gnas rnams
kyis// 'khor lo chen po ji lta bu// thabs mkhas byang chub sems bcas pas// rab tu brtse bas bshad par mdzod// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi bzang po 'dir// pho brang mngon par rgyas pa nyid// ston pas

dgongs pa'i don bzhin du// thabs kyi phyag rgya gsal bar mdzad// mngon par bsngags pa'i sngags mchog ni// kun nas me tog phreng bas brgyan// dbyibs dang chu bo 'khyil ba'i tshul// sman dang yo byad phun
sum tshogs// phyi nang nyes pa'i tshogs bral ba// de dag mngon par bsngags pa'i gnas// dgon pa chen po'i sa rnams ni// phyogs mtshams cha yis rnams phye ba// rab tu 'gol bar dben 'gyur

zhing// dngos grub phrin las mthun pa'i phyir// de nyid rigs kyi mtshan ldan pas// dngos grub mtha' yas las rnams 'grub// grong khyer yul 'khor bzang po dang// skyed tshal ba glang lhas dag dang// ri bo

nags tshal spang shong nyid// rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang lu ma'i phugs// sbyor ba'i bkod pa'i gnas rnams su// dkyil 'khor bzang po brtsam pa'i phyir// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas 'jug bya// thog mar rdo rje slob
dpon bzang// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas theg pa kun ldan pas// snying rje cher ldan 'gro drug bzung// mngon par sgrol ba'i lam kun gyis// bya ba chen po gzhan don spyod// thabs
kyi theg pa kun ldan zhing// shes rab chen po'i bdag nyid can// blo gros dri ma med pa yis// mya ngan 'das lam mngon par sbyor// gsang ba'i rgyud rnams tshul shes shing// de dag don rnams bsgrub
nas spyod// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lam la mkhas// dam pas bsngags pa'i gdams ngag dang// de nyid rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ rab tu bzung bar 'os pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa'i gnas// thog
mar blo gros kun ldan pas// dam pa'i rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs// ma lus 'gro rnams kun sgrol ba'i// yang dag lha la gsol ba gdab// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ma lus 'gro rnams sgrol
mdzad pa// bla med rgyal ba thams cad kyis// dngos grub mchog la sbyor ba dang// gsang mchog 'bras bu'i rigs kun gyi// bya ba chen po'i don rdzogs pa// thams cad gzung ba bla na

med// yang dag ye shes blo gros mchog/ sngags rgyud theg pa'i tshul rdzogs pas// dkyil 'khor gnas kun blta bya ste// bya ba kun rdzogs don chen brtsam// sa gzhi phyogs mtshams steng 'og dag/ brdal zhing

spung dang bskor ba dang// rab tu brtsegs pa'i ljongs dang bcas// g.yas su 'khyil zhing 'gyed pa yi// pad+ma brtsegs dang 'khor lo'i dbyibs// bar chad gnod byed mi gnas pa'i// sngon byung grub pa'i bkra

shis mchog/ yang dag brtags te shis pa'i sar// yul gyi bdag po snang ba dang// mi snang dag la bslangs byas te// rin dang rdzas kun mnyes par 'bul// phyi dang nang gi bya ba yis// rnam par brtags shing

sbyangs byas te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshad kyis ni// phyogs mtshams kun tu rnam par gzhal// yang dag dben pa'i gnas nyid du// mi shis mtshan ma'i skyon bsal zhing// dri zhim sngags kyi chu gtor te// sa

brnyan bzang po la sogs rdzas// rin chen sman 'bru'i rnam pa dang// dri mchog rab tu sbyangs pa yis// de nyid dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// phyogs mtshams gnas kun brgyan byas te// rab tu mnyam zhing yid 'ong
ba// dngos grub rab 'bring la sogs pa'i// byin rlabs lhag par gnas pa'i phyir// de nyid rten gyi khyad par te// zab dang dpangs kyi tshad mnyam brtsegs// dbang bskur bsrung la sogs pa'i las// khru

bzhi'i rgyan ldan dbyibs legs par// 'phang du sor tshad bzhi dang ldan// dri sna lnga yi rdzas kun dang// ba las byung ba'i rdzas dag gis// ma nyams phyogs kun legs par 'byug/ gnas de mngon par sbyang

ba'i phyir// chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya dang// gsang sngags ting 'dzin kun rdzogs pas// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i dbyings// stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin las// 'byung ba rim brtsegs rten dang bcas// rdo

rje rgya gram sa gzhi dag/ sngags dang phyag rgyas brtan par 'gyur// b+h+rUM las rin chen khang bzang ste// gdan gyi dkyil 'khor cha rdzogs par// de dbus rigs kyi bdag po ni// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gsal
zhing// rgyan dang cha lugs mngon par rdzogs// shes rab phyag rgya'i dbyings su 'khyil// rigs kyi bdag po'i dbu rgyan can// byin brlabs sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas// yang dag bsrungs pas brtan pa'i
phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rab 'bar 'od zer rdzogs pa'i bdag/ gnyis med ye shes lha mo yis// rang gi rigs dang sbyor mdzad cing// sngon gyi thugs dam brtser ldan pas// kun nas
bslang ba'i rgyud dag gis// phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa mchog/ tshad med gnas kyis rgyun ldan pa// rigs kyi phrin las ye shes sbyor// oM sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rnam
dag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// mi shigs dri ma kun dang bral// thugs rje 'od zer nyi dkyil bzhin// sa gnas lam kun rdzogs mdzad pa// rab tu sbyangs pa'i stobs rdzogs shing// tha snyad mi gnyis
yul dang bral// byang chub sems mchog sgrib pa med// 'gro gnas thugs rje'i rgyun bcas pas// rang gi ye shes 'dus ma byas// theg pa mchog ldan sngags kyi rgyun// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad

cing// rang bzhin phyag rgya'i gnas su 'jug/ nyi zla rlung gi dkyil 'khor las// 'od tshogs phyogs bcur 'khrigs byas pas// bskal pa'i me 'od sreg byed tshogs// bskal pa'i rlung dang bcas par sbyor// ma
lus snod bcud khams rnams kun// rnam par dben pas dag pa nyid// chu bo'i rgyun ldan mtha' yas pa// thams cad kun nas sdud par byed// mi shigs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la// gar thabs phyag rgya'i tshogs

rnams kyis// g.yas nas bskor zhing bsrung bar mdzad// de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor nyid// hU~M stobs chen lha dang klur bcas pa// gnod sbyin srin po bgegs kyi tshogs// sha za 'byung po mkha' 'gro'i
gdon// lha srin lto phye nam mkha' lding// dri za grul bum gsang ba po// ma lus bgegs kyi tshogs bcas rnams// rdo rje 'chol ba'i mtshon cha yis// bshig cing dbral gtub brlag byed pas// gnas 'di'i
phyogs su gnas ma byed// de dag rdo rje 'bar ba'i mes// bskal pa'i tshogs rnams bsreg byed cing// rab tu 'bar ba'i mtshon cha yis// phyogs mtshams kun nas bsrung bar 'gyur// ma lus sa 'dir dbang
byed pa'i// bdag po khyod kyis dpang mdzod cig/ ma lus mchod dang gtor ma'i rdzas// bdag gis phul ba 'di bzhes la// sngon gyi bde gshegs bka' bzhin du// da ltar byin brlabs lhag pa'i
gnas// dus gsum kun tu brtan pa yis// sa gzhi bzang po shis par mdzod// dngos grub thams cad nye bar mdzod// lha mo khyod ni blo dang ldan// gser mdog bum pa'i mtshan mas mdzes// 'og gi
bgegs tshogs mnga' mdzad cing// gnas rnams bskyod pa'i blo ldan pas// dus tshod 'di na dbang po mdzod// phal ba'i rgyu las byung ba yi// rdzas rnams nye bar bsags byas te// ma lus 'gro ba'i tshogs
bcas la// sbyin pa'i stobs rnams rdzogs par mdzad// g.yos kyi bye brag sna tshogs pa'i// ston mo'i mchog bzang gtor ma'i rdzas// rin chen snod bzang shing rtar bcas// mang po'i tshogs bcas bkod pa
dag/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bcas// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa'i// sil snyan glu la sogs pa dag/ phyogs mtshams kun nas nye bar brgyan// de
dag gtor ma'i rdzas kun gyis// 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams tshims par mdzad// 'dod pa'i rdzas rnams ma lus pa// dang po ye shes mes bsreg cing// rnam dag byang chub sems kyi khrus// rab tu 'phrul pas rgya

chen po// kun tu bzang po'i longs spyod cing// nam mkha'i bar snang gtibs pa yi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogs dang// rin chen longs spyod nye ba'i rdzas// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po// tshogs
rnams kun nas nye bar sprul// so so'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod bzhin// mtha' yas rnam par spros pa yis// ci bder tshims pa rgyan gyi mchog/ mtha' yas thog ma med pa'i dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor

mngon sangs rgyas// 'gro rnams nye bar sbyangs byas te// rang bzhin rnam dag lha yi sku// dkyil 'khor cha lugs rgyan dang bcas// rigs kyi phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i bdag/ kun nas grong khyer chen po dag/ nye bar
dag pa'i longs spyod de// bkra shis bsreg khang bzang por ni// bya ba'i las kun tshims par 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// rab tu gnas pa'i bya
ba dag/ rnal 'byor mchog gis spyad par bya// dkyil 'khor pho brang nyams dga' bar// ci rigs lha yi gnas rnams su// dri sna me tog bzang po yis// gdan dang rten bcas gzhag par bya// rigs kyi
gsang sngags go rim bzhin// cho ga rdzogs pas rnam gsum sku// 'phro 'dus mdzad pa'i las bcas dang// dam tshig dkyil 'khor brtan byas te// phyag rgya kun gyis dbang bskur zhing// gzi dngas yul kun
rdzogs par gsal// thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// ma lus sems can mgon gyur pa// rigs mchog thugs rje bzang po nyid// sa yi dbang phyug brtan bzhugs mdzod// bdag gis dri spos bzang po
dang// me tog mar me phreng ba'i rdzas// mchod yon dga' mgur bcas nas 'bul// de bzhin rin chen rgyan gyi tshogs// bzang btung bcas pa sna tshogs dang// yid bzhin bum pa dpag bsam
shing// gnas 'dir bkod tshogs bzhes su gsol// thugs rje nyi mas khyab mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba rnams ni mngon bzhugs te// ma lus 'gro rnams thams cad dang// khyad par bdag gi slob ma la// byin
brlabs lhag par gnas pa'i phyir// gnas 'dir brtse bar 'dong ba lags// thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi mchog/ yang dag bstod cing 'dud pa'i gnas// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i gnas rdzogs par// byin
rlabs dbang bskur kun stsol cig/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// bdag cag bsam pa brtan bskyed pas// phyogs rnams kun nas dgongs mdzad de// lam mchog dpal ldan bla na
med// dus gsum kun tu bsngags pa yi// bya ba chen po yongs rdzogs mdzod// dkyil 'khor gnyis su med pa'i blos// phyag rgya sngags rnams brtan byas te// lhag par gnas pa'i grong khyer mchog/ yang dag

'khor lo rdzogs par mdzod// rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las byung// kha dog dbyibs dang rgyan ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor pho brang bzang po nyid// 'bru lnga spos lnga snying po lnga// rin chen sna lnga sman lnga dag/ nye bar

sbyang ba'i rdzas kyi mchog/ kha rgyan mgul chings gzung thag bcas// lnga'am bcu gnyis nyi shu gcig/ rim gyis mtshan ma grangs bzhin du// gsal sbyang byin brlab lha gnas shing// rigs kyi sems dpa'i phyag
rgya ni// lha yi chu rgyun rnam par dag/ dam tshig lha yi gnas rdzogs par// ye shes dkyil 'khor bzhugs gnas te// cho ga'i yan lag kun mnyes pa// rnam dag pho brang bzang po'i rgyun// 'byor pa'i yo
byad thams cad dang// nye bar bkod pa'i rdzas rnams dang// de nas dkyil 'khor la dga' bas// rigs mchog dngos grub gnas su sbyor// phun sum tshogs pa'i yo byad dag/ phyogs bcur rnam par spras
byas te// dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor lha yi rgyan// bza' btung mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// cha lugs ji bzhin byin gyis rlobs// rab tu sbyangs pas rdzogs byed cing// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i yan lag
mchog/ rdo rje slob dpon slob mar bcas// sdom pa gsum la gnas pas 'jug/ dam bcas 'jig rten mgron gnyer zhing// pha rol phyin sogs rnam spyod pas// yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
'dir// theg pa chen po mngon par 'dod// de dag brtul zhugs bzang po yi// bslab pa kun ldan rgyud rdzogs pa'o// yi dam lha la gsol btab cing/ dkyil 'khor bla ma bzang po'i mdun// rang gi dam
bcas sdom pa'i tshogs// theg pa che nas bstan pa bzhin// byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos// ma lus 'gro gnas mngon du rdzogs// so shing sor tshad bcu gnyis pa// me tog phreng ba'i sngags kyi
mthus// ngag gi nyes pa kun sbyangs shing// bar chad las kun 'joms par byed// mngon par bsngags pa'i chu rgyun gyis// phyogs bcur gnas la 'thor bya zhing// rigs kyi gnas kun dag par
sbyangs// byang chub sems rdzogs ye shes khrus// lus ngag yid gsum srung byed pa'i// tshon skud mdud pa gsum dang ldan// rgyal ba kun gyi sngags rgyud rdzogs// byin brlabs dpung pa g.yas par
gdags// ku sha sar pa ma grugs pa// dri yi chu yis nyer sbyangs shing// thabs dang shes rab gsang sngags kyis// sngas dang stan la sbyin par bya// las kun rmi lam mtshan ma sogs// rab tu
brtags pas gnas kun gyis// dge sdig mtshan ma ji lta bar// bsal sbyang bsrung dang lhag pa'i las// 'khor gnas zil gyis gnon byed pa'i// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma lus khams rnams dag byed
pa// de nyid bstan pa don chen rdzogs// mthong dka' rab tu rdzogs pa yis// brtul zhugs bzang po 'di lta bu// dam pa'i yul rnams rdzogs byed pa'i// thar pa'i grong khyer bla na med// sangs rgyas thams
cad 'jug pa'i gnas// de nas mthong gyur spro ba bskyed// lam 'di phan yon bla med pa'i// tshe 'dis rigs kyi dngos grub dang// yon tan lhun rdzogs 'bras bu'i mchog/ shin tu dben pa'i sa gzhir ni// dri

mchog rdzas kyis sbyang byas te// las kun mngon par bsngags pa yi// sbyin bsreg cho ga brtsam par bya// ji snyed bya ba'i tshogs rnams kun// de nas mngon par 'grub byed pa// phyi dang nang gi ting 'dzin

gyis// las kyi dngos grub kun rdzogs 'gyur// de dag sbyin bsreg rgya chen pos// nye bar sbyar zhing rdzogs byed ste// bya ba'i cha rnams smin pa'i sgo// zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun gyi// phrin las so so'i bye brag
bzhin// yul kun rtogs pa sbyang byed de// mngon par bsngags pa'i 'bras bu'i lam// zhi la zhi ba'i mdangs ldan zhing// 'od dkar bkra shis dkyil 'khor la// phyag rgya'i brtul zhugs ma bcos par// rgyan

phreng na bza'i chas rnams dang// bdud rtsi'i rdzas kun bcud len pas// de dag phrin las rnam par spyod// snga dro rab tu dang ba'i yid// skul tshig sngags dang bcas sbyongs shing// sgrub pa'i ming tshig rgyun bzhin

du// rang gi phrin las stobs kyis 'grub// kun tu rgyas pa'i yid kyis ni// rin chen dkyil 'khor gnas rdzogs par// mtshan dang dpe byad tshogs rnams dang// rin chen longs spyod kun gyis mdzes// byang du
gser sogs shing rnams la// bdud rtsi'i rdzas dang bcud ldan par// rab tu dga' bas snga dro'i dus// yon tan dkyil 'khor nyer sbyangs shing// skul tshig sngags kyi rgyun bcas pas// de dag las kun sbyor
ba'i mthus// 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal gnas bzhin 'grub// gsung dbang chags pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// pad+ma dbang gi gnas 'dug ste// rigs kyi ting 'dzin snyoms 'jug par// phyag rgya'i gsang sngags skul

tshig ldan// dmar thag mtshan mo'i dus dag tu// rgyan chas rdzas dang bcas pa sbyor// lha dbang klu yi dbang po yang// skad cig 'gugs par dbang du 'gyur// khro bo'i ting 'dzin gtum po yis// lho phyogs gru
gsum sra ba'i stan// khrag dang bdud rtsi gsher ba'i rdzas// nag po'i chas rnams byugs byas te// las kyi khro bo chen po'i skur// phyag rgya gsang sngags bskul ba'i glu// sbyor ba'i rim pa kun ldan

pas// phyag rgya rdo rje gtum po yang// skad cig las ni 'jig par 'gyur// rab tu sbyar ba'i gsang sngags dang// phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin ji lta bar// las kyi sbyor ba kun sbyor zhing// dbye dang mnan dang rmongs pa

dang// rmugs dang 'gug dang bskrad la sogs// sbyor ba'i yan lag kun bgyis te// phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg dag/ nye bar sbyor ba tshe 'dis 'grub// so so'i las dang mthun pa'i dbyibs// zlum po gru bzhi zla
gam dang// gru gsum lcags kyu pad+mas mtshan// rin chen bum pa rlung la sogs// las rnams kun rdzogs kun gyi dbyibs// de nyid kha dog dkar ser po// dmar dang ljang la sogs pa yi// phyag rgya'i

bye brag 'od 'bar rdzas// zabs dang rgya khyon cha snyoms shing// pho brang rim gsum mtshon chas brgyan// ku sha ral gri me long dang// dur ba srad bu'i phreng bas bskor// me lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzangs
su// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid// dbang bskur byin brlabs brtan byas te// ye shes lha dang gnyis med sbyor// ma lus mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ dngos grub phrin las kun rdzogs pa'i// bya ba

chen po yang dag sbyor// 'gro ba'i gnas rnams rdzogs pa yi// rigs kyi phyag rgyas thams cad kun// ye shes sprul pa'i bdag nyid kyis// brtse ldan thugs rje'i gnas 'jug mdzad// bya ba'i yul kun rnam par
grol// pho brang dkyil 'khor bzang po 'dir// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus te// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i bdag/ lhag pa'i dbyibs gnas rdzogs par mdzad// lha rnams gzhan du 'phos pa

dang// de nyid bkra shis bzang po'i gnas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rdzogs byed pa'i// rdo rje theg nyid bla na med// rigs kyi ye shes brtan pa las// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnam par dag/ bde gshegs lnga yi
yi ge yis// de dag yul bcas rnam par sbyang// rigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang// glu gar rol mos mnyes par mchod// yang dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ltar// so so'i pho brang gsal bar byed// phyogs

mtshams logs kyi cha rnams su// re'u cha'i phreng ba bzang po nyid// rin chen la sogs mtshan gyi tshogs// phyag rgya sngags kyi tshogs byas te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid// rang rigs gnas su dgod
par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs kun nas// rgyan dang mchod pa'i tshogs bshams shing// rol mo du mas brgyan byas te// byin brlabs brtan par rol pa nyid// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas brtan bcings
pas// nyes pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms byed cing// khri dang nor la sogs pa dag/ legs par brgyan pa'i sems kyis 'bul// de nyid stobs kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu

'jigs byed cing// phyag rgya 'bar bas gnas bsrungs shig/ khro bo'i tsham rngams sngags dang bcas// rol pa'i brtul zhugs rnam par spyod// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i tshul// rang gi dkyil 'khor brtan

par byed// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma rgya gram mtshan ma'i tshogs// rang gi dbang bskur ji lta bar// 'byung ba gar thabs rol pa'i tshul// khro bo chen po'i cha lugs kyis// phyogs mtshams bgegs
rnams bsal byas te// sa gzhi ra ba gur du bcas// yang dag brtan pa'i ye shes gnas// dngos grub chen po'i don ston pa'i// pho brang rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams// dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir rdzogs byas
te// rang gi cha lugs brtan byas pas// yan lag phun sum tshogs gnas 'grub// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba'i tshogs// rab tu rdzogs

pa phyag rgya'i sku// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing// yum rnams ji bzhin brtan pa'i mchog/ dngos grub chen po lhag pa'i lha// khams bzhi 'dus pa'i khu ba nyid// byang chub sems kyi bcud rdzogs

pas// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi sku// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang// rigs brgya la sogs dbye ba yis// phyi nang 'byung khams rnam dag cing// gnyis med ye shes rdzogs pa nyid// phyag rgya chen po nam
mkha'i dbyings// sor bzhi'i tshad du rang bzhin gnas// bde ba'i ye shes thugs kyi 'khor// kha dog dbyibs dang ldan par bya// thabs kyi rab gnas cho gar ldan// 'jug pa pos kyang gsol ba

gdab// thal mo nye bar brdab pa'i sgra// dbang po yul du rnam sbyor zhing// phyag rgya chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// brtul zhugs rol pa'i dbang rdzogs nas// rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse gnas la// til 'bru nam
mkha'i gzhal yas khang// ri rab lta bu'i phyag rgya rdzogs// thabs kyi cho ga rab gnas dang// gsang ba'i sbyin bsreg lugs su dbul// phyi nang med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i cha lugs mnyam rdzogs
shing// bya byed sgyu ma'i tshul rnams kyis// thabs kyi theg pa gsang ba nyid// phung khams skye mched 'byung gnas sogs// ma rig rtog pa'i yul 'das te// shes rab mkha' gsang zab mo la// thabs kyi cho

'phrul rnam par rol// dkyil 'khor b+ha ga'i bdag nyid can// sangs rgyas theg pa'i yul rnams kyis// byang chub sems nyid gnas rdzogs pa// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dag pa'i sku// rab tu sbyangs pa'i don bzhin
du// sa gnas yan lag kun rdzogs shing// de nas dkyil 'khor nye bar rdzogs// bum pa mtshan ma mchod pa'i rdzas// rigs kyi byin brlabs mngon bdag nyid// phrin las bzhi yi las rdzogs

pas// de dag sbyor ba'i yan lag nyid// phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis// byang chub sems dngos rgyas par 'gyur// yul rnams nye bar spyad byas pas// mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings// sangs rgyas

kun gyi gnas 'di ni// de ni ston pas gsungs pa yin/ thams cad du nye bar sbyor ba'i tshul gyis smin par bya ba'i gnas la 'jug pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol
pa chen po'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas 'gro gnas ma lus kun// rnam par sbyong ba'i thabs chen gyis// dkyil 'khor sprul pa kun ston cing// thabs dang
shes rab gnyis med sbyor// rigs kyi sangs rgyas kun bsdus te// rang gi dbang bskur gnas rdzogs pas// phyogs rnams kun nas gsol gdab cing// dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i don bstan mdzad// rigs

kyi bya chub sems rnams kyis// phyag rgya'i gar rnams sna tshogs pas// legs spyod rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs// glu dbyangs snyan pas gsol ba gdab// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba rdzogs byed pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni byin
rlabs nyid// thob dka' thob pas kun nas 'jug/ byin gyis rlobs shig ston pa mchog/ dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba'i// tshul 'di nye bar rdzogs byas pa'i// gnyen pos yul kun 'joms byed

cing// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs mchog/ ma lus kun nas nyams pa rnams// thugs rje'i bdud rtsis brlan par mdzod// kun nas spyod dang yang dag spyod// shin tu spyod pa rgya chen mchog/ thabs dang shes

rab phyogs rnams su// yang dag sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi yis// sras kyi tshogs rnams khyab mdzad de// rig mchog sems dpa' dbang bskur zhing// pha rol phyin rdzogs don ston mdzad// de ltar rgya chen 'gro gnas
kun// thams cad cig car 'jug pa'i mthus// yul dang yul can rnam par sbyor// rigs kyi rgyal ba 'gro ba'i skyabs// ma lus kha lo bsgyur ba'i gtso// rigs mchog dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ru// dbang
bskur thugs rje che las 'byung// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas kyis// yang dag dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i bdag/ nyon mongs dri gnas kun sel bas// bum pa'i chu yis dag par 'gyur// rin chen sna

tshogs rdzas kyis spras// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// byang chub sems gnas ye shes nyid// bum pa'i rdzas las mngon par 'byung// oM rigs kyi dbu rgyan bla med pas// nyon mongs gnas kun rnam
par sbyang// ye shes byin rlabs stobs rdzogs pa'i// mtshan ma bzang po khyod kyi rgyan// yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis// mngon sbyor rol pa'i byin rlabs rdzogs// mtshan dang dpe byad
mtha' yas pa// ma lus yul kun nye bar mnyes// cod pan bzang po 'di nyid ni// dbang dang mngon par shes pa'i rtags// theg pa thams cad ma 'dres pa'i// yon tan rigs rnams ting nge 'dzin// byin
rlabs ngo mtshar yul rdzogs pas// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa nyid// khams gsum chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis// shes bya'i gnas kun gsal bar mdzad// byang chub yan lag me tog phreng// lam gyi yan
lag brgyad gnas 'jug/ stobs dang mi 'jigs kun rdzogs pas// rang byung byang chub sems kyi rgyan// rigs mchog gsang sngags che las byung// theg pa'i mtha' rnams rdzogs pa'i tshul// cis kyang mi
tshugs mi shigs pa'i// stong pa'i go cha bla na med// mtshan ma'i yul kun 'joms byed cing// yang dag chos rnams mnyam par gnas// las kyi bag chags kun las rgyal// de dag ye shes chen po'i
stobs// nyon mongs mtshan ma kun 'joms shing// rigs mchog dngos grub brtan byed pa// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang// pad+ma rin chen bla na med// go cha bzang pos brtan byas pas// mi mthun rtog pa'i
tshogs las rgyal// rang gi phyag rgya rdzogs pa yi// dus rnams kun tu srung ba'i mchog/ bdud bzhi'i mtshan mas mi tshugs shing// mtha' bzhi'i g.yul las rgyal ba'i rtags// chos kyi rgyal mtshan bla na
med// gsang ba'i sngags rnams kun gyis mdzes// theg pa chen po gnyis med pa'i// yon tan rin chen rigs kun bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes te// rigs kyi 'khor lo
bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku yi sku ste sku yi mchog/ gsung gi dam tshig gsung chen po// thugs rje thugs kyi bdag nyid las// yon tan kun 'byung bde ba nyid// phrin las yul kun
rdzogs par spyod// bde gshegs pad+ma rdo rje dang// rin chen rgya gram bla na med// ma lus 'dod pa'i don skong zhing// rigs mchog dkyil 'khor brtan par mdzad// nyon mongs bdud kun zil gnon
pas// phyag rgya'i ye shes brtan par 'gyur// mtha' 'das chos kun bstan pa nyid// byin rlabs de bzhin nyid kyi mchog/ thus rje'i 'od zer dpag med cing// ma lus yul kun khyab pa'i chos// tshad med bzhi
gnas char khebs mdzes// pha rol phyin pa'i gnas kyi tshogs// yang dag bsdus pa'i rgyan gyi gzhi// gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can// don kun spyod pas nye bar 'khor// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs
pa'i gnas// phyi nang snod bcud dag pa'i dbyings// rigs kyi rin chen gzhal yas khang// brten pa 'khor lo'i tshogs spyod cing// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// byang chub sems
rnams bde chen rdzogs// mi gnyis dngos grub chen po'i gzhi// thar pa'i grong mchog bla na med// kun 'byung 'dod pa'i gnas rdzogs pa'o// kun tu bro mchog tshims byed rdzas// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma
'gags dbyings// chos kyi bdud rtsi bla na med// rnam grol zag pa med pa'i rdzas// khams gsum 'dod yon gnas rdzogs pas// ting 'dzin ro mchog bstan pa nyid// ma 'dres rgyun gyi phyag rgya la// lha mo'i
tshogs ni kun tu spro// 'khor 'das 'gro ba kun sbyangs shing// nyon mongs gnas kun dag mdzad pa// rigs mchog ye shes gsal byed cing// gsang sngags phreng ba'i yan lag rdzogs// hUM gis chos rnams
gsal mdzad cing// A+oM ldan byin rlabs rgya chen po// mngon par tshims mdzad swA yi tshogs// don kun spyod pas AM gnas ldan// phrin las stobs rdzogs hA nyid de// shes skyobs sgra yi gnas rdzogs
pas// khyad par khyad par med pa'i tshogs// mi shigs 'dus pa'i gsang sngags nyid// phyi rol gnas chen las byung ba'i// phyi rol dkyil 'khor brtan par 'gyur// ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa'i// mtho
ris bde ba phun sum tshogs// dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba'i// dam tshig mchog 'di brtul zhugs gnas// phyag rgya gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur// rdo rje 'od bcas
phreng bas brgyan// yang dag brtan pas spyi bo'i gnas// sku yi byin rlabs lhag gnas pa'i// snying po don kun rdzogs pa'i mchog/ 'di dag sangs rgyas sku chen po// khams gsum gnas kun spro mdzad
de// rigs mchog rgyal ba kun gyi bdag/ mi 'gyur brtan pa'i gnas chen 'jug/ tha dad yul kun mnyam rdzogs shing// rnam par snang mdzad sku chen 'grub// me tog phreng bcas mtshan ma nyid// thugs rje'i
gnas su dkyil 'khor che// mi bskyod byin rlabs rdzogs pa'i bdag/ 'od bcas thugs rje'i ye shes nyid// khams gsum gnas kun dag byed pa'i// thugs rje ye shes bla na med// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor

chen po ru// thabs kyi spyod tshogs rgyas par mdzad// ngag gi gnas su thabs dang bcas// dam tshig gsum gyi byin rlabs nyid// gnyis med yul kun sbyong mdzad pa// dam tshig bdud rtsi rdzas can po// ngag gi
gnas kun dag byas te// ma 'dres chos kyi phyag rgya yis// thams cad rdzun gyi tshig lta bu// rgyu 'bras skur ba'i gnas rnams la// gsang sngags theg pa'i don chen 'dis// sgro btags chos kun rnam par
dag/ sa rnams bya ba kun rdzogs shing// dam tshig chen po'i gnas chen 'grub// gnas bzhi yi ge'i mtshan ma la// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// thugs rje chen po'i gnas yin
te// rgyal ba kun gyis gzigs par 'gyur// rigs kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams kyis// las tshogs nyon mongs rnam par dag/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa// der gnas byin rlabs rol pas
mchod// sku gsung thugs kyi rtags ston cing// phyag rgya mi shigs 'bebs par 'gyur// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs gsang ba// rang sngags phyag rgya yang dag 'bebs// kun mchog gsal ba lhang nge
ba'i// thams cad dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog/ rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// grong khyer thams cad rnam par grol// rigs rnams so so'i mtshan ldan gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i
tshul// rab tu brtags pa'i gnas chen po// nye bar sbyong bas byin brlabs shing// gnyis med rol pa'i sbyor ba mdzad// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba'i rgyun// 'od zer sngags kyis kun spros te// rigs kyi
dkyil 'khor mnyes mdzad cing// rnam par bsdus pas gnas rdzogs pa// de dag lhag pa'i bdag nyid can// nyan byed rna ba'i gzhal yas su// rin chen rigs mchog dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rnam gsum
sems dpa' spro zhing bsdu// byin rlabs dbang bskur mtshan mas brgyan// ye shes dkyil 'khor gnyis med par// mnyes mdzad rigs kyi gsang sngags rdzogs// go cha brtan pas dbang bskur zhing// bde
gshegs sman gyi dngos grub gnas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba la// rdo rje'i rigs mchog gtso gzungs sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// pad+ma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor// 'khor lo
lnga yi gnas bzhugs pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bdag nyid// rnam gsum cho gas rdzogs pa yis// gtso dang sprul pa'i tshogs bcas rnams// phyag rgya rgyan gyis kun tu brjid// rigs kyi lha dang sgo
ba'i tshogs// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs pa dang// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgug/ tshad med bzhi yi gnas brtan nas// yang dag mchod cing bstod byas te// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs

shing// 'od zer spro dang bsdu ba yis// sangs rgyas kun bdag ngo bo nyid// rang gi gnas su bstim byas te// dbang bskur snang ba ye shes rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yi// brtul zhugs bzang po bla na

med// thabs kyi ye shes brtan pa nyid// 'od 'phro shes rab dbyings su 'khyil// cha lugs mtshan rdzogs phyag rgya'i sku// don kun dngos grub bzang po yi// theg chen gsang ba bla med par// phyag rgya'i cho ga sna
tshogs dang// kun tu mtha' yas spyad pa'i sgo// phrin las sna tshogs rdzogs byed pa'i// de dag las rnams kun sbyor zhing// dngos grub mtha' yas grangs med 'jug/ yi ge'i mchog rnams mi

shigs pa'i// dam tshig mchod pa kun gyi gnas// sbyong ba'i bye brag rol pa nyid// rjes su snang ba'i tshul rdzogs pas// las rnams kun la thogs pa med// 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i theg
chen dgyes pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya'i 'jug pa mnyam sbyor bas// de ring khyod nyid lung bstan mdzad// sras kyi byang chub sems rnams dang// tha dad don kun ston byed cing// khams gsum gnas chen bsgral
dka' bar// mi ldog de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// theg pa'i mtha' bral rnam par dag/ sa gsum dbang phyug 'byung gnas mchog/ yang dag lung bstan rdzogs pa yi// rigs kyi 'khor lo kun bsgyur
zhing// bya ba chen po las mthar phyin// sdug bsngal nyon mongs nyes pa'i tshogs// thams cad yul kun las 'das shing// las kyi rgya mtsho kun 'dod pa'i// chags bcas yul kun sgrol bar byed// gnas
ngan sdug bsngal thams cad kun// rab tu sbyangs pas gnas kyi mchog/ khams gsum bya ba kun rdzogs shing// lhag ma dang bcas grol ba nyid// dbugs dbyung gsang ba bla na med// sangs rgyas kun gyis
bstan par mdzad// lhag pa'i dam tshig gnas rnams kyi// ye shes yan lag tshul 'jug pa// kun mchog 'brel pa med pa'i chos// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid do// yang dag ye shes 'dod pa
yis// mgon po kun mchog la gsol 'debs// mchod bstod mnyes pa'i yan lag gis// rigs kyi pho brang nye bar mdzes// phyag rgya rigs dang mthun pa'i yum// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas

te// tshul bzhin mngon par sbyangs pa dang// rol pa'i brtul zhugs rnam pa bdun// dkyil 'khor lus kyi bdag nyid la// byang chub sems kyi cha rdzogs 'gyur// las rnams brtan pa'i thig le nyid// phyag rgya
bde ba'i cha skyed cing// longs spyod gnas su yang dag nyid// kun tu mnyes pa'i 'khor lo mchog/ thams cad gsal zhing rdzogs par 'gyur// shes rab las byung ye shes te// rang gnas phyag rgya chen po'i
bdag/ yang dag gsol gdab mthun pa'i grogs// mchod pa kun gyis mnyes par bya// b+ha ga dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ rigs kun thabs dang shes rab kyis// mtshan
bcas mtshan ma med pa'i dngos// bde ba'i ye shes mnyam rdzogs pa'i// don kun gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid// dga' dang rjes su dga' ba dang// dga' bral lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog/ rang byung ye shes zag pa
med// yang dag brtan pas sku rnams rdzogs// khams gsum thams cad de lta bur// mngon par byang chub ye shes nyid// rang bzhin rgyal ba thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bde chen gsang ba'i
mchog/ thams cad yul kun rdzogs par gnas// bde chen zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid// khams bcur bde ba'i lam gnyis dang// dbu ma bcud 'dus mtshan ldan pa// drwa ba'i rtsa dang dbang po dang// phung sogs ye

shes bde 'khor lo// hU~M gi bde ba ye shes bcas// tshogs brgyad rin chen ye shes lnga// sngags rdzas dgongs pas gang blangs pa// kun nas ldang zhing skyob pa yis// sdug bsngal las grol rigs su nges// mi

bskyod yab yum rol pa las// bde ba gsal zhing mi dmigs pa// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ye shes hU~M tshogs kyis// pad+ma ye shes bsdus par 'khyil// nyung dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems// rtse nas
rtse ru phyin pa yis// rang bzhin chos khams dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sa bon zung 'jug gnyis dang bcas// gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te// dmigs med sems kyi ye shes lnga// gsal bas sa bon tshig
pa bzhin// mi skye thabs kyis dbugs dbyung ba'o// thams cad rang gi byang chub sems// sa bon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs// 'khor lo'i khams rnams sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i thig le kun rgyas

pas// cha shas zung 'jug yul las 'das// phyi nang khams gsum de lta bu// bde ba chen po'i dngos nyid do// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rjes su 'jug pa'i phyag rgya nyid// zil pa'i thig le sngon lam
bzhin// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le gcig/ phan tshun 'khod pa'i stobs nyid kyis// bde ba gnyis pa'i ngo bo rdzogs// gsum pa ye shes dkyil 'khor du// gsal rdzogs shar bar gyur pa'i sgra// rang bzhin

'od gsal dkyil 'khor ro// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje nyi ma thabs kyi rgya// phung khams phyag rgya'i tshogs dang ldan// de la bsil byed shes rab dngos// dus gcig ro mnyam thig le che// sum cu
rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs shing// zla ba'i ye shes lnga bcu drug/ dpe byad la sogs dpag tu med// sems shes mngon par shes dang ldan// sems dpa' 'gro 'ong rdzu 'phrul shes// gnas nas log pa thim pa'i
sgra// mtha' gnyis ma gos pad+ma can// sprul pa'i gnas nas bkye ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la sogs mtha' yas kun// rang rig nyid las ngang gsal ba// bcu gsum yi ge 'khor lor rdzogs// zhes gsungs

pas smin par gyur to// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying pa de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las// dbang gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang// rang gi dkyil
'khor gnas nyid na// sku sung thugs mchog ye shes che// dam tshig yan lag rdzogs pa'i bdag/ ma lus srid dngos dag pa yis// rang bzhin dam pa rnams kyi gzungs// don mchog phyag rgya
ston byed cing// mtha' yas byang chub spyod pa'i tshogs// 'dren pa'i cha shas snying po'i sku// kun nas rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo nyid// bya ba chen pos don spyod cing// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i
tshogs// gzugs su gyur pas brtson ldan pa// bya ba chen po kun sgrol zhing// de bzhin nang nang dang 'dra yin nam gi phyi rol tshogs// dam tshig yul rnams gtan la 'bebs// bla med theg par rab bsngags

pa// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu dbye ba yi// sa dang lam kun grangs 'das shing// skyab pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid// kun bzang 'jig rten 'khor lo'i mchog/ bya dka'i gnas rnams rab tu rdzogs// sdom pa'i tshul
khrims mtha' yas pa'i// theg pa'i mchog rnams mngon bstan te// rang bzhin yul gyis rnam dag pas// bya dang byed po gnyis su med// sangs rgyas theg pa bsam yas par// mi dge bcu dang mtshams med
lnga// nyes spyod las rnams mtha' yas kun// rang bzhin dman rnams 'ching ba'i rgyu// yang dag rtogs par rnam par grol// mnyam pa chen po'i dam tshig tu// ma lus kun 'dus rnam dag cing// kun nas nyon
mongs 'khor ba'i gnas// yang dag spyod gnas theg pa'i mchog/ srog gcod ma byin len pa dang// rdzun tshig log par g.yems pa dang// thabs kyi yan lag kun 'gyur bas// shes rab chen po'i rtsal
rdzogs pa'o// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang// phrin las bya ba mtha' yas pa'i// sdom bcas tshul khrims dam tshig nyid// rigs kyi tshul bzhin 'jug pa'i mchog/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i las rnams

kyis// las kyi 'khor lo dag par 'gyur// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcu// rnam par spros pa'i tshogs ldan pas// gnyis dang gsum gyi cha shas rdzogs// rigs mthun spyod pa bzang po yis// drug cu rtsa brgyad
yan lag nyid// thabs dang shes rab tshul 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i las kun mtha' yas pa// bkod dang yang dag bkod pa dang// rnam par bkod pa'i 'khor lo nyid// zin pa skyon bral thig le nyid// brtan

pa nye ba'i las dag gis// sum brgya drug cu'i yan lag rdzogs// de dag 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du// yan lag bdun gyi bdag nyid can// ngo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis te// rab tu sbyor bas drug cu brgyad// ring du

bskor zhing ma 'dres pa// rtsol ba'i bye brag rgyu dang bral// gnas skabs yul kun rdzogs pa yis// rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid rgyas// spyi gsang bzhi dang bar gsang bzhi// gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad
dag/ bye brag mkhas pas rdzogs bya ste// gsang ba'i don kun shes par bya// bsrung dang bsgrub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ tshul rnams bsdus pas sku gsung mchog/ dkyil 'khor slob dpon phyag rgya
dang// gsang sngags grogs dang yul bcas pa// yag dag brtan pas brjid byed cing// bcu gnyis nyi shu rtsa lnga dag/ gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// dam pa'i gnas kun rgyas pa yi// phyag rgya'i yan lag
mtha' yas shing// rang gi gnas su 'jug byed pas// dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i bdag/ rigs kyi 'khor lo stong rtsa brgyad// rgya chen bkod pa'i gnas rdzogs 'gyur// yang dag yang dag ma yin
sems// de dag nyon mongs la sogs sgrib// phyi rol gzhan gyi don tshogs te// sangs rgyas theg par mi 'gyur ro// theg pa'i mchog rnams mtha' yas pa'i// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di nyid yin// ye nas dag

mnyam rtog pas spyad// mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis 'grub// ces kun tu rgya chen bstan par mdzad do// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ dam
tshig bkod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rigs kyi 'khor lo mchog/ de bzhin gshegs rnams ma lus pas// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang po nyid// bsnyen bsgrub rdzogs pa'i yan lag
mchog/ thams cad dag pas dbang bsgyur zhing// 'bras bu sgrib pa med pa'i bdag/ thun mong gnas kyi bye brag gis// las kun dngos po ma 'dres chos// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba// tha dad gang gis
gang ston cing// mtha' dang dbus bral yul kun nyid// ma lus bkod pa'i dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan par mdzad// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos// thabs rnams yan lag rdzogs
pa yis// 'gro ba kun gyi las dag pa// de dag rdzas kun mngon par snang// rang bzhin ye shes kun rdzogs gnas// rigs kyi 'khor lo yum dang bcas// gnyis med rol pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'byung ba'i

tshogs rnams bshigs pa dang// spro zhing spar dang bkod mdzad de// snga ma'i gnas kun gzhan 'gyur bar// bya ba chen po'i don ston mdzad// oM AHhU~M swA hA/ sa ma yo gI nirti swA hA/ oM man+d+ha la gar+b+he hU~M swa b+hA wa sa

ma yA haM/ oM sarba shud+d+ho s+t+waM/ oM pa ri gar+b+ha sid+d+hi hU~M/ oM ga ga na sam+b+ho ta na hU~M/ de dag yul bcas 'gyur byed cing// rigs tshogs phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// ting 'dzin spros pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de nyid gnas
mchog 'grub par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya dang stong la sogs// rab tu grags pa'i mkhas rnams kyis// tha snyad yul rnams sbyong mdzad cing// 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun gyis gzugs// rang sems dri med
sbyangs pa'i mthus// dpag bsam shing dang rin chen sogs// rdzas kyi mchog rnams 'grub byed cing// de nas longs spyod tshims par 'gyur// thun mong mngon par shes pa'i stobs// thabs kyi
bye brag mtha' yas pa// rig pa bzang po'i phyag rgya yis// 'khor lo rnams bcas kun tu sbyor// ral gri mig sman bcud len dang// rkang mgyogs gser 'gyur bum pa bzang// mkha' 'gro 'jig rten
kun spyod pa// 'khor la sogs pa rig pa'i bdag/ rdo rje a dzi ra la'i tshogs// ma g.yos kun tu khyab byed pa'i// dngos grub la sogs grangs med bdag/ rang gi lha yi ting 'dzin rdzogs// dkyil 'khor kun
nas dkyil 'khor ldan// 'khrul 'khor nyi rim sbyor ba dag/ sngags dang phyag rgya dbang sbyor te// bsam gtan yul tshogs kun gsal ba// rgyu 'bras bye brag tha dad rnams// rang gi rkyen gyis rnam par

'grub// pho brang dkyil 'khor bzang po nyid// rtse gcig ldan pas brtan par 'gyur// oM sarba a nu ra ga sa mo ga ta na hU~M// oM ma ha sa ma ha yA hri ta ni man gar+b+ha hU~M/ rA ga dz+wa la dz+wa la pra mo ta na hA/ oM sarba ga ni l
o ka na pra tI shwa ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ khams gsum thams cad rnam par dag/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs byed// yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dir gnas las kun 'grub gyur cig/ sangs
rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang// gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo mchog/ phyag rgya bden pa'i byin stobs kyis// las kun dngos grub stobs rdzogs shog/ smon lam rnam par dag pa yi// byin rlabs tshogs gnyis
rdzogs pa nyid// ji srid bdag gis dbang du ni// don kun bsam pa'i las rdzogs shog/ bsnyen pa'i yan lag rnam bzhi yis// rdo rje bkod pa mtha' yas mchog/ gtso bo rigs kyi skur rdzogs pas// phyag

rgya'i yul kun brtan par mdzad// nye bar bsnyen pa'i yan lag bzhis// chos don lha mo gzungs kyi tshogs// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya kun spyod cing// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan pa'i bdag/ bsgrub pa'i yan lag

rnam bzhi y-is// zhing khams chen po kun sbyangs shing// phyi nang yul kun rdzogs pa nyid// dkyil 'khor brten pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs// bsgrub pa chen po'i yan lag bzhis// sangs rgyas thams cad sbyong mdzad
cing// rten dang brten bcas mngon par 'phrul// phyogs dus ye shes rdzogs pa'i mchog/ rab dga'i tshul gyis mngon sum du// thabs kyi 'khor lo 'gog pa dang// shes rab 'khor lo 'gog pa'i
mchog/ phyag rgya gsang ba'i bsgrub pa nyid// gnyis med don gyis rnam par spyod// nye bar bstan pa'i rdzas rnams la// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mthus// rigs mchog phyag rgya gsal 'gyur
zhing// 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya'i bye brag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs ston cing// mkha' la kun gzugs snang ba yi// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri sna tshogs gzugs// nye

bar spyod pa'i phyag rgya nyid// mtshan ma'i dngos grub sna tshogs pa// rang gi rten bzhin skye bar 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba'i// dngos grub snying po'i lha gnas mchog/ rang gnas mthong ba'i ye

shes kyis// sa gsum dbang phyug rdzogs par 'gyur// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang rdzogs pa// lam kun bskyed pa'i yan lag ste// mi shigs dkyil 'khor sngags kyi mthus// bya ba chen po'i don rdzogs shing// zag
pa med pa'i dngos grub mchog/ rab tu brtan pas 'bras bu nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes mchog/ dus gsum rdo rje 'dus ma byas// snang dang stong pa las grol zhing// mtha' dbus dus sogs mtshan

rnams bral// gnyis med ye shes dngos grub mchog/ rang gnas byang chub sems las skye// skye 'gag rtag chad spros pa'i gzhi// zhen pa'i tha snyad yul bral zhing// khyab dang khyab byed sna tshogs dag/ yang dag
chos sku'i rang bzhin las// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i tshogs// 'bras bu'i mdzad bcas rnam par dag/ mi gnyis dngos grub brtan 'gyur ba'o// phyogs kun nas yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyis/ de

dag gi snang ba dang bcas pas kun nas rgyas par gyur to// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa'i sgo rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste
dgu'o//// de nas zhing khams ma lus rnams// rigs kyi phrin las thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas dngos grub mtha' yas rnams// tha dad rdzogs pas theg pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad
kyis// bstan pa'i tshogs rnams gsal mdzad cing// kun kyang zhing khams rnam par dag/ phrin las kun nas ma 'gags pa'o// rigs mchog lhun gyis grub pa yi// phyag rgya gsang sngags rgyud ldan pa// nam
mkha'i mtha' klas yul rnams dang// bya ba kun nas rnam par dag/ theg pa'i mchog ni bye brag gnas// dam pa'i yul kun rdzogs pa nyid// de dag cha shas cha shas 'das// las dang 'bras bu mtha' yas
mchog/ phyi nang rdzas kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'i gnas// phrin las yul rnams mthun pa'i rdzas// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang// mnyam gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i

bdag/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// rigs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar bcas// yul bzhi'i tshogs dang mnyam sbyor zhing// phyag rgya yan lag kun rdzogs pa// nga nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// rab rdzogs
phrin las bdag po'i tshul// 'od 'phro snang ba'i phreng bas mdzes// rigs mchog dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis 'grub byed cing// rnam gsum gsal bas rdzogs par
'gyur// rigs kyi rgyu dbyibs ma 'dres shing/ kha dog phyag rgya'i mtshan mas mdzes// rgya mdud nyis brtsegs bcu drug cha// dkyil 'khor gnas rnams rdzogs byas te// dbang dang byin rlabs gzi mdangs

bskyed// rtse mo so so'i bye brag bzhin// rigs kyi mtshan ma yi ger bcas// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang// gru gsum brjid pa'i ri bo'i tshul// nges par btab na lha rnams yang// skad cig yud la 'grub par
'gyur// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa'i// rdo rje gtun khung byin rlabs can// rab tu sbyor ba'i gnas rdzogs pas// khams gsum rdzas rnams yul dang bcas// gnyis med 'od zer sbyar ba'i
mthus// phrin las rnam bzhi'i tshul bzhin du// rab rdzogs brtan pa'i las kyis 'grub// kun nas sbyar ba gtor ma'i rdzas// kha dog dbyibs rdzas phun sum tshogs// so so'i drir bcas sngags ldan

pas// las rnams rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// bro gar 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya dang// rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsdams te// phyogs rnams kun nas bskyod byas te// phrin las mngon par rdzogs pa nyid// dkyil 'khor kun
nas mnyam rdzogs shing// 'od sprul phyag rgya'i gnas nyid du// rab 'bar rdo rje'i mtshon cha yis// 'dod pa'i yul rnams lha gnas pa'o// 'bar ba'i hom khung gnas kyi mchog/ dam tshig mi gnas 'khor lo
la// ye shes 'khor lo mnyam rdzogs pas// sbyin bsreg kun nas rgyas par 'gyur// dgug dang gtang dang bcings dang bkrol// gso gsad 'pham rgyal la sogs rnams// sbyor ba'i yan lag kun ldan
pas// bstan pa'i yan lag rdzogs par 'gyur// lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs rdzas// de dag 'dod pa'i pho nya mchog/ thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// byang chub sems sogs dkyil 'khor

kun// phyogs mtshams bla 'og rnams spros te// sprul pa mkha' 'gro phra men tshogs// lha mo kun gyi sbyor ba yi// 'khor lo mchog tu gyur pa rnams// rab rdzogs sprul bcas byin brlabs bzhin// cha shas grangs
las rnam par 'das// me lha'i rgyal po'i rdzas bkug ste// phyag rgya 'di yis brtan byas la// 'bar ba'i snyoms 'jug brdar bcas pas// khams gsum ye shes 'bar ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi rgyal ba kun sbyor
zhing// bro gar 'du 'phro'i gnas 'jug pas// mtshan ma'i yul kun rnam par dag/ phrin las lhun gyis grub pa nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam 'phrul nyid// byang chub sems dpa' ma lus sgrol// de dag
mdzad pa rgya chen pos// khams gsum ye nas rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor sbyor ba kun rdzogs shing// rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs rdzogs pa// bya ba'i gnas rnams rol pa nyid// bsod nams
ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs// zhing khams chen po kun 'das pa'i// sa dang lam bcas yang dag sbyor// bye ba bzhi 'bum 'khor lo'i sku// bkod pa gsang ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ sdong gcig ma dang me reg

sogs// drag shul sbyor bas chags pa'i yum// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol mdzad cing// 'dod pa kun 'byung rnam par spyod// ljon pa dag dang lcug phran la// ngo mtshar yul kun mnyam sbyor te// zhi rgyas dga'
zhing dngas pa'i yid// phrin las 'dod pa kun gyi mchog/ rang bzhin mngon par 'phel ba'i tshul// mi shigs thig le'i stobs rdzogs pas// 'khor lo drug gi gnas rgyas 'gyur// rim bzhin sbyor ba'i byin
rlabs kyis// lugs 'byung lugs las zlog pa'i tshul// rnam par 'phro ba'i rtsol ba las// kha dog drug ldan dkyil 'khor rgyas// de dag phrin las stobs rdzogs pas// 'phro 'du gnas pa'i phreng bar
bcas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// thams cad brtsams pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// bya ba mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas mdzad pa'i las kun tu rdzogs par snang ngo// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba
gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor khro bo yi// rol pa'i ting 'dzin gnas la
bzhugs// dkyil 'khor phrin las spro mdzad cing// phyogs bcu'i dregs byed thams cad kyis// nga rgyal gtum tshogs 'jigs mdzad phyir// rigs kyi bdag po bsdu mdzad cing// khro bo rol pa'i tshogs sprul
mdzad// khams gsum 'jig rten rgya chen por// nyon mongs las kun zhen pa yi// dregs byed tshogs rnams nyon mongs mthus// rang gnas rgyud kun 'bar bar byed// las kyi sdug bsngal tshogs rgyas
pas// kun nas nyon mongs mnar bar 'gyur// bdud kyi sde rnams dpung bcas pa// thams cad dregs pa'i mthu yis myos// de nas gtso bo lha chen rnams// nyon mongs las kyi spyod pa yis// 'byung chen
gnas rnams g.yo mdzad cing// gcig la gcig gis gdung sems dang// thabs kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// rgyal srid yul kun 'phrog par byed// las kyi sdug bsngal stobs rgyas pa'i// mi mthun gnas
kun 'khrugs pa las// 'jig rten khams rnams me 'bar zhing// rmongs nyams sngangs nas las gzhan 'gyur// de tshe nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus// dur khrod bdag po stobs rgyas shing// las kyi nyon mongs
kun nas spyod// dregs byed sder bcas 'joms byed pa'i// rU tra mngon par lhags gyur te// khams gsum mngon gnas rigs gnas kun// rngam 'khrugs myos shing bred par byed// de nyid
stobs kyis lus ngag yid// kun nas sprul pa'i tshogs 'gyed cing// rang gi mthu stobs phyogs bcur spro// nyon mongs nyon mongs sdug bsngal tshogs// kun nas gzir ba'i 'gro rnams dang// de dag bdag
po'i dregs byed dpung// thams cad sdug bsngal gcig tu 'bar// las kyi bdag pos dbang bsdus te// de nyid nyon mongs bsnyems par gnas// de dag kun nas dregs pa'i mthus/ mi dge gnas sogs
longs spyod pa'i// sder bcas de dag las bzhin spyod// sngon dus yang dag brtan pa'i stobs// thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs gyur nas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor kun snang ba'i// khro gnas mngon par
sprul pa mdzad// khro bo'i sprin phung mtha' yas pa'i// sku gsung thugs sogs bkod pa'i mthus// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' rgyas shing// stong gsum rdul snyed snang byas te// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can
mtshon cha dang// rab gtum gsang sngags drag po yis// nyon mongs las kun dag par mdzad// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams btul ba yis// dregs pa'i stobs rnams dpung bcom ste// rang gi dkyil
'khor gnas la bkod// rab gtum drag po'i 'byung po rnams// nyon mongs ngar bcas tshogs rnams sprul// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang mtshon cha dang// phra men mkha' 'gro'i rbod gtong 'gyed// drag po'i

'gro ba ma lus kun// las kyi stobs rdzogs mthur ldan zhing// bdud rigs nag po'i phyogs su gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// stobs chen khro bo grangs med tshogs// phyogs rnams kun nas spro
mdzad de// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha'i char phab ste// de dag sder bcas brlags par mdzad// ma lus sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs// ngo mtshar chen po'i zhal du gsol// ye shes cho 'phrul yan lag rnams// kun tu

rol pas sbyor mdzad cing// ngo mtshar bcu gnyis cha lugs kyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnas su bkod// mthu lnga dbang lnga yang/ sman lnga 'bras bu lnga// rab rdzogs bstan pas khro bo'i sku// ngo mtshar chen
po'i yul rnams dag/ de dag bstan pas rdzogs pa nyid// nyon mongs sha khrag rus bcas pas// dug gsum rnam dag mchod pa che// yang dag gsol bas dgyes pa dag/ thugs rje chen pos slar bzung
ste// shes rab snying rje 'brel ba'i tshogs// khams gsum sa gnas mngon par sgrol// rnam gsum sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ 'og min mi 'khrugs bde ldan gnas// rigs tshogs byang chub sems dpar
bcas// thugs rje mngon 'byung dkyil 'khor nyid// bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// mi gtsang snyigs ma'i tshogs rnams kun// mngon par bstan pas rdzogs pa'i sku// thal ba'i dbang
po zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje'i bdag/ bskal pa bzang po'i dus nyid du// ma 'ongs 'gro gnas spyod par 'gyur// thabs mkhas mngon par rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas mdzad pa ngo mtshar

che// dregs byed thal bar brlag pa las// thal ba'i dbang por lung bstan mdzad// de phyir gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i rgyud// sgyu 'phrul thal ba zhes bya ba'i// ngo mtshar bshad
pa'i dra ba'o// dus gsum 'byung ba'i gnas rdzogs pas// kun mchog go 'phang thabs rdzogs par// rab tu sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// yul 'dir mngon par rdzogs pa nyid// rnal 'byor ngo mtshar las
byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa mchog/ rab tu spyod rnams grol 'gyur zhing// tshul rgyun 'jug pas mya ngan 'das// de ltar 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ rigs kyi bkod pa snang mtha'
yas// nyon mongs las kyis gdungs pa la// de nyid thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de// mthun pa'i gzugs dang sgra nyid dang// phyag rgya kun nas sprul pa'i tshogs// mi mthun gnas rnams sna tshogs pa'i// cha

lugs kun dngos 'gro ba'i tshul// rnam pa lnga yi gdul bya la// de bzhin ston pa'i 'dul byed mchog/ 'khor nas mya ngan 'das sbyor ba'i// phra men lnga brgya drug cu gnyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas
pa'i// sder bcas rang rgyud mthun pa'i gzugs// de dag gnas rdzogs bsdu mdzad cing// rnam kun dag pas rdzogs pa nyid// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// phyag rgya 'dus tshogs lha mo'i sku// mkha'

'gro phra men sgo ba'i tshogs// rang gi lag cha phyag rgya dang// ngo mtshar yul bcas rol pa nyid// lha 'dre dregs pa'i tshogs rnams kun// 'dam rdzab mi gtsang gnas dag nas// tshad med gdung sems byang chub
sems// ldang dang rnam par ldang ba'i yid// kun nas spyod pas dbugs phyung ste// mi gtsang gnas las grol bar gyur// de rnams phyogs gcig gnas gcig 'khod// nyon mongs la sogs 'gyod bcas
gdungs// rigs bdag kun la gsol ba 'debs// rang gis 'byor pa'i rdzas phul zhing// dbang bskur dam tshig la gnas 'gyur// kun nas dam bcas smras pa'i tshig/ dus gsum mi 'gyur brtan par
gnas// rdo rje theg pa'i don bzhin du// yang dag bsgrub la nan tan gyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bzung byed cing// de ming 'dzin bcas bsrung ba mdzad// 'khor gyi dbang phyug bran tshogs rnams// gtso
bo'i bka' bzhin nye bar gnas// mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas ye shes la// shes rab che ldan sbyor ba'i mthus// thugs rje'i bdag po'i lung bzhin du// rab tu spyod pas grol 'gyur dang// dus
mtha' ji srid sems can don// dam bcas byang chub spyod pa mchog/ stobs chen drag po'i tshogs rnams kun// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// bde gshegs mdzad pa'i byin rlabs mchog/ sgyu 'phrul

drwa ba'i ngang tshul can// shes rab gnas kyi phyag rgya las// kun nas spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul// 'khor lo'i gnas kun rgyas 'gyur te// yang dag sbyor ba'i rlung gi tshogs// gnas kun brtan rdzogs sdud pa'i
bdag/ me rlung yang dag phyogs rgyas pas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzad bcas rdzogs// ma lus chos kyi gnas 'jug cing// longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi bdag/ yang dag brgyad kyi sgra gnas sel// rnam

shes tshogs brgyad ye shes nyid// bcu drug rol pa'i pho nya yis// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo rgyas// kun nas spro dang bsdu ba yis// phyi nang 'jig rten dag par mdzad// drag po'i tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad

cing// rigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa'o// zhing khams thams cad dag par mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun nas sprul pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud
las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ dbang po yul dus rol pa yi// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i gzhi// bya ba chen po'i
las 'di gsungs// thabs kyi phyag rgyas mtha' rnams rdzogs// de dag rnam shes dbang por bcas// shin tu brtan pa'i bdag nyid can// bya ba kun nas skad cig la// rigs kyi 'khor lo thams cad
kyi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thabs kyi mchog/ yul bcas rnam par dag byed cing// bde gshegs byang chub yan lag rdzogs// yid kyi yi ge rgyun dang bcas// rdo rje'i rigs dang de bzhin gshegs// rin
chen pad+ma las rnams kyi// cha lugs tshul gyi kun spyod pas// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// rtog pa bzhi yi bdag nyid can// gnyis med ye shes thugs rje'i mchog/ 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin yongs su

rgyas// thabs kyi spyod pa rgya chen te// kun nas sprul dang bsdu ba dag/ de dag dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'o// spros bcas spros pa med pa dang// rtse gcig bstan pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ shes rab rigs kyi lha mo

rnams// nye bar bkod sbyangs byin gyis brlabs// so so'i mtshan ma rgyan ldan par// yang dag brgya pas sbyor ba'i gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs kyi// mtshan ldan mtshan ma'i don bzhin du// rab tu sbyangs
pas phyag rgya rdzogs// shes rab nye bar sbyar ba'i mthus// rol pa'i brtul zhugs gnas rgyas te// gang zag bzhi yi bye brag gis// tha snyad dkyil 'khor yul kun rdzogs// rigs mchog phrin
las thams cad kyis// sbyor rtags phyag rgya bde ba'i yum// thang gcig yud tsam gcig la sogs// bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas// mi shes sgrib sogs kun bral zhing// ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i

bdag/ shes rab spyod pa bla na med// chos dbyings yul kun rnam par sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thams cad yul kun dbang bsgyur zhing// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// phyi nang snod
bcud ma lus kun// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor che// dus gsum mnyam pa chen por sbyor// shes rab dbang po yul gyi rgyun// kun nas rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// bde ba chen po'i thig le'i
dbyings// mtshan ma'i yul bcas gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'bras bu'i mchog/ kun nas dkyil 'khor snyoms 'jug cing// rang bzhin yul kun las 'das pa'i// zung 'jug gsang ba spyod
pa'i mchog/ kun nas ma 'gags rol pa'i chos// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// rnal 'byor gnyis med spyod pa'i don// ngo mtshar yul kun rmad du byung// ji ltar 'gro nyal 'dug pa dang// spyod lam
gang tshe gnas pa'i dus// sku gsung thugs kyi brtul zhugs mchog/ kun rgyud rnam gsum dag pa yi// phyag rgya sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// zhing khams thams cad rnam sbyangs te// yang dag bsrungs pas
'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig rnam par nyams pa dang// mthu dbang byin rlabs med pa dag/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor brtan gnas shing// kun nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lor ldan// thabs dang shes rab gnas
'jug pa'i// sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i mchog/ yang dag sbyor bas kun dgug cing// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// dam tshig chen po'i lce la bzhag/ sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yis// rim par
gnas sbyangs dbang bskur zhing// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs mchog/ kun nas 'dus pa'i tshul bsgoms na// rnam gsum rdzogs pa'i tshul 'dis ni// dkyil 'khor kun nas skal ba mnyam// 'dod
pa thams cad bskang ba dang// dam tshig mchog rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// kha zas sogs kyis dub pa yang// spyi bor zla dkyil bdud rtsi lnga// yi ge lnga 'od 'bar ba'i mthus// rigs dang rigs bcas zhing
khams rnams// rnam par sbyor bas rdzogs pa nyid// mtshan ma phra mo sku yi tshogs// kun nas spro zhing bsdu ba'i mthus// phyogs bcu'i rigs rnams bdag po nyid// dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung gnas
gtso// bdud rtsi bcur rnams rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub sems tshogs snying po nyid// yang dag bsdus pas rgyas par 'gyur// kun tu tshims pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje 'dzin dang skal mnyam
'gyur// longs spyod 'dod kun bral ba yis// de dag rgyas pa 'grub bya'i phyir// rin chen 'byung gnas ting 'dzin mchog/ rin chen bum pa bzang po las// yang dag bden pa'i mthu brjod cing// ji srid me
tog phreng ba yi/ bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bzang po nyid// 'dod pa thams cad dbang mdzad pa'i// gsang sngags phyag rgyas rnam par spel// rin chen rigs tshogs thams cad kyi// byin rlabs yon tan kun bsdus
te// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor byas pas// thams cad rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnas chen 'grub// yang dag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// tshe dbang byin rlabs nyams pa dag/ mtha'
yas mgon po dpag med sku// mdzod spu rin chen gzhal yas su// byang chub sems nyid u sha'i gzugs// 'od gsal kha dog lnga dang ldan// rigs kyi phyag rgyas brtan byas te// chags pa'i yul bcas dbang

gi skus// khro bo mtshon cha'i phreng bar bcas// yang dag srung bas bsrung byas te// mi mthun las kun rnam par 'joms// khro bo'i sprul pa bsam yas dang// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma thams cad kyis// yul kun

gnas bcas bshig byas te// mkha' mdzod dra ba'i las chen po// rnam par spel bar rgyas pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mdangs ldan pa'o// sprul pa'i phreng ba 'od dang bcas// bkra shis g.yung drung dpal be'u

mchog/ bum pa bzang dang gdugs kyi mtshan// mi shigs rdo rje snying po'i sku// phyag rgya'i bkod pa mtha' yas shing// tshe dbang rigs kun rgyas mdzad de// phyogs kun bsrung ba bla na med// yid bzhin nor
bu theg pa'i mchog/ 'dod pa'i gnas mal thams cad du// dkyil 'khor 'brel bas chags pa'i gnas// bza' btung longs spyod thams cad la// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon gyis// 'phro 'du'i byin rlabs
sprul pa'i tshogs// gnas kun nye bar bsgyur byed cing// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lha mor bcas// sangs rgyas theg pa kun gyi bdag/ dbyings dang ye shes mnyam sbyor zhing// lnga gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'od zer

dang// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od zer gyis// don kun gsang ba'i bdag po las// sbyor ba'i yan lag bdun du snang// gnyis med gnyis su 'phrul pa yi// rgyal ba kun 'byung bdag nyid do// kun tu bsrung ba'i phyag

rgya yis// gnas rnams kun tu rgyas gdab cing// cod pan phreng ba myu gur bcas// rang gi dam tshig rdzogs pa'i mchog/ gnas drug sna tshogs rdo rje las// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i rgya// rin chen phreng ba rdo
rjes mtshan// rgya mdud gnas kun brtan pa nyid// dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i mtshan mas mdzes// sangs rgyas kun rdzogs dbang bskur mchog/ sna tshogs ba dan phreng sogs bklubs// grong khyer
bzang po'i gnas 'di ru// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// lha mo'i mchod pa bla na med// thabs la shes rab rol pa dang// thabs kyis shes rab rol pa nyid// 'jug pa rgyu dang 'bras bu
mchog/ bya ba rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya yis// yang dag 'pho ba brtan mdzad cing// phyogs mtshams gnas kun 'jug pa'i tshul// mi gnyis rdo rje'i tshig ldan pas// glu gar dbyangs kyis kun bskyod cing// yan

lag rol pa'i 'khor lo dag/ rnam par sbyang ba'i byang chub sems// mtshan ldan pad+ma'i pho brang sdud// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang bcas// byin rlabs bsgrubs pas gsal ba nyid// bde ba chen po'i gnas rnams
su// rol pa brtul zhugs gar bsgyur zhing// lha mo'i tshogs kyi gar dang dbyangs// sprul pa'i don kun spyod pa'i mchog/ bsod nams tshogs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus ngag rgyud bcas dag 'gyur zhing// rnam
grol dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog/ ye shes tshogs mchog mtha' yas pa'o// kun tu smon lam ma 'gags pas// mtshan ma'i yul kun sbyor byed kyang// zag bcas spyad pa'i rtogs las byung// khams
gsum 'bras bu las dang bcas// thugs rje ye shes byin rlabs mthus// gnyis med dngos grub 'bras bu rnams// yul kun rdzogs pa'i stobs kyis ni// zag pa med pa'i bde 'byung zhing// rang gi ngo bo

gsal bar byed// spyod pa rnam par grol ba'i mchog/ rgyal ba'i mdzad pa kun rdzogs pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa chen po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa bstan pa'i
le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor la// rab tu brtags pas 'jug gyur cing// byin rlabs yul kun rnam par 'jug/ rang gi ye shes ji

lta bar// de dag snang ba bsam mi khyab// chos kyi rgyun gyi bya ba dag/ mngon par spyad pas rgya chen rdzogs// ngo mtshar ya mtshan gnas la 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad bstan pa'i gnas// rnam par sbas pas

gsang ba'i tshul// phyag rgya thabs tshogs cho ga kun// bstan pa'i gnas su 'byung 'jug thim// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor ni// yang dag yi ge'i dpe las 'das// dgongs pa ye shes bla med pa// bya ba'i

'khor lo bsam mi khyab// sku yi sku ste sku mchog nyid// mnyam pa lnga yi bdag nyid la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun 'jug cing// sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs pa yi// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag gnas chen po// a ha
a sha'i sbyor ldan pas// 'jigs byed ya ha tsa ta'i mtha'// pho brang ma bcas pad+ma'i dbyings// ba ta ba ra swA hA dza/ rgyu yi 'jug pa rnam bdun gyis// rkyen gyi nam mkha' rnam par dag/ yang dag
nye bar bsags pa'i rgyun// drug dang drug bcas mtha' rnams 'gog/ 'bras bu der gnas mthun pa'i chos// rnam gsum sbyor ba'i stobs kyis rdzogs// nyam nga med pa'i thabs rnams kyis// rgyal ba'i pho
brang bcu drug gnas// zla phyed yongs su rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor gsal ba cher rgyas 'gyur// mtshan ma sna tshogs ting 'dzin dngos// de dag gnas kun lhun grub pa'i// rigs kyi yi ge bzang po'i
tshogs// mtshan ma med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ sangs rgyas theg pa mdor bsdus te// yul dang yul can gnyis med par// byang chub sems bsags cha rgyas pas// rang bzhin rnam dag dkyil 'khor

mchog/ mi rtog ngo bor dbyibs dang bral// rab sbyangs spyod pas rdzogs 'gyur zhing// pho brang yi ge'i cha bral ba// yul kun sbyangs pa'i ting 'dzin ni// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gzhan pa'i rgyud// kun nas sgyu

'phrul drwa ba'i dngos// tha dad yul gnyis bsam yas pa'i// phreng ba cha dang cha las 'das// dmigs pa kun nas 'jug pa'i rgyun// de mtha' spros dang bsdu ba'i tshul// mnyam nyid rtogs pa rnam lnga yi// phyag

rgya rdzogs pa thig le'i tshul// rang gi gnas 'jug thig le'i rgyu// 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa'o// ji srid dngos grub snying po mchog/ rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// bye brag yul tshogs gnyis med

par// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i tshul// nye bar bsdus pas rdzas byas te// dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam ldan pa// thugs rje 'byung ba'i bdag po nyid// ye shes sems dpa' sngags lam las// dam tshig 'phro
'du'i bye brag gis// yan lag gnas kun rdzogs 'gyur zhing// 'od kyi thig le rnam par dag/ bu ga'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang// dbang po drug gi gnas khyab cing// rten dang brten pa'i ye shes
tshogs// ting 'dzin sems dpa' bdag nyid do// sa bon zla ba thig ler bcas// yang dag sbyangs pas rdzogs pa'i sku// byang chub gnas kyi rgyan ldan zhing// mthar phyin sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// dus
gsum rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// ngo bo gcig nyid sna tshogs mdangs// thabs kyi 'phrul pa mtha' yas te// sangs rgyas drug gi mdzad bcas pas// dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i mchog/ ye shes dkyil
'khor thams cad kun// dga' mgu dngas pas mnyes byas te// 'khor lo cha shas gnyis kyi tshul// gsol 'debs sngags dang phyag rgya yis// rang gi yul du gshegs gsol zhing// dus ring 'gro la
gzigs pa'i mthus// ji srid bkod pa rgya chen don// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams kyi// sangs rgyas theg pa bstan par byed// sbyin sogs tshul khrims zod pa dang// brtson 'grus bsam
gtan shes rab sogs// thabs stobs smon lam ye shes kyi// bya ba chen pos gzhan rgyud sel// yang dag mnyam nyid ye shes che// 'gro rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// gnas kun mngon par sbyor byas te// thabs
dang shes rab sbyor ba'i bdag/ gnyis med 'phrul pas bsam yas pa// de dag rnam par rdzogs pa yi// byang chub yan lag rin chen rdzas// rang gi gnas dang gnas med gzhan// spyod pa'i rgyun gyis bkod
byas te// chu bo rgyun gyi tshul 'jug pa// rnam par grol ba theg pa'i mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad rin chen rdzas// nam mkha' la gnas b+ha ga nyid// rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor chen por
dbang bskur zhing// dam tshig gsang ba la gnas te// kun nas smin pa'i byin rlabs kyis// de dag mtha' dang tshul gzhan gyis// grong khyer mchog rnams sprul pa yi// longs spyod gnas chen mngon dga'

ba// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma'i tshogs// rab sbyangs dmigs pas 'grub 'gyur zhing// bcu drug cha shas rnam par 'phel// rab tu sbyar ba'i yul 'di ni// dam pa'i ye shes 'jug pa'i gnas// bya ba'i 'khor los

gzhan rgyud sel// don kun rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// rang byung gnas su bstan pa yin// zhes bkod pa rgya cher khyab par mdzad do// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rol pa

chen po'i rgyud las/ sbas pa gsang ba'i tshul la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// sgyu 'phrul ngo mtshar bshad pa'i drwa ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ rol pa chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba
rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang// bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////
